Pros_Review: In my new position as a teacher, there are many trainings we must attend.  My company has used Eventbrite to help us when getting tickets to events.  I was surprised to discover it also displays local events as well.
Cons_Review: I have not used this particular product as much at my job as some other sites like, SurveyMonkey, but I still feel it is an all-around great product with no negatives to report.

Overall_Review: Overall, if you're looking to keep up with every event near you, Eventbrite is a software I would highly recommend.
Pros_Review: I absolutely love Eventbrite because it keeps me up to date on all of the events going on in my area. It has a great mixture of both professional and entertainment events.
Cons_Review: The only downfall with Eventbrite is that most of the events are not tailored directly towards the user. I sometimes see completely irrelevant events on my page.

Overall_Review: from a user perspective, i was sick of paying high fees for concerts (over 50% some times), and from a seller perspective i was sick of the lack of support from ticketing partners for issues that they were causing that was losing us revenue. Eventbrite has great support and affordable fees
Pros_Review: i LOVE eventbrite. not only is it easy to use with the app where your tickets can be purchased and accessed, but the fees are so much better than their competitors. if i could use eventbrite for every concert or event that i purchased tickets for i absolutely would
Cons_Review: the only complaint is that i can't use eventbrite for all my concerts and events since some venues we have contracts with are owned or partnered with ticketmaster/livenations, and AXS/AEG/Goldenvoice. their fees are so much higher for consumers and user experience is worse than eventbrite

Overall_Review: My overall experience has been very smooth and seamless. I haven't had any issues whatsoever.
Pros_Review: This app is very easy to use. It's very easy to find events and save them by clicking on the heart. I also like how the app saves your tickets.
Cons_Review: There isn't much to not like however I do wish you could create and save category lists. For example I would create a list labeled concerts and I can then save my liked converts into that category and so on for other events.

Overall_Review: Love it and we will continue to use it! It has helped us organize numerous events!
Pros_Review: We use this to organize our annual walks and family days. It's easy to use and I love the plug-ins as well as the mass scheduled emails you can create. Makes my life so much easier when it comes to planning!
Cons_Review: The one con I came across is that we couldn't find a way to request donations for a free ticket. Or a way to purchase a ticket for an entire family? But other than that we still love the software!

Overall_Review: Overall, very positive experience with Eventbrite in the encounters I've had. Wished more venues would ticket though Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I don't use this program frequently, but when I do it's a breeze. I love it when events I'm attending use Eventbrite to store tickets as I don't have to worry about bringing any thing extra since I already have my phone with me. Very convenient.
Cons_Review: This software works very well and I can't think of something to improve in the context I've used the program.

Overall_Review: Our overall experience with Eventbrite has been fantastic.  Anyone organizing an event, whether small or large, needs to look into Eventbrite for its event management system.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite provides a large number of features, making the creation and managing of your events simple and easy.  They have really thought of everything a user may need from a great looking event page layout to ticket management and payment collection.  Attendee tracking and built-in messaging is also a great way to keep people informed about the event.  Eventbrite is the go-to event management system from for both large and small event users.
Cons_Review: Expanded contact information collection would be really helpful.  Id also like to see space where an event host could include sponsor information or sub-page sites for promotions.

Overall_Review: I use it all the time and it keeps me in the know of whats going on in or around time.
Pros_Review: I like using this site. I tend to use it a lot, personally, when I am looking for something to do on the weekends.  If I am traveling I can see whats happening in or around the city.
Cons_Review: Need to have more ways to narrow down events to get something you really looking for sometimes. I know sometimes I have a hard time trying to find certain things to do specifically.

Overall_Review: Overall, this software is very easy to use while signing up for events.
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to use this software when signing up for various events. I believe it stores most of your information based on your email address so you don't have to set up and account with a password that you have to remember.
Cons_Review: Sometimes I think it takes you through too many pages to complete registration for an event when they could simply have it all one screen to save time with the whole process.

Overall_Review: Both universities use this tool to manage their events books (even though they could use in-house options). Out local government and NGO groups also use it to great success to advertise and manage bookings securely and reliably.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a fantastically help booking platform for events. The functionality at the user end is seamless - booking steps, payment, information, confirmations, and notifications - all work robustly and efficiently. And this is delivered in a high-quality user interface. The mobile app enables you to keep track of bookings on the go and integrates with other phone functions so that you can rely on it to get you to the event.
Cons_Review: There is nothing that I can criticise on this product but I have not been an administrator to set it up or pay for it so cannot comment on this side.

Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite. It is VERY easy to use the software. I have used the software as I have signed up to attend and pay for various events. I like the software can be set up to send invited guests reminders about the upcoming event that one has signed up to attend. I also like that it can be used for free events and used to track potential guests.
Cons_Review: I have NO cons about this software! It is a great tool to used to create events and have people register.

Overall_Review: I am pretty new to it since my business is young. Overall I love it  because my company is limited in its budget and advertising resources. if you are wanting to get out there and grow your business, eventbrite is the ticket.  Especially if you are tired of the behind the computer approach.
Pros_Review:
It was easy to set up and login for find happening events in and around my area. Whether its a tech event or small business meetings  to encourage start ups.  Setting up your own events using your contacts and send invites and know how many people are coming is a breeze. The cost is extremely low and they have a professional level for paid events. Not all events are free.

The purpose of eventbrite especially for businesses is to elevate your business, get people in the door. An excellent way to advertise with a small budget. I am loving the instagram and facebook integration help bring more people together. If you have the foot traffic I would use the professional level.
Cons_Review: There is really nothing I not like about this program. To find used to the program, I would start with the essentials and if it works out , move on up to the next level.

Overall_Review: Wonderful experience
Pros_Review: Love it! I use this for anything where I need an RSVP head count, or just want to plan a room size or meal. It's easy to setup your event, add pictures, time and date, plus description. You can even send the invites right from there especially if you already have the email addresses saved. It can also be shared directly into social media and easily accessed from there and sign up.
Cons_Review: It's been great so I don't have any, we've liked everything about it. As a real estate company who plans open houses and events frequently it's become our go to tool for planning.

Overall_Review: It is a great tool for organizing events and finding nearby events for an individual and an organization.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review:
- The customer service is not good. It takes days to get an initial response on the email. 
99% of the phone calls are routed to Voicemail!.

Overall_Review:
It is an efficient way to attend events and to give access.  I have used it both ways -- and it works!
As I mentioned above, I wish there was better calendar intergration.  I like when I get emails suggestting events -- the algorythm seems to know my taste.
Pros_Review:
I think it serves and important need -- posting tickets and getting tickets for a local event.
I have used it both as a seller and buyer.
Cons_Review: I wish there was better integration w/ the calandar.  I miss events I would like to see

Pros_Review: I really like the fact that it has many features and it is fast and good
Cons_Review: It is quite complex for people new to skype

Overall_Review: Has really made it easy to post events and coordinate ticket "sales" - how many tickets are left, cancellations, waiting lists, etc. Easy to promote on social media.
Pros_Review: It's really easy to set up and use. Makes tracking ticket sales and attendance super easy. We've been primarily using it for free events, so that's a perk as well.
Cons_Review: It can be a bit complicated to set up different ticket types so there is a learning curve at the start. We don't host a tonne of events on EventBrite so every time we do, we need to refamiliarise ourselves with the process.

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite is great for a quick and easy way to set up an event. You can easily add different payment options for your customers and even add descriptions for what the different options get you. It's great for everything from a golf outing to a simple free event. 

While I'm on the topic, for free events, Eventbrite is such a great way to go. You get a good idea of who's coming to the event without having to pay or give a percentage of ticket price to Eventbrite. A free event no brainer :)
Cons_Review: They take a percent of your ticket sales for operations. Yes, I know they have to operate - however, it would be great if their cut wasn't so high. For me, its a major turnoff when it comes to selling tickets for a high pricepoint. Might be better off looking at other platforms if you're actually selling tickets.

Overall_Review: We were happy to use Eventbrite for a couple of local music events selling less than 1000 tickets each. Which the fees were steep, they are for any ticketing software.
Pros_Review:
We used Eventbrite a couple of times to sell tickets for local music events. Over all, good experience.

Their seller interface is straightforward and easy to use, and their mobile compatibility for iOS and Android  work well for selling tickets on a mobile device. I was quite happy with how easy it was for someone to buy tickets on a mobile device.

Their platform integrates well with websites as well, and at least when we used Eventbrite you could add an Eventbrite widget to the event's website and sell tickets natively on the event's website.
Cons_Review:
Eventbrite's service fees, etc. are, in my opinion, a little steep to make sense for most small events. They do provide a lot of value in streamlining the ticket-buying experience for a guest, so it may be worth it.

Eventbrite also doesn't pay out your ticket proceeds until AFTER the event, which is troubling if you need to use ongoing ticket sales revenue for the event itself. Their payout process is also slow even if you choose a wire transfer to receive your money.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is super user friendly. It is very easy to work my way around the website, whether searching for an event(s) or if I am clicking an link that's taking me right to a specific event. The payment process through Eventbrite's website is also very cut and dry and simple to use. Lastly, I REALLY love that once I receive a confirmation email, a calendar event is created in my phone, I am asked to accept it and then within that event, my confirmation code and direct link to my confirmation email can be found!
Cons_Review: Don't have a specific item that comes to mind of what I don't like -it's a great service!

Pros_Review: I've used Eventbrite as both a host and event-goer. For the latter I probably use the site at least once a week. And for creating events I've used it once with no problems - it worked flawlessly for selling tickets and organizing attendees.
Cons_Review: The percentage-based pricing will hit some ticket tiers harder than others. But Eventbrite is more affordable than many other ticketing software options so I will continue sticking with them for future events.

Pros_Review: Hi everyone ,Fair share of my thought I have found so numerous parties to go to and curiously things to do! you must attempt this because this is a great app
Cons_Review: I do have issue with this app when I fair open but it is fair exceptionally simple to settle. no problem at all

Pros_Review: You can planning, announce and get answers of your event in a short time
Cons_Review: I have not found anything that I do not like

Pros_Review: I use Eventbrite to post all my work related events that needs to get out to the general public. This platform allows me to do so very seamlessly. Since I work for a government agency, all software that use must be free, so this work out perfectly.
Cons_Review: I do not like that I can not add my companies logo (or perhaps I have not figured that part out). I would like the option to personalize the event page as much as possible, but all for free since the agency I work for does not have a budget for this type platform.

Pros_Review: Can take note and sync everywhere i go, whatever I take note
Cons_Review: I really addicted to this software because of using

Overall_Review: Overall, I can see this app going even bigger than what it is now. Possibly even being bought out by apple music. Who knows. But for now, it's very reliable and works like a charm.
Pros_Review: First, the app is pretty is elaborate and very well designed. It allows you to use your phone as the actual ticket! this is definitely the golden age of technology.
Cons_Review: I was expecting it to show more concert dates for some of the smaller acts. This may be a limitation of the data and not a reflection of the app itself.

Overall_Review: Overall, this tool is good and does the job of setting up events! If you are a large organization, you might give it a miss!
Pros_Review: This tool is easy, intuitive, user-friendly and excellent for beginners. Events/ RSVPs can be created, sent and responses be collected in a very professional way. The registrant's details and payments can be collected in a hassle-free way.  The best part is some customization is possible in the free version too and the Eventbrite App works smoothly on smartphones.
Cons_Review: Managing events with a larger crowd is not a great experience with Eventbrite as importing and downloading information becomes complex. Attendee list can be viewed only after linking to a Facebook page and something like connecting to LinkedIn could be preferred as it would be more professional.

Pros_Review: when i get an invitation, it is by far the easiest procedure - to sign in, to sign up, and to rsvp to an event, invite others, or create my own.  many awesome templates, and can save your invitees contact info, etc...
Cons_Review: i dont believe there is anything I dont like about this app!  I get an invite, i'm encouraged to 'sign in for faster and easier rsvp', which in fact it is!  I sign in, rsvp, and then done! It is so fast, done in seconds.  What is there not to like about this app?

Overall_Review: Overall an excellent event invitation software.
Pros_Review: The excellent thing about Eventbrite is that it has a lot of veraitility in style to send out invitations and saves previous information about guests, attendance and contact information for past and present events. It also allows for an organization to easily track how their sales and attendance is doing and gives a variety of ticket purchase options.
Cons_Review: The amount (%) taken out in ticket sales is a bit high compared to other credit card processing or other softwares.

Pros_Review: Coordinating tradeshows and events became very easy with a solution they had in this tool. They have a easy integration feature with excel.
Cons_Review: Success has its own challenges, as your events grow the database becomes slightly instable, looks like a room for improvement.

Pros_Review: Very easy to set up and to sell tickets. It doesn't take long at all. Even someone with no ticketing or event experience can go in and easily figure out through the step by step instructions and info to fill out.  More budget friendly than having to get a contract with a large ticketing company!
Cons_Review: I wish you could have more control at tailoring the interface (fonts/colours/etc) to your needs, but that isn't a huge con. Fees can be a bit pricey for those with very small businesses or non profits.

Overall_Review: I highly recommend Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great because it allows us to collect payment, registration, and issue tickets for several types of events. We use Eventbrite for small events of 10 or so attendees, medium sized events of 50-80 people and large complex, expensive events.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite doesn't have a ton of flexibility when it comes to designing the main page of our events. They do allow us to add a custom graphic or photo, but there are limitations to other parts of the look.

Pros_Review:
The only reason I breath a little sign of relief when I am trying to rush through an event sign up is when I see it's been created by eventbrite. I know that the fields can be autofilled and the event confirmations are easy to find later. 

I used to attend a ton of meetups and events, while it was never too difficult to get signed up. Often the whole process of entering the same data made we want to quite by the second field. 

It shouldn't take me half an hour to get through this because I'm looking for spending the least amount of time possible. It's been seamless and fast in my experience.
Cons_Review:
I once tried to use the platform to find local events that were in my area... that was a mistake. The groupings are difficult to navigate, many events were completely off, the locations I was searching in weren't displaying in a map format, etc. 

This software isn't for discovery as much as it is for confirmations and organizing.

Pros_Review: I really enjoy the features provided for event management and for attendees. I think it's very straightforward, easy to use, and clean. It's helpful to organize the attendees as well. I've used it at several events, all without problems. I really like how you can export the event attendees very simply.
Cons_Review: I don't really have any complaints about it. I think the product is extremely easy to use, and I never had to ask for help on how to use it.

Pros_Review: Once I understood how to navigate it, I found it helpful to gain an understand of RSVPs I was still waiting on and easily pull spreadsheets to help with supply ordering. It also seems to be easy for end users to navigate and allows for a ton of personalization for our company.
Cons_Review: I truly struggled when initially using this software. I spent a ton of time getting it right and troubleshooting. I just didn't find it as intuitive I guess.

Overall_Review: Overall, I have enjoyed using Eventbrite. I would really like to see some upgrades made so that information reflects accurate event details, but other than that I would say that it is a great platform to use!!
Pros_Review: I like that it makes it easy to purchase tickets for events (and get information about the event) all in one place! It is very convenient and straightforward, which is nice!!
Cons_Review: Sometimes the platform glitches, which can make it hard to get updates about event changes that have been made. Therefore,  it seems as though the information listed is not always accurate which can cause problems before/ during the event for attendees.

Overall_Review: As a business solution, I find Eventbrite to be less than ideal.  It's simply not seamless ... such as Ticketmaster would be for personal use.  On a personal level,  I purchased tickets for a concert that was delayed because of the Corona crisis.  Upon purchase, the tickets were "owned" by Eventbrite, yet I never received a single notification from Eventbrite.  This was particularly annoying when I went to the concert (pre-quarantine days), only to learn that the concert had been postponed.  Eventbrite NEVER sent an update or notification, nor did it offer a solution moving forward.
Pros_Review: I find very little about the product to be useful.  Somehow, EventBrite has inserted itself as some sort of Ticketmaster for millennials despite providing a limited value add.
Cons_Review: My biggest beef with Evenbrite is its inability to effectively manage event tickets purchased for personal use vis-a-vis tickets purchased for business purposes.  In the version I was using, it was nigh impossible to toggle between personal and business tickets. Mind you, the user has little or no choice when it comes to the 3rd party entity who "owns" the actual ticket. I'm disappointed that Eventbrite has not yet addressed this as a product feature.

Overall_Review: I really enjoy Eventbrites overall! It is really convenient and easy to use, because it's so easy to just show your phone at the ticket area.
Pros_Review: This is a very convenient app to use for events and keeps all the event passes organized in one place. It is also great for searching new events that are happening near me!
Cons_Review: This is a very great app to keep all my events organized! The only thing is that it sometimes log me out for some reason.

Overall_Review: I skim more than jump and take. Lately my regular work has a varied schedule so I look for the small opportunities and random events rather than the full time or long term deals. I said above that I like the name.For some reason it Pops!Amd on my emails that's the way to stand out. So I faithfully look at what they think might help me.90% a good match.10% not so much. But better than some other organizations and companies and how they alert you to potential anything.
Pros_Review: I am on the receiving end of Eventbrite and love it. It is an excellent source of information delivered straight to me for potential gigs and overall related job opportunities.  They email me the leads and needs and do so off of my interest profile. I have nothing to pay and a lot to gain.
Cons_Review: While I enjoy getting pointed in certain directions I often find that what I am seeking is not always what I am being solicited on or rather what I am getting suggestions about related to my interested job opportunities.  This is rare so it keeps me on my toes and it adds to similar companies that help keep me going, keep me aware and at times keep me employed or invested. The name is smart and striking on a plus.

Overall_Review: Love it, would highly recommend promoting your event on Eventbrite. We even use is internationally as well and it's super easy for company and customer alike.
Pros_Review: I like this tool. We use Eventbrite within our company to promote upcoming company events to our customers. It's really straightforward to use on the backend, and for customers wanting to purchase tickets. I personally always choose to promote an event on Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Not many to be honest. I guess I wish I could customise the frontend more than they allow, but then that's the standard look for all events, so we can't complain.

Overall_Review: EventBrite keeps me connected to different local events and keeps me in the loop.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great source of information when I want to figure out what to do on a great weekend. It's really hard trying to find things by word of mouth because sometimes the information is wrong and then you finally arrive you see that you had to pay before hand.
Cons_Review: What I do like least about Eventbrite is that the locations that I put in for the events I want to know about it gives me events that are 50 miles away from me. Maybe that's a mistake on my part and I need to change the parameters.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to buy tickets to any type of event. You can buy a lot of tickets at a time or send events to your friends so they can purchase tickets too. i am sure it would also be super helpful to have this as the maker of an event.
Pros_Review: I like a lot of the things that Eventbrite can do. I have used it for buying event tickets such as concerts, meet-ups, dinners, and even small local events. One of the best features when it comes to concert tickets is that it shows all the seat types and locations, so you know where you will be from the stage. It lets you buy cheaper seats or nicer ones for more. It's also nice even for free events because it lets the event creator know you are coming.
Cons_Review: Sometimes with Eventbrite the payment process can be difficult. I have had experiences whee my card information was not accepted and then got charged a couple times. More often than not, this part goes smoothly, but it could still be improved.

Overall_Review: I like it when I organize a seminar and have this piece of software handy to manage the people who will be attending my events, whether it is free or paid.
Pros_Review: There's no easier way to manage your own event registration or as a medium to find other events in your area to attend.
Cons_Review: I can't say that there is much I didn't like about Eventbrite because I've been using it for years and have not run into any major issues. I wish they would add more customization features to the email invites.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been fantastic for me and my colleagues to reserve CE classes.
Pros_Review: As an insurance agent, we have to go to continuing education classes to maintain our licenses. A lot of the companies that offer classes use eventbrite to register for classes. It's very user friendly and helps us keep track of what we have registered for.
Cons_Review: I have absolutely no complaints in regards to eventbrite. It has always been reliable and has not once glitched.

Overall_Review: worked overall for us, but our older guests needed continued help. Would be nice if there was a back end credit card, door portal to run cards at the door day of event.
Pros_Review: It was easy to use for our event. Liked the reserve seating usage and being able to customize the seating arrangements.
Cons_Review:
The tickets when printed seem a little confusing to our older customers. The seat number, row and other info needs to be more prominent.

Also the older folks found the website a little hard to navigate.

Overall_Review: Overall, I'm happy I went with Eventbrite. It's done everything I need, and there are lots of other features that I haven't needed but look like they would be great for someone else. It's been great for the free events I am setting up for a client.
Pros_Review: It is fairly easy to use and set up, especially once you've done it a couple of times. I feel like consumers are familiar with it, so there's a level of trust there also. Additionally, I love that there is no fee to use Eventbrite for free events.
Cons_Review: For some of the more "advanced" settings (creating private events, etc.) and when I needed to cancel an event, it took a little research to figure out what to do. There are plenty of online resources, but there were a couple of aspects that could be a little more intuitive.

Overall_Review: Incredible Product and so helpful!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is app that highlights events in your area or areas which you are visiting. It's a great way to up-skill for work, meet new people at networking event or simply something to do at the weekend. The app is easy to use, great UX.
Cons_Review: There could be a couple more filters for the search function you can specifically find an event, but that just me nit picking

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite several times in responding to events I was invited to. It can be a good way to keep people in the loop and keep track of RSVPs, but I think the same thing can be done by making a Facebook event page. In the case that the people you are inviting do not use Facebook, then this is probably the most popular alternative.
Pros_Review: Makes it easy to create an event, publicize it to potential guests, and receive responses via email.
Cons_Review: The number of emails that you may receive can be very overwhelming and annoying.

Overall_Review: Overall, i truly aids us in being able to mass generate invitations for marketing events and such. It also helps us stay organized in terms of preparing for the events.
Pros_Review: I like the ease of use to invite so many people at once to an event. I also like the tracking of responses to make planning easier for headcount and such.
Cons_Review: I wish the software had better templates for invitations. A more upgraded software or graphics would be great. I also wish it was a tad easier importing contacts.

Overall_Review: It has been a great experience, have gotten great results from posting my events on the platform.
Pros_Review: The abilty to put out events and get contacts easily. Great social share functions and embedding to website.
Cons_Review: I dont really have anything least about this software.
reasons_choosing: Its popularity and effectiveness.

Overall_Review: I think it is the seamlessness between registering on a desktop computer and then showing an admission ticket on a phone that makes EventBrite easy and almost transparent.  Really nice experience overall.
Pros_Review: I have registered for several conferences using EventBrite and I found it especially easy to use.  Often conference registration is really cumbersome, asks for too many details and has too many pages.  EventBrite seems to only ask for just the basics which is fine by me.  I get a ticket on my phone and then that's it - I just pull it up when I arrive at the event.  I don't have to print anything out beforehand - I just show up and show the ticket on my phone.  Very easy experience.
Cons_Review: I can't think of anything.  As a registrant I am always happy to see that it is the software being used.

Overall_Review: I have used this product to register for events for myself as well as participated in setting up public events through Eventbrite for others to use for registration.
Pros_Review: In my personal use for professional development events and in our organization's use for public events, Eventbrite brings clarity and simplicity to event publication and registration.
Cons_Review: Every experience with Eventbrite has been excellent.  I cannot think of an improvement that I have wished for while using it.

Pros_Review: I like the ability to get the word out about an Event to a mass number of individuals through e-vite and sharing a link to the event on social media platforms, which followers/friends also share. Eventbrite is efficient and super easy to use. It makes life simple in our digital world where mailing invitations is no longer favorable. The Eventbrite softwate helps me get an idea of the event turnout even prior to the event through rsvps/tickets sold, which in turn helps me prep to host/serve a number guests accordingly. One option I enjoy using on Eventbrite is keeping the location as TBA, and releasing the event location info only to those who plan to attend.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints about the Event software.

Overall_Review: I used Eventbrite to help spread the word of a local directory website and community/tourism business. It was easy to use and beneficial for both myself and customers.
Pros_Review: I liked how easy it was to navigate and use. It's a simple idea that can be very beneficial for the right person.
Cons_Review: Sometimes when it shows up in search engines it's not always accurate for what you were originally searching for.

Pros_Review: It's incredibly easy to learn how to use Eventbrite, and it's pretty universally used, so users can easily navigate your event page to get details and purchase tickets, and it can be seamlessly integrated to many other platforms you're using to share your event.
Cons_Review: The transaction fees are quite pricey, unless you're hosting a free event, so I would definitely recommend doing your research before blindly using Eventbrite for your events.

Pros_Review: I would say that Eventbrite can handle really any event you want to promote or track tickets for. Even if you are a small business or an individual looking to book for an event. It sends out automatic emails and reminders, tracks your ticket sales, and embed events right onto your website.
Cons_Review: I would say the only thing I think would be cool is if you could white label this service somehow so Eventbrite's name didn't show up.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has pretty much any feature or service that you could need to plan an event.
Pros_Review: For events where there is no ticket charge, Eventbrite is free to use. For a non-profit, this is great as we put on a lot of free events. It also so easy to manage and track event attendees through Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: In the past, I have found the customer service to be a little lacking, especially when I want to try and get someone on the phone.

Pros_Review: It's popular and recognizable, so hosting your event on this platform lends it some automatic credibility.
Cons_Review: I don't find it's interface particularly intuitive or user-friendly. That being said, you get used to it after a few times using it. Another con, they take out a significant chunk for Eventbrite processing fee. Many platforms take less commission, but are not as popular as Eventbrite (yet).

Overall_Review: Been using on and off through the years. Always a great experience.
Pros_Review:
I can purchase and RSVP to thousands (even millions?) of events through their site. But most importantly: I trust them. Having used some shady sites and getting scammed, Eventbrite is a breath of fresh air. 

I like that I can add the event directly to my calendar too.
Cons_Review: I find their mobile web experience a bit lacking. That's all I can think of.

Pros_Review: EventBrite makes it easy to register and sign-up for various events. It works from a mobile device and also allows you to browse events in your area if you are looking for things to do.
Cons_Review: I think the search feature could be a little more comprehensive since currently it is limiting in terms of fields. Also I wish there was a way to auto-complete any registration form if it requires a lot of fields to fill out so you could save time.

Pros_Review: I absolutely love searching for events on eventbrite. You can find events based on different categories or genres. You can search by music, food, and by holiday. The possibilities are endless. You can find events in many different cities. As a social butterfly who also loves food, EventBrite is an amazing tool to venture out into the community.
Cons_Review: We need it to become more popular as not all events are listed.

Overall_Review: This is allowing us to save time and money by making it easy for students and parents to register for events on their own, rather then us having to register each individual
Pros_Review: I can track how many people are coming to our event, and who is coming.
Cons_Review: We have no complaints for this software.

Overall_Review: Happy with the product. I've used to collect participant info for 2 events I've coordinated and used it to rsvp for events hosted by others
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review:
-Doesn't give option for free version, to collect additional participant information such as phone number and address
-Doesn't give option of participant info in excel format for free version

Overall_Review: Having worked with many music festivals, overall I would choose Eventbrite as my ticketing partner.
Pros_Review: Very easy for any user to set up an event and sell tickets, and can be expanded to support large scale events, festivals and concerts, with everything you need for event ticketing.
Cons_Review: Minor items are imperfect, such as integration with advertising tracking. Onsite ticket check in is not as reliable as you would like when you have a line of hundreds of people to deal with!

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very user friendly and have a lot of features for what I needed to use it for.  The application is very easy to manuever around. There were additional features that I would have liked to use, but it was not available for my level of subscription.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite didn't have all the features I thought it should have for the lower level user. It's pretty straight forward so I was able to make it work for what I needed.

Overall_Review: Try it out if you are ready!
Pros_Review:
The pro version adds a ton of functionality but here are the main three things that did it for me:
     Ticket sales on your own site
     Customizable checkout forms
     Detailed sales analytics
Cons_Review: The con is the dollar value of ticket cost on top of the %. It makes sense... You just have to get over the hump of having small value tickets and need to sell tickets so that it is practical of pay for those added features.

Overall_Review: If you're looking for a way to sell tickets to your next event, you can't overlook Eventbrite. The features in the Professional and Premium suite specifically are valuable for event organizers of all kinds.
Pros_Review: From the easy to use mobile purchasing to ticket scanning, Eventbrite truly is a "bright" platform to use for ticketing. We've used it for multiple live events and have always enjoyed using the product. Specifically, the Professional toolset allowed us to save a great deal of staff time.
Cons_Review: I wish there were more integration with other platforms. We would like to be able to fully utilize our CRM and extend them to Eventbrite, but it's simply not easily feasible.

Pros_Review: I love the functionality of Eventbrite. For a free platform, it offers SO many different features. You not only can post events and get the word out there, but you can also manage attendees, send and schedule emails, and post the event to facebook right there through the website.
Cons_Review: When it comes to accepting payments for paid tickets, the fees can be a little steep. I did a charity event and eventbrite still took a cut of ticket sales.

Pros_Review: Register and manage all your fundraisers, tradeshows, event gatherings, public meetings, shows and seminars at one place as it is built on a cross platform.
Cons_Review: I see there is a price for every event or show registration which i feel shy to ask the customers though.

Pros_Review: People already KNOW Eventbrite! They are trusted and smooth. Using other platforms have caused issues with our attendees as some are unfamiliar and the processes are clunky. I appreciate the tools that allow us to remember all the details and pull of a much better event. The ticketing is great!
Cons_Review: We have used Eventbrite for years and will not be changing anytime soon. They are coming out with new features and bug fixes regularly and we love it!

Pros_Review: Love that there is an option for free ticketed events.  Many of our events are free and this is a great way to get a headcount.    Being that we do many free events and people just "show up" without signing up, it's great to be able to add attendees manually after the event has taken place to have a more accurate headcount.
Cons_Review: I wish the pricing wasn't so steep.  Many of our events are very low priced as we're a non-profit and only charge what it costs us to put the event on.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite was a simple program that took us step by step in getting our event created and live. Each step was clear and concise.  I was impressed at the ease of use.  We have used Eventbrite at  its' beginning and still today and have seen more activity to our events.  Eventbrite has become more known and people recognize the site as a place to view non-profit events.
Cons_Review: We do wish there were more of a design aspect in creating an event to generate more interest instead of just a listing.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to set up events and sign up for events. Highly recommend!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use event making and signing up platform. It is easy to create events and sign up for them. They also send reminders and calendar invites!
Cons_Review: Sometimes sending a calendar invite once you sign up for an event takes a while (or ends up in spam). Would recommend an easier way to put invites on calendar's like Outlook so this doesn't happen.

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite has been a great tool for sourcing networking events or when looking for training opportunities within the community. Through Eventbrite, I actually came across an event I hadn't been looking for and it led to me being a board member for a local non profit - Imagine that!  

Easy to navigate and tools such as filter options allow the user to narrow the scope of their search and really determine what their local community, or in other communities has to offer. It is a really nice platform for anyone looking to connect!
Cons_Review: My experience has been on the user side, not having organized an event myself, but from this experience I can say it was exactly what I had hoped it would be - A very nice product!

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is a great program, and I  look forward to continuing to use it.
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to build a website to create an event. as both a user and an administrator is user friendly.
Cons_Review: What I do not like is that eventbrite takes about $3 from a ticket sale so it discourages our school from using it more than we could. Because when putting on an event you want to limit cost.

Overall_Review: Overall good experience and has enabled me to find and attend some events with ease.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is good for finding local events and acquiring tickets. It has helped me discover local happenings I was unaware of and makes it easy to get tickets.
Cons_Review: There could be a greater variety of events offered. I notice that they definitely don't have everything that's happening locally available in the app and I have sometimes had to go elsewhere for tickets.

Overall_Review: my overall experience is positive and its been a very helpful resource
Pros_Review: what i like most about the site is that it makes easy to find and attend all the best events going on in my neighborhood or discover ones I never knew about
Cons_Review: what i like least about the site is that sometimes filtering through events can be annoying and you can get a lot of ones that you dont relate to what your searching for

Overall_Review: My overall experience was positive, other than not receiving a response from EventBrite support and the event being canceled without explanation.  It took a couple of months to receive my refund and was not received within the time promised.
Pros_Review: This software is convenient for purchasing or registering for events.  It is easy to navigate and use.
Cons_Review: An event I registered for was canceled.  It said that I would receive a refund from Eventbrite within 30 days.  I did not receive it.  I tried to contact EventBrite support multiple times.  I never received a response.  I ended up having to dispute the charge with my bank to get my money back.

Overall_Review: Very easy to use. This product is very convenient and I've had great experiences.
Pros_Review: I've used this product to make invitations and keep track of invites and head counts. It definitely saves time and money from having to have things printed. I've also purchased tickets through this forum as well.
Cons_Review: I've used this product a handful of times so far and have had no bad experiences. I will continue to use Eventbrite in the future.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite is a positive one. It's a great site for selling tickets to your event.
Pros_Review: The thing I like most about this software is how easy it is for customers to view your event page and purchase tickets. The setup is quite user-friendly.
Cons_Review: The thing I like least about this software is that if you're unfamiliar with the setup then you might have a little difficulty setting up your event page at first.

Overall_Review: I've been very happy with EventBrite every time I've used it. It has helped me manage and track track of events and I enjoy the ease in which I can purchase event tickets directly through it.
Pros_Review: This is a great platform for managing events. I've used it to purchase event tickets on as well as search for events to attend.
Cons_Review: EventBrite is not great for marketing your event. You must do that on your own. However, it's a great ticketing and registration software.

Overall_Review: I quite like using Eventbrite for events going on in our personal lives. I used to use it quite a bit more, before Facebook became so popular and I started using Facebook events, but I did use one for my son's birthday party this past year. I don't like FB events for birthdays because many don't see it. I liked that you can use it  as a text message.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so easy to use to create events. I used it quite a bit more, before Facebook became so popular and I started using Facebook events, but I did use one for my son's birthday party this past year. I don't like FB events for birthdays because many don't see it. I liked that you can use it  as a text message.
Cons_Review: I don't like that it was hard for people to find the text and sign into the invite without signing in to the program.

Overall_Review: Page load is one thing they should be fixed (or maybe my internet connection? haha), overall I really like it!
Pros_Review: Apart from its function to help us searching for recent events nearby or across countries, I really like how it looks or its interface now. Very minimalistic and user friendly.
Cons_Review: I don't have any reason to hate or dislike this software actually. Unless its page load that sometimes takes more time than other website.

Overall_Review: Overall I found it to be an easy streamline process and would have no stress of using it again, or creating an event for myself in it.
Pros_Review: The times I have used this software to purchase tickets for an Event it was so easy to use. You can click a link thats shared with you that takes you directly to your event to purchase tickets or you can search for events in your area to purchase tickets.  It will also store your purchased tickets for easy electronic retrieval at the event.
Cons_Review: Each time I used the software I had no problems or issues with it. It was easy to use and log in and create an account.

Overall_Review: I overall really liked using Eventbrite! It was easy to use and makes my life more fun by adding some cool options of things to do!
Pros_Review: I liked that I could register for and see events very clearly with a picture and a description. I also liked the search feature.
Cons_Review: I disliked that not every event did mobile tickets and made you print them out. This would only be bad in cases of getting last minute tickets.

Pros_Review: this is the only ticket purchasing app I have downloaded on my phone and the one I prioritize when it comes to picking events. The website and app are incredibly user friendly and easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: Haven't had any issues with the app or website as of yet.
reasons_choosing: There was an incident with fake tickets a friend purchased via ticketmaster, so I stopped using them.

Pros_Review: I've purchased and signed up for tickets for multiple events through Eventbrite.  It's very easy to do and I appreciate being able to browse upcoming events to see what I would be interested in.  I love ordering tickets online and being able to pull them up on my phone, without having to print them out.
Cons_Review: I like everything about this software, it's useful for all sorts of events and businesses.

Pros_Review: There's an easy template, navigation and onboarding to get you from nothing to collecting money for an event -- in 10 minutes.
Cons_Review: The lack of customization, it's on purpose but it really is designed for those who don't care too much about their own branding.

Pros_Review: Offers so much functionality to create variety of access levels to your event. Creates easy methods of tracking attendees.
Cons_Review: It's not mobile friendly in terms of making edits to event details.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has made it easier to publish and promote our events, resulting in an increase in attendance. Also, it has made it much easier for us to capture payment. The end users also find it easy as they only need to submit their credit card details online.
Pros_Review: I love how easy Eventbrite makes it to publish and accept payments for events. My company conducts a lot of paid training sesssions and workshops, so it's nice to have an intuitive platform where I can manage all of them.
Cons_Review: So far, there are no cons to Eventbrite that I have experienced. I really like the platform a lot.
reasons_choosing: N/A

Overall_Review: I highly recommend Eventbrite because it's much better and an enhanced way to send out professional, attractive invitations to your email contacts, instead of just sending a plain email. The tracking and follow-up features are very helpful, too.
Pros_Review: I love Eventbrite because it helps you create professional invitations with a lot of customization, tracking, follow-ups, etc. I only use the free service, but it's still an in-depth tool that assists us with sending invitations to business meetings, event sign-ups, and much more.
Cons_Review: I really haven't found any limitations to what Eventbrite offers, and that's using the free service!

Overall_Review: I use this for several non-profits events that I volunteer for.
Pros_Review: It is very easy to set up an event and gets guests registered. For no-fee events it is great.
Cons_Review: The fees for paid events are more than other competitors. Since I generally use this for non-profits, this can be an issue

Overall_Review: I have used this over the last 5 years for our annual events in our company. I love that I can use it free of charge, I can email everyone to invite them , and it will update me and track who has responded and who hasn't. I also like the feature that allows you to limit the number of guests they are allowed to bring with them, and can be set to zero if it is a staff only function.
Pros_Review: There are many selections to choose from when using it FREE.
Cons_Review: The better quality selections are ones that cost.

Pros_Review: Does everything I would need for buying tickets to shows and events that I want to attend. Pretty straightforward sign-up and archiving events, as well as accessing my tickets. Used for most events I go to, so it is convenient.
Cons_Review: Could be better at recommending concerts and events I would actually want to attend. Their browse and suggestions don't always align with my interests.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to navigate from both the event planner and attendee's perspectives. The fees are also minimal for ticket purchases. The mobile app enables event goers to easily manage their schedules and tickets.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is best for simple events. I would not recommend it for use in complicated events, such as conferences with multiple simultaneous sessions.

Overall_Review: Try and verify who the tickets are for, in the case they are changing the person attending event allow for easier change. No single person needs 6 tickets to anything, period.
Pros_Review: I use this several times a year to purchase. It's very straight forward and you don't have to worry about discrepancy in prices. I have mainly used this to purchase concert tickets and I usually see that the ticket prices stay stationary rather than fluctuating like other ticket or even websites. 10/10 recommend.
Cons_Review: Something Eventbrite along with most other event ticket selling platforms should really work on is the emphasis they should place on people who are ordering a LOT of tickets at once. There tends to be a clear trend in scalping tickets especially for events in small venues.

Overall_Review: Overall my experience with Eventbrite has been excellent. I am able to find and purchase tickets for ALMOST every show i go to PLUS my friends who throw events use them.
Pros_Review: I use Eventbrite for any and all shows i attend in my city and it is all i use. Not only do i find it better then Ticketmaster i feel like the service fees are less as well.
Cons_Review: I have absolutely nothing bad to say against Eventbrite. I have used this site for years and have yet to run into issues.

Overall_Review: This is the simplest of software for both setting up a meeting and reviewing a meeting invite.  You have the ability to review the content of the meeting, the venue, date and time.  Once accepted, it's one click to download to your calendar; Outlook, google, etc.
Pros_Review: Great for reviewing a meeting content, date and time.  Takes minutes to both set up and respond to a new meeting and venue.
Cons_Review: I cannot really think of a downside to this software.  It truly takes minutes to use.

Overall_Review: Amazing Customer Service - whenever I had a question, I was able to get a quick answer either via phone or live chat
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: Some features only seem to be accessible by the account owner and not the other admins (e.g. download attendee list including all form questions)

Pros_Review: We almost always use Eventbrite for planning events because it is easy for us and easy for our participants when they register to attend.  The fees are reasonable and we've never had a problem.
Cons_Review: At first, we found it a little difficult to link Eventbrite to some of the other software we use, including our website, so that people could go to one place for registering.  Eventually, we got the hang of it, and now there's no problems at all.

Overall_Review: Overall I like the idea of Eventbrite and it somehow works decent enough. (at the side of customers buying tickets the site is perfect and you'll have your tickets immediatly in your mailbox after paying). But from a seller's perspective I think they could've done a way better job at making it simple and easy to use.
Pros_Review: I like the fact that you can just set-up an event if you're organising one. Everyone can sell tickets for their events and that's a good thing, makes your event available to a large audience so you could probably get more visitors by putting it on a website like Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: When you are selling tickets you will have some trouble solving everything. I remember having a lot of trouble with changing events and the available tickets. Had to wait a long time to get a response from their support aswell.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is an easy tool and fun to use. It makes finding, attending and planning events simpole and enjoyable.
Pros_Review: It is easy to organize an event and invite others in a timely and accurate matter. Also, finding events to attend or join is easy with this tool, which is especially important for those owning small businesses and need to make their presence known in the community.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints with this software.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been a great tool for selling tickets. I like that you can send email notifications to all or just a portion of your registrants. You can easily keep track of tickets sold and manipulate those controls. And I like the analytics that help you know who is buying and when. Great product.
Pros_Review: I like Eventbrite b/c of the way it integrates with social media. I can set up my facebook event page and have the option for people to buy tickets right there without having to be re-directed back to eventbrite. That is super helpful and makes us look really professional.
Cons_Review: I don't like that you can't really customize your event page. I think that was a recent change b/c you used to be able to manipulate colors and fonts for the page, but now the colors automatically generate based on your event header image.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a convenient interface for attendees to view event information and register for events. It's also easy to cancel registrations and access a list of attendees.
Cons_Review: The skin/theming isn't as customizable as I would like for it to be, in order to match the theming on event pages. I would also like more options to be able to frame just the registration section instead of the full page; Eventbrite has decreased the framing/sharing options in recent years.

Pros_Review: I have been using Eventbrite for several years. It is very user-friendly. Anyone can figure it out. You can manage rsvps, updates, pricing/location info, etc. It also keeps a history of your past events.
Cons_Review: Not much that I don't like. I've used other event planning apps/software, but I still like Eventbrite. Maybe they could eliminate or extend the timer that they place on the screen to finish your order before the tickets go back in the pool.

Pros_Review: If you want to create a cool invite that reaches everyone who has email, and uses graphics that are fun this is an easy way to do that. Not everyone uses Facebook, so an invite here is better sometimes.
Cons_Review: With all freebie software platforms there are advertisements, it's just annoying sometimes frankly. Also, it would be great if a snail mail option with postal purchasing built in was included. Some people still don't respond or get (believe it or not!) email.

Pros_Review: I never had any issues using it. The UI/UX is quite clear and havent noticed anything that would stop me from using it. Other than that its up to the creator if he will make the event on facebook eventbrite etc.
Cons_Review: There isnt really any incentive to use it. I get annoyed that I have to retype things from my account a lot of times but its kinda irrelevant. If someone wants me to sign up through it, I will but thats it.

Overall_Review: You can organize and sell your tickets for your next conference or class.
Pros_Review: Is beautiful to use. Eventbrite is very well designed, so it is very useful to understand how the things work. The best of Eventbrite is that is free when your event is free! So when I'm organizing a free conversation or conference i know Eventbrite is the best solution to distribute my entrance tickets. Even when is a paid event, Eventbrite only takes the 6% as a commission for the sell and it give me an event page to promote the event and an app to control the sales.
Cons_Review: It could be amazing if Eventbrite implements more payment methods (I know you can use Debit and credit cards), that could be useful in no banked countries. Sometimes people prefers to go and pay physically what they buys.

Pros_Review: We've never hosted an event, but have been on the "guest" end several times and each time we use Eventbrite, we can rest at ease knowing our bases are already covered and we don't have to worry about printing, remembering, or picking up any physical tickets. Makes attending the event so much easier to have everything in one place.
Cons_Review: We're really happy this app exists, though again we can't speak to the "hosting" side of using the app.

Pros_Review: Working with various events I have enjoyed my experience with eventbrite. Really easy to use for customers, will help you track and keep your event organized without worry.  The positives are lots of features, options for collecting payments, reporting, notifications, and use of app. It works great!
Cons_Review: Their service fees are on the higher side. Would like to see more options for templates (use for promotion) which better fit what we're going for per event.

Overall_Review: I could not imagine a better event RSVP software product. My life has changed since I used it.
It's a great platform and the one to use if you are often booking events.
Pros_Review: It has a beautiful UX that is very professional looking and legit. When people think of event sign-ups they think of eventbrite. What else do people even use? They are the best in the game.
Cons_Review: I feel like the prices keep getting higher and higher to use the platform. They are great but hate losing 2% of transactions.

Overall_Review: Used it for years for various events of both small and large size.
Pros_Review: Useful for tracking both small and large numbers of events.  Been great for using as invites and check ins for events especially with COVID restrictions in place
Cons_Review: Not everyone has been able to use the check in option.  It doesn't work without an internet connection for checkin which makes some remote locations a little iffy.

Overall_Review: For industry events, it's been good to use this for registration.
Pros_Review: I have used this program many times when registering for industry events. The registration process has been easy and it keeps track of where/when the event is being held.
Cons_Review: Nothing comes to mind as a deal breaker when using this program. Oftentimes, there isn't an option (to use something else) when registering for an event.

Overall_Review: I use the software weekly to find events local to me and it's been great in finding local and virtual events
Pros_Review: I like how easy it makes finding local and virtual networking events for business and also for personal
Cons_Review: More so of an admin poster issue but sometimes closed events will be posted and you won't know that they are member only events until actually joining

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is a great and simple to use tool to organize and attend events.
Pros_Review: My favorite feature is the Eventbrite's ability to integrate with a multitude of different devices making it super easy to find and use when it's time to attend an event.
Cons_Review: In order to find the event you're looking for you either need to know the specific name of the event or it could be hard to locate going through the directory.

Overall_Review: We are able to invite attendees to our events and manage the guest list effortlessly!
Pros_Review: I love this software because it is very easy to use for me and our guests. Managing the guest list is easy, and the company takes care of making sure that the attendees get the info they need via email!
Cons_Review: I dont have one con to report about this software. It has served us well for events and very easy to use!

Overall_Review: So far, I have been really satisfied with the services provided.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an well thought software that has been helpful to me and my colleagues for managing office meetings and conferences. Eventbrite has a very user friendly interface, easy to use  and support is usually quick to respond to any issues I may have.
Cons_Review: I do not have any complain about this software. It has not given me any problem since i started using it, but it is good some more features are added to make it easier to share events. There is definitely room for improvement.

Overall_Review: Good experience overall. It took me a little while to confidently set-up an event with eventbrite.=, repeat events were very easy to set-up.
Pros_Review: I used eventbrite for a few repeat events we were hosting. I really like the ability to replicate past events and edit details.
Cons_Review: It was a little confusing to set-up the first time around. I didn't find the help page very helpful and googled answers to my questions.

Overall_Review: Absolutely great, we use this for all events we host!
Pros_Review: I loved using eventbrite for events we hosted! it was easy to set everything up and share our event through the site. It's easy for customers to purchase and it's great they receive their tickets on their emails.
Cons_Review: I honestly don't have anything against this software. It's great as it fills the need and at a great cost to the team.

Overall_Review: Sometimes the best thing is staying simple, but staying simple is very difficult many times. This software has achieved it for many years so it is that getting together.
Pros_Review: I think this is a very good software to get people together for meetings, social activities, art exhibitions, etc.
Cons_Review: I met this software in 2016. In the beginning, many people did not know it, but now it is a very well-known app.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a fantastic tool for planning events and managing attendees/constituents. A free resource with so much planning/organizational power is a no-brainer and SO valuable to our organization.
Pros_Review: I love the simplicity of the tool and the features. The invitation design is also a huge plus.
Cons_Review: The ads and the paid designs are great but I wish the tool was completely free. But I understand the company needing to make a profit.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite gives several event suggestions forevents I may be interested in based on the events I have attended which is a great social tool. There wide variety of event hsted on this platform makes it a powerful tool for planning fun nights out in the city.
Pros_Review: I like that many companies use this software to launch/organize their event ticketing. You can integrate it with your Google Calendar, and get real notifications on the events you sign up for. It is a veru intuitive software which makes it very easy to use.
Cons_Review: The search function on the mobile app can be a little laggy and a little counterintuitive. I thik getting pop-up or notifications with new events around your area would be great. Now, you are the one that has to go into the app and look for something.

Overall_Review: Many of our staff has enjoyed free trainings registered via eventbrite. We have been able to network and gain new clients too
Pros_Review: I have been priviledged to attend life/business saving trainings related to my industry, some free and some paid for.  This guys has done a great job giving us a platform where we can search through useful events and pick and chose which to attend.
Cons_Review: The search feature isn't so great. Having to type in all data for payment is exhausting.  Haven't been able to process refunds for events that failed to hold, I think you guys need to hold funds in escrow until events are confirmed to hold, so that refunds will be processed trough eventbrite and not organizers

Overall_Review: Nothing but all positive experiences every time I've used it
Pros_Review: I am able to find great events where I live and when I travel easily through the app. Also it stores all of your tickets under your account so need to waste ink by printing!
Cons_Review: There is absolutely nothing that I like least about this app/website, everything is truly awesome. I really love it.....

Overall_Review: I love being able to enter a city's name and find out about things happening around town! I can receive notices about events if I choose too. Lastly, I love that the app tracks all of the events I've attended.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows me to keep track of places I want to go and I have access to the tickets on my cell phone.
Cons_Review: There's not much to complain about honestly. Each time that I've used it, I haven't had any problems getting into any events.

Overall_Review: We are able to host large-scale events more easily and stay organized with gathering payments.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is the best software out there to help you create a large-scale event with shareable links, information, payment processing, and RSVPs. It really helps you think through all the details
Cons_Review: I mean, I would say the only drawback is the percentage charged with each transaction to use their platform.

Overall_Review: Mine experience has been somewhat positive, and as someone in the tech industry I can say the interface and user experience is quite well. However, based on the poor customer experience received by a few of my close friends, I would choose to avoid Eventbrite when I can.
Pros_Review: Easy to navigate interface, and can easily find events nearby in a timely fashion. Choosing seats and ticket options is an overall positive experience through this software.
Cons_Review: Typically I would do my best to avoid purchasing from Eventbrite if I can. This is mainly based on hearing poor experiences from some peers and coworkers. Generally, the feedback is about poor customer service and in some cases been victim of scams which were left unresolved by the Eventbrite team. Personally, the Eventbrite interface is easy to use, and tickets and events are easily navigated. However, would choose Ticketmaster as my primary place to purchase.

Overall_Review: It is something that is meant to make life easier but yet it requires too many steps.
Pros_Review: The easiness of remembering my details is good, also that it integrates with calendars although this may be troublesome with ical.
Cons_Review: The notes when it asks to integrate with calendars are not explicit enough. it should also work more smoothly with siri commands if it works at all.

Overall_Review: Overall, I haven't had a bad experience with Eventbrite. It's been great and I plan on continuing to use it.
Pros_Review: I love using event brite to get an accurate count of how many people will be attending my events, it's easy to use on the back and front end.
Cons_Review: I dislike the fee that eventbrite charges to users when creating $ based events. I understand it's how they make their money but it's what I like least.

Overall_Review: I will definitely continue to use Eventbrite. It's a great way to find things going on.
Pros_Review: I have never set up and event on Eventbrite but have used it in several occasions to RSVP to events. It's so easy to use. I love the convenience of the product.
Cons_Review: I'm not sure there was anything I don't like.  Maybe I don't have the settings correct but I'd like the see events listed in order of occurrence instead of random order.

Overall_Review: I have RSVP'd to many events using Eventbrite and even bought tickets thru EventBrite. The ticket buying process isn't as seamless as the rest of the functionality of the site but overall it works good and is easy and quick to use.  The best part is the auto reminders that it sends before the event and you can also have it import the event into your personal calendar which is super convenient. Definitely would recommend this software
Pros_Review:
It's easy to use as a user. Just a few clicks and you can respond whether or not you are going to an event. And it can send you a reminder email a day or two before the event so you don't forget.
Also on the site it's easy to see all the information - date, time, location.
Cons_Review: If you need to pay for an event thru the software the process is a bit cumbersome.

Overall_Review: I enjoy using Eventbrite. Have used it for years and always my go to.
Pros_Review: This is a good system to use when creating events or hosting virtual fundraisers. Eventbrite allows you to create a ticket and have your guest/supporters RSVP. Highly recommended if you have limited capacity in budgeting.
Cons_Review: You have to pay to upgrade to higher features. I work at a nonprofit, budgets can be tight. Good for basic feature.

Overall_Review: It truly is the best all-in-one ticketing software and I have recommended it to all.
Pros_Review: I have used this product to create a few bridal show expo events and have hyped it up to my fellow "friendors". Event brite makes the event creating process extremely versatile.  Once the event has been created, you can see who will or wont be attending and  I am also able to check guests into the event which is another plus. I also love that you can connect it with facebook thus giving me access to my friend list. You can also create coupon codes and much more.
Cons_Review: I would say the fee is a little higher than I would like to pay for this software. Only for a paid event offcourse, not free ones but still worth for the price!

Overall_Review: It's made tracking attendees especially for expending purposes simple.
Pros_Review: The easy way to not only invite guests to any and all events, but also to track responses. The ability to sell tickets and other functions makes this the most efficient and simple way to organize any type of event.
Cons_Review: Some people are old school and refuse to use this wonder that makes planning a snap.
reasons_choosing: It was the most practical option

Pros_Review: Many of the concerts and events that are hosted through my school use eventbrite. I really enjoy this software because it is easy to buy tickets and it is easy to retrieve your tickets. I highly recommend this software to anyone hosting an event and in need of a way to sell tickets or to track attendance of the event.
Cons_Review: There is not anything that I do not like about this software.

Overall_Review: I like that it is simple and quick to register for things. I don't like spending twenty minutes registering for something. This software makes the process easy and quick.
Pros_Review: I have had to use Eventbrite on several occasions to reserve spots for upcoming continuing ed. I found it simple to use. I like that it doesn't require a lot of time to schedule these events.
Cons_Review: I don't know of anything I can say negatively about this software.

Overall_Review: Event planning, scheduling and getting individuals to RSVP--All solved with Eventbrite!
Pros_Review: Not only is Eventbrite easy to setup and use but the best thing about it is that it can save you thousands of dollars. The cost of purchasing event calendar software then having it integrated into your website is very expensive for most small businesses. With Eventbrite you can skip all of these custom and expensive steps and save thousands of dollars.
Cons_Review: There aren't many negative things to say about Eventbrite but if I had to think of something, it would be customer support. It has only been a couple of times in the last 4 years that I even needed customer support but the times I did, I had to wait for a while.

Overall_Review: Can download your tickets pretty quick.
Pros_Review: Basically any big event will have tickets through Eventbrite.  It's a huge site filled with any and all event you can think of.  Buying tickets on there is safe and secure.  You can download or print your tickets within minutes of purchasing which is nice.
Cons_Review: Getting ahold of customer service can take awhile which can be frustrating if you are in a time crunch.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been instrumental in promoting events to the public and providing all of the details in one place.
Pros_Review: The tool allows users to register for an event and share their registration on social media.  Eventbrite offers categories of details which could be provided to attendees - but many are optional.
Cons_Review: I do not like that there is a percentage of each registration charged to Eventbrite for paid registrations.

Overall_Review: I have not used Eventbrite as a vendor, but I can only imagine that the app makes it easy for smaller event organizers to track attendees.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to purchase or reserve tickets to a variety of events - both big and small.  I appreciate how smooth the transactions are and how predictable the website is.
Cons_Review: No real cons - although I do get the very occasional email from the company promoting events and/or their product.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite to organize free monthly conferences and create Eventbrite events to invite our members and manage attendees.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is free to use when you are organizing free events.  This allows us to manage all our events without costs, therefore allowing us to offer free events.  The interface is very easy to use and all the features are available in the free version.  It also integrates well with Facebook and MailChimp so that I can create the event at one place and update everywhere else at the same time.
Cons_Review: There isn't much I don't like about Eventbrite.  One small irritant is that I can't seem to find a nice summary of all orders - when asking for the orders report, the information is presented in a detailed way.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite saves and organizes your tickets whether the events or group sessions or webinars etc. are free or paid you still get a sense of it being an honorable situation younare going to since eventbrite makes the lrocess prior so satisfying.
Pros_Review: It really is a very organized app and platform and makes your experience with getting tickets feel very special!
Cons_Review: There are absolutely zero cons with eventbrite for me. I have always had a great and satisfying experience.

Pros_Review:
It's it literally my one stop shop.  Now that is has gps locator, I don't have to enter the city! I travel often so this software is extremely beneficial when I want to find out the happenings. 

As a user, it is easy to set events up, especially events that cost.
Cons_Review: I have in the past had issues with the financial tools, but recently eventbrite has made it even easier to use. I've been a user for over six years now.

Overall_Review: Fine. Now I mostly use the mobile tickets and I'm glad that I get a reminder email about my upcoming event.
Pros_Review: I like how I can search for tickets by category because the majority of the time I am looking for free, food or music related events.
Cons_Review: It seems just a bit complicated to use as an administrator trying to set up an event. I'm sure it's really not that bad though and that I just need more time to utilize all that the software has to offer.

Overall_Review: I would definitely use Eventbrite for a future event.
Pros_Review: The Event Brite tool was great when planning our office Anniversary party. The tool made it easy to create and invite, an event page, and track how many guests had RSVP'd. It also made it easy to send follow up Thank you cards for guests that were in attendance.
Cons_Review: Some guests called that would be attending instead of RSVP'ing on the event link and there wasnt a way to mark them down as RSVP'd on the guest list. I had to create an RSVP using my email for each individual that called to RSVP and then receive tons of emails from Eventbrite for each person on did a manual RSVP for. Other than that, the site worked perfectly for our event.

Overall_Review: I used this software both from my desktop and from their convenient app.  I used this to organize a 20-year reunion for my high school graduating class.
