Pros_Review: The company has been doing events for a long time.  THEY KNOW THEIR STUFF!  They have everything covered for small events like the one I organized (100-200 people class reunion).  They also have a great platform for larger events!
Cons_Review: You must have a wi-fi connection to take credit cards at the event.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a fast, easy way to communicate details and send tickets about the event. With a little bit of time, a user can easily set up both paid and free events. I've hosted multiple events with this software and it's relatively painless to process payments and update the event.
Pros_Review: I liked that I had an option to switch between paid tickets and free tickets. I use Eventbrite to put on various events that are both paid and free to the public. This software has a large rate of use and people find it easy to understand. I have been able to easily see how many tickets have been reserved as well as communicate updates, with attendees easily able to cancel or remove their ticket.
Cons_Review: Setting up software took a little time to get used to, but once I had an account and some preferences loaded, the whole process was much easier. Sometimes the recommended events at the bottom have had some company competitors which there isn't an option to remove.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite is a positive one. I prefer this app to others of its kind, and as the app continues to update I can tell that the development team is working hard to make their product one of a kind in terms of features, function, and convenience.
Pros_Review: I most enjoyed being able to view my already purchased tickets to events, and search for other events all within one mobile app. Eventbrite has been great for surprising my family with weekend outings to a variety of concerts, festivals, and other fun events.
Cons_Review:
I have only had a few minors issues with events not updating their head count or changes of dates to 
Eventbrite. But these are very uncommon occurrences. Generally speaking I mostly never have this problem!

Overall_Review: Our office space is multipurpose and can be used for external events. Eventbrite helps us gauge the attendance of those events.
Pros_Review: Regardless of the type of event, being able to keep track of attendance and are able to plan for the number of attendees more easily.
Cons_Review: The fee per ticket for the paid plans is unfortunate but it's not terrible. Overall I'd have to say that's my least favorite part of the program, it is very helpful otherwise.

Overall_Review: It has made it so our HR and event planning committee spends less time figuring out logistics of who, what when and more time on the planning the fun of the event.
Pros_Review: When trying to put together an event for 1000 employees and volunteers Eventbrite makes is easy for us to set up, track people, send the invites and remind people of the event.
Cons_Review: Nothing particular comes to minds as it does what is needed and expected, we only use it once or twice a year.

Overall_Review: The platform allows you to track your event progress. You can set ticket sale limits and see how many tickets are currently sold which is a nice feature.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is pretty user-friendly and allows you to easily create events. You can upload an event photo and easily promote your event on social media. The interface looks clean and professional.
Cons_Review: Because the interface is relatively simple and straightforward you are limited in some aspects. For example, you event title can't be too long and the event photo is cropped to certain dimension; so there are some limitations in customizing.

Pros_Review:
Easy to create events and schedule them for any events from personal to professional or community.
It can be just less than 3 minute to finish creating events if your script is ready.
Ease of payments for users to register for events
Cons_Review: Tool still needs more better look and feel to reflect quality. As a user I want to feel secure when using this tool and should not doubt the trust of security threat.

Overall_Review:
Helps with overall marketing of our events. It saves enormous amount of time and to have everything from one platform to extend into the rest is really a great tool in hand. 

We save staff, money and time with this software and we are available on more newsplatforms for events at the same time.
Pros_Review: This software just connects everything needed. Build the event on one platform and share it, extend it to all imaginable platforms. The integrations level and functionality is stunning and well thought through.
Cons_Review:
Id be missing functions to drag and drop content to the standard editor. It has html but a more intuitive userinterface Id prefer . As well the ability to make different text styles in the newsletters and on site.
Possible an option for accepting cryptocurrencies in the future.

Pros_Review: Easy to create free or ticketed events and is able to track who comes and clicks on your event. You are able to edit add and make changes whenever needed. Very user friendly and easy to search for other events in the area.
Cons_Review: The service charge on the ticketing is a little high. Since most of the users using this software are small business owners, it doesn't make sense to charge such a high service fee.

Overall_Review: Good overall experience with Eventbrite
Pros_Review: I love the integration between the desktop and the mobile app. Also, I have found that the community sense on eventbrite is better than other similar tools. The potential event matching capabilities of Eventbrite are better and I constantly find myself aligned with the recommended events that are published on the site.
Cons_Review: If eventbrite could be integrated into an existing social media platform then it would be easier to track events through that integration as currently they have to be tracked seperately.

Pros_Review: I like the fact that you can send an invitation via email or other ways of communication over paper. It saves trees and lets you be creative when creating an invitation no matter the even. I've used them for birthday parties and also received several for birthdays, weddings, gender reveals and many more.
Cons_Review: There isn't one thing I don't like about this. Being able to be creative and save time and money is excellent.

Overall_Review: Experiencing things that I never thought about and didn't know existed. Seeing Dallas, TX beyond just the mainstream stuff. Never running out of options for things to do on the weekend.
Pros_Review: This website has existed for 12 years but my girlfriend and I just found out about this a few months ago. She has lived in Dallas, TX her whole life and I have lived here for about 5 years now. We THOUGHT that we had done everything there was to do in Dallas, but after finding Eventbrite we realized we were very wrong. This website is really unique and easy to use and is truly a killer of boredom.
Cons_Review: The only thing that I can think of that is a con of this software is that you can't ask questions about the events online. I think the site would greatly benefit from some type of forum for each event where people could ask questions and have someone who knows about the event answer them. My girlfriend and I have found ourselves wondering things like what kind of clothes to wear or what seating would be like with many events, and have not been able to get those questions answered.

Overall_Review: I got a lot of visibility for an even that I organized, and I also discovered and partecipated to a lot of great event in the city where I live.
Pros_Review: Initially, I used Eventbrite to share an event, and it was a great help, in less than a day the event was sold out, it is a useful and effective way to let a potential partecipant to know about your activity. Creating events within the platform is very simple, you are guided step by step, and everything can be changed at any time, the general graphics greatly enhances the offers and opportunities available. It is a fantastic tool to discover some very cool event in any city.
Cons_Review: The only thing that I found problematic, is that not always Eventbrite gives you a feedback about the participation to an event, it might tell you that you can still purchase a ticket while they are already sold out, but it happened to me only one time out of many times.

Overall_Review: Protect my financial information
Pros_Review: I have always had an easy time responding to events on this software. I like that I am providing them with my information instead of the host when it is hosted by a group I am not familiar with
Cons_Review: I have heard their fees are high in comparison to their competition. While as a guest I'm not privy to the details I have been told it increases the amount I pay to attend events using the software

Pros_Review: I first used Eventbrite as a way to gather assistants for a promotional event. It made keeping track of the RSVPs and attendees so simple! I was able to export excel sheets with every person who confirmed they would assist, plus the fact that the reminders are sent out automatically and (at least) a paper ticket can be requested for the person to show on their phones or download them, makes them remember about the event even more. When you host a free event it is possible for a lot of people to forget about it or disregard it more easily, but when they have to take the time to download the ticket and so forth, it is more of a commitment. The add to calendar feature is also very very handy.
Cons_Review: Not sure if this is offered (it sure must be), but a pay option with no Eventbrite branding would be perfect and if I use it again I would be glad to purchase it.

Pros_Review: I loved how when invited to an event you can put your ticket for the event right into your wallet on your iphone! Love how professional and easy it is to use, would definately use if our office ever needed to use something like that!
Cons_Review: I got a ticket from an event in 2015 that I had put into my wallet on my iPhone and it is still there, not sure how to get rid of it. Not sure if it is an EventBrite thing or an Apple thing though.

Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite in organizing everything from personal birthday parties ,to office get together , to high-school reunions etc  All I do is upload an image, create my event information and bravo! I have got a beautiful event page  which displays my event in a professional manner. The map feature is icing on the Cherry.
Cons_Review: I think my one reservation will be privacy . I once created a professional get together event ,and I had like five persons show up without being invited ,however they had tickets and we had to make do with them.I was very much displeased.

Pros_Review: It's really easy to use and the ticket management features are really robust. Especially being able to manage waitlists, multiple ticket types, reimbursements, custom order forms, etc. all through the application.
Cons_Review: There's little customization on the eventbrite pages themselves and marketing integrations to be able to tie it more into a larger marketing campaign and plan.

Overall_Review: If you are an event organizer for your own sanity use another provider. Eventbrite DOES NOT HAVE LIVE SUPPORT FOR EVENT ORGANIZERS ANYMORE. Yes they used to that is why I loves using them. Now I cant log in because eventbrite isnt recognizing the email and the only tech support they have is online which they only send automated messages. I described thouroghly how it's not recognizing the email and they send me an email back telling me how to reset my password. Then they say if this doesnt help respond I still need help so I do that and still, NOTHING! My event is live and I cant access or look at anything. It has been 2 days. I don't know what happened to eventbrite but SERIOUSLY CONSIDER OTHER PROVIDERS IF YOU ARE AN EVENT ORGANIZER. SAVE YOURSELF THE HEADACHE!!!
Pros_Review: Nothing
Cons_Review: Tech Support, Customer Service

Overall_Review: Its been ok. I will keep using it until I find a better platform.
Pros_Review: Being able to have a central place to advertise and sell tickets is great. Being able to capture the customer in that moment is so crucial.
Cons_Review: It is expensive and take longer to pay than I would like. It needs to be faster because theres a lot of different people who need to get paid after an event.

Overall_Review: I've been using it for a while now everyone who received an invitation enquirer about it and I've guided them.
Pros_Review: Self explanatory user interface makes it a go to software. People without prior idea can easily navigate through the application.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything negative I've liked the way it works and makes our lives easier to create a formal or an informal event for any number of people.

Overall_Review: Its easy to use, and helps promote, sell tickets, track all analytics etc. makes event hosting a breeze!
Pros_Review: I like that tickets can be sold/registered for so easily, no app needed for customers, and that tickets can be added to apple wallets.
Cons_Review: templates and formatting can be a bit bland for listing pages- its hard to customize template, but easy to add images and details.

Overall_Review: Always happy to go to the platform, it allows me find likeminded community I would love to associates myself with.
Pros_Review: I love the wide network of events one can find on the platform and can tailor it to my test and event that I want to attend.
Cons_Review: The fact that most event host can call the event free but on flier it is paid for, that can't be stopped

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great, cheap solution for organizing events especially for small businesses. It has been very easy to use and have had great success organizing events through this platform.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use platform to create and share events. I like that you can upload a cover photo of your choice, add all of the details, sell tickets and collect emails and RSVPs all in one place. It is also very easy to integrate with Facebook events to share your event to your facebook page.
Cons_Review: It took me a short while to figure out how to download the email addresses of those who RSVPd to my event. It would be nice if there was a way to do this easier and also to collect additional information from your attendees.

Overall_Review: We use Event brite for all catering events and business meeting invites. It is seamless and easy to use!
Pros_Review: Very user friendly program, easy to use. It makes organizing event invites much easier! It helps everyone keep tabs, and keeps everything organized.
Cons_Review: Our company had no problems at all with this eventing platform, we never had any issues or snags using it for our catering needs.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great because it connects you with your events. It's just frustrating because sometimes I can't find all the information I need. It will tell me about the event, but not everything about the event.
Cons_Review: I have to use other websites to find the information I'm looking for. I can't find it all on Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Overall, I would highly recommend using Eventbrite for event management. It is user friendly for the person setting it up and the people who register for events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great event management tool. It is easy to learn how to use and easy to set up events. I like that you can collect payment through the tool. I like that you can set limits and have multiple ticket options. I like that you can add photos to the events.
Cons_Review: It would be nice if you could collaborate with other people on events instead of making them login with your account.  There is not a great way for people to add "extras." For example, we had different meal options and you have to create a different ticket for each meal.

Overall_Review: eventbrite is a great site to use for basic planning and ticketing for creating events. outside of that would recommend other platforms if you want to advertise additionally or market your event not just sell tickets to that event.
Pros_Review: eventbrite makes your online registration process easy for large conventions. users will find it easy to create a profile and sign up for events. It is really good for ticketing and registration and will email confirmations directly from teh site.
Cons_Review: they do make you pay for events that you charge for but you can use it if you are setting up a free event with no charge. Not to be used as a marketing tool. Not much the site can do outside of the registration, ticketing and confirmations.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an amazing product that is a must for any organization for concerts, classes and seminars for easy organization.
Pros_Review: This software is great for all things event oriented.  People can register for events, pay and receive updates, which is so helpful to have in one spot.  It even works with other apps so that all things can flow together.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite has so many positive things that I don't know what cons it has.  The only potential negative is the amount of money they charge for payment.
reasons_choosing: Eventbrite is our software because of all the options that it offers and because all of it can be done through one software that does all the work for you.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a good resource to manage ticket sales for events as well as event promotion.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to use and is user friendly. It simplifies buying tickets. A customer account is easy to use and find tickets you purchased
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons. The only thing I like least is that this is one more ticket account that I need to provide my information for,

Overall_Review: Excellent! I would always recommend this software to my family and friends.
Pros_Review: I love this software! I used it for the first time a few years ago to buy a ticket for a music festival. It's super easy and convenient plus you get your tickets right away.
Cons_Review: I really can't think of any cons about this software. I have always had positive experiences with using this software.

Overall_Review: Overall, I've had a good experience with the software and would recommend it to others.
Pros_Review: I like how Eventbrite makes it simple for event attendees to purchase tickets either individually or in groups.
Cons_Review: Because Eventbrite is a third party, you're not able to contact them about event details or any questions that may arise in regards to the type of ticket you should purchase (given a situation where there are multiple options). If the organization selling the tickets does not provide adequate contact info, then purchasing can become a hassle.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to send out mass invites with exact details. It also allows for payments and booking of funds for each event. Having QR codes that are scannable really helps with the day of events and check-ins.
Cons_Review: Creating an event can be time-consuming and limitations on graphics can be a little frustrating when creating a marketing piece.

Overall_Review: We were able to register, check-in, and follow up with 100+ participants to a fundraiser for multiple years.
Pros_Review: I loved that I was able to set up, manage, and use Eventbrite to promote, register, and track participants for a family fundraiser. It was basically a one-stop shop!
Cons_Review: While it is competitive with other registration and ticketing websites like it, the fees are a bit discouraging - I didn't want my participants to incur the cost, but since it was a fundraising event without any overhead, it made it challenging to absorb the costs too.

Overall_Review: You probably won't be able to find a better vendor than Eventbrite for ticketing purposes -- it accomplishes what most people who end up using it want to accomplish. My overall experience has been positive.
Pros_Review: I like that you can easily and succinctly distribute, track, and take tickets for an event. It has afforded us an inexpensive, careful way of disseminating tickets for an event, taking the tickets at the event, and following up with people before and after the event. We have used. Eventbrite multiple times -- and their functionality is great. It just takes a bit of time to get there.
Cons_Review: When implementing an Eventbrite event, it often takes a bit of time to get everything situated just as you'd want it to be. The design of the control panel and the ease of its use leaves something to be desired -- but rest assured, you'll get the job done.

Overall_Review: I can plan an event, list all pertinent details, upload photos -- even a map to the venue! I love that guests RSVP electronically. They can leave me a message with any questions that I need to respond to personally. I am updated daily on who has responded and who hasn't. That way, I can follow up individually if necessary. I love that Eventbrite does most of the thinking for me when planning an event. The automation is amazing...one less thing for me to worry about!
Pros_Review: I love that I can create an event invite -- add photos -- and details...plus an RSVP feature.  Then, I send the invitation via e-mail to a selected invitee list. They can RSVP electronically and save the date to their phone or computer calendar. I also love that  I receive notification of RSVPs and regrets received. I also love that Eventbrite sends my attendees an e-mail reminder the day of the event to ensure they don't somehow forget! If payment is required, attendees can easily do so right in the app. No more paper!
Cons_Review: There's nothing I DON'T like about Eventbrite - it's a game changer for me!

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is a very useful platform for searching for other events and posting your own.  The user experience could be improved.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a place to post events as well as search for them. The more popular the platform gets, the higher the quality events are. We used Eventbrite to post some of our important events as well as find relevant ones to go to.
Cons_Review: When we ran an event, sorting out payments was a problem on Eventbrite. It wasn't easy to customize and track things on the backend.

Overall_Review: We organize two or three events a year for network marketers.  Eventbrite takes care of the details and reduces the confusion at the door.  People show up with a barcode on their phones ready for us to scan.  It saves us tons of time with no frustration!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite takes care of dozens of tedious tasks for us at extremely reasonable rates.
Cons_Review: We tried to find something to dislike but couldn't come up with anything!

Pros_Review: It was easy to use, confirmation emails and additional information was great. No problem booking events i have attended and it was also used when i did recently volunteering at a school so i know it's a trusted company.
Cons_Review: I saw conflicting dates when trying to book an event. Turns out it was the events issue so i can't really blame Eventbrite

Pros_Review: Perfect interface for small or big events. Easy, fast, convenient process. Less hassle. You can create your own event or RSVP any invitation sent to you. Give it a try. you will love it. Just sit back at your home or office, and get things done.
Cons_Review: It does what you need it for. You may get charged but they gotta keep things going , you know.

Pros_Review: I love being able to use eventbrite for FREE for my team events and classes! I love the functionality and customization options for events and the notifications I get. I also love the ease of social sharing when you RSVP to an event.
Cons_Review: I can't think of anything! I've been using it for years and love it!

Pros_Review: I love how easy this software is to use. I have been able to utilize it as a business tool after I moved to a new state. It was really helpful in connecting me with other women business owners in our new city.
Cons_Review: I think the actually site could you use an update aesthetically, and I wish when you clicked on an event it would be the only thing on the page.

Pros_Review: They are clearly invested in a user-friendly experience, which I like. Quick sign-in with saved preferences and easy to use functions are great for attending events and creating events as well.
Cons_Review: I have not personally used their customer support but have heard from others that it isn't always super responsive.

Overall_Review: Overall a great place to look for events whether in your home city or in a visiting area
Pros_Review: I like that you can find events to attend anywhere without prior knowledge! This product allows you to search anything from festivals to concerts in a specific city plus tickets!
Cons_Review: I think the sorting algorithm isnt the best because sometimes events suggested are not fun nor relevant

Pros_Review: A wonderful tool for promoting events for an organization. Through this innovative software, an organization is able to organize and sell tickets for a great cause. This is regardless to size of the event. Additionally, this software assists with participant's registration, tracking of participant's attendance and distribution of tickets. Overall, this software is a project manager or coordinator dream come true.
Cons_Review: There are no negative features or functionality to report regarding Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Positive and streamlined!
Pros_Review: Easy to use. I found that most of the events and parties I was invited to seemed to be linked through Eventbrite. I was initially annoyed that I had to go through a 3rd party to get my tickets and event info, but after a few rounds, I got used to it. Its helpful to keep all your tickets in one place, and not only that but Eventbrite is integrated with Apple wallet so you can conveniently store everything there, if you are an Apple user. I would suggest that Ticketmaster follow their lead and make their ticket/event application more user friendly in regards to navigation. Good work EB!
Cons_Review: None that I can think of. Pretty useful app!

Overall_Review: Although there is a little delay in receiving the funds from ticket purchases we have been satisfied with this platform. I think there are still functions of this software that we have not used for our events that could enhance our user experience even more.
Pros_Review: This is great for events, you can add on additional tickets such as luncheons and customize your page.
Cons_Review: Refunded customers is a little tricky and the reports are ok.

Overall_Review: I really like Eventbrite and find it's a useful tool in steering our clients to our events.
Pros_Review: I love the statistics you can get out of it.  Page views and rsvps are great to measure traction with your event.  It allows you to see how well your event is being looked at.  I also like that you can set up events to recur so you don't have to create an event each time.
Cons_Review: I wish there were an option for no ticket sales.  We host a webinar every month and invite our client via Eventbrite but when they RSVP they are always sent a "ticket."  We don't ever collect the tickets since it's all online and it can get confusing but I haven't had anyone complain.  It just would be nice if they could RSVP only.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to do ticketing for events, as well as find events happening in your area. It gives you all the information of the people who got a ticket to your event and allows you to contact them in an easy manner.
Cons_Review: It takes a little bit of getting used to on the back end, but there's lots of information and features available to you.

Overall_Review: Overall it's good.
Pros_Review: I can look up events of my interest with just few keywords and the search button. Also the design is pretty simple, which gives you where and when the event is happening, and if the event is paid event or not.
Cons_Review: Search is limited to some of the major cities like San Francisco or New York. Hopefully it expands to search by zip code at least.

Pros_Review: The best way to collect registrations for an event - you can use this product for events where you sell registration/tickets or even events that are free and you just need a head count. This is such an easy product to use and the end result is so professional and polished. It's a reputable name/company so people don't feel uncomfortable providing their payment info and I think it actually improves our attendance at events.
Cons_Review: I truly don't feel there are any cons for this product. It's great and the website has a great FAQ page that really helps in addition to a very attentive customer service team.

Overall_Review: It would be great if there were more help-type articles or posts from the organization that provide you with ways to get around some of the basic limitations. Enhanced design options would be great, too!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is one of the big names in event sponsorship/meeting software for good reason. The platform is cost-effective and offers many of the key features that meeting planners are looking for. I've personally used it for a few free events that we've hosted around the country, and been satisfied with the feedback I received from users.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is relatively limited in terms of functionality. It's great for small or large events that don't have a high level of complexity or anything of that sort. As long as you keep things simple and don't try to customize, you'll be able to quickly and easily set up an event and start taking registrations quickly.

Overall_Review: I use it alot for events in the area, to register for an event I've been invited too. Also events on facebook I attend that require tickets or to register. It makes things so easy.
Pros_Review: It's easy to get tickets emailed, add to wallet on Iphone, and just register for events in the area.
Cons_Review: I really do not have anything bad to say, I've had very good experiences with the app and events I have attended.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite provides organization and legitimacy around events small and large for both attendees and event organizers.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great tool to circulate invites and formalize any event.  We host networking events and happy hours often. Creating an Eventbrite page adds a sense of legitimacy to the event, and also helps organize attendance, invites,  and overall scheduling.
Cons_Review: Occasionally there is some confusion by  attendees who have never used Eventbrite before and they must sign up for an account or leverage the tool. Pretty user friendly - just a drawback of formalizing an event through a software like Eventbrite. Some people will have just preferred a direct email. Very small and negligible drawback we've found.

Overall_Review: I used it as an event maker and as an attendee of an event  and as I mentioned they make the ticket booking process way smoother and easier but on the expense of a higher ticket price
Pros_Review:
It makes ticket booking for events very swift and easy. Allows paying for tickets online for events that didn't have that option. 
Each ticket has a QR code which if scanned marks the attendance of its owner to the event and hence very easily created and organized database for attendees which saves time and makes organizers job much easier
Cons_Review: The percentage they cut from the price of each ticket as their profit is somewhat high so that results in a magnified price for the ticket which discourages some people to attend the event and pay that high price.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is a great platform to market and advertise your events. People find us all the time just because they're browsing Eventbrite for local events.  It's super easy to edit the picture of your event and to write an awesome description that will capture your audience.
Pros_Review: I love that it requires an email from the attendees so it's very easy to have a list of your guests with their contact information. It's super easy to connect to other platforms so you can automatically add your guests to email marketing campaigns after the event or follow-up with people that purchased a ticket but didn't "check-in".
Cons_Review: I wish there was a way to check-in people without having to download the mobile app.

Overall_Review: Very easy for the responder. When I need to look good- let's say for a professional event- I am more likely to use EventBrite.
Pros_Review: Looks more "professional" even for kids birthday parties, like you put some thought into it. More than a Google invite.
Cons_Review: Ultimately it is an extra step when scheduling. Most of the time I am scheduling an external event through my Google phone, so this requires using another app.

Pros_Review:
Most of the features are free compared to the charge prices. Better options available in free version.
Good for general admission for events. And also best option I like is about preferred seating which is very helpful when planning for an event.
Cons_Review: Customer service isn't that good sometimes. Have to wait a long on a phone to talk to someone. No option to ask more complex questions. The main feature that I would like to see is print the report by registrant last name which will help me to analyze the event details very detailed.

Pros_Review: People seem comfortable signing up for events with Eventbrite. The interface is user friendly, and it certainly makes our job easier when coordinating people and places.
Cons_Review: There are so many event signup apps to choose from so if it doesn't offer some features you may want, you can always try another. Sometimes we switch out depending on what type of event or sign-up details we need.

Pros_Review: Easy to use for purchasing tickets, used it a couple times for a couple concerts.
Cons_Review: I purchased a ticket once and it asked if I wanted to add insurance but didn't give a price so I thought it was free, but once I submitted payment it then showed how much it charged my card. that isn't necessarily the best way to handle a transaction, so maybe making it clear on the cost would be nice.

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite provides a full platform for running ticketed events for your company. We love the ease of use and how rapidly we can set up events on it. It provides us valuable analytics to see who is RSVPing and who is attending. We can easily communicate with our guest list. Day of the event, we can export the guest list to provide for the security staff. 

All in all, it's a great platform to use for your next event!
Cons_Review: I don't have many cons to list about EventBrite.  Some of the payout functionality is a little strict and not helpful for those planning events months in advance. They make you pay often for extra features or email blasts. But overall it's a great software.

Pros_Review: Integrated with popular email marketing platforms and social media, built-in payment processing, automatic customized confirmation and reminder emails, beautiful and easily customizable rsvp page, and easy to read analytics on attendees and ticket sales. For any small or medium event, I have never even considered looking for another option. This was such a pleasure to use from start to finish.
Cons_Review: The process of formatting text and images for the rsvp page felt a bit clunky at times, but it was minor and easy to resolve.

Overall_Review: Perfect Event Hosting.  Easy to navigate software for creating the perfect event.  And there is nothing better than printing a list of event attendees with the click of a button.
Pros_Review: It's very easy to use and navigate.  Takes your events to new levels and new audiences without putting any much time.  It's clear cut and self explanatory.
Cons_Review: I do not have any cons about this software.  I have never collected any fees for any event I have held so I am not sure if that is as clear cut and it sounds but just to hold free events and not be charged to use the site is definitely a bonus.

Overall_Review: Able to share the link of tickets and get much more traffic for low cost/free events that are for smaller organizations.
Pros_Review: It's ease of use. I also like that it is so well catered towards low budget events and that it has the capability to have tickets that are for free but still need to be kept track of.
Cons_Review: I find it looks very basic and a little bit boring. I would like something brighter and that gives a couple more options.

Overall_Review:
- Easily create public events
- Easily share the events
- Accept payments for the events as well
Pros_Review: First of all, it is free and even the free version comes with a wealth of analytics that can help you optimize your events!
Cons_Review: Nothing that I absolutely hate about this software to be honest. Only thing that I would like to see is a better search engine for public events on their page.

Overall_Review: Great integrations with other softwares and robust features!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to customize the kind of ticket you want to sell and have a lot of features and event/ticket classifications that allows each event to be very customized. There is an option to have the ticket fees billed directly to the customer or to have the fees pulled from the overall event sales.
Cons_Review: Sometimes is takes a while to find the customization or feature that you want for a specific ticket categorization but usually there is a solution to all needs.

Pros_Review: Product is easy to use.  Great way to get exposure for your events.  Audience can easily see events that are local or search by interests.  Includes ways to push out and promote on Social Media if you are not really SM savvy. Allows you to easily duplicate ongoing or similar events, which helps keep branding consistent. Nice looking event page.
Cons_Review: Difficulty (if not impossible) connecting Social Media accounts if you are a consultant or agency that manages multiple Social Media Accounts.  Wish there were a few more categories from which to choose.  Sometimes your event doesn't really fit into one of the categories that are offered. Also, the HTML editor seems a bit antiquated.

Overall_Review: I first tried this out for my small business.  It helped keep me organized and everything in order.  I started telling other friends and family about it.  Its easy to use .
Pros_Review: How easy it is to use it
Cons_Review: I liked everything

Overall_Review: Although ticketing distribution was done on a "free" basis, the regional Eventbrite-assisted websites appear to have been hastily deployed, and thus caused immense frustration, irritation, resentment, and possible mental anguish among the populace that was desperate for any solution to the pandemic.  The ticketing websites that were made available to the multitude of localities was at best just plainly underdeveloped.  It was incredible to see that with the technology available during this day and age, something that was akin to sophomoric ticketing.  For example, the site's availability to obtain tickets, was limited to just one time slot during a weekly period in the state's various counties.  Logging into the site was almost immediately blocked due to the immense number of login attempts.  This was further complicated when one actually was able to log in, and find themselves getting into the "ticket" mode.  To me, and to anyone that has ever purchased any type of tickets, this would have meant that a "ticket" was available.  But this was only the beginning of the frustration.  Clicking he "ticket" entry only took you to a selection of some 10-15 time slots that were almost immediately shown as:  "Event Currently Unavailable".  However, this is NOT the end.  Clicking on that particular message 10 -100 times (or maybe more), only took to to either a repeat of that same message, or to a blank disconnect screen, or to another message that showed that the event was "Sold Out".
Pros_Review: The software appears to be very popular for selling event tickets online.  The sites usually are adapted to the few most populated cities and regions.
Cons_Review: It was recently used by certain regions of the US to provide ticketing for vaccine distribution during the pandemic.  Unfortunately it was one of the most frustrating and agonizing attempts that one could ever imagine.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great choice for providing ticketing services for free events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use for scheduling ticketed events, regardless of whether it is an in person or online event.
Cons_Review: If you are charging a price for the ticket the software also charges you to hold a fee based event versus a free event is always free to set up.

Overall_Review: I have used event bright to locate and reserve several events in my area. I use its monthly to keep up to date with everything going on near me.
Pros_Review: I love how event bright keeps you up to date with not only all the events going on in the local  area but anywhere!
Cons_Review: I absolutely love everything about event bright. There is nothing that I do not like about this software.

Overall_Review: For a free platform with a large audience, it is great, however know you pay in other ways.
Pros_Review: Its pretty straightforward and easy to use. Also, so many people use the platform, so for getting people to your events and making events easy to access, its great.
Cons_Review: Fees, although the platform itself does not cots any money there are substantial fees on either side of the transaction. Fee to have your tickets, processing fee, payment fee ... so many fees.

Pros_Review: EventBrite has a lot of great features- some I'm still learning about like the ability to print name tags from the registrants.  I'm sure there's even more to explore!
Cons_Review: I wish it were more user-friendly.  It can be frustrating navigating between managing the event and editing the event depending on what you're trying to do.

Overall_Review: Very easy to use and I will use it again! Thanks team!
Pros_Review: The ability for a novice such as myself to be able to set up and make available for others to use this program to purchase tickets was amazing! Thank you for creating this program!
Cons_Review: The only thing that would really enhance the experience would be to maybe have customizable features other than just a photo and the information. The site isn't very flashy, but for the money, it works amazingly and I am willing to say we keep it as is.

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is so pull up tickets remotely.  I also love the calendar feature, making it so easy to track all my events.
Cons_Review: We had an event where multiple sponsors were sending out invites and people received quite a few duplicates, would be great to have a cross reference feature for when multiple people, are inviting.

Overall_Review: Excellent!! Would definitely use again!
Pros_Review: I signed up for an event for Mothers at my local convention center. This was supposed to happen at the beginning of this year. The event was free, and after putting all my information, I had the option to print the tickets or have them sent by text. Unfortunately, the event was cancelled die to Covid, but Eventbrite was amazing about keeping me updated on it.
Cons_Review: Nothing, there was nothing that I found that I didnt like with the software.

Overall_Review: We have used Eventbrite for several years to run large events with ease.
Pros_Review: The best feature on Eventbrite is the ease of customization. It's very easy to pull in your own graphics and stylization.
Cons_Review: There was a learning curve to get this software up and running, and at the event you have to rely on wifi or data if you're using the app to check in guests.

Overall_Review: Overall experience has been with reserving for events and then using it for reminders.
Pros_Review: I like that when I reserve with Eventbrite that an email is sent right away as well as reminder emails are sent occasionally as the event approaches.
Cons_Review: I really don't have anything that I dislike about Eventbrite. Overall a great product that does what it says!

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a cool software to use if you're interested in hosting an event that involves selling tickets.
Pros_Review: This software is easy to use and it makes it easy to share events in your area and to sell tickets to different events.
Cons_Review: Most time I find it difficult to locate the different events on the website. The search must be very specific.

Overall_Review: I know that I can always go to this legit site to set up tickets for any performing events that I put on and that's a good feeling.
Pros_Review: I was ecstatic to find out that people could purchase tickets through this site for any production that you created.
Cons_Review: What I liked last about this product is that some times the link would freeze up when testing the link

Overall_Review: Our agency has used Eventbrite for a quite some time and have had very few issues.  As more and more products similar to this become available we would love to see the product grow!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an efficient tool for inviting people to events and allows for tracking of interest in those events by creating tickets for those hoping to attend.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is great if you are looking for a basic service without too many bells and whistles.  It would be great if the software was updated so users could create more large scale events

Overall_Review: It's been awesome. I'm able to find and post events and connect with new people!
Pros_Review: I love how easy eventbrite makes it to get your event in front of people you might not ever be able to reach. And how easy it is to keep track of those people and reach back out to them later.
Cons_Review: The percentage rate of how much is taken out of the planners pocket when paid events are posted. As a event planner it's hard enough to make sure you're receiving as much money back after planning the event but it's hard when you have to add in costs of the ticketing process as well. But i understand that's how the company makes their money.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is such a great platform to get the best of all event posting  for companies and individual, NGO and government agencies organizing events t that really want to attract large crowd.
Pros_Review: One of the notification i always check in my inbox anytime i wanna go event. Eventbrite gives correct event whether free or paid one. They do not waste to update posted with correct location.
Cons_Review: nothing really on my side, since i have been using, it has help me track event in my geopolitical environment

Overall_Review: My experience with this software is really good. It helps me to create and manage my personal events
Pros_Review: Great variety of event planning tools. Very easy to create any event even if it is complex one. Very good management of every detail of event. You can promote events on social networks or websites. it is free for free events.
Cons_Review: I can't say a lot about negative sides, I only used it for my personal events and I didn't use some tools (like ticketing for example).
reasons_choosing: Just to explore the difference

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been great overall to get tickets for concerts, activities and different things for my family.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite software is easy to find the events that you want to go to and it gives you the overall best prices
Cons_Review: It typically does not give you comparison prices that some softwares give you, but a lot of events only use eventbrite so that it is a one stop shop

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is a solid, functional and streamlined event planning software with the standard drawbacks associated with all major ticketing services.
Pros_Review: We used Eventbrite to help plan a concert. Eventbrite is more accessible to smaller events but allows for large-scale planning that is unobtainable through other services. The interface is streamlined and easy to use.
Cons_Review: Although the service allows for either the planner or the attendee to absorb the fees associated with ticket sales, the large fees in today's ticket sales sector are unfortunate. It would be preferable to allow for advertising space on the tickets as opposed to the 10-20% fees associated with each ticket.

Overall_Review: Overall, we loved our experience with Eventbrite.  Also, customer service was excellent when we used the live chat option.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very user friendly!  As someone who was using this product for the first time, it required about 5 minutes to set up my event and start selling tickets.  We had two events.  One event was free and the other required a purchased ticket.  I loved that Eventbrite doesn't charge anything for using their product if the tickets are free.  And there are no upfront costs when you do charge for tickets!  Also the ability to edit the event details and share through social media platforms was effortless!
Cons_Review: Honestly, we have not had any disappointments at this time.  We will continue to use Eventbrite for future events.
reasons_choosing: We chose Eventbrite because our fundraising platform, Kindful, is set up to sync with Eventbrite.  This makes our work more streamlined.  In addition we had seen Eventbrite used for many other large popular events.

Overall_Review: Love it and will continue to use it. The app downloaded to your phone will also tell you about other events you might not have known about.
Pros_Review: I love that when you have booked an event thru event brite that it saves your event ticket in your wallet on your phone (Apple user) and it also creates and event for you on your calendar as a reminder.
Cons_Review: No complaints. I wish that all companies used this when booking events. It makes it so much easier for the user and not having to deal with emails or paper tickets.

Overall_Review: I have realized that utilizing softwares like eventbrite allow for me to keep my academic calendar clean, organized, and full! With that, my time has become better spent overall.
Pros_Review: What I like most about eventbrite is that it allows me to easily sign up for and keep track of the multitude of academic events on my calendar.
Cons_Review: Overall, I don't really see any real cons with this software. It is easily customizable such that little annoyances can be avoided dependent upon your settings.

Overall_Review: great for free events! Easy to use and share events!
Pros_Review: This is a great system to use to streamline event information and ticket sales through one program. Easy to add to local listings!
Cons_Review: I wish it were more customizable and that you could co-sponsor events easier and both have access to the sytem to manage.

Overall_Review: A polished, professional software to manage event ticketing.
Pros_Review: I've mostly seen Eventbrite tickets used for local producers putting on comedy shows or plays. I like that the DIY crowd has access to this polished ticketing system.
Cons_Review: No issues or complains in setting up an event using eventbrite or attending an event with eventbrite ticketing.

Overall_Review: I have had great experiences with Eventbrite - it's easy to use and it makes event management a breeze.
Pros_Review: It's super easy to create and manage events using Eventbrite. I've only ever used it for free events but nonetheless, it was simple. I also liked that you could create your Facebook event page directly from your Eventbrite and that it sent out the statistics of your event after it was over.
Cons_Review: I think the pricing for a paid events is  a bit steep. I don't think I'd use it if it were for a paid event.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is super is easy to use and events can be set up quickly - especially if you're in a crunch for time.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is super easy for the users and makes registering for an event a breeze. Events can be customized so that only certain users can view or events can be open for everyone. Direct links can be easily sent and invitation only by emails can set up. The best part for me is that registration is customization and all that information is kept through Eventbrite and can be exported easily through an excel sheet!
Cons_Review: There is a service fee if you are to charge for your event. Can't complain too much though because it is a free service for the admin!

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite proved to be very simple to use: an event can be created within minutes and registration being tracked so easily. I do recommend to any event organizer. This is definitely a plus, if you have some time to manage the tools.
Pros_Review: Thanks to Eventbrite, we managed to automatically generate tickets for our events, manage attendees and plan our resources to be deployed accordingly. This helped us successfully build a rich contact list, which was used for our future events. Best of all, the ability to use custom forms to collect  additional useful information.
Cons_Review: The fee for non-free events is a little high in my opinion. The percentage should be reviewed wherever possible.

Overall_Review: We use this to help manage attendees at our events.  Very helpful.
Pros_Review: So incredibly easy to set up an event in Eventbrite.  Love how it captures attendee information, keeps them in the loop of changes and reminders.  Automation is the key.
Cons_Review: Wish I had more templates to choose from.  While there are lots of free templates, I would like to see even more.

Overall_Review: This is very easy to use and I have been pleased with the results so far It makes creating a ticketed event easy.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it very easy to create an event and sell tickets for just about anything which is extremely useful.
Cons_Review: There seems to be a lot of people using it. Not sure how to get an event to really stand out from all of the others.

Overall_Review: Good webpage to create events, send invites and keep track of attendace.
Pros_Review: It gives you and easy way to create events and send out invitations via email to your relatives, friends and co-workers.
Cons_Review: For a lot of the people who you send an invite to, it might be directed to junk mail therefore can't check it unless they regularly check their junk mail tray.

Overall_Review: Overall, we were able to have people register for our race and for our camp outreach successfully!
Pros_Review: I like all of the options that are available for us to set up an event and get the word out. We've used it for several youth group events, like our "Run with Purpose" race and, also, for our Mega Sports Camp outreach in our children's dept.
Cons_Review: I feel like this software is growing still, and it's been a while since I've used it but sometimes the functionality can be tricky with so many options.

Overall_Review: This is a great app for finding local events and keeping your tickets in the same spot.
Pros_Review: I liked most how easy it is to find events in the area and to narrow down what kind of event you are looking for. I also like how you are able to keep tickets for events within the app without having to print them. That feature was very convenient when I went to a concert this summer
Cons_Review: I don't have many cons about this app. It overall worked very well for meeting

Overall_Review: Eventbrite allows us to easily create a registration page for our events and track who is going.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite offers a registration platform for both free and paid events. While you can make your event private, making the event public is free advertising and also allows for easy sharing on social media. The feature set is also pretty robust and you can customize the look and feel of your event.
Cons_Review: If you're looking to simply publish and go, Eventbrite might not be the best tool. There is a small learning curve in using this product and that includes things figuring out how to best setup a reoccurring event, adding others to help you manage the event, etc.

Overall_Review: Has been extremely pleasant.
Pros_Review: Recently I used this for a hiring event we had. I had everyone apply through eventbrite and they said it was the easiest event they had ever been too. All the information was right there and they knew exactly what to expect.
Cons_Review: I cannot think of anything negative about this software at the moment.

Pros_Review: As a nonprofit, it's great to have a place to publish our events for free. Since Eventbrite only charges ticket sales, our free events are free to post. The interface is easy and intuitive to use.
Cons_Review: The ability to publish recurring events, or mass-edit batch events, would be invaluable.

Overall_Review: Overall, I enjoy using it and would also recommend others to use it for their planned events/ ticketing/ marketing etc.
Pros_Review: With Eventbrite, I can go through any of the events happening in or around my area with easy. I don't have to ask anyone for any information, just a check on it and I can go for music events, dance choreography, social events, conference, delegations etc. etc.  We can create our own events along with discount coupons. It is really one of the best softwares to use for any upcoming event.
Cons_Review: For a free event, its the best but for a paid event, the transaction fee is very high. It should be reduced.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite has been an effective and easy way to host events and track guest lists for our company. I'd recommend it to anybody.
Pros_Review: We're a small operation, and when it comes to finding software solutions, simple's the name of the game. Eventbrite is the ideal software platform for organizing your event, whether you're looking for ticketing solutions, guest list management, and event marketing.
Cons_Review: I really wish there was a better way to implement free events (right now, customers have to "purchase" a ticket costing $0). This sometimes confuses customers (say, of an older demographic) who think that purchasing a ticket means they have to pay.

Overall_Review: I have loved using eith party planning and recieving eventbrite invites and would definitely suggest to a friend to use them for themselves.
Pros_Review: Whether it is a public event or a private one, eventbrite has the RSVP and cute and attractive invitation thing down!
Cons_Review: The choices could always be more plentiful as far as what options you have to design your invites with.

Pros_Review: It's easy to use if you are hosting a large event. It takes away the overwhelming responsibility of personally keeping track of attendees and payments (if applicable). This app assists with organization and creates ease.
Cons_Review: I do not like the spam emails received as a user after attending an event. But it's an easy fix with unsubscribing.

Overall_Review: Great beginner resource. Almost akin to MailChimp for email.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is free or inexpensive to use to promote events, big or small. They also tap into their network of users to promote and share your event. Built-in promotion is always a plus.
Cons_Review: Some roadblocks as far as canceling events and notification.

Overall_Review: It is easy to use for small events and to get your tickets.
Pros_Review: It is very easy to use to buy tickets and have access to them. There is an option to print your tickets or get a digital one.
Cons_Review: You cannot get tickets to big concerts or sporting events. You are also unable to re-sell your tickets. There is no update if an event is cancelled.

Pros_Review: It is well know.  Most tech savvy people have heard of eventbrite.  It is found integrated in some well know apps.  It also is standalone.  Either way you can find out what is going on locally or anywhere really.  Since it is well known, there are a lot of listings usually in a semi populated area.  The app or website is very easy to navigate and listing events is a breeze as well.  As a host of an event, you can integrate payment for tickets and issue them digitally.  There are a lot of benefits to letting Eventbrite manage your event.
Cons_Review: The fees are a little steep in some places, but you are gaining convenience in return.

Pros_Review: I like that you can join a waiting list on some events and it notifies you about tickets if they become available. A few of my union's event tickets are usually released on Eventbrite and I find it very convenient.
Cons_Review: Everything is working and I had no problems with it since I started using it quite a few years ago.

Overall_Review: This makes event setup easy, and they aren't trying to break the bank.
Pros_Review: There are so many options and they are not trying to push you to use the paid features. I think that will naturally come as users have more and more successful events. We use this for large scale events, and I use it for little side projects as well. Highly recommended.
Cons_Review: Its almost too robust if you are doing a simple event. It takes a time commitment to get something up and looking good.

Overall_Review: The Eventbrite website is easy to navigate and use. As an events coordinator for the Society of Children's Book Writers and Illustrators for the UK, I ran several events across the UK each month from small events such as author talks and workshops, to annual conferences with hundreds of attendees.  In the whole time I was responsible for our events, I never had any problems with Eventbrite. It was easy for me to use, giving me step by step choices in setting up event info and tickets. Our attendees often commented on how easy it was to find events and book event tickets. The site also makes it easy to look for other similar events near you, or in a specific month, or week.
Pros_Review: It is really easy to use, both for setting up an event, and for people who want to go to the event. I have gotten many complements on how simple it was to get the information and tickets.
Cons_Review: I don't have any complaints about this software. It has always been very reliable.

Pros_Review: It helps you find events in your area you might not have known about. It's also aesthetically pleasing and formatted in a logical way.
Cons_Review: I wish there was a feature to allow you to choose a distance radius around your location. This would allow you to see events close by that may not be in the specific city you searched.

Overall_Review: When I was organizing public events in Las Vegas, I preferred this software because it had 3 options for membership. My tickets were always free, but when I considered a small paid event, the fee per ticket seemed reasonable.
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to create an event and link to Twitter and Facebook.  The user  interface isn't clunky and it's very user friendly. Eventbrite is also a fun place to search for events. I've found a lot of events that I wouldn't have heard about otherwise.
Cons_Review: I can't think of any cons at this time.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to set up an event and sell tickets. Their fees are a bit more than if you accepted payments yourself, even through a credit card processing company, but overall, they're generally reasonable. Since Eventbrite is also searchable, it can expand your event's audience as well.
Cons_Review: It isn't set up to create more complicated event ticketing, such as selling group tables at a charity gala. That's not really what it's intended for, though, so that's understandable.

Pros_Review: I love this software when looking for fun things to do in my area. You can purchase tickets to so many popular events in your area and other areas.
Cons_Review: Sometimes you well find an event and it will be listed by so many people. Some people post events that aren't real just to get your money.

Pros_Review: As a small business, Eventbrite allows us to save money by advertising events for free. We can also sell tickets directly from Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Although it is free, Eventbrite does charge a service fee when a customer purchases a ticket, however, you can pass the fee on to the customer.

Pros_Review: It's very user friendly when purchasing a ticket from a user using Eventbrite.  Once the ticket to the event or conference is purchased the ticket automatically loads to the app.  The app is easily accessible and can bring up tickets for scanning.  This makes admission process easier and simple.  No need for paper tickets or the potential to lose it
Cons_Review: Only useful if the person hosting the event is using Eventbrite then it can automatically store and provide easy access to the ticket/admission

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use, with many useful functions for managing events online efficiently. It is the market leader. The user interface is familiar to customers which also facilitates easy use.
Cons_Review: Few negative experiences. They recently acquired a competitor (which I was also using) and no integration feature to migrate data from the other platform into Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an extremely intuitive tool for selling and processing event ticketing. The appearance of the application is basic and not overly complicated with unnecessary features. Also tends to have far lower fees than its competitors
Cons_Review: Nothing to complain about here, Eventbrite works exactly as I would like.

Pros_Review:
- Great for small companies, start-ups, and non-profits who provide free events as there is no cost for free events. 
- It's used by many event attendees so people know the product. 
- Users with an account can sign-up for an event in seconds. 
- Crisp interface and user experience is good
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: We've used Eventbrite to manage both free and paid community events for the tech community in the area. It's a great value for the money (especially for free events!)
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to share an event with the community, both for free events and paid events.
Cons_Review: The pricing scheme has changed over time, and features I used to use for free are now hidden behind paid/premium accounts.

Pros_Review:
It's amazing it nearly do everything an event organizer need, reducing work time, reaching more people, handling payments, connecting with other services, in total a must have for every event.
The facebook integration, and allowing to sell tickets from it.
Cons_Review: I believe they've got most of the needed things covered, and they're working on this all time

Pros_Review:
Very easy to setup and show other users how to use effectively, in-comparison to other pieces of software we've rolled out across the university this was seamless with little to-no teething problems. Something that very rarely happens!
There are various teams and departments all using this with ease, the UI is easy to navigate and features aren't hidden away in menus.
Cons_Review: Even though I complimented the UI above, there are some questionable design choices. Some of the more advanced features aren't particularly clear, especially for a non-techy person. Some trial and error is definitely involved, but once you're used to it there are no problems whatsoever.

Overall_Review: I've used Eventbrite to purchase tickets for approximately 5 conferences and the process couldn't be smoother. My favorite thing is not having to worry about printing tickets or digging through my bag to find them when I check in. I just pull out my phone, show my ticket, and done.
Pros_Review: I can manage all my event tickets from my phone and also easily find events in my area.
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons from my usage thus far

Pros_Review: Easy to use.  I can find events, make purchases, and then use ticket very easily.  It all feels very intuitive.  I can find events by categories.  Scroll to search.  Then tap to learn more and get.  All is saved in my profile, which is easily situated on the home screen.
Cons_Review: With categories, they can be too broad some times.  I wish maybe there was an easier way, such as tags, to better know about an event.  For example, under kids and families, it's hard to know if this is for high school kids or for my 1 year old.

Pros_Review: I absolutely love using Eventbrite because it integrates with our CRM (NeonCRM) and is a great tool to use when publicizing events. I love that the donor has the option to absorb credit card and transaction feeds
Cons_Review: It can take a while to receive checks if you do not opt in for their direct deposit. Other than that, I don't have any complaints!

Pros_Review: Easy to setup and start selling event tickets.  Great tools to promote your event.  We love the registration app, people at events entrance have an easy tool on their phones to verify tickets.
Cons_Review: You cannot customize too much your event page, if you try it Eventbrite "punish" you changing your event to an old fashioned web page design.

Pros_Review: It's a super easy way to list an event and collect attendee numbers and details. I've run several events and it worked great for this. It's also fantastic for finding events in your area.
Cons_Review:
For running events, a joint account of some sort would be great that wasn't directly tied to an email address. This has made it tricky for me to co-run events with others. 

There's a bit of a visibility gap about event organisers - I wanted to be updated of new events by organisers whose events I wanted to follow, but couldn't see any option. 

Event finding also lags behind Facebook, for example, and seems to be very much the mainstream, paid-event crowd. I'd love to be able to *find* alternative and underground events in my area (which are the kind I tend to go to) by keywords, but it doesn't seem that this is Eventbrite's key audience.

Pros_Review: I've used this for conferences I've registered for and attended.  I like the ease of use and the ability to pull up your tickets on your phone for ease of checking in etc.
Cons_Review: The only negative I can share is that sometimes if you have made a ticket reservation on behalf of someone else, it will only allow you to be the administrator of their ticket information

Pros_Review: I have never set up an Eventbrite event, but I have RSVPed and purchased tickets to events as users. I found the system very easy to use, with a clean interface and simple checkout steps.
Cons_Review: I dislike the general trend toward connecting all social media accounts everywhere, so I don't like when it asks me to create an account for a one-time event I'm attending, or to "sign in with Facebook!". I understand that engagement and social metrics seem to be important, but as an end user who values my privacy I find it occasionally annoying.

Pros_Review: The ease of use and approach ability.   Eventbrite suggests events for me based on previous attendance and does not bombard me with spam.
Cons_Review: The reminders aren't very splashy so they can get lost in an inbox unless I'm looking for them.  It looks like any other email coming through.  I try to put the event on my calendar so that I don't delete the reminder.

Pros_Review: the app is so helpful for eventbrite. It allows you to quickly get your tickets, the search function is fantastic, and it gives you recommendations of events near me. very quick and easy to RSVP
Cons_Review: I have never organized an event with Eventbrite app because my company doesn't use it, but as a user, I don't have any cons.

Pros_Review: Planning an event?? Then you definitely need this!! It's a great way to reach out to contacts with details of an event including the location, cost, directions, time, dress code, etc. Once you send out the details, it tracks your RSVPs, sends confirmations to guests to accept and additionally send reminders out prior to the event! It really helps make the event process less hectic and it's also nice to know that everything is one place for you to access.
Cons_Review: The first time you set it up and send it out, you might miss a few of the features. I'd suggest seeing how others have done and it then replicating their process. Overall, it's an easy-to tool and hard to mess up!

Overall_Review: Love Eventbright
Pros_Review: Easy login, remembers each ticket you've purchased, recommends events based on the one's that you're already attending, easy to "add to calendar", well organized and easy to use.
Cons_Review: Some events suggested aren't relevant, after you order a ticket to an event it automatically has a pop up set asking you to share on facebook

Overall_Review: Excellent way to set up, track and provide attendees complete information about the event.
Pros_Review: I like that for free events, the software allows you to set up the event, track attendance, limit attendance and have attendees print tickets
Cons_Review: The cost for processing events where you are charging attendees is a little high.  I understand there is cost involved but sometimes makes the overall cost high.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great tool to use when creating, promoting and receiving payment for events.  It is easy to use, and simple to integrate the financial portions.  I also like that I  can capture the leads from Eventbrite (i.e., emails/phone) to be used later.
Cons_Review: There are some limitations to customizing the look of an event, but the overall ease of use is key.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite make it so easy to contact customers, it is easy to use and we know that, if we have any problem with it, we can count on a team of great people happy to help us.
Cons_Review: Some bureaucracy are not great, but I understand it's the best for us and our customers. I don't see any cons in using Eventbrite.

Pros_Review:
Easy payment processing
It's pretty simple in booking tickets for multiple events
Guest check-in app
Invitations and emails
Social promotion and tools
Online RSVP management
Cons_Review:
It's not that powerful for managing complex tasks
it has a high commission fee
you have to create an account at Eventbrite to register for any events

Overall_Review: My experience wasn't so bad. Can't really think of anything went wrong with me using Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I like using Eventbrite because whatever ticket info I need or if I buy a ticket the system safely records my payment and emails me a receipt. I did this several times without no worries. Also it's easy to download on my phone and doesn't use a lot of kilobytes.
Cons_Review: I didn't know what to put for this answer but I didn't run into any problems when I bought my tickets to go to a few events.

Overall_Review: It has been a great experience. I especially appreciate the reminders for events that I receive, particularly for the times that I forgot to write the event in my calendar. The reminders are great!
Pros_Review: This is a beneficial platform for both event planners and attendees. For planners: it is a great way to send our event invitations to a large number of people and to keep track of numbers. For attendees: the reminders of events, and easy RSVP process is very beneficial
Cons_Review: I have no complaints about this software. It makes it easier to plan events, especially. Embedding it into Facebook makes it easy for attendees to keep track of their event calendar

Overall_Review: Overall, EventBrite is great to use when buying tickets for events.
Pros_Review: EventBrite is easy to use and has a wide variety of tickets available when searching for events such as sports games or concerts.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the prices seem higher than other ticket selling sites, but that is not very often. Most of the time, it is better prices.

Overall_Review: Would highly recommend for any business that has a medium to large event to coordinate.  Easy to use, quick set up
Pros_Review: Very easy to use to organize events, fast setup, easy signup for event goers, clear sign up confirmations
Cons_Review: To date, I have no complaints about this software.  It truly is very easy to use and user friendly in all aspects.

Overall_Review: I have used event brite for over 5 years for both purchasing entertainment tickets and attending educational/seminars/ webinar events. The built in feature that notifies you of similar events you attended in the past or recently ensures that I never miss a great event ( i.e., personal, entertainment, academic and business related).
Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows flexibility in the user creating, selling, and promoting both virtual events (i.e., regardless if they require money or are free) and entertainment events (e.g., concert tickets) is exceptional!
Cons_Review: Eventbrite does not have a customer service chat feature or toll-free number, which can be frustrating if you encounter an issue.

Overall_Review: Regularly use eventbrite to manage our organization's events. User-friendly tool for collecting and managing registrations.
Pros_Review: It's free! And it offers a great variety for creating customized registration and ticket options. Love that events posted to eventbrite can easily be shared across social media platforms as well.
Cons_Review: Not a lot of complaints with this software. Because it's free, sometimes your events can get lost among the sea of other events, but it has served our purposes well!

Overall_Review: I've never had a bad experience with EventBrite, even for events that are listed as free!
Pros_Review: I have used this service for many, many years and find it very easy, streamlined, and organized when it comes to booking events.
Cons_Review: I feel like the website could use an update as it has stayed/looked quite similar for a long time.

Overall_Review: We managed to get a lot of attendees for our events/information sessions. It was worth using it as a marketing platform.
Pros_Review: What I like is that we can post our events for FREE with no limited duration. It's easy and very convenient to use and to set up the post. You just have to make an account for free and you can use it right away!
Cons_Review: There is nothing that I don't like except for the required size of the flyer to be posted for the event. Other than that, everything is fine!

Overall_Review: Overall I enjoy it, it makes browsing and showcasing events very easy as well as ticket buying.
Pros_Review: An easy way to virtually invite people to an event, able to share lots of details and set up ticket sales all in one location.
Cons_Review: Sometimes if an event has varying dates it can be hard to find the right way to present that on this platform.

Overall_Review: My overall experience has been good with Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I like the fact that you can not only advertise your events on, but you can also see other events happening in your area.
Cons_Review: The only con is the amount paid for the ticket price and the payment processing amount. Both those combined can be quite a bit.

Overall_Review: I very much like having my events in one area. I also love being able to see where my friends are going and doing. I love the extra suggestions as well!
Pros_Review: I love that I can sign up for events at just a touch of a button. I also love that I can see and find other events in my area!
Cons_Review: I have a hard time connecting my google calendar with the app at times. I have contacted customer support and they have been great at trying to help me solve this issue.
