Overall_Review: Very easy process in setting up my fundraiser events tickets through Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: Great platform for advertising and marketing events that are free and those events associated with a fee. Refunds issued to potential guests has been refunded in a timely manner. Eventbrite offers these reports like strategic reports that give useful information about your audiences. If you review carefully it can help build potential guests or future visibility to your events.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite app is not mobile device friendly. There tends to always be some type of formatting or layout issues when trying to use software on a mobile device.

Overall_Review: Overall, I have no complaints about Eventbrite. I love getting email updates and my receipts when I register through Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: It is very simple to use. I have registered/signed up for a handful of events through Eventbrite and I loved it. Both the app and website and easy to maneuver, modern in design, and pleasing to the eye.
Cons_Review: I have not had any issues with Eventbrite since I've used it. I've used it for about 5 or 6 events now and it's been smooth sailing for all of them.

Overall_Review: I am usually searching for events when I want to get inspired by the local scene and simply check what is going on that day or weekend.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has a really great information architecture layout that speaks directly to the user. It is always easy to find the necessary information and simply search for events that match your needs or desires. I only use it to search for events, not to organize them, but I believe it would be equally pleasant to perform that task too. The good thing is that Eventbrite covers numerous countries and you can almost always count on its support, wherever you are. The UI is absolutely not cluttered and it only contains the essentials. It is great that it also handles the tickets purchase so you can be all set for your event in very little time.
Cons_Review: Even though the service is available in many countries, not so many event organizers actually use it to publish their events online. I would say that the coverage is not always the best and you might miss out on many available events. Facebook probably contains many more events, which is a pity. Another thing I could think of is that it is not always easy to tell whether the published event is actually real or fake. I have heard about those issues before. Finally, ticket fees can be quite high sometimes.

Overall_Review: I enjoy it very much. The app that was created has never given me any issues and I love that I can pull up my tickets or event logs right from my phone in one place.
Pros_Review: As a frequent goer of concerts and events I was always running into issues with getting organized each month with multiple shows and events that I had tickets too. Being about to have access to all of your tickets on one app in one place has made life so much easier.
Cons_Review: I wish more companies and venues used Eventbrite. There are many times I get lucky and all events are hosted through Eventbrite but there has been a few times where they are stored locally though the venue itself..

Pros_Review: It's easily accessible to purchase tickets for events that ay be happening around the area. Easy enough to pick out seats, see the time, and price. If extra assistance is needed, that is also available for anyone needing makes it much more comfortable for people who may need that.
Cons_Review: The fact that this software does crash at times if used on a mobile device perhaps. If it is re-loaded, sometimes all the information is lost so having to enter all the information again becomes necessary. That however is very annoying and frustrating when you are on the go and just need to get the ticket right away.

Overall_Review: My experience has been great. A lot of places only use eventbrite for ticket purchases
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been used many times throughout the years by me for ticket purchasing. Easy and clear for events
Cons_Review: I don't like paying the fee that is always associated with ordering on the site. Other than that, easy to use.

Overall_Review: I have been glad to use Eventbrite for the events that have used their services.  It has been user friendly whenever I have used their product.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is convenient in that it allows for another method to purchase tickets and receive confirmation of purchases.  It is easy to use when attending an event, as the smartphone feature is well made.
Cons_Review: I really have no issues at all with Eventbrite.  It is a convenient tool to use and more and more companies are utilizing it.

Overall_Review: I use this app for personal reason , and it work very well in europe .
Pros_Review: This software permit so have and to save tickets from several event . It's very practical to have this .
Cons_Review: From my personal experience , when you buy something on this website and you can face some issue . But i think it's because of some event organization .

Overall_Review: I have purchased tickets to a concert using EventBright.
Pros_Review: Event sponsors can sell tickets to events an this software and they can be purchased through a web based platform.
Cons_Review: The only con is you don't receive paper tickets for the event, everything is digital and you receive the tickets non a phone or tablet.

Overall_Review: I end up using it to find and sign up for events in my area
Pros_Review: Love this software for events. I use it all the time and i love the reminders it sends me because I forget about everything. all the time.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it's clunk to use but that's not anything that bothers me enough to stop using it. Love it

Overall_Review: Overall easy to use, very easy to promote with and keep track of all attendees for an event.
Pros_Review: I'm able to create an easy RSVP system for events that I we host, whether they are free or need a ticket purchased. It's easy to create descriptions, FAQ Sections and custom create questions or discount/access codes.
Cons_Review: We host an event with multiple time-slots. It can be confusing with clients once their tickets are printed since it shows the entire time-frame and then they show up early etc. We removed the time-frame from our description and then it removed the date. Overall it isn't a large con but one that has caused a few hiccoughs.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite in multiple areas of our business.  Sales team uses it to get us into great events around the city, while the planning/marketing uses it to post our own sponsored events for better attendance.  We love it.
Pros_Review: As a small business, finding out what is going on in our city is crucial.  This is great for event attendance, as well as planning our own events.  Thus, we use Eventbrite both as "searchers" and as "posters" of events.
Cons_Review: I think they could be stricter guidelines on what is posted on Eventbrite.  Some events listed are not really events at all, but are almost like mini-advertisements.  A little bit stricter quality control could go a long way.

Overall_Review: Overall Eventbrite has made our event organisation and ticket sales relatively easy, and has taken much of the hassle away from our administration team, so they can do more important jobs.
Pros_Review: Easy to use and easy to promote events via integrated platforms (Facebook etc). Eventbrite is also a reliable and trustworthy way to take ticket payments, and customers enjoy being able to book online, as opposed to having to call through to organise their tickets. The reminder emails for events are also excellent for increasing attendance rates.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite takes a relatively significant portion of ticket sales, meaning if you are using this software for many events, it can become relatively expensive to use (e.g. as opposed to using a software with a single yearly fee, regardless of number of tickets sold).

Overall_Review: One of the business problems Eventbrite solves for me is ease to access personal and business development programmes. And even if I don't have a budget for a paid programme, there are always free ones on Eventbrite that I can attend. Eventbrite makes it easy to know the programmes happening around you at any given time.
Pros_Review: I like the fact that I can see most of the events happening around me on Eventbrite. There are no more boring days because there's always an event I can attend by checking Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: The fact that you need to register for an event and then get a mail confirming your ticket. It makes the process a much longer.

Overall_Review: Saving time  by not having to collate event responses individually and send out reminders.
Pros_Review: It saves me time coordinating responses. It is also now a brand people are familiar with. I find it is helpful to use this even for setting up free events, as it automatically issues people with a ticket and a reminder, so they are more likely to attend.
Cons_Review: I would like more customisable features. The message that goes out with the reminder isn't always appropriate to the audience.

Pros_Review: Have used this for our annual department awards ceremony. It's a great way to keep a headcount and track the number of rsvp's. I like features in which you can send reminders which are customized
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons so far. I hope to never have any either.
reasons_choosing: It was free and it gets the job done.

Overall_Review: Overall, I am a happy and returning user to the software
Pros_Review: I've successfully used this software to register for and track events local to me. I am a big fan of it
Cons_Review: The search functionality could be improved. Often, I am looking for a list of local events that would interest me

Overall_Review: Overall my experience is great!
Pros_Review: I love the ease of creating a ticket for my event and Eventbrite does all the work on the backend.
Cons_Review: I think the fees are a little high. I understand everyone has processing fees however I think Eventbrite could reduce them just a little bit.

Pros_Review: I like using Eventbrite to purchase event tickets.  It's fast and efficient, and there are usually no addtional fees.  It's great to have another option to Ticketmaster for concerts and events.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything that I have had trouble with on Eventbrite.  It's been very easy to use.

Overall_Review: Easy to use, love that the tickets are electronic as it is one less thing I have to bring with me.
Pros_Review: I love that Eventbrite allows you to purchase tickets to local events, the tickets are electronic and all you have to worry about is presenting your phone when you get there.
Cons_Review: Everything is great and I haven't had any complaints.

Pros_Review: Eventrbrite has the easiest and the most reasonably priced online ticket sales for fundraising events.    With all the different ticket sales options that they have, you should be able to have the sales any way you would like them to be.
Cons_Review: Sometimes tech support is a little slow, but not unacceptable.

Overall_Review: Gets rid of posting flyers and distributing pamphlets around town for an upcoming event.
Pros_Review: One stop solution for keeping track of events, signing up for them, making payments and managing the tickets.
Cons_Review: The filtering to sort out the type of events I am looking for needs to do better.

Pros_Review: I've used Eventbrite to find tickets to games and shows quickly. I found an extremely discounted ticket, last minute, for a football game and had no problem getting in. The app was easy to use and I found no problems with it.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the tickets aren't the cheapest you can find.

Overall_Review: We are rather happy with EventBrite. Even though we cannot have all of the features we require at the base level, it works very well for what we need it for. There are a few things that could be done better, such as the refund system, but it's one of the best programs out there.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is extremely easy to use. We've only done events when there weren't many people expected to attend, but the program worked flawlessly. We were able to get our first event up very quickly and any questions we had were answered by the helpful customer service and FAQ.
Cons_Review: There are many features that require an upgrade on the plan, which a lot of small businesses, like ours, cannot afford. It would also help if we were able to do multiple refunds rather than one at a time. That way we can refund for an entire event if needed.

Overall_Review: This helped us to really be able to plan for a general number of people that would be attending our event.
Pros_Review: It is so easy for people to simply log into it and let us know they will be attending our event.
Cons_Review: Not the software, but, sometimes the user. Some people added their info. to our event and then did not show.

Pros_Review: It's easy to set up an event and see who's coming. We've used this in my company for almost every internal event to get accurate counts and RSVPs of those coming. We have seen the value when using this so there isn't too much left over food, so we have a venue that can hold everyone etc.
Cons_Review: The events you create on the site don't have the best design customization. I would like to be able to design the site a lot more to make it go with the theme of the events.

Pros_Review: I really enjoy the ease of use of Eventbrite. It is a straightforward platform. It is easy to search for events and to purchase tickets. I love that it also sends a confirmation e-mail with an attachment of your tickets that you can add an event to your calendar.
Cons_Review: I have not had a negative experience with this platform. I have heard people have a hard time with customer support if they need a refund, but this is not something I have experienced.

Overall_Review: Many of the best events I've attended were found on Eventbrite. So having the opportunity to buy and sell with them was a great experience!
Pros_Review: This software is super easy to use and you can post your tickets for sale in minutes.  Has a very easy to use design tool and uses forms for entering your information for site.
Cons_Review: I did not like that the site did not allow you to pass their fees on to the ticket buyer if you use PayPal. They send you an invoice that you have to pay to them directly.

Overall_Review: I am using the app for my personal goals of looking for the best events around and booking tickets there.
Pros_Review: I really like the flexibility and the functionality of the Eventbrite
Cons_Review: I do not really enjoy the design of the app and I would like it to look a bit more simple and user-centered

Pros_Review: It was easy to install and setting up events is very easy.  Applicants reported no problems registering and reminders were sent in a timely manner.
Cons_Review: It is not the most professional looking site.  They also tend to send a lot of promotional e-mail.

Pros_Review: The software is super easy up upload ANY events and link to social media.  We also love the free ticket option as it allows us to more accurately determine the crowd size.
Cons_Review: I wish there was a way to automatically share an every from social media to Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Overall, I think Eventbrite is useful. Lower fees than AXS and ticketmaster, and easy to use for smaller clubs and music venues.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a super easy and user friendly ticketing system. Everything on their site is very straightforward and easy to navigate.
Cons_Review:
I don't like that the gross number on the auto reports that get sent out include fees-- that number isn't useful when it comes to sending net and gross over to ticketing agents.

I don't like that you can't see more than one venue at a time-- you have to specifically go back into the manage panel to select another show at another venue.

Pros_Review: Just like the name, it's a one stop shop for any event or gathering, very easy to use and doesn't need any extra tutorial for those that would be registering for events using it. I also like the fact that you can program it to your taste and needs like when you have to send reminders to participant of your events. I've been using Eventbrite for the last 2years for my event and I've not had any regrets.
Cons_Review: You only do not have to pay when your event is free but it's not bad anyways. Also the timing for each registration, some first timers  might not really get the whole concept at first usage.

Overall_Review: I have been using EventBrite for over 7 years and love its ability to sell tickets to events for my companies and organizations.
Pros_Review: EventBrite is user-friendly. Easy to set up events and link them to your website. I Love the new Facebook Addin which allows your guests to buy tickets right from the Facebook event without having to be connected to another landing page or external site.
Cons_Review: EventBrite is limited in the marketing aspect. It is great that you can sell tickets on this platform and they have made leaps and bounds with integration for Facebook and MailChimp but if you are looking for a one-stop shop, this may not be for you.

Overall_Review: Easy to use and easy to get users to download and quickly interact.
Pros_Review: Introduced to this software through a county health department, using it for an event. Really helpful in getting responses and in making the event visible, and for tracking the participants.
Cons_Review: There seem to be many of these types of apps, so I'm not sure how it ranks in being recognizable. However, once you get your clients aware that you are using this app for ticketing/promoting your event it is great.

Overall_Review: My experience with this program over the past three years has been relatively positive.
Pros_Review: Simple, easy to use event planning application!
Cons_Review: In the past, I felt Eventbrite's service fee was much too high. Recently, Eventbrite reduced the service fee charged per ticket, which was definitely needed!

Overall_Review: Easy way to communicate with guests and get a head count.
Pros_Review: I love this software for creating events and invitations. It's done electronically, you can create as many events as you want, invite people, and see who rsvps. Very convenient.
Cons_Review: No complaints as of yet. I only use the free option which works great.

Overall_Review: It has made it so much easier to schedule training's and meetings.  Everyone can just respond and then I know how many to plan for and what I will need to bring for the meeting.
Pros_Review: It is so easy to use that even I, who am technology challenged, can use it.
Cons_Review: I cannot think of anything that I don't like.

Overall_Review: I have a very positive experience working with Eventbrite. I used it when working on migrating content for numerous university clubs. We had to create different levels of membership and tickets with promo codes varying depending on person's levels of memberships. Eventbrite is very flexible in what you can achieve.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows to easily create single or recurrent events and payments (such as membership fees, etc.)  and add a variety of tickets available for different prices and  conditions, to generate promo  codes. It also generates reports that allow to see the  progress of sales. Also it gives an ample opportunity to apply custom design to the event and has user-friendly forms that allow to enter event's location, date, and other details.
Cons_Review: When the company I was contracting for used Eventbrite, not all countries'  currency was supported (we needed to setup events from within US, so some of the countries had to provide alternative method of receiving payment).

Overall_Review: I was invited to several job informational meetings, dinners, and small parties.
Pros_Review: This allowed me to receive invites for events, see who was on the list, and contact the host in a professional and timely manner.
Cons_Review: This is a great program that can be used for personal and professional uses. Works great for managing attendance.

Pros_Review: The professionalism of the system, the ease with which you can create an event, the speed with which processes the purchase and design
Cons_Review: The mobile version does not display the seat map but automatically assigns it.

Pros_Review: I love eventbrite!!! I've purchased tickets from here before and it was great. No hassle and straight to the point. I'm happy they even promote local events!!
Cons_Review: There is nothing to dislike about this software.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has a trusted reputation, making it easy to sell tickets online - have found this to be a problem using other ticket vendors, especially on social media.
Cons_Review: I have never personally had a problem, but I understand it can be difficult to issue refunds if an event is cancelled.

Overall_Review: This came in very handy in promoting our events. Great and easy use for our clients without of use of handling cash or depositing checks.
Pros_Review: The ease of use in setup and as a user. The cost per transaction is decent and the money of sales goes straight to your account.
Cons_Review: none that I can recall, everything work well for our organization.

Pros_Review: This is so easy and effective for marketing.
Cons_Review: It only takes a minute to figure it out and it's time well spent.

Overall_Review: it has been a pleasant experience using Eventbrite for the events I have went to.
Pros_Review: i have used Eventbrite  on several occasions for events I had planned. it is easy to use and show the ticket on the phone or print it off. which ever you want to do.
Cons_Review: I don't know of any. because if you have an issue you can get help and they will walk you thru it.

Pros_Review: It is a great tool for searching event, but also a great tool for hosting an event. guests searches, calendar, and event details, all are under one interface.
Cons_Review: I hope there will be multi language options. It will be easier to reach different language, culture so that we can reach more people.

Overall_Review: I work for a University and a lot of our events are free and use Eventbrite and it's always a seamless experience. You can also save the tickets as cards on my iPhone, which is very convenient.
Pros_Review:
One of the things I really liked was that even if the event was free, Eventbrite was seamless, just as if you had paid for a ticket. 

You can even use the site to look for events, sort of like a search tool for events in your area. You can also create events on the website for others to register for.
Cons_Review: I don't like that in order to create a login, I had to use a service like LinkedIn to login with. I feel that it would be nice to be able to create a login specific to Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is used for our networking events and launch events. It's been quite a friendly tool for the consumers, making it easy for us to invite others, charge, or even offer free one time promo codes. It's pretty vital for hosting an event. Doing a normal list outside of this would be very time consuming.
Pros_Review: It's very easy to offer invitations to our clients for events using their services.
Cons_Review: It can be a bit costly when it comes to certain event types that we do so we have to plan for the event to be big enough to get a return.

Overall_Review: There are great benefits to using Eventbrite. I have created events for the community and also able to have plans for my friends and family when they come to town.
Pros_Review: It's so easy to figure out what's going on in a city near you!
Cons_Review: There are so many events to choose from. Sometimes it is hard to see which are the popular events.

Overall_Review: If you want a simple ticketing platform for your event of any size Eventbrite is a great tool.
Pros_Review: Easy to use platform with the ability to customize your ticketing needs and reservation management. Works great for for free and paid for events.
Cons_Review: I have not come across any cons after using the service as an end user and organizer. The platform has come a long way.

Overall_Review: Great experience - we've been using them for years for our classes for kids and adults.
Pros_Review:
Ease of use
Creating events with multiple dates
Connecting with facebook/FB events
Ability to post events at different locations
Cons_Review: No affiliate codes can be used when creating events with multiple dates - would be great if they fixed this!

Overall_Review: Absolutely positive experience. Eventbrite helped us register for many military events. It also led us to discover many local events.
Pros_Review: Everything was easy to use and understand.  I would not have known about many local events had it not been for Eventbrite.  Great for military spouses to find local events.
Cons_Review: have no complaints at all about Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Absolutely loved everything about it! We used it to send out our wedding invitations. Everything including the directions and the map with the gps link was right in the invite.
Cons_Review: I don't remember facing with any issues with it - the interface does take a little time to get used to and you need to play aroundto see where everything is.

Overall_Review: It's great product ! I hope everyone try to use it!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has everything you want for creating an event registration form and ticketing of it in an instant , so easy to use and great for daily need. I love this great product.
Cons_Review: There is one thing I complain for using this , that you can't print a report starting on registrant's last name , but other than that is great its customer service is great and I can follow there instruction easily.

Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to use and set up your events. We used this software to advertise our job fair events. This software allows us to send mass communication to applicants in our ATS informing them about our event and asking them to RSVP for it. It has made the events easier to manage because it gives us an idea of how many candidates we can expect to attend by allowing them to select time slots.
Cons_Review: The only thing I do not like is that it allows our applicants the ability to select multiple time slots for our events. It would make more sense to only allow them to select one time slot. Allowing the candidate to select multiple times with multiple tickets has inflated some of our numbers, which can be misleading because we think more candidates are going to attend than actually will.

Overall_Review: I've used Eventbrite on a couple of occasions. Each time to secure tickets for an event. I was able to reserve many many tickets very easily. They just had to be printed off, and there they were. It was easy, functional, and worked each time. It automatically uploaded to my digital calendar, and I was sent "reminders" about my event. LOVED IT!
Pros_Review: It's ease of use and functionality make it accessible for anyone to use regardless of age or tech savviness.
Cons_Review: Nothing really except that's it's still technology that people of an older generation might not understand.

Pros_Review: This is such a great tool for groups, non-profits and small businesses. Easy, affordable (and free in a lot of ways). Doesn't get much easier to get things planned and organized.
Cons_Review: I don't really have any. As -is, it worked great for my "free" needs. There are upsells, but they don't get in the way of small, personal use.

Pros_Review: I really like how Eventbrite includes all the details to whatever the occasion may be. I also like how Eventbrite asks if you want to add it directly to your calendar and then does so with permission...along with all the details.
Cons_Review: As much as the reminders are nice...I don't like how many reminders they give you. It also automatically alerts you of events in your area. To unsubscribe from this option, you have to do that at the bottom of the email and then follow a link.

Pros_Review: They are kind of like Stubhub in the sense that they have accumulated a very wide, impressive range of events. The layout is also sharp and simple. I'm mostly just a fan of Ticketfly, which is a great ticket seller.
Cons_Review: The searching part can be improved, as it isn't always easy to find specific events, especially if they aren't concerts.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a free/low cost solution to event promotion and management. It has a ton of great features like Facebook event integration and mailchimp integration that are easy to use.
Cons_Review: Tough one... I have had such a good experience using Eventbrite. Perhaps the only negative is that when integrating with a free Facebook event there is no way to change the name of the button from "Purchase Tickets" which created confusion. I wish we could have used RSVP or something similar.

Overall_Review: Looks great and trustworthy
Pros_Review: High quality and well designed. A great third party tool for events that require a higher level of brand image without having to invest a lot in a proprietary system.
Cons_Review: It can get expensive as the size of your event grows, so it requires some research. There isn't much flexibility built into the pricing model.

Pros_Review: Easy way to get out the word when the team is having an event and getting people to RSVP. It sends reminders out too before the event if they haven't RSVP'd.
Cons_Review: Nothing really, it's a pretty straightforward product for what it is. I don't really like all the emails they send me advertising various different things, but all companies do that.

Overall_Review: N/A
Pros_Review: We use this to sign up for monthly trainings at work. We are required to complete 3-4 continuing education classes each month and Eventbrite does a good job with it.  You can view everything on one page along with dates and times that fit into your schedule.
Cons_Review: The one thing I don't like at all is once you select a specific training you have to go back to the very beginning and start all over to select another one. That is very annoying.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is one of the important tool to register yourself for any event and the team working behind the screens are really enthusiastic at managing stuffs, and events, making it a memorable experience and user-friendliness makes life easy.
Pros_Review:
Being a Student at UNLV, Nevada, where Most of the time Events and festivals take place, and I have trusted this company to get the tickets for the events,
It is very user-friendly that a KG Kid can easily print a ticket for him/herself. The whole Process usually takes place in  three steps and It also gives an access to mark it on your calendar so you don' miss it anyhow and you promptly get an e-mail regarding your registration and E-ticket.
Cons_Review: Add-ins for invited guests and users can make the process more efficient and convenient and it can also be used to avoid the rush at the event itself.

Pros_Review: Keep track of all of your attendees in one place!  Collect funds, contact attendees, with added (paid) features like printing name tags.
Cons_Review: Extras that would be helpful such as printing name tags are integrated with third party sites that will charge for their services.  Excellent product if you're looking for basic event management functions.

Pros_Review: If you're going to put on an event and don't have a ton of time and resources to promote and process the event, EventBrite makes it easy and efficient for you to do it. They provide all the tools necessary in a very user friendly IU.
Cons_Review: I think that the ability to customize the feel and look of your events page would make EventBrite much better.

Pros_Review: I like how it's pretty easy to use, and how it can include a good amount of info about the event.  Some sites don't always include that much.  It seems pretty easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: I don't like the extra fees that are tacked on, it's a little annoying to think you are paying one price and then it bumps up because of an extra fee.  But it does seem like it shows the fee before moving forward too much in the process, so that part is decent, even though having the fees is still inconvenient.

Pros_Review: When your auto-fill is on, it's super easy to register for an event. Overall, it's easy to get a high level view of an event, and register, which matters most.
Cons_Review: Sometimes you have to dig a little to find "additional details". Would be great if this was easier to access and of the format of descriptions was more consistent.

Overall_Review: For the registrant the process is seamless, however, Eventbrite could improve their backend experience for those putting on the event. For example, not all event hosts have the digital capability to scan everyone's ticket.  It would be helpful to non-profits or organizations who are boot strapping to more easily be able to download an excel sheet of attendees, or load names directly to a name badge template.
I used it for a last minute event to broadcast the event
Pros_Review: Ease of use for customers to "buy" tickets, list events and different types of entry , because it is widely used I was able to get my message out easily,
Cons_Review: Limits on notification scheme , found it difficult to update after I had already created the event. Found it confiusing to alter the event after people started signing up

Overall_Review: Overall I am a huge fan of Eventbrite and it allows me to stay active and get to know my community better.
Pros_Review: I use Eventbrite to buy tickets for shows I know I want to see but also to search for fun activities and events in my area. Everything is able to be filtered by type of event and your tickets are stored all together.
Cons_Review: I have been using Eventbrite for several years now and I have not seen any issues or had any problems with the software.

Overall_Review: I've always had good experiences using Eventbrite and their customer service.
Pros_Review: I've used Eventbrite for many years and it's always been very reliable and easy to navigate and use.
Cons_Review: I haven't had any issues, other than the occasional cancellations but that is completely out of their control.

Overall_Review: My overall experience is very good with the eventbrite software
Pros_Review: Easy to navigate the software and easy to book events. I Enjoy the reminder alerts for booked events
Cons_Review: There is not much I didn't like about the software. The software hits the main user experiences that are needed

Overall_Review: Great way to keep track of things and purchasing is very easy
Pros_Review: This software is very useful to me as a user. It is easy to keep track of events and event sign up is very easy
Cons_Review: The user interface could be a bit more streamlined. Multiple emails are a bit annoying - reminder emails would be great

Overall_Review: I use it because many of the events I attend use it by default.
Pros_Review: I like that I can find a huge variety of events in one place. Once I am logged in to my account, the registration process is faily simple.
Cons_Review:
I am not able to automatically sync the events I am signed up for with my Google calendar.  I have to enter each event individually. Moreover, if I sign up for something using my iphone, there is no option to enter the event directly to my google calendar. I have to type it in every time. 

One more thing which is frustrating is that when I have finished registering for an event, the ticket pops up 3 or 4 times, again and again and again.

The event suggestion is very much off from what I typically look at. And surprisingly, I am often not even able to see the people or organizations I follow, let alone their events.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: Overall is a good platform for small to medium businesses.
Pros_Review: The software is very user friendly and easy to navigate. Option to use a digital ticket with barcode for event.
Cons_Review: Not able to track reoccurring events. Not currently offering the ability to resell tickets to local events.

Overall_Review: My overall experience in Eventbrite is positive. Eventbrite makes setting events easy and compatible to any websites. Eventbrite connecting with email system makes reminder and tracking of our customer easy. Eventbrite is an amazing system for any business to create events and to track customer. The reminder system comes in handy to insure people remembered to come to our events
Pros_Review: What I like most about this software is that Eventbrite makes it easy for user to create events and easy  customize the details. Eventbrite allows users put all the information up  online as well as connect their emails. It also makes tracking people. Eventbrite also allows set reminder emails.
Cons_Review: What I least like about the software is the buying table. In the past a customer and event creator I have struggled to  buy large tickets amount. Minor glitches in the app had many customers complain they could not put the credit card information. Glitches with ao sometimes gives us wrong reads with on the amount checked in.

Overall_Review: I enjoy using Eventbrite as a trustful resource to make ticket purchases.
Pros_Review: The display of the software had a professional outlook and was easy to access when purchasing tickets.
Cons_Review: The extra fees that are charged makes me prefer to do window pick ups instead of printing the tickets out.

Overall_Review: Overall, I find using Eventbrite to be easy and fast.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy way to register for events and to get information about upcoming events in my area
Cons_Review: I don't really have any complaints about eventbrite, I find it easy to use and navigate. Registering for events is easy.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite allowed our organization to quickly, easily, and effectively put together a hub for our supporters to buy tickets to our fundraising events. With the time we saved on event management, we were able to re invest that into making a better event. It's really a no-brainer
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so ubiquitous that its pros almost go without saying. It's easy to set up, reliable, and from a user pov, people are very familiar with its interface. It allows you to keep multiple events organized in one place , and its mobile implementation is better than most similar pieces of software that I've seen.
Cons_Review: It would be nice to have a bit more flexibility re: how your event appears on the event page. I guess it's the trade off you pay for ease of use, but having 2 or 3 design options would be nice. Not everything necessarily fits the same template- having some options that are more visual, for example, would be useful for more artistic oriented events.

Overall_Review: I was put in charge of planning an event for work. I was looking for tips to make planning easier when I came across eventbrite. Eventbrite made planning far less stressful by using the provided tips.
Pros_Review: I've only used eventbrite once, but I will definitely be using it to plan more events in the future. It made planning a breeze. Eventbrite offers so many helpful tips.
Cons_Review: It took a little while for me to figure out the ticket system. But once I played around with it, it was easy.

Overall_Review:
In big cities, like San Francisco, great to find events. 
Extra useful at big events like SXSW in austin, as it lists non official events.
It was easy to list my own meet-ups, and get the word out at the last minute.
Pros_Review:
Mostly i use to find events. Easy to use your current location or to set the location you will be in in a few days.
Easy to find events and save them
Can reserve a spot at events with limited-numbers
Easy to list your own event, using the sister app.
Great in big cities
Cons_Review:
Need the companion app to list events. thats fine, just one more app to have.
no map view of events (as far as i can tell)

Overall_Review:
Always have an easy time to use this site.
Recommend them.
Pros_Review:
It is easy to use for a senior.
Some sites are not senior friendly.
I don't have to go round and round.
Just click.
Cons_Review:
Nothing to dislike about this service.
I can not think of any cons about the service.
Easy to navigate.

Overall_Review: Very good, I enjoy searching and booking through the site.
Pros_Review: You can see events in your area and find out about new things going on. Includes all the information you need about the events.
Cons_Review: Sometimes you don't see events relevant to you and your likes/dislikes or too much of the same things.

Overall_Review: My experience, though just on the consumer side, has been good with Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I love that this software allows community groups to offer tickets to free events. This enables the groups to get the word out about their event while also getting an estimated number of people who are interested and have reserved their free tickets.
Cons_Review: There is really nothing that I do not like about Eventbrite. It is a wonderful tool for community organizations to  use.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is super easy to use and I have no issues with it. Events are quickly and efficiently sent by email and interacting with it is very easy.
Pros_Review:
I like that Eventbrite is a great and easy way to create and send events for friends, family, and larger events as well. When you get an event information is simply and quickly displayed inside an email. You can then sign up for the event quickly and easily. 

I also like how there are a lot of options like free and paid events as well.
Cons_Review: There isn't much I don't like about this. EventBrite isn't flashy but that is also its strength as well.

Overall_Review: Positive, the business uses Eventbrite regularly and will continue to list events here.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, great way to promote upcoming events and track traffic to listings.
Cons_Review: Limited functionality, no way to add branding to your own events page.

Overall_Review: Overall we are pleased with Eventbrite and would recommend anyone in any field use Eventbrite to encourage more education and training in what you do!
Pros_Review: Using Eventbrite has given us the ability to have our staff and volunteers sign up for events, trainings, and conferences that will help them get more educated in how we serve the clients we do. One great thing about Eventbrite is the information you are given for the events you sign up for, what a wonderful way to be ready for the meetings!
Cons_Review: I would have to honestly say I don't have any Cons at this time for the Eventbrite application! Thanks

Pros_Review: I love that I can easily make events and send them out to families that I work with.  This also helps me track RSVPs and attendance.  I use the app in my personal life as well to find things to do!
Cons_Review: I love this app but wish it was easier to search events.

Overall_Review: It's been a while that I organize events and I always load my events on Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I love this app just for the interface and the features with the Social Networks.
Cons_Review: You have to put a ticketing for every events, but some events doesn't need ticketing.

Overall_Review: This software is good for alerting me of various events I have been invited to and it a good software for keeping up with who and how many will attend.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has proven to be a good use for scheduling and hosting events.
Cons_Review: I can find nothing negative about the software

Overall_Review: Amazing software
Pros_Review: I used this software to buy tickets for various events and its the easiest and best software out there to purchase a ticket for any type of event. Or even sell tickets.
Cons_Review: The amount of times it asks one to log in

Overall_Review: Easy to use,  very helpful.
Pros_Review: It is easy to use, helps to track attendees for meetings
Cons_Review: I have had no problems using it. And my meeting attendees have said how easy it was to use
reasons_choosing: I was referred to Eventbrite by a friend and it had good reviews so I never considered anything else

Pros_Review: quick and efficient event planning especially for someone who is on the go and doesn't have the time to make and send out invitations
Cons_Review: There is not much to not like about this service. unless you are not tech Savy or are catering to people who are not tech savy

Pros_Review: I've mainly used this product to sign up for events, and everytime I do, it works smoothly.
Cons_Review: The only questions I've had with this product have come from the lack of clarity of information from those who set up events-----the product itself is clean and clear.

Pros_Review: This software is useful for any event application. Easy to use and very intuituve. Extremely scaleable: you can plan out a personal event for free, or creat events for largd scale opperations. The software includes ticketing options as well, so it can be the single program you use to reach your audience , ticket them, and collect market demographics from your participants.
Cons_Review: Can get confusing with large scale operations, and while the ticketing software is useful, it is not the most glamorous; other operatios devoted completely to ticketing can be more effective.

Overall_Review: We have only used Eventbrite and no other system - its super easy to set up, keep track and so forth...no switching here!
Pros_Review: Great way to keep track (especially when space/seating is limited), knowing who is RSVP to events and so forth.
Cons_Review: I personally haven't found any draw back with this system

Overall_Review: A great product, no major problems.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has great exposure to the tech ecosystem. Lots of events are being posted through Eventbrite hence lots of choices for attendees and event organizers. Their registering system is seamless. Creating an event is also extremely easy.
Cons_Review:
Although free for free events, pricing can be a bit high for low priced tickets, hence you need to consider price when setting the overall price of the ticket. 
The main page when searching for events on the web does not contain the filter option. You need to perform another action in order to get to filters.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite for ticketing of academic conferences and managing registrations for these events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite really is the bog standard for ticketing and events. It's very flexible and you can customize things like early access, waiting lists, referrals, etc. without having to read through a 1000 page manual. The uptime has been fantastic and we've never encountered a crash due to servers being overloaded. The newly designed mobile app is a big improvement and participants can exchange contact details, upload slides and documents, and register for sessions at the event (conference style).
Cons_Review: A bit pricey compared to competitors but in my opinion Eventbrite is worth the costs as the functionality simply can't be beat in other companies' products.

Overall_Review: Great, we can promote meetings, ensure signups and payments and market events just as we need to.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, intuitive interface, has rapidly become the standard for tech events and meeting planning.
Cons_Review: Nothing negative to say about it, very easy to use.

Overall_Review: We have closed our account after using them for sub par services for a few years. We are growing and its time to move on.
Pros_Review:
We enjoyed using this platform because they do allow photo and video integration.
They roped us in the first year we worked with them by assigning us a an actual representative, but that quickly changed.
Cons_Review: It feels choppy because each event has to stand alone. They don't necessarily link together as one large event if you are trying to build out separate events for each day or time. Horrible customer service over time. We finally started to pay for their equipment and they didn't answer their phones or emails during our event at all. They also sent equipment that is not compatible by most standards to modern day technology or building codes. They did not seem to care about the aftermath of losing money for our event.

Overall_Review: The app is being used by many academic and non-academic bodies to organize events and enable people to register. It is the new RSVP form and ticketing app.
Pros_Review:
The app allows for download of tickets/ QR code/ Bar code making it easy to pull up tickets at venue. Also allows syncing with Apple Wallet.
Ability to add events to Apple calendar to track them.
Cons_Review: Does not allow ability to customize reminder emails before an event.

Pros_Review: I like the ease of use and the fact that it connects to my mobile phone and work calendars, so I always know that events I've signed up for
Cons_Review: No complaints! They do send a lot of marketing emails, but it's easy to unsubscribe

Overall_Review: The best feature outweighed the least favorable feature, it made my life easy when managing the event.
Pros_Review: The feature that was by far the most useful on Eventbrite was the capability of segmenting the target audience, I had participants and sponsors to accommodate with tickets and payments.  It was extremely easy to keep track of all the orders and create promotional codes.
Cons_Review: I would say the least user-friendly feature I found in Eventbrite was that it wasn't that easy to collaborate with the rest of the team.  I had given them access but it was not very intuitive as to how to work together.

Overall_Review: Very good experience always. Very good mobile app, very good features.
Pros_Review: Its a very good tool to manage your events. The best part is its Mobile app which helps at event to get the attendance and automated reminders are just wow.
Cons_Review: need to create more awareness about this tool in the market.

Pros_Review: My school uses this for events where the attendance is limited. This is a great way to get RSVPs that can be rescinded and given to others if the original person is unable to attend. Email reminders are a great feature.
Cons_Review: The sign up generally signs me up for marketing emails which can be annoying. It's hard to tell if I am unsubscribing from the marketing emails or all communications such as my reminders.

Pros_Review:
mobile friendly
Customized as per user requirements
great collaboration with google maps and social accounts
Cons_Review:
Site crashes multiple times because of load
non responsive customer service
issues with refund of the tickets

Overall_Review: Evenbrite helped create and mail off flyer for an event my company was having, best part about it, since the event was free, we did not have to pay for it.
Pros_Review: You can create, promote and send off invitations to hundreds of people with one simple click. If your event is free they do not charge for the service-which is also a major plus! They have a lot of wonderful templates that you can use to add a little flair to your flyer
Cons_Review: As mentioned in my title, I used this for both business and personal and lets just say a lot of business professionals were invited to my a baby shower. I was able to rescind the invitations but took a little bit of time separating my business and personal contact. I would recommend creating to accounts so it separates your contacts.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been the choice of service chosen between colleges for hosting (and attending) game development industry events. It simply works and is great to use.
Pros_Review:
The user-facing website and app offers a great user experience, making it a good choice for hosting an event through Eventbrite. 
It's great to be able to set up a free event if you have no entry fee.
Cons_Review: It'd be nice to have a lower price option for events with a lower cost of entry.

Pros_Review: Receiving and responding to events is super simple, for all levels of technological literacy. The events we respond to usually have well over 100 attendees and the response rates seem much higher than a traditional email RSVP.
Cons_Review: Emails can get lost in the shuffle, having the ability to invite through alternate means (i.e. through Slack or other IM services) could be useful for departments that utilize those services.

Pros_Review: My university uses Eventbrite to host and manage our arts/theater events, which is how I was first exposed to the service as an attendee. I find their website layout very pleasantly simple and enjoyable to use. Afterwards, I was pleasantly surprised by their "rally" recommended event emails (the rare company that sends genuinely interesting emails). I love being able to browse events nearby by category or mood!
Cons_Review: (This may be a feature I'm not aware of or that my university perhaps did not utilize, but) while attempting to register for some of my university events, I missed the brief window where tickets became available and was not able to attend because they were sold out. I wish you could sign up for email or text alerts.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to get a survey of local concerts, social events, and other various occasions in your area. I enjoy using this site because it brings all of the information into one webpage so that you do not have to consult multiple websites before making a decision. It offers fast AND accurate information.
Cons_Review: Occasionally the site will list that events that turn out to be sold out when you try to check out and purchase the ticket. In addition, price changes are very frequent on this site. Be aware that prices may change even after you put an item in your cart.

Overall_Review:
The software is so easy to use and very practical for selling workshop tickets for my small business. I loved being able to quickly create and custom event with all the necessary information for attendees to purchase their tickets in advance. For me, it's worthwhile to pay a bit extra and have multiple types of tickets for my workshop.
Give it a try. I think you'll love it too.
Pros_Review:
Minimal fees
Easy to use
Very customizable
Cons_Review: I couldn't find a way to 'copy' or 'repeat' a past event without having to just start from scratch.

Pros_Review: This software makes it easy for employees to organize and attend company events. I would also assume it helps our HR department keep track of what employees are going to what company events.
Cons_Review: One time I could not remember whether or not I had received my tickets for an event. So, I just went in and got two more. It turns out that I had already applied for the event, and then I had four tickets to the event. The point being, that could throw off numbers for HR. I realize this was my fault but it would be nice to be notified of duplicate tickets. The event was free, so this did not cost me any extra money.

Overall_Review: I've used it professionally for our non-profit organization events.  I've used it personally as well.  Very convenient
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to set-up and manage.  You can customize your checkout page with your some of your own info which is nice.  Pay out is fairly quick.  It's also great to be able to print out a list/spreadsheet of all your sales with names.
Cons_Review: The fees.  It's standard that any kind of credit card processing is gonna come with fees though.

Pros_Review: I can search, select, & pay All on one site for any kind of Event that I could ever think of. It's so convenient & it definitely saves me time and energy having to stand in a line somewhere.
Cons_Review: I haven't seen or noticed anything that I have not liked about this site yet. To me I think it's great the way it is.

Overall_Review: It's perfect for larger events who want their box office managed by an expert.
Pros_Review: They have a lot of features for small, medium and enterprise sized events.
Cons_Review: It doesn't offer much in terms of omnichannel marketing. You can integrate with your Facebook event page but beyond that, you can't advertise directly in the platform.

Pros_Review: The pros of eventbrite are the ease of creating and posting events.  These events can be whatever you need them to be whether free or paid. It is also easy to share and integrate with other platforms such as FaceBook.
Cons_Review: Can't really think of any cons for eventbrite, it simply gets the job done!

Overall_Review: This has made our registration process super easy. Plus, we are now able to offer tickets with payment plans- something we couldn't offer before Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to use Eventbrite. You can quickly make tickets, track sales, update event and attendee information as needed. Plus, there is so many useful articles in the help center- it really can't be beat.
Cons_Review: I haven't found anything I dislike about the software, the only thing that comes close is that it took me a while to figure out how to actually contact customer support for help with an issue I couldn't find an article on.

Overall_Review: I am being able to use it for work to find charity events that are having silent auctions that we can donate to and the filters are great for choosing and picking what I am looking for!
Pros_Review: I use Eventbrite for work as well as personally. The ease of navigation and user friendliness is top notch! I use this site for finding different charity events for my company to give silent auctions to, as well as leisure time for myself! I have been using this website for quite some time and it never fails to show me all the events I need to see!
Cons_Review: I cannot not think of anything I would change about Eventbrite. It meets all my needs currently!

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been my go to in finding out local events in the Washington DC area and places I have traveled. I like how they allow to filter events by free or paid, by certain dates, and what your interests are. I have used it to help host events and track the number of people coming to happy hours, so it's easy to coordinate and prepare for events as well.
Cons_Review: Sometimes I would like to see the number of people who have paid/come out to the event as a user so I can figure out the interest. In the mobile app, sometimes the QR code doesn't scan and it would be nice to have a manual code entry feature.

Overall_Review: I overall had a great experience. I use this app weekly if not monthly.
Pros_Review: I like the most about this software. I like that you can download tickets to your phone, I receive emails from Eventbrite and that it is easy to navigate
Cons_Review: I do not like that there is a timer when purchasing tickets.

Overall_Review: It's great to work with. Very easy to setup events. We do a lot of free events, but some paid, so the fact that it's super easy to switch between the two is great. I also love people can purchase tickets through Facebook Event pages via Eventbrite. We've also had several people come to our event just because they were searching the eventbrite site. So that's an awesome bonus.
Pros_Review: It's super easy to use. It's very intuitive. I'm using the newer version as well, which really streamlines setting up an event. And I love how we can charge for an event if we want, and let's us easily decide whether we want to eat the fees/taxes, or pass on the customer.
Cons_Review: Setting up bank accounts is sort of confusing. You have to create a new account on the actual event page, and then you can link it. That part should be more clear. Beside that, I haven't had any problems.

Pros_Review: My kids high school has been using Eventbrite for a couple of years now for musicals and other events.  Really like being able to go online and actually picking our seats as opposed to the traditional first come first served seating.  Another great feature is being able to just use your smartphone for them to scan when you walk in the door and not have to keep up with paper tickets.
Cons_Review: We have seen no issues so far in the last couple of years.

Pros_Review: This software makes it so easy to buy tickets on the go from my phone. My favourite feature is being able to use Apple Wallet for my tickets so all I need for going to an event is myself and my phone.
Cons_Review: The only negative thing about Eventbrite is that there aren't tickets for more events available on it!

Pros_Review: Easy to use event scheduler. This allows you to create events, put in your ticket price and then you share the link provided to have people sign up for your event. Really easy to use software that gets the job done, it notifies the creator when people sign up and lets you keep track of how many people do. I also like that, if you don't have anything to do you can literally just search your area for event happening around you and choose from the great list of things to do.
Cons_Review: Honestly couldn't find anything I did not like about the software

Pros_Review: I like how I can put my interests into the site and search for opportunities to meet other people that like to participate in similar activities or classes. I also like the map feature that shows me where the events are in my city. The wide variety of events is also very interesting.
Cons_Review: The site is great some of the events can get expensive but other than that I really don't have any significant complaints.

Overall_Review: All around a great product at a good value.
Pros_Review: Eventbright is a very powerful system that is fairly simple to use. Creating an event page, promoting the event, tracking ticket sales, collecting data about your guests, and checking in guests/accepting tickets are all reasonably intuitive. Eventbright will integrate smoothly with outside marketing platforms.
Cons_Review: Guests for an event can be looked up, but you can't print a report of their registration. Offering paid ticketing costs 10% of the ticket price, which seems expensive, but is still worth it for the convenience.

Pros_Review: I have used EventBrite for personal and business reasons. I love to see what events are happening around me including concerts, comedy shows, etc. It's also very easy and affordable to post your own events without an entire management software. Great for small singing gigs and music shows.
Cons_Review: The only con I have for Event Brite is that the learning curve could be pretty hard to non-techies. Lots of details can easily be missed when setting up events.

Overall_Review: I found events to go to and then had a very easy to way to keep track of them!
Pros_Review:
I really love Eventbrite because it caters to a different set of events than other apps such as Meetup. These events are more professional and are of better benefit to me. The easy of tracking tickets is really where Eventbrite stands out, I can have it all in one place. 
The system to find events and purchase tickets is intuitive.
Cons_Review: The one and only thing I wish was different was that it would save my login info for when I am being sent links to reoccurring tickets. That way I don't have to fill out my information every month for the same thing.

Pros_Review: Had a great experience using Eventbrite, it made the proccess of organizing and attending to events a lot easier. Also, it enabled me to keep in touch with others with no problems.
Cons_Review: I think they could improve the interface and communication interface (flow), but it definitely doesn't make me use another tool for that.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it very easy to find business-related events, and all the information in order to attend.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite has failed me in the past. I have purchased a seat for an event and paid on the Eventbrite website, just to arrive and have no record of me. That may be the event planners more than the software.

Overall_Review: As a nonprofit organization, we have greatly benefited from Eventbrite and its functionality to collect RSVP's and sell tickets.
Pros_Review: Easy to use and learn. Easily navigated by the public who will be using it to buy their tickets.
Cons_Review: Fee for ticket sales and limited customization on the look of the event.

Overall_Review: Since discovering Eventbrite my job has become much easier! Eventbrite has helped us better organize our events and communicate with attendees more easily and accurately than we had before. Eventbrite is great for us because we don't have a way to collect credit card payments so this platform has been an added bonus for us. With the option to pass the credit card surcharge onto the customer we're not taking a hit on the registration fee which is another bonus.
Pros_Review: Payment collection, organization, reports, communication
Cons_Review: The reports can be tricky to find exactly what you're looking for.

Overall_Review: If you're running a free event it's a must-use. Lots of ability to set up events with all sorts of configurations and easy for your participants to find, register and manage via the apps & online. The only thing that's missing (last time I used it) is the ability to set up templates for events and quickly run them again (you can copy an event but you have to reconfigure date & times & locations which are on different screens).
Pros_Review:
Easy to use
Free for free events
Lots of options
Mobile app for participants
Cons_Review: Difficult to run events that reoccur but irregularly.

Overall_Review: I have hosted a couple of different events on this site, and have had some issues with the email invites going to spam. While it is easy to set up your event and there are a few different customization I can make for it, it is pretty bad when your invite goes directly into someone's spam box. Pretty useless at that point.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, create nice looking evites, and well established
Cons_Review: Invites went to spam, limited customization.

Overall_Review: My experience with Eventbrite is a positive one, I wish I could discover this platform earlier. I would recommend it to all my friends
Pros_Review: I like eventbrite because it is a great website to be up-to-date and get advantage of the opportunities available
Cons_Review: Easy to use,  necessary and useful for me, no features I can complain about, only good things about Eventbrite

Overall_Review: I used it when I have a virtual and/or in person meeting. I love the way it makes a note of each participant
Pros_Review: When you want to organize a meeting and need to collect monies, register participants and send notes about the meetings, Eventbrite is available for it
Cons_Review: Sometimes, it sends too many reminders to the participants and they complain when they come to the meetings

Overall_Review: I like that that this software has made it easier to create an event and to publish. It is very easy and hassle free from the beginning until the end.
Pros_Review: I really like how easy it is to create an event no matter how big or small the events. Eventbrite is great for paid or free events creation. Everything could be done in just in matter of minutes from creating the event and publishing it to the public.  Most of our nonprofit events are free, in which means it's free to post. It is really easy to track and analyze how many people will attend the event. It is also easy to check the attendees with the QR code.
Cons_Review: I don't have any problems with the software. I think that there is not a lot of customization within the eventbrite.

Overall_Review: This service has really simplified the process for hosting and participating in different events. Eventbrite is easy to use and intuitive for any new user. I have found that the Facebook integration feature is helpful in expanding an events reach. I have found this service to be one of a kind due to the free features available to any user.
Pros_Review: The best free event software out there on the market to host and participate in events. The check-in process at events is straight forward and easy to use. It is easy for a new user to get setup on this service and simple to find relevant events.
Cons_Review: Customer service could be improved in regards to refunds. It would also be a big step up if they offered more customization for free users. As always the layout of the website can always be improve.

Overall_Review: I like using it to find upcoming events, and finding entertainment in my city.
Pros_Review: I like Eventbrite because it lets me search my area for things to do on certain dates. I think it's great for when you're visiting a city and looking for something to do, that you can access this app and find events.
Cons_Review: I've never offered an event myself, so I can't comment on things that don't work with this software.

Overall_Review: I use it all the time and I always find events in town that are free of cost.
Pros_Review: It shows all the events happening in town and that is something that I always look for.
Cons_Review: There really isn't anything to dislike about this software.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is my go-to platform for creating event landing pages that require registration and ticket sales. It's chock-full of features and integrations that make it very user friendly.
Pros_Review: What I like most about Eventbrite is how quick and easy it is to create a landing page for an event and setup a way to sell tickets. It takes less than 30 minutes to get your event up and running, which is really awesome.
Cons_Review: What I like least about Eventbrite is the lack of layout customization. It would be really great if Eventbrite had a drag-and-drop tool for building better layouts.

Overall_Review: My local newspaper uses Eventbrite to add events to its online calendar and I would probably look for another program were that not so.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite gives me the ability to list my organizations events so that they can be found by local news sources. I like that the forms are reasonably simple to use and the feeds tend to go where I want them to go
Cons_Review: It's very difficult to find my organizations event on Eventbrite. Adding events is quite easy, but I cannot imagine one could find them unless he or she had specific information about the concert. Searching for events already listed is difficult.

Pros_Review: This is such an easy software to use to buy tickets from and is very secure for any payment you have to do for tickets. It has a clean design and navigation.
Cons_Review: I do get annoyed that once I buy tickets for one event at a certain venue through eventbrite, they will continually send me updates about other events going on at this venue, regardless of whether or not you check the box saying "please give me more information about the venue's future events". I have marked them for spam countless times and yet they still keep popping up in my inbox.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is very easy, safe and convenient to use. Organize your schedule and events, and show you other possibilities that interest you, including free options.
Pros_Review: Not only can you enjoy your event with peace of mind and security, it also warns you about other events within your interests or the same event producers you have already attended. The chance of you finding cool things to do is great.
Cons_Review: Honestly there's something I don't like about Eventbrite that I can consider here. Activities can be found for all tastes within it, from conferences, events, to festivals, among others.

Overall_Review: The experience has been positive, especially after learning how to really navigate the tools. I have been able to streamline the registration process for my events and better manage the information.
Pros_Review:
Eventbrite allows me to schedule out an entire season of events with good tools to track attendance for each occurrence.
Also, this software syncs with other platforms to manage communication to our guests
Cons_Review: Not all the features are intuitive, I have had to dig deep to find the tools I needed. Once I found them they were great, but there was some extra work to get there

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is the best tool for purchasing tickets and keeping tabs on all the events one is committed to.
Pros_Review: This software is extremely user-friendly. I am able to purchase tickets for various events and can access this information at any time, as well as keep tabs on my receipts and the event information.
Cons_Review: I have never had any issues with this software to complain about. I think it has been an all-positive experience on my end.

Pros_Review: My experience with Eventbrite has been nothing but wonderful. I have listed a few events at this point, and have been consistently impressed with how many tools and features are available. Event and ticket sales pages are all highly customizable, and I've been very happy with how all of my events have been presented for sale to the general public. Furthermore, I appreciate how many analytical tools are available to help you understand how sales are being driven. This feature alone is instrumental in marketing efforts.
Cons_Review: I feel like it takes a little while to get used to how many features are truly available and where you access them, but with a little digging it's very easy to learn.

Overall_Review: We used this for a large conference (around 1000 attendees) and it was a breeze to implement and track all our attenders. We're using it again next year.
Pros_Review: It's simple to use and trusted as an online ticket provider. That gives people using it a great experience and they know what to expect. It was very important to us that we weren't directing people to purchase a $200+ ticket through a shady looking portal.
Cons_Review: They hold all ticket sales and you don't get payout until after the event. Also their fees are higher than some of the other competitors.

Overall_Review: I have realized with a event that has multiple people it makes it much easier to organize and keep a log of everyone.
Pros_Review: This ease of use and all inclusive software has the ability to integrate with calendar to remind you that you bought tickets to something. Business wise this is very nice to use.
Cons_Review: There really isn't anything that I can say that is really negative about the software. It is a very well designed system

Pros_Review: I loved how eventbrite exposed me to fun events around me that I otherwise wouldn't have known about if I wasn't browsing through eventbrite. Some events that I saw on eventbrite that I ended up going to were concerts, local food events for foodies and local park events!
Cons_Review: The only con I can think of is some events on eventbrite can be costly

Pros_Review: The popularity of the software gives you the ease that most of my guest will know how to navigate the software to see all the important information.
Cons_Review: It's not really much I don't like about the software.

Overall_Review: Overall, a great quick way to locate and purchase tickets to local events.
Pros_Review: Work days are long and tiring, and every team deserves some time off. Eventbrite is a great source to see what events are around that people would have interest in. It is also public information so it can easily be sent to other to hear feedback about participating before and purchasing needs to take place. It is easy to finalize orders as well.
Cons_Review: Probably because of uncontrollable reasons, that are a lot of events that do not appear on Eventbrite. Purchasing tickets to an event to later find out that there is a better one that you did not see on there can be frustrating. The fees charged for using the service can cause user to avoid using it as well.

Overall_Review:
Easy to set up and event and update
Tracking if responses is great
payment process is smooth
Pros_Review:
We like the pricing-free for most of our events
Easy to set up and add event promo pics and links
Cons_Review:
nothing that I can think of
We have not had any issues that I can think of

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to use, both for the organisation setting up an event and for the attendees registering their attendance. It is straight forward and all the options I need are there.
Cons_Review: Nothing to be honest. Shame I don't have more opportunities to use it!
reasons_choosing: Eventbrite was more appropriate for our needs.

Overall_Review: Overall experience is great.
Pros_Review: This software is great for booking events, such as concerts, parties, etc. it's easy to use and it's great whenever your on the go.
Cons_Review: There is nothing lease I like about this software.

Pros_Review: Honestly, this is an incredible software for tracking your event. Not only can you see the guest list with ease, but you can promote, create, track, etc all for free. It's very straightforward and an incredible software for both minimal and more complex events. There is also software that allows for creating events with different price points; and as a bonus you can follow up with users when you recreate the event the following year. This saves on a lot of advertising costs.
Cons_Review: Settings were sometimes hard to find, and customer service was not there to support or guide you when you were lost. I think if you aren't computer savvy, you may want to find a more simple program.

Overall_Review: I love going to concerts and dont have time to go to the box office. It makes it easier to purchase tickets without the hassle of a box office.
Pros_Review: I liked that when you purchase tickets they can be sent to your email.
Cons_Review: That there were limited concerts in my city.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite constantly for events and workshops. It's easy to create an event and make it look great with customizable text and pictures. It's also easy to see info on people who sign up for events and message them if needed. Eventbrite makes creating online event pages very easy and everyone has heard of Eventbrite, so it's a trusted, well-known website for people looking for local events.
Pros_Review: Very easy to use for creating and customizing attractive, eye-catching pages for upcoming events. It's also very easy to track sign ups and message attendees.
Cons_Review: We don't have any complaints about Eventbrite; it does exactly what we need it to do.

Pros_Review: The Eventbrite webpage/event portal is very clean and easy to navigate and manage.
Cons_Review: A bit more customization in terms of event page appearance would be nice.

Overall_Review: I really enjoy Eventbrite. I usually print my ticket out and it gives me all the information I need to get to my event.
Pros_Review: I like the formatting and ease of use. It is easy to set up an event and provide the goer all the information they need (even payment options) all in one place. This is like a higher quality e-vite. It keeps track of who responded, counts your total coming and declined. It provides the goer a ticket to print off if needed. I also like that it sends reminders to patrons.
Cons_Review: At this time I have not had any issues with the software.

Overall_Review: The best app/software product available for get information about events happening nearby. Eventbrite made it easier to get a spot ready there.
Pros_Review: It's the best app that is helping us to know the events happening nearby (or we can search by any cities). I can create a new event and manage it very easily with eventbrite. And an integrated purchasing ticket for events is really great feature I enjoys.
