Cons_Review: It will be better if we can know how many spots are available for an event while searching for an event. Or while purchasing the event ticket.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a useful tool because people know how to use it, they are familiar with it, and it's user-friendly. We have used it to list a few events and have gotten OK results.
Cons_Review: Although I am not usually worried too much about design, there weren't too many ways to customize things on the back end. Of course they also take a cut of the profits although the fees were reasonable.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: Really struggling for a con here - I love it!

Overall_Review: Overall Eventbrite has made it really easy to create and manage events
Pros_Review: I use eventbrite to create and manage events for my company. Its easy to set up events, create a Facebook event page and add the event to my website.
Cons_Review: The fees are a little expensive. Although it does give you the option to absorb the fee or pass it onto the customer it affects your pricing.

Overall_Review: work with the eventbrite tool is a good experience, easy to use and give you a lot of corporation image
Pros_Review: i can provisioned the right amount of money for my event, cause i know with a lot of exactitud how  many people will came to my event
Cons_Review: the price to use this kind of tool is very high here in mexico, everything we have to multiple by 20

Overall_Review: We started to use this as a way to advertise an onsite job fair, it was a great way to drive traffic to our career website and allow for us to get people pre registered (then we could remind them about the job fair)
Pros_Review: We use this as a way to create searchable job fairs for our company.  I love how easy it is, how far reaching the target market can be and how much it can help us bring in candidates
Cons_Review: I'm not sure how much their website is scrubbed by other websites, and I'm not sure what they could do about it.  Maybe form partnerships with other hiring entities?  Worksource? Chamber of Commerce?

Overall_Review: Using Eventbrite, I have been able to create an event online, which is now the most easiest way to get a reply! Even accepting an invite through the internet has been simple by just a click.
Pros_Review: What I love the most about Eventbrite, is that I am able to create an event and easily invite the people I want to attend. It is super easy and helps me organize my events. Eventbrite saves the hassle of printing tickets and now you are able to download your ticket on your phone and have it on you whenever you attend an event.
Cons_Review: All has been good with using Eventbrite! I love it!

Pros_Review:
Used this app and its easy to use.
I have attended multiple events using Eventbrite free and paid events
Notification on the events are made easy for the users 
Best software for conducting and informing people with free and paid events with filters
Cons_Review: Can give promotions or offers for paid events to bring more people using this software.

Pros_Review: This product is very simple and easy to use for any type of event. It also is compatible to other software (ex. Crowdrise) which is helpful when hosting fundraising events.
Cons_Review: This product is really good for the value - no upfront costs.

Overall_Review: Overall it feels well thought out and clear/easy to use.
Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite when signing up for certain events and it seems like it works awesome.  Certain times when redirected from a website to another page like that can feel clunky, but Eventbrite doesn't feel that way to me at all.
Cons_Review: I guess the extra fees that you get charged would be my only con, but still I also totally understand it!

Overall_Review: I always find more events that I am interested in.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is super easy to use and I love how it always has recommendations for similar events.
Cons_Review: I think it should offer discount codes for frequent users.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite because we do not have other options at the moment.  But we are evaluating less expensive options for our members to use.
Pros_Review: The software is easy to use.  Events, email lists and blasts are easy to set up.
Cons_Review: The software is fine, but the cost to use is too high, specially for non for profits.

Overall_Review: It works
Pros_Review: I have used this for fun run sign-ups and for the sale of high-school musical tickets. It is very easy to navigate for the administrator and the person signing up.
Cons_Review: It is very generic and you will have ads on the screen. There is a service fee added on to each purchase.

Pros_Review: I just moved to a new city, and Eventbrite is a great tool to search for events happening in Detroit and the surrounding area.  I use it to look for cultural events, and I also use it for work to see what tech events are coming up.  Additionally, I like that they send me emails based on what I have currently searched or have attended.  This helps me to know what is coming up on the calendar.
Cons_Review: It's UX and UI design is a little basic, and not the most pleasing to the eye.  This is not a huge deal at all, but it's something Eventbrite could work on for the future.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great because it helps keep track of RSVPs in an orderly way, and is super easy to setup and use. The integration/sharing of the software with other platforms (like FB is great too).
Cons_Review: I'm not there is anything in particular that sticks out at this time..

Overall_Review: It was definitely an asset to the organization of the event, despite the small bumps in the road
Pros_Review: When starting off with simple events eventbrite is wonderful. If you don't have the technical know how to build your own registration website and database eventbrite is a great solution. Their infrastructure has allowed our events (both free and paid) to function quite well. Integration with mail chimp was also very useful
Cons_Review: The one size fits all approach that they have works for the most part, however when organizing an event with several tracks and different components and registration options it became quite cumbersome to set up and manage, and one envisioned portion of the event needed to be slightly changed as we could not figure out how to make registration for that component work (we ended up taking registrations in person at the event for that portion so it all worked out). I also feel that Their customer service could be more responsive

Pros_Review:
This app/software allows staying connected with the world. I've used it to book formal events, events related to the university, cultural events and many more. 

The categories of the event which can be selected are set up to be very good, which goes well with the online, in the app, ticket purchase option.
Cons_Review: The is very less to dislike about this app/software.

Pros_Review: Outside of Facebook, there aren't a ton of options for event management and curation; that's where Eventbrite fills in that gap.  I've used it for both personal and work purposes and Eventbrite is super easy to use and my favorite part is being able to roll-forward events and duplicate listings for re-occuring events.
Cons_Review: The basics are free, which is great, but it does cost money to add different types of tickets and in some situations quantity limits for those tickets. Instead of a fee by ticket sale, it would be nice to have a subscription based payment model as an option.

Pros_Review: I find Eventbright extremely easy to use and love that it gets events out and advertised. Easy to link to and looks professional. I recommend this to anyone hosting an event.
Cons_Review: I honestly can't think of what I disliked except maybe how much they charge for the use of the site.

Pros_Review: The platform has a modern and beautiful design, you can create and share an event in few minutes. Moreover you can also find very interesting events around you or in any city you like, it is also a way to enlarge your activity horizons.
Cons_Review: There is nothing that I dislike or I would change about this platform, but maybe a filter to find out which events are free and which are not would be great.

Pros_Review: I have used this a few times when scheduling meetings and classes for work.  I have never had any issues with it, and i get my notifications instantly.  It seems extremely easy and I like it.
Cons_Review: Nothing.  It seems to be fantastic.  I have yet to find a flaw with it.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to register for upcoming events, add them to your calendar and share that you're going to attend.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a very user-friendly way to register for an event!
Cons_Review: The only thing I would add would be a way to add photos to the event.  (This may be a feature I simply haven't discovered yet)

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so easy to look through and find things that are happening in your area. It is also so easy to post and event for the community to see.
Cons_Review: No cons Eventbrite is a great resource so get people together in a community.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great platform. Private or public events.
Pros_Review: A simple to use web application which allows you to advertise your event. Also has benefits that event write listings may show up on Google Searches.
Cons_Review: Interface can be buggy at times, determine what category to place it under can be vague.

Pros_Review: I save so much time when event organisers use Eventbrite. It's a relief just to login and not have to compete all my details every time I book in to attend something. The dashboard and email follow ups are handy too.
Cons_Review: I really can't think of anything at all!

Overall_Review: Overall, if you are an event organizer, I can vouch for the ease-of use and streamlined integration of ticket purchasing and documentation management made possible by Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: As an attendee of a seminar that utilized Eventbrite for it's attendance management, I had a very good experience with Eventbrite.  It's integration of payment, documentation, and followup communication made attending the seminar very easy and streamlined.  Additionally, it's website collected and displayed aggregate information on like-events and other ongoing events, making expanding my knowledge of additional or similar events.
Cons_Review: There really were no cons I experienced as a user of the software to make a payment for tickets and also to receive information about the event I was attending.

Pros_Review: It's pretty straightforward whether you are just looking to get tickets to an event or get admission handled for your own event. Takes the guess work out of one part of your planning. Also don't feel ripped off like I do when I have to go through Ticketmaster with all of the fees added on there.
Cons_Review: Thing I like least is that it isn't popular enough for the big events. Doesn't yet compete with Ticketmaster whom I hate.

Overall_Review: Positive experience
Pros_Review: Eventbrite provides a great tool in which hosting or signing up for events is very straigtforward and provides accurate data of everyone that is attending those events. The ability to print out tickets also provides a valid proof to ensure that only authorized and invited personnel are able to attend.
Cons_Review: The algorithm that it uses in order to match events based on your past profile can be improved a little bit as there are a lot of occasions where I have found that the matches are not accurate based on your search and past history

Pros_Review:
- Basically creates a landing page for us without having to communicate (and pay) for our web development team to make one
- Visually appealing
- Pushes onto a strong event searching pool
- Built-in analytics dashboard very useful for quick insights on event campaigns
Cons_Review:
- Landing pages it creates is fairly generic (looks like any other Eventbrite landing page)
- Revenue payment is delayed for us until post-event, leaving us a bit stranded at times for cash
- Customization of page difficult without extensive coding knowledge

Pros_Review: Easy to use.  Can go back and see what you have registered for in the past, check dates, and easily bring up on your phone or print out your ticket
Cons_Review: If you used different emails to register, you can not combine the 2 emails into one account.  They must stay separate.

Pros_Review: At the freemium level, this is a fantastic way to share your free events. The cost is fairly effective if you have to pay to use it.
Cons_Review: Some of the app integration doesn't always work the the best way it can.  However, Facebook events share does.

Pros_Review: Very easy to incorporate everything you need about your event into one shareable link. Easy to include photos and link a location to the map. The interface is nice and simple.  Very trusted platform, so users are not typically  turned off by entering their info into this system.
Cons_Review: I have had difficulty with the payment feature. Refunding ticket sales is difficult. Not being able to receive payment until after the event ends is also limiting.  You are limited to eventbrite's branding and it is difficult to change the layout to reflect your own company colors/marketing scheme.

Pros_Review: This program is great for posting and attending events throughout the country. Allows for payment and ticketing on any device.
Cons_Review: The interface and search functions can sometimes not show all events nearby and requires some manual searches to get to the right items sometimes.

Overall_Review: Overall for easy to learn and setup.  Makes your events look very professional.  Give this software no hesitation and get started with it today.
Pros_Review: Very user-friendly.  As a smaller company not a lot of time and effort is needed to make things look professionally done.  Customizing things like the landing page gives you more ownership.
Cons_Review: Wish we could get more information that our company wants when they register for an event.   The only other down fall is getting people of the hurtle of getting to the site and getting registered, if Eventbrite could only come up with a magical solution to make that easier.

Pros_Review: Planning and setting up events are easy using Eventbrite.  It's easy to send the invite to multiple parties with ease.
Cons_Review: I've only used the software if I'm planning an event, which is a few times a year.  I can honestly say I don't have anything negative feedback to provide.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is one of the best tools out there for event management, it's got all the features you need to organise and easily promote your event to others.
Cons_Review: Don't have any cons really it's easy to use and has all the features I need. I haven't looked into many other tools to compare.

Pros_Review: I have used this many times as an alternative to a real paper ticket. Super handy, and saves you the trouble of either having your ticket printed or posted to you.
Cons_Review: I have not used it to send invites (i.e. as an admin) so I guess I'm pretty one-sided but I have not found any faults so far

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is super sleek and easy to use. I love their marketing emails and what they do as a company.
Cons_Review: No cons to using Eventbrite. One of the better companies out there managing events and making it easy for everyone to use.

Pros_Review: Amazing and user-friendly platform for customizable event registration. This is my favorite of all registration platforms. Try it. You will 100% love it!
Cons_Review: They charge a fee. You can decide if you or buyer will cover it. I wish the fee was less than it is.

Pros_Review: This app is great, mobile and web both. I have not created any events but I have RSVPed to a number of events. It is also great way to find things to do.
Cons_Review: I honestly I cannot think of any negatives. I have never had issues with RSVPing or getting to an event that takes eventbrite.

Overall_Review: I use this software all of the time and am a huge fan.
Pros_Review: It makes your event registry simple and visually appealing. I love how clean the design is an how there is great organization in the back end.
Cons_Review: None. I really like Eventbrite. If anything, I would like to see it a little more efficient for 'free' events.

Overall_Review: I have purchased many tickets through eventbrite. Many of those tickets I have purchased were EDM events. I enjoy the fact that their fees are not ridiculous like Ticketmaster or live nation. Also, eventbrite is very easy to use. I have never had any difficulties with using the site nor has it ever crashed or given me errors. I really embrace their style of letting other individuals sell tickets on their site. With Ticketmaster or live nation its usually huge arenas or venues. Event brite gives other the opportunity to host their own events and sell tickets on their site. Eventbrite is brite!
Pros_Review: Its efficient and easy to use. Allows others to promote and sell tickets to their events. Low fees.
Cons_Review: Never had any issues with this software.

Overall_Review: I am an events coordinator who has used this software for several events. While I find the software to be easier than most to use, I find the customer support to be severely lacking.
Pros_Review: It's very easy to use and edit.
Cons_Review: Basically no customer support. There was a customer support line to call that just defered me back to the website.

Overall_Review: Overall, I am very please with Eventbrite and plan on continuing to use it.
Pros_Review: What I like most about the Eventbrite platform is how user friendly it is to create the events and the ease for those purchasing to make their purchase.
Cons_Review: I do not have any complaints about the Eventbrite software at this time and will continue to use throughout the year.

Overall_Review: My experience with Eventbrite is wonderful. It is my go to for my events.
Pros_Review: The best part about Eventbrite is if your event is free it is free for you to list. If you have a paid event the fees are so reasonable  and the amount of people you reach it is worth it.
Cons_Review: There truly is nothing I don't like about Eventbrite. Eventbrite is the place to be if you have an event.

Pros_Review: I love how this platform has so many features. It has features for event reminder emails integrated right when you form the event and it sends it automatically for you. I also love how it can generate "tickets" for the event. Eventbrite really gives you everything you would ever need while organizing an event
Cons_Review: I do not like how difficult it is to find the list of attendees. Especially when you change your form questions, it does not update the columns which make data tracking difficult.

Overall_Review: Overall, quite easy to use and generally a good experience for setting up events. That being said, it could use some extra/fancier features to improve ease of use.
Pros_Review: I love how easy Eventbrite is to use and how easily you can keep track of people that have responded to your events.
Cons_Review: I wish there was a way of exporting information about the people coming to your event, in case there's a need to actually email them with extra information or use email addresses for something else. Having to manually export information is very time-consuming and seems unnecessary.

Overall_Review: Thank you for working for a small event and helping to make it a great night!
Pros_Review: So many people wanted to pay for tickets online and this program made it possible. We believe we sold more tickets to our dinner theatre because of Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: It has a cost, but of course, this wouldn't be available to us if they didn't charge a fee. It was not much so we were happy to pay for it.

Overall_Review: When talking about an overall experience, Eventbrite is best for finding events in a new place and talking to new people with the same interests.
Pros_Review: The thing I like the most about Eventbrite is that you can organize events for FREE of cost. It is quite easy to set up your events. One more thing about this tool is the people interested in the event can book their tickets, and they get notified through email.
Cons_Review: They should improve their customer service. Other than that, I do not find any flaw in the Eventbrite tool.

Overall_Review: The benefit of the software is that it is quite universal in its function and can be integrated within other business processes and needs.
Pros_Review: A feature that I appreciate of Eventbrite is the ability to view similar events to a program one has just registered for. The events that pop-up are curated based on the events you have searched for previously which makes the app an effective resource for finding personalized events in your area of location.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is a great software so there is nothing that I would say needs to be significantly improved.

Overall_Review: I like the service and will continue to use it. I find many of the community events beneficial.
Pros_Review: So many options and things that you can do or sign up to participate in.  This is great for all ages and all types of events.
Cons_Review: I have used this system once or rice before for our small fundraising opportunities.  I wish nonprofits and public institutions had a reduced price on the fees.

Pros_Review: I enjoy that I purchase many types of event tickets using this. I also like that the link can be used for Facebook events as well.
Cons_Review: I would like it if the app had an update to fix bugs and freezing of the app.

Overall_Review: I am satisfied with using EventBrite and prefer it to other similar alternatives.
Pros_Review: Easy to use to schedule and/or RSVP to events. Payments are secure and that is important to me when using software.  It is simple to add Eventbrite events to your calendar without having to type out the details. Eventbrite emails a copy of the receipt to address on file, making it convenient to keep track of purchases and event details.
Cons_Review: I have not encountered any issues with this product.  It is able to do all the things I need it to do.

Overall_Review: I like Eventbrite.  However, I wish I knew how to see how many people were seeing my events.  I feel like I get better reach with Facebook and this is only good if the customers need tickets.  I also think donation based events should be free as well.
Pros_Review: It's easy to use,  for the most part, and they allow you to post events that are for FREE, for FREE.  No charge, which is pretty awesome.  They also allow customers to buy tickets, and download them.
Cons_Review: Doesn't seem like the reach goes very far. Feels like it is a waste of time unless you need a place for people to buy tickers.

Overall_Review: It is easy to create one sign-up form for everyone on the Team to use - individuals don't all have to create and email a form to their Clients.
Pros_Review: It is easy to create registration forms for upcoming events. This makes it easy for us to count who will be attending our events so we can properly plan personnel and food.
Cons_Review: One thing I don't like is the form has a time limit when it's being filled out. It's easy for Clients to be distracted by more urgent matters and then have to start over. Also, the form can be lengthy to fill out, even when there is no fee for events.

Pros_Review: It's completely user friendly for registering For an event invite. Love the reminder enails
Cons_Review: I would make it less than a 3 step process to check out when there is no cost to attend an event. It's got at least one extra step.

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite both to plan and schedule my own events as well as to participate in someone else's event. I like how user friendly it is and how it's more like completing a template. You don't have to think too much about what to enter as it guides you thru. So it takes the stress off of potentially forgetting to mention something important.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has become a staple for online invitations and event planning. It is used on other social media platforms and is user friendly.
Cons_Review: I can't think of any cons for this software. Everytime I have used it, there have been no problems or issues.

Overall_Review: Simple integration with our web presence, reliable data handling and fee processing-lots to love when we use Eventbrite for our workshops and conference registration.
Pros_Review: Lots of people use this, which means lots of people are used to the interface. They are consistent with strong uptime, and easy to use on the back end.
Cons_Review: This is a classic case where they are staying in the pocket, and not trying to add too many complex features. That means that for our more sophisticated events they aren't up to the challenge, but for 90% of what we do they are easy to use and work great.

Overall_Review: It's the only event-pr brand for marketers and advertisers if their client or them want to announce an event to engage specific interested people.
Pros_Review: As an advertiser, it is hard to engage specific interested people to organize events and gathering them. By Eventbrite, we are achiveing this almost daily basis. Creating an event and having co-operation with Eventbrite is the fastest way nowadays.
Cons_Review: Users tend to find themselves in stuck irrelevant events. Search engine might be improved to give more accurate results.

Overall_Review: It was good, easy to use and good customer service, but for my very specific needs perhaps not the best alternative.
Pros_Review: It's very convenient for events management and its connectivity with other social media platforms makes the final costomer experience way better.
Cons_Review: It is not the best tool if you organize tours or events daily since it is more focus on events not happening regularly.

Overall_Review: Used it 5+ times to buy and keep tickets for upcoming events.  Have the app on my phone
Pros_Review: Easy to use.  I like that I can pull up my tickets at the venue without printing anything in advance
Cons_Review: nothing I can think of,  I have not had any issues

Pros_Review: It does exactly what it needs to do which is to offer tickets or reserve a place for an event.
Cons_Review: Nothing really, the website feels a bit clunky when using it on mobile browsers but nothing too difficult to work with.

Pros_Review: I love that event Brite reminds me of my events multiple times after purchase. It immediately adds to my calendar and makes it easy for reference through my inbox.
Cons_Review: I haven't found any negatives from using event Brite.

Overall_Review: Its a great platform to use for both paid and ticketed events.
Pros_Review:
I love the way you can easily load events and manage the back end of your account.

It was so easy to find my way around and figure things out.

The customer interface is smart and professional and easy to use.
Cons_Review:
Trying hard to think of something to write, as there is not much to add to this great software.

Perhaps a bitly integration as art of the administrators back end so when you copy event links to share they are not so long.

Pros_Review: I had a wonderful experience with it to know all events happening around me in the field of my interest
Cons_Review: it is a great tool i actually love it, and hope they improve it more and more

Pros_Review: What I liked most about this software is it is extremely easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: One thing about this software is that it seemed to lag each time I clicked on a link, but that may have just been my internet connection.

Overall_Review: We've only done free registration events, so I can't speak to the paid ticketing, but it does a good job of taking registrations. As long as you aren't in need of extensive customization over every little thing, it does a good job.
Pros_Review: Easy to create registration forms, including multiple ticket types, custom questions, and allow for multiple tickets per order.
Cons_Review: Some of the customization is missing that I've seen with other software.

Overall_Review: I give to the Eventbrite Team a high five! Excellent work!
Pros_Review: It's so simple and easy to use! A great tool to coordinate events!
Cons_Review: Not all people know about the platform. It hard to make them go to the website and register.

Overall_Review: It serves us well when setting up corporate and personal events allowing directions content and itinerary info to those invited
Pros_Review: Being able to share event information to a vast amount of people
Cons_Review: Having to go into separate tabs in order to view info

Overall_Review:
I used it to book some purchases
My company uses it to plan general meetings
Pros_Review:
To make sure and remember future events 
To book the new event
Cons_Review: Sometimes, when there is more than one event in the main event, is not possible to manage them clearly

Overall_Review: Eventbrite just gets the job done. It's has to be one of the easiest event sales/management systems out there.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has really straight forward pricing, free events are free events and paid have a percentage. There is not guess work, no unneeded add-ons that complicate the process. I also like the built in communication with event goers. I don't have to worry if I missed an email or ticket follow up.
Cons_Review: Hopefully in the future eventbrite could possibly give users the ability to customize pages just a little bit more.

Pros_Review: I use Eventbrite to take registrations.  The set-up is quick and the integration with our merchant account was very easy.
Cons_Review: Reporting can be an issue as registrant info can't always be sorted the way you want.

Pros_Review: I really enjoy how user friendly this application is and how easy it is to quantify the amount of people expected
Cons_Review: There isn't much I dislike, but if I had to pick something it would be the amount of pictures to showcase the event

Pros_Review: The one thing I love most about Eventbrite is that I can have my payments go directy to Paypal
Cons_Review: The one thing I do not like about Eventbriet is that they do not take their fees before paying out your money and yu wind up left with a bill.

Overall_Review: This has made event sign up for my church a breeze to keep everyone organized, and to help us be able to plan for the event.
Pros_Review:
Eventbrite give me the ability to create an event for my church, with a professional design and themed branding, gathers an rsvp list that allows me to know how many are coming, what they are bringing, and how I should plan to accommodate the guests.  It is like taking Facebook events to the next level. It also has full integration with Facebook and other outlets.


Professional Designs
Social Media Integrations
Organization of attending guests
Reach a larger audience
Cons_Review: They do take a small percentage of sales is you are selling your tickets to your events.  That is probably a given since they do need to make so money as well.  Since I use it for mostly free events for my church it comes in quite handy and there do not require a payment for that.

Pros_Review: This software was incredibly user friendly. It offered many options for me to host my event through. Doing ticket sales was very easy to set up and follow through. It was so convenient to take payments and keep everything organized leading up to the event.
Cons_Review: It does cost for every ticket sale. You can choose to cover this fee yourself or wrap it up into the ticket prices. It's not a huge amount, but if you are hosting a charity or a low guest count event where you want to keep costs low, this may not be your first choice due to the cost to use it.

Pros_Review: Great way to search and find something to be involved in whether its a conference, weekend party, or concert.
Cons_Review: Wish the app didn't take an additional fee on top of the ticket price but that's standard

Pros_Review: Very easy to set up any event and invite all your friends! The RSVP list makes planning easy and fun!
Cons_Review: Haven't really run into any come to be honest. I've had only positive experience and can't think of something negative to say.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite is very good. Collecting Data from sales is the best.
Pros_Review: The interface is clean and very easy to use.
Cons_Review: The only thing that I find that's a little trying at times is the finding reports. Sometimes its tedious locating the right sales reports.

Pros_Review: We use this program at Heritage Chirch for large events at Church.  We were able to put an app on our phone to order tickets for special events
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons.  This app was very easy to use and loved I could put application on my phone

Pros_Review: What I like most about Eventbrite is that you can add your tickets to your iPhone wallet, making them really quick and easy to access.
Cons_Review: In the app, the loading screen can be a bit long, but this is a minor issue.

Pros_Review: I've been an early adopter and I love how over the years, the app gained many new features but was able to retain its ease of use for everyone. It's such a powerful tool, invaluable for anyone who has to organize and manage any events - from birthday parties to big conferences. The search and browsing features are definitely the things that sets this app apart from competitors.
Cons_Review: Sometimes pages are so crowded with information that it might become hard to scan and process them - a little redesign and small improvements in the UI could definitely help.

Pros_Review: We often did our events offline, but with Eventbrite it was easy to sell online tickets which resulted in even more ticket purchases. It's very easy for our customers to purchase tickets without having to meet us in person!
Cons_Review: The fees are a little on the high side. We don't really mind paying for it though, since we may have not got those ticket sales otherwise. Just know that going in!

Pros_Review: I love using EventBrite, whether I'm sending an invite or I'm using it to sign up for another persons event. It's easy to use and sends you a calendar invite after signing up for an event.
Cons_Review: I haven't had any bad experience using EventBrite

Pros_Review: Excellent app which allows me to register for and track my attendance at a range of conferences, forums and events
Cons_Review: I would like Eventbrite to proactively alert me to events in my local area which it thinks I may be interested in attending

Overall_Review: I LOVE Eventbrite and it has helped to optimize my events; the data collection process is excellent; it builds a contact lead of people who've attended your event in the past, so it's easy to keep track of your audience. The email list has driven at least 75% of my leads.
Pros_Review: I host events at least once a quarter and search for events to attend every month. It is the only platform I use to track sales for my event, process payments, and widely invite past attendees to my event. It has articles that guide you on how to better market and sell tickets. The communication tools are excellent.
Cons_Review: I don't like that you can't get a payout every week; the final payout is on the same schedule as the others, and I can't collect the final payout after the event immediately ends.

Pros_Review: It's simple,  and the best part is that it can be easily integrated with our Wordpress website.
Cons_Review: The only part I don't like is that it takes a % off + a fixed fee so it's quite a lot when you add them all up. Fixed price would have been ideal.

Overall_Review: It has helped my organisation in making a database of the event attendees. The number of people invited and the actual number of footfalls can be easily tracked which turns out to be a very helpful tool for future events
Pros_Review: So it takes only 2 minutes to setup a profile, schedule an event or purchase tickets to an event. The e tickets can be saved in my mobile. It is very user friendly product and very helpful for small to medium organisations who either with to arrange an event or attend an event.
Cons_Review: I didn't come across any such cons of the product, however for the first time users, it can be tricky.

Overall_Review: I have been using Eventbrite for all invitation needs for several years now, and I love it.
Pros_Review: EventBrite was easy to use for both the users setting up the event, as well as the invitees who are getting the invitations to respond to (RSVP). Eventbrite is a great product, and dominant in the marketplace. If there is an alternative that works as good as Eventbrite, I am unaware of that or those products.
Cons_Review:
There was nothing that I did not like.
Product is affordable (often free)
Product is accessible
Product is easy to use
Product is intuitive
Product is well designed.

Overall_Review: Overall, Evenbrite is a very helpful application for creating and managing events. I would recommend this software to my colleagues.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to use. The best feature I find in it is its integration into emails. Provides features like asking queries to your guests, which helps me get to know the target audience even better.
Cons_Review: The interface could be more self explanatory especially when creating discounts or custom fields. Perhaps adding help boxes for these features could save the user from navigating to other pages for more information.

Overall_Review: We use eventbrite to sell concert and event tickets. They're the best in the market; very easy to work with.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, easy to communicate with customer support, reliable company to do business with
Cons_Review: We don't currently have any issues with Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: I'm able to find the great events within my city or borough. Navigating through the system is seamless
Cons_Review: I honestly have not experienced any cons with using this app. Navigating through the system is seamless

Pros_Review: The ability to allow consumers to purchase tickets online to an event has given our Non-Profit Organization that I volunteer for a great way to manage attendees and track attendance as well as their payments.
Cons_Review: The fees for the transfer of funds to our account was a bit high, but for a convenience factor we chose to utilize Eventbrite for all advance purchases.  I do know that Eventbrite has a pay at the door feature where I can track that they paid, but since we did not purchase the Card Reader from Eventbrite we could not connect the Square reader we had already.

Pros_Review:
Ability to change, limit, keep track of attendees. 
Well recognized.
Calendar integration.
Map included
Cons_Review:
Not as easy to use as I would hope. 
Map wasn't always as accurate as I had hoped.
Room for more customization on invites would be nice.

Overall_Review: Very happy with the ease of use of creating events and the analytics are superb. Eventbrite has everything you could possibly need for hosting and promoting an event.
Pros_Review: Simplicity. It's very easy to either manage/setup your own event registration online or register for an event through the platform. I first discovered Eventbrite as a regular user and was impressed with the ease of finding events that I was interested in and that were close to my area. Registration pages look professional with plenty of customization options and payment processing/confirmation is error-free. The platform is being used by so many other companies that your event has a higher chance of being noticed just through discovery of similar events. I also really like how you can embed a checkout on your own website.
Cons_Review: Rarely some results were not as relevant as I'd like them to be as a regular user browsing through events.

Pros_Review: It is simple to set up events. I love that the mobile app contains the event tickets. It is user friendly for purchasing tickets to an event. Guests to my events have commented on how much they love using Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: The transaction fee is a bit steep, according to individuals who have purchased event tickets from our organization. That leaves us with finding a way to build that into our ticket pricing.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite makes events easier for small businesses and artists. Highly recommended!
Pros_Review: For a small company like mine, we can sell tickets to our events without the hassle of having to keep track of them all ourselves.
Cons_Review: Can't think of anything. Maybe the fees?

Pros_Review: It's great for a small organization with a small budget that only runs a few events per year. Easy to set up and manage events, plus payout is accurate and on time.
Cons_Review: Fees have been increasing over recent years but still reasonable

Overall_Review: Great ticket platform
Pros_Review: It is easy to use and doesn't involve the download of a separate piece of software for the user who receive tickets
Cons_Review: I have not come across any. It has always been easy for me to access my tickets and print off the day of the event

Pros_Review: Easy to use, useful for event check-in and RSVP's for nonprofit fundraising for both small and large scale events.
Cons_Review: I honestly love this software, so I can't think of any cons for my use (nonprofit event organizing).

Pros_Review:
Very easy to set up and run events for community groups and businesses. 
Extremely friendly user experience for the customer.
Cons_Review: As an organizer and event customer no major cons.  It's the go-to event planner for coordinators and customers.

Overall_Review: Our events were able to be posted to our website automatically, and we have been able to integrate our eventbrite events into our email campaigns through other platforms.
Pros_Review: This software is really quite simple to use, most features are very straightforward. The software integrates well with other platforms which is very useful when you have a large campaign that utilizes many different platforms.
Cons_Review: I've run into issues on several occasions when trying to schedule repeat events, or to copy an event to create a similar event. When copying events or creating recurring events the software is not as straightforward as with one time events. Integration can also get sloppy when creating a recurring event/copying an existing event to use a base for a new events.

Overall_Review: Easy-to-use software to create and manage events and sell tickets.
Pros_Review: The software is so intuitive and easy to use. I like the connectivity between Eventbrite and Facebook Events, so I can easily incorporate it into the pages I manage. The brand itself is well-known so I know my customers feel safe and comfortable using the platform.
Cons_Review: The initial user interface is a bit clunky. Logging in and navigating to your own events could be more streamlined. The landing pages are set up for new users only and not current users.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite manages events and ticketing very well! It seamlessly collects money, and has options for ways to do that.
Cons_Review: It's pricier than other similar event and ticketing software that works just as well and fits my social values better. Other than that, it's great.

Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to use, and you can use your phone to get into the event. A lot of events are using Eventbrite now.
Cons_Review: Sometimes searching on Eventbrite can be tough. Or, sometimes the titles of events can be different than just saying where the event is (bars).

Pros_Review: Let's you purchase tickets for almost anything. I purchased tickets many times here starting from meet ups to conferences.
Cons_Review: The fees is higher some cases. Other than that the the website works perfect in all cases. Pls look into the pricing.

Overall_Review: Use it multiple times a month
Pros_Review: set up is fast and you can have free or paid events. I like that you can see the organizer and contact them.
Cons_Review: Better design. Would love a sexier looking page. It's hard to design in HTML and can be clunky at times

Overall_Review: In satisfied thus far nothing major needs to be used,  just more options would be nice.
Pros_Review: The convenience and ease of making events and free at that.  Its mobile friendly and allows people to buy tickets without an account which is huge plus in an impatient generation
Cons_Review: Nothing is really wrong with this app, but I have not tried to do a large event yet so maybe there are flaws in numbers? I would however like to see more options for how to get tickets let a print out option or have them mailed and we ship them.

Pros_Review: AMAZING system ! This should be promoted worldwide. It's super user-friendly, you connect to events, meetings, collaboration depending of your city and the programmation. I truly think it is one of the best system we have to connect (concerts, meetings, association, etc). It is great to discover new things, connect with other, etc.
Cons_Review: Not available everywhere. I'm based in Canada and we use it a lot but if you are looking for events in Africa (trip), you might not find any information.

Overall_Review: Great software to help your organization look organized and professional.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite made our conference (which is run by a non-profit group of volunteers) look professional by creating a nice looking registration and ticketing process.
Cons_Review: The use can be a little pricey for non-profit groups, particularly when you do not charge an admission fee for your events.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great tool that simplifies event management and is a great resource to "house" all attendee info.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is such a handy tool with a lot of customization options. One of my favorite features is that you can have a custom URL that will bring people to your event page. Plus, with the upgraded options, you can customize the URL as well. There is a lot of branding customization options as well.
Cons_Review: I wish they offered different layout types or more customization of the overall look of the event page.

Overall_Review: I prefer not to use this software if I have other options. It's not as user friendly as I'd like.
Pros_Review: I like the idea of eventbrite. It's nice being about to create & promote an event all in one location.
Cons_Review: EventBrite needs to have better functions when it comes to managing your events. I've had customers receive cancellation notifications even while the event was still active.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is a great app to have handy if you are hosting an event or are looking for something to do for fun.
Pros_Review: I primarily use eventbrite to scout new events happening in the city. They are really good about using your location and past events to make recommendations that they think you'll like. Eventbrite is also a great site for quickly planning events and selling tickets.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it is hard to navigate the listings or they show you events that are happening outside of the mile radius you set.

Overall_Review: I attend business-related events through Eventbrite, and have been able to connect with others working in similar areas.
Pros_Review: I can easily see what events are happening in my community using this software. Eventbrite sends me frequent emails letting me know of events, and I can easily view them and sign up.
Cons_Review: I have not had any problem using Eventbrite--it is straightfoward to see the events and sign up. Perhaps if I have had questions about events, it can be difficult to see who to contact, but other than that, no problem.

Overall_Review: Overall Eventbrite is always used for us to promote events that are free.  It is easy to setup an event and manage.  For selling tickets, however, there are a few other options that offer cheaper fees to nonprofits.
Pros_Review: Posting your event on Eventbrite's calendar and offering registration is a simple process and creates alot of traffic to your event with a few easy steps.  If your tickets are free then there is no cost to you in the process at all.
Cons_Review: If you are looking to promote a fundraiser for a nonprofit it can get lost in the shuffle with all the other events they are promoting.  It can also be a bit confusing to decipher the pricing for nonprofits to sell tickets through the website.

Overall_Review: Great software and easy to use. Helps makes buying tickets easy.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is one of the easiest ways to purchase tickets. So easy sometimes I think my order didn't go through. very simple and straight to the point.
Cons_Review: Well, it does not have a lot of exposure in Puerto Rico, so I can't use it to its full potential. Would be amazing, to be able to use it more.

Overall_Review: Our business problems were solved with Evenbrite by organizing all people into groups and getting the answers we needed quickly.
Pros_Review: This product is easy to use.  Evenbrite made an impact for our African Festival.  We used this product for a platform to promote this African Festival event.  It allowed us to be organized to manage the tickets and organize people to come.  A few clicks and everyone was setup.  When the event was over we sent a survey to know everyone's opinion so we know how to be even better next year.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the ticket display was poor. Some people found it was a struggle to use. Use of space was limited. Add ons were not good.

Pros_Review: I enjoy using eventbrite to create multiple payment events. It's pretty easy to set up your ticket sales.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the fees are outrageous when you're using it for your small business promotion.

Overall_Review: It was nice. It's great for somebody that wants to turn in event around quickly and get it online and taking money.
Pros_Review: This is very easy to get set up on and create an event. It has great SEO strength as well. Saw an event I posted being listed on top of Google results for my area pretty quickly.
Cons_Review: If you do consistent events, another platform might be a lot cheaper. Historically, their fees have been more than what you can get on your own if you just custom build a form in reuse that on your site for multiple events

Overall_Review: Eventbrite works perfectly fine for me, I have never had an issue using the software.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has very useful platform that lets users share events. The best part is that is allows you share events for free as long as participants register for free.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is a great and useful software, however, I think it could be more affordable than it already is.

Overall_Review: My experiences with Eventbrite have been really good. I love that it not only send me reminders about an event but will also create a calendar reminder with the click of a button.
Pros_Review: What I like about Eventbrite most it that it will send me recommendations based on other events that I have purchased tickets for or rsvp'd to. It is a great resource when I randomly decide that I need something to do.
Cons_Review: No cons really. The software is super easy to use, whether you are creating an event or have been invited to an event.

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite for a number of different things; one as the event coordinator at our church and also for personal use, such as parties, or general invitations.
Pros_Review: I love using Eventbrite to schedule our events at church and for personal use as well.  It's a very easy product to use and I love the reminders that are sent when people reply to the event and when the event is coming up.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything I dislike about the software.  I've been using it for a number of years and have never had an issue.

Overall_Review: Ease of use is a great benefit. We've used other programs before for registration, and this is least clunky.
Pros_Review: It is very user-friendly, both for us (as the administrator) as well as for the user who is utilizing it for registration purposes.
Cons_Review: It's very expensive to use. There are other alternatives that are more expensive, but this is still quite costly.

Overall_Review: A real delight to use. Great analytics and functionality. Will be using again.
Pros_Review: Easy to set up web pages. Due to it's success this product is really well fleshed out and functions in multiple ways. Reporting is great.
Cons_Review: It costs. There are absolutely cheaper products out there and it sucks to give away a % each time....but it works so well and we cop it on the chin.

Overall_Review: Overall a good experience. Took me a while to figure out how to get it set up, but now that I have, it works well.
Pros_Review:
The cost - FREE - of course is great.
The ability to create and collect custom fields of information.
Cons_Review:
Generating reports 
I wanted to create two events each on two different days. I have figured out something that works ok, but it's not great.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been such a good way for me to find events, college fests, city based events that are easy to access. Can share the details with your friends and get real good events on it, especially for students.
Pros_Review:
1. They are really good at helping a random person find the right event
2. They send well curated email to subscribers letting them find the right event
Cons_Review: Not all the events that you find on eventbrite will be free but you will be able to access those on the website by searching

Overall_Review: I use this to sign up for shows, concerts, events that are free and paid.
Pros_Review: I love how easy this software was to find out info about events, sign up, and find my tickets. All easy tasks but somehow the comp makes it difficult.
Cons_Review: I dont have anything bad to say - the competition is always hard to use and eventbrite makes it so easy!

Overall_Review: Overall, I love this platform. It has everything you need.
Pros_Review: I love Eventbrite. It is so great to be able to create events on this platform. It gives you all the fields you need and is easy to use. I also like that it suggests upcoming events in your area and connects to your calendar on your phone when you sign up for an event. That way you will never miss your event.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything negative to say. This is my goto software for creating events and would highly recommend it.

Overall_Review: Overall a great product with value regardless of the version you pick.  Free and paid all have their uses depending on your needs.
Pros_Review: I love that I can find events to attend locally via Eventbrite.  But I should also mention that the best part about Eventbrite is how easy they make it create and share events for FREE.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints, I think their ticketing fees are very reasonable.  So for example, you can also use them handle your tickets with a paid account.  Plus it integrates with social media so you get more views!

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is our primary system for ticket sales, on site check-in, and one of our systems for communicating updates about the event to pre-registered attendees.
Pros_Review: I appreciate that this system is integrated already for check-in on site. If attendees purchase a ticket, then in real time it will reflect their ticket for check-ins.
Cons_Review: The guest list requires you to assign a type of ticket to the guest. In some cases they are only getting a specific access, and I am required to create that type of ticket to provide them access.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was easy to use and I would say there was no real learning curve to get an event set-up.
Pros_Review: I liked how easy the program was to use and that it didn't cost anything to set-up an event and sell tickets.
Cons_Review: I didn't like that there weren't more options for how the event would be visually displayed. You couldn't put your own look and feel into the ticketing platform.

Overall_Review: Really helped us when we threw a large event a few years ago. It was just overpriced for the industry.
Pros_Review: Really helped with making our event more professional.
Cons_Review: It was too expensive for us to purchase long term.

Pros_Review: I appreciate the mobile access & it is fairly easy to use.
Cons_Review: Sometimes hard to find your ticket again if you navigate away from it or don't screenshot it. Emails don't always arrive in a timely manner.

Pros_Review: It was really easy to sell tickets via Eventbrite and know how many people to plan for.
Cons_Review: Our event is held offsite. Having a spotty internet connection made for long lines at check in.

Pros_Review: I liked the ease of being able to RSVP to an event and purchase tickets.
Cons_Review: There were a couple of events that I needed to get more information on and had a hard time finding where to request it.

Pros_Review: I love the ease of the product. It's one of those products that is easy to use and has a great purpose.
Cons_Review: I've never had a real problem with it. Even if I had a question, CS was helpful.

Overall_Review: Great platform for event registration and management.  It is very smooth and functional.
Pros_Review: Great platform to manage event registration.
Cons_Review: Registration is lengthy for customers/event goers. Wish It was a bit simplified.

Overall_Review: Overall Eventbrite is a great platform, I have found out about great events through this platform and also have been able to share my own events. I have the android app and use it on my phone all the time. It is just as easy to use it on the phone and the computer.
Pros_Review: It is very easy to use, and I really like the categories and filters, especially when I am looking for a specific type of date, place and cost. Publishing events are also easy and you only have to pay for the service if your event has a cost, if your event is free you don't have to pay to share it.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the filters for area don't work really well. Like if I am looking for events in a specific city it also shows me event in cities that are 2 or 3 hours away and that throws me off sometimes. If it showed the events of the selected city and then suggestions for surrounding cities it would be better.

Overall_Review: Event Registration / Attendee Management
Pros_Review: I liked the UX/UI experience for users the most. Eventbrite makes it super easy to manage events and also for users to signup and register to attend events. This makes the organization process much nicer to manage  the registration process for events.
Cons_Review: Can't really say there was a big con. But, I guess Eventbrite pushes users to organize their event through their website instead of pushing users to white label and have users signup through their own website for the event.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows you an easy solution to hosting an event with a classy and seamless appearance
Cons_Review: The only downside to Eventbrite is the slight learning curve especially when bringing new people to use the system.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is a great product to use if you're planning an event!
Pros_Review: I love how easy this product makes tracking attendees and it sends reminders automatically!
Cons_Review: The UX design is a little bit cluttered, but that's my only complaint.

Pros_Review: I use Eventbrite to buy tickets to family friendly and adult oriented local events. I think that a lot of these events would not be able to hold events and sell tickets without a service like Eventbrite to facitiate ticket puraches.
Cons_Review: I think the Eventbrite fee should be included in the ticket price so there is no surprises when I go to check out.

Pros_Review: It does exactly what I need, which is creating an event for company functions. Managing invites, sending out reminders is a breeze.
Cons_Review: Nothing in particular as we only use it occasional and it does what we need.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is a great product. It makes event planning much easier and managing guests, etc easy as well.
Pros_Review: I am able to create festive-looking events, send out invitations, and get responses with much ease. I am able to hide guests if need-be so as not to discourage others from coming. I love that I am able to get responses (RSVPs) quickly using this product.
Cons_Review: Sometimes when finding my own photos after an event which I post to this app can get a little tricky. I have to remember to click on the correct link to take me back to the photos I posted.

Overall_Review: Overall, this tool has been excellent for smaller use needs!
Pros_Review: This tool allows you to easily set up an event, collect payments and provide a list of individuals for your doorman.
Cons_Review: Could be a little more robust in terms of functionality

Overall_Review:
I would recommend using Eventbrite to anyone who finds their events schedule a bit overwhelming. The site consolidates your tickets until you need them, and gives  you helpful reminders so that something important 
doesn't slip under the radar.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to attend lots of interesting (and sometimes free!) events that address things you like to do. I've personally learned about coding events and other niche topics that I wouldn't have found without the site.
Cons_Review: Sometimes I've had the site's automatic calendar feature be a bit buggy in how it integrates with Google (that is, adding the wrong time zone or event duration). This might be something on the organizer's end however and isn't a huge deterrent to using the software.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to manage invitations for professional events. It's a lot easier than having a dedicated person in your office try to manage all the invitees to your event.
Cons_Review: Not everyone that was invited had an Eventbrite account, but the accounts were easy to set up and eventually everyone got on the same page.

Overall_Review: General experience is very good. We can use eventbrite for a variety of events (courses, webinars, fundraisers and other social events). It's great for tracking who is attending/participating in the event and it is great for tracking the fiscal portion of the event.
Pros_Review: I love the analytics section of the software. Once the event ends, we can see when people bought the tickets and the quantity. This is great for event planning for the future. We can anticipate how long it will take for people to purchase tickets so we can give people ample time.
Cons_Review: The fees are slightly high (especially if our ticket sales are in the thousands of dollar range, we end up spending hundreds+ on fees) but it does not deter us from using the software too much.

Overall_Review: We occasionally use this to schedule appointments rather than using outlook and find it to be an easy way of getting things done.
Pros_Review: I like most about this software is I don't have to use outlook!
Cons_Review: The email response you get is pretty general and a bit blah.

Overall_Review: I found this product is very easy to search for and use. I use it personally as well as for professional reasons.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to search for tickets. All I had to do was put in the search box what I wanted and it was there. I like that there are three columns for a search: Event, City or place and Date. This allows the search to be very specific. As a bonus there are categories underneath for specific searches such as free popular events, family time and many more. I like this feature because it allows me to discover tickets for something I might not have thought of. The layout is very easy to use and see. The front has a good mix of colors. All in all I find Eventbrite to be an A+ software.
Cons_Review: It's hard for me to ind anything wrong with this software. Everything responds well. I have no complaints on this software.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was simple to set up and make our event live. It was very user friendly and took care of payments too.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so customizable for any type of event.
Cons_Review: Nothing really. I didn't have any problems or issues using it.

Pros_Review: I find that Eventbrite is a great resource for finding events. It's comprehensive and easy to sign up.
Cons_Review: I dislike the fees they charge. I know it's inevitable but regardless it's a hassle.

Pros_Review: Very easy to create an event and find events. Easy payment system and there is the ability to make an event private.
Cons_Review: The refund process can be tedious is refunds are allowed.

Pros_Review: This is the primary software we use for event registration. Its great! Easy-to-use and trusted by most people. We love it.
Cons_Review: One occasion, the software glitches and seems to lose registrations. VERY VER VERY RARE though!

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy for individuals and companies to create events and manage all aspects of them all under one platform. Creating an event page, selling tickets, sending updates, collecting emails, and keeping your customers updated are just a few of the main features offered by Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Customer service could definitely be better. Takes a while to hear back.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has always been an easy way to purchase or plan events with ticket sales. Nice UX and great support.
Cons_Review: Hard to find larger event tickets on the platform. Other than that, it's a great way to buy and sell tickets!

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite is an excellent product for everything event driven at your business. Be it 1-off employee events or larger client-driven conferences and opportunities, Eventbrite is an awesome tool to cover the majority of your needs. 

I like that they support their core business but also strengthen and add on new features all the time.
Cons_Review: I don't like eventbrite for strictly event-driven products, because the company doesn't own a lot of key company information. But it is amazing for getting up off the ground or for 1-off things.

Pros_Review: I have used this product when purchasing tickets to both concerts and 5k runs. Both types of experiences were positive and easy.
Cons_Review: No cons. The software is easy and fast to get through to book events.

Pros_Review: It's an easy set up, practically done for you. It's connected to all the social media outlets which help boost my events
Cons_Review: The upgrade feature is such a hassle, in the past all of the features were listed up front.

Pros_Review: I've used EventBrite a few times to find events going on around me and really enjoyed those events. It was simple to use and easy to find events!
Cons_Review: In the times I've used EventBrite, I haven't found any issues with the product.

Pros_Review: Very easy to set up and use. Free events mean no cost to you or your events. It is very accepted out in the community.
Cons_Review: Embedding it into web sites can be awkward. Minor changes in the web page can break how it works for you.

Overall_Review: The creation and management for tickets for events as well as sales.
Pros_Review: I found the program to be intuitive and easy to learn. I was worried that I or other luddites on our team might struggle with it but there was no struggle. Everyone enjoyed and appreciated the ease of the program.
Cons_Review: I was a little intimidated by the system that helps to tailor to the audience you want but was able to use it fairly easily along with everything else. This was new work for me so a lot of the hesitancy was me, not the program.

Pros_Review:
Mobile app is great. Easy to use and intuitive.
Easy to organize small meetups too.
You can charge for events.
Cons_Review: No issues with the product. I really like it. It's easy to use. Maybe make it easy to to share event invite link.

Overall_Review: It's a great tool to use! I've used for multiple events!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is well known in the community which helps because majority of your customers will have interacted with the platform previously! It is very simple to set up and easy to manage. If you aren't setting up or hosting an event, it is very easy to use to purchase tickets to a community event or function.
Cons_Review: The percentage they take for ticket sales is on the higher side. Also, when getting ready for registration or check in, it isn't the easiest thing to figure it.

Pros_Review:
You do not have to track who did RSVP or not
You can ask participants to contribute the event
User friendly
Cons_Review:
I have not encountered anything bad with this system.
I use this as a user as well but I do like the simple set up.

Pros_Review: I like that events are easy to set up with Eventbrite. Almost everything you need to create, market, promote, and share your event is already built-in for your use. Even people who don't often organise events can grasp it easily with this tool.
Cons_Review: Whenever I go back to the landing page, I find that it takes too long for me to go to the events I'm managing. There's barely any use for me to go to Eventbrite's home page and not see the things I'm going there for as an administrator.

Overall_Review: Generally a great platform for event managers. Definitely an innovative way to sell and manage tickets.
Pros_Review:
I've used Eventbrite for events with sales and it works very well.
Eventbrite is generally well known and people are comfortable purchasing large tickets through the platform.
Fees are reasonable.
Lots of options and configurability.
Cons_Review: Design UI could be a little more user-friendly, but it's not bad. If you're a marketer or experience at all in design, it's no problem, but might potentially be a challenge for a first time user with no experience elsewhere.

Pros_Review: With a clean and simple website, Eventbrite offers a list of webinars, workshops, discussions and even yoga sessions. It's intuitive way of suggesting events happening near you, by default, will surely come in handy for those looking to spend some time out of the house. It offers tickets to these events, almost always, for free. Creating an account to get in on the fun is no hassle at all.
Cons_Review: You could register for an event (virtual in my case) and get no correspondence from the organizers. I recall taking a short trip back home to attend a webinar in the serene comfort of my home only to sit behind my computer like a bum for over 45 minutes. Rather disappointing considering Eventbrite kept reminding me every 5 or so minutes prior to the event's start time.

Overall_Review: Event rite was super easy to use, i had no issues i will be using it again to purchase tickets to other events.
Pros_Review: Just like other event ticket sale sites. It's easy to use and there are no hidden fees when you buy tickets to events.
Cons_Review: there was nothing that I did not like about this software, I will be using it again in the future for other events.

Overall_Review: Love how easy it is to use. Having it incorporated into Facebook events has been helpful although the automatic import into Facebook doesn't have all the functionality so I don't do it like that anymore.
Pros_Review: I like that public events added can reach more people in the EventBrite network. Being able to duplicate similar events and easily email and export attendee lists is helpful.
Cons_Review: We charge $5 for most events and the fees at that price are insane and have forced us to use a differnt platform for our $5 events.

Overall_Review: Amazing experience with the software and platform in general!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite's application is amazing to book/organize events and sell tickets seamlessly for a small charge. User interface is nice and easy to follow.
Cons_Review: Could add some new features like showing events based on location/AI recommendations to keep up with the competition

Pros_Review: Easy to use and manage participation in events.
Cons_Review: I like eventbrite as is, but others might find it difficult to use and/or limited in options for customization.

Overall_Review: Great place to find events, buy tickets, and attend.
Pros_Review: I've used this eventbrite to attend events. I have never hosted an event with them. As someone who has attended events they've helped host - buying tickets from them and finding events near me or virtually, it has been great. Easy to buy tickets, find events, and attend. Have never had trouble.
Cons_Review: Honestly nothing bad to say about eventbrite. They are great and customer service responds quickly when you need them.

Pros_Review: An easy way to organize and schedule important meetings or just some awesome get togethers.
Cons_Review: Prepandemic this was my go to product to set up and find networking or other meetings. However the transition to this less face to face contact has been leaving me wanting more.

Overall_Review: I've been using Eventbrite for over 2 years. It is awesome for small businesses and busy companies for those who don't have time to put a staff person on selling tickets for an event.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has made setting up local events so much easier. They process payments, populate lists, and make the entire ticket selling a cinch!
Cons_Review: The fees can be a little high (You can pay the fees yourself, or incorporate the fees into the price of the ricket- your choice), but it's worth it for less work on my staff's end.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is a great way to do tickets, a lot better than having to get paper tickets to an event.
Pros_Review: I really like being able to order tickets for an event and then having them electronically. That way you don't have to keep track of paper tickets and worry about losing them anymore. You know that all you need to have is your phone at the event and you'll be able to quickly and easily find the tickets in your email.
Cons_Review: The only issue I've run into with this is if your phone does not have a good internet connection. Typically you have to click on a link in your email that opens the ticket but if you have no internet that won't work.

Overall_Review: It is easy to create an event and find a bunch of events in the local area for a range of prices. Sometimes, the events are not what you are expecting since anyone can make an event.
Pros_Review: It is easy to publish and sell tickets to your upcoming event, no matter where or what that event may be.
Cons_Review: This software allows anyone to use it. This can be a challenge for fake events or non-authenticated events that are selling tickets. Sometimes people will buy tickets to non-legitimate events and expect something else.

Overall_Review: I really enjoy my time with the product. I recommend it to others!
Pros_Review: Using Eventbrite is really great when organizing a gathering. I like that it is easy to use and you can register and have everything you need in one place.
Cons_Review: When first using the software it can be hard with the details but when you get the hang of it is is simple.

Overall_Review: Pretty good.  If I'm looking to send out a professional business event to my database, Eventbrite would definitely be on the top of my list to use.  There's more structure there as opposed to like sending the event invitation via personal email.
Pros_Review: I use it to set up events and to organize workshops.  When my friends set up events, they usually use Eventbrite to send out invites and it allows the event  planner to keep track of RSVP and sends out the reminders and such.  It's great because it's free for free events.
Cons_Review: It's good but I mean there isn't a lot of software out there that really stands out.  It's somewhat user friendly and people are used to using it so it's no wonder people use it.

Overall_Review: Overall eventbrite is great and easy to use and is used for so many diffrent events!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an alternative software which you can use for selling tickets to events it rarely ever crashes!
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is so that i can barely think of anything to say! If i have to choose one thing it would be the occasional crashing.

Overall_Review: We are typically very pleased with the EventBrite experience.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite helps us keep our ticket sales organized and together in one place.  We can easily find them with event details when needed.
Cons_Review: Our number of ticket purchases on one email account were limited.  This forced us to used a separate account, causing confusion.

Overall_Review: Using Eventbrite saves me time on creating and marketing my events and even collecting payments. I love that it integrates so easily with Facebook too.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so easy to use! It's great for managing events and finding some near me.
Cons_Review: Some of the management features aren't as user-friendly as I'd like, but overall it's really great!
reasons_choosing: Overall it was more cost-effective, efficient, easy to use, and well-integrated with other software systems we were also using.

Overall_Review: I used eventbrite weekly and marketed the events via Facebook, email, etc.
Pros_Review: I like that you can create an event and add a lot of details and features, such as maps, rsvp, max people, etc.
Cons_Review: I do not like that to rsvp, etc on eventbrite you have to go to the website, rather than just a 1-click from an email or link.

Overall_Review: I run across eventbrite fairly often whenever I seek out tickets to concerts and events.
Pros_Review: Probably the thing I like the most is the e-newsletter that alerts me to upcoming events I might like.  Otherwise I don't feel like eventbrite provides enough of a service for me to justify the extra cost I'm paying on top of a ticket.
Cons_Review: Biggest issue for me is how much extra I have to pay just to get a ticket through eventbrite.  And it's not like I have any other options.  If it was a convenience thing that'd be fine, but I hate how I see a ticket price, and then it's automatically going to have a fairly high extra charge and I have no other way of buying at face value (not including tax, of course)

Overall_Review: Overall it is very good and user friendly. It makes small events seem more legit
Pros_Review: It's super easy to make events. As a Dj I can make events public and look official by making it available on Eventbrite. Having people print tickets or download the ticket on the phone makes your events seem more legit
Cons_Review: Sometimes the app gets too clustered and hard to find smaller events. They tend to get washed out by the bigger ones.
reasons_choosing: It is very well known and tons of people look at it

Overall_Review: over the half dozen uses so far, it hasn't let us down yet. Overall good experience.
Pros_Review: can easily create social events for staff and clients in jus a few minutes. its quick and easy to use.
Cons_Review: I'm probably reaching for the stars here but I love to have more customizable options. perhaps those options could be expanded a bit

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to show people upcoming events in the area that they would be interested in based on past likes.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows event goers to be notified about events similar to ones they have been to in the past. Great way to increase awareness of events.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite can be confusing for first time users because sometimes it isn't the website where you buy the tickets to the event so the users ends up going to multiple sites to buy a ticket.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is definitely a necessary program to know about!
