Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes finding and registering for events and conferences simple. You sign up for an account and can download your ticket to your phone.
Cons_Review: The fees associated with purchases can seem pretty steep. Otherwise, I don't have anything bad to say.

Overall_Review: Excellent experiences over a diverse range of events, double best for free events!
Pros_Review: Super easy to use, share, and organize with. The perfect software to use for events if you don't want to create a customized software.
Cons_Review: The fees associated with the events are pretty standard however can feel like a lot of money at the end of the day.

Overall_Review: Generally pretty good for a straightforward event announcement.
Pros_Review: It captures all the basics about an event and its has been easy for the recipient to open and navigate.
Cons_Review: Its a little too basic.  Not alot offered in a way to make the invitation visually attractive. And sometimes the payment mechanism is a little glitchy.

Overall_Review: I have purchase tickets for events, and even reserved space for events which do not have an admission fee.
Pros_Review: I have purchased tickets using eventbrite and I think it's a really easy way to sell tickets and buy tickets for an event.  When used with facebook I think the event owners have access to a great app.
Cons_Review: I think the fees can be high.  I have never been on the admin side of event brite so I can't speak to the ease of use, but on the buyer side, the fees passed off seems high.

Overall_Review: It's great for larget events that need customized intake forms and attendee communication options.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite offers extensive customizability in attendee registration, reminders and follow up with attendees.
Cons_Review: The learning curve can be a little steep and the fees for credit  card processing are not clearlyexpressed.

Overall_Review: Overall, my experience with Eventbrite was been amazing. The analytics and support provided by this software has helped me to determine the specific demographics that my business is attracting.
Pros_Review: I really like that Eventbrite software allows me to advertise events pertaining to my business on a wider scale, which expands my audience and has led to increased revenue.
Cons_Review: One aspect that I like least about this software is the abundance of settings that are set to default. While this appears helpful on the surface, there are many settings that I need to manually change and there are times that we do not notice that this is an issue until after the event is posted.

Overall_Review: I use to allow people to register for events and track registrations and people attenting.
Pros_Review: They provide a generous trial options where you can use it for a few events entirely for free and offer very affordable rates to manage invitations and registrations for events. They have great analytics as well to track event stats.
Cons_Review: Prices have increased over the last few years but the costs are still good. The analytics functions could be a little better as well, but they are improving it gradually.

Overall_Review: I have found that it is an excellent system for issuing tickets to events and regularly communicating with a listing of event attendees.
Pros_Review: The website has a clean and crisp feeling to it and it is very user-friendly. I've managed events with it and also been a user getting tickets. Always satisfied and never had any issues.
Cons_Review: I don't really have any cons about the site at this time. I have only had good experiences with Eventbrite. I think some things could be even easier, but overall, I give it an A-.

Overall_Review: Overall it's easy to use for event promotion and communication as well as registration.
Pros_Review: I like that it is easy to organize and promote events through this technology platform. It makes it easy to buy an e-ticket.
Cons_Review: I don't like the look and layout of the website. It feels very outdated and could have a new cleaner look to it.

Overall_Review: Overall I enjoy using this software/platform and would recommend it to anyone looking for events.
Pros_Review: What I like most about Eventbrite is how easy it is to register/RSVP for an event. It also makes finding events easy. And, the best feature is probably that I can link it to my google calendar easily so I never miss an event.
Cons_Review: The only con I can speak of is that they send a lot of emails that aren't necessarily relevant. It is possible to opt-out of most of them though.

Overall_Review: We had a great experience with Eventbrite and would highly recommend, although Facebook Events is now a close competitor in terms of cost and functionality.
Pros_Review: It's easy to set up customized events and search for local events. You can easily manage and secure transactions/payments for attendees. It is also an easy way to be able to control number of invitations released and automate the invitation process. You only pay for events where you charge admission, so it doesn't have to be costly for personal or business use.
Cons_Review: There are not a lot of marketing capabilities, so you really have to go to the work of publicizing the event to your audience. I also wish there were more analytics capabilities. Lastly, Eventbrite is hard to use if you want to have tiered event registration types/tickets.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great interface for creating events when you want to invite a lot of people from online, but don't want to pull in money (or you want to charge and don't want to create an events feature on your own website.)
Cons_Review: There aren't a whole lot of options for how to charge for events.

Pros_Review: I love using this to purchase tickets to various events. Its so easy to use and convenient to keep track of tickets
Cons_Review: I have not had any cons when using this

Overall_Review: Quick and easy to organise an event and we can track details with the platform.
Pros_Review: With the Eventbrite platform , we can easily organise an event and get the audience for our events. User interfaces are very user interactive and not having complex processes to create an event. Even we can send emails  for all attendees using a single click.Also we can issue tickets for the events through the platform.
Cons_Review: Transferring tickets to another attendees procedure should improve.

Pros_Review: I like the ease of setting events and the payment processing offered through Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: The processing fees are a bit high, but worth the ease of use.

Overall_Review: Great platform to purchase and organize tickets from!
Pros_Review: Great user interface, allows you to easily receive and download tickets. Great mobile app, transferring tickets amongst peers is simple. Allows you to also purchase tickets based on your past events, relating to your interests, and gives recommendations. Notifications allow you to make sure you never miss an event!
Cons_Review: A lot of features, with can be overwhelming and does require a bit of learning at first.

Pros_Review: How easy it is to use - to invite people and keep track of people coming to your event. Also, I love the fact that it is free unless you charge for the event - so that has worked great for any company team-building events as well as personal parties.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I can think of at this moment. I really like it!

Overall_Review: My overall experience has been pretty good. I have continuously used this software for events and have been pleased.
Pros_Review: Check-in process is easy, ticket sales are super easy and an excellent main hub for all events, big or small. Using this software just makes the entire event process and experience smoother. You can also create customized data reports.
Cons_Review: In some situations events have been canceled with no advance notice of refund offer so this is something that needs to be worked on.

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite for general event notices as well as occasionally buy tickets for events through it.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great -- it's super easy to put together event notices or smaller, private invites. Publishing and managing are easy, and as a user, email notifications, etc. make it much easier to keep track of events I plan to attend.
Cons_Review: Maybe I haven't gotten deep enough into its use cases to find Eventbrite's limits in terms of ease/usefulness, but I have yet to find anything I don't like about it.

Pros_Review: Loved the fact that i now do not have to print out or go and purchase invitations. Very convenient.
Cons_Review: Some people do not actually RSVP or click where they are supposed to.

Overall_Review: use this all the time to set up parties and track invites. this works very well.
Pros_Review: ever easy to set up events and track responses
Cons_Review: this is a great product. no real cons to the product

Pros_Review: I love the ease of use. It is more than a ticketing software. It is a great site to find events as well.
Cons_Review: I can't think of anything I don't like about Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: I've used this for my own events and integrated their API in a startup project. Overall, the functionality is great and does what it is supposed to.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review:
For software developers:
- Their API caused many problems in a project a couple years back. Be prepared to spend more time than you think for integration of systems into custom web platforms.

Pros_Review: It is very customizable and allows for so many options with tickets and registration.
Cons_Review: I do feel like the fees are a little on the high side.

Pros_Review: Great platform to invite people to events. It's easy to use and it really helps to make the organization of an event easier.
Cons_Review: I didn't find any cons while using the platform.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: If you are organizing a lot of personal or professional events and need a light solution or an advanced functionality to host, plan, take payments, and promote events, Eventbrite is a wonderful solution.
Pros_Review: I love the mobile app for registering and creating events, they have easy ways to take payments, produce ticketing, and even create promotions within the software.
Cons_Review: I don't like the UI, especially on the app, because it forces you to click multiple times and navigate too many directions to find out about a specific event.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use. It also does a great job of promoting out local music scene. The fees for the tickets are not outrageous either.
Cons_Review: I do wish since the tickets are electronic that we wouldn't be charged processing fees. We aren't having them mailed or printed so I feel its just pointless to pay that fee.

Pros_Review: I really like the ability to search for events by area or by dates on Eventbrite. The software also lets you send reminders to your email days before and enables me to add it to the calendar.
Cons_Review: Not the best customer service around with Eventbrite. hey say search results are only limited by geography, but if I try to book an events in anther country,for example, it's much harder to do so. For any international conferences, we just use the host's website instead of going through Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Experience has been great.  We had a small issue regarding questions not appearing on facebook.  I contacted customer service. The reps guided me through a bunch of ways to correct my issue.  When that didn't work, she offered a call back while she bubbled it up thru her tech team.  The expectation was 24 hours, and she called back within minutes with a solution.  AWESOME!!
Pros_Review: It was easy to use, and accommodated everything I needed at no cost.
Cons_Review: My custom questions weren't available when purchasing event tickets through facebook.

Overall_Review: Overall I would recommend Eventbrite as it makes the process of securing admission to events, paid or unpaid, very easy and it's hard to find a comparable platform.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is the go to platform for general admission and reserve seating for a range of events. It makes payment seamless with handy virtual ticket and in general it's easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: One of my biggest negatives for Eventbrite is the customer service. It's limited to non-existent in my experience and resolving complaints is not an easy process.

Pros_Review: The feature I like most is being able to easily and quickly check-in event guest by simply scanning the code with your phone.
Cons_Review: I find the fee's to be on the higher end.

Pros_Review: I've used the mobile version of this software to purchase tickets for concerts. The app is extremely intuitive and allowed me to add my ticket directly to my Apple Wallet so that I have easy access to the ticket.
Cons_Review: I wish they would expand the software to include professional sports tickets in my area.

Pros_Review: I fancy the software with its ability to create events and even advertise it, can share details to people via email. You can create free events as well as paid of which they'll take up a percentage from the tickets sold which I believe its a fair share.
Cons_Review: I have no problems with the platform I think it works well as intended.

Pros_Review: I like the friendly interface and ease of creating, saving, editing, publishing, and linking/sharing events. I was able to start using it for the first time with minimal effort.
Cons_Review: I wish it had more search options on the patron end, such as key words PLUS date, type of event, and location/city.

Overall_Review: mostly use it for fundraising and social events where we don't want to use a formal productions agency. this is a great alternative.
Pros_Review:
Eventbrite made it simple to organize our events, even if you are not charging any monies in your event you can use this platform to have a correct headcount and RSVPs from your invitees. 
I used for pay and free events, when you charge for events you get the monies in a simple way once you understand their procedures is pretty much all simple to use.
Cons_Review: people may not like to pay a fee for using the tool, but its much more reasonable than other platforms. in the end it worth the efforts, but money is always and issue.

Pros_Review: There are many event applications out there but the one I have had the most experience with is Eventbrite. It is for the most part very easy to use.  I most recently had to purchase tickets for a networking event. It was a simple, secure process to pay either by debit or credit card. There is also a Paypal option which is helpful. I received immediate confirmationof my tickets by email. In the email I was encouraged to download the mobile app which I have done.
Cons_Review: It is hard to tell fraudulent events on this platform and difficult to get a refund of payments. Other than that I have had no negative experiences.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is our go-to for managing and tracking our upcoming events. While it may not always be the most cost-efficient option, it's by far the easiest to use - which makes the small pricing difference worth it.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes planning and managing our corporate events incredibly easy. The options to create different types of tickets, different availability and waitlists make it simple for us to see what we need to push and promote - as well as reach back out to attendees and waitlisters. I also love how easy it connects to social media platforms.
Cons_Review: The fee per ticket purchased is a little more expensive than other ticket management programs. Other programs have flat fees that make more sense for some of our events. Additionally, I also would like to see more development in the MailChimp integration.

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to create custom forms for event registration. You have a ton of flexibility and you can capture just about any kind of information about your attendees as you need. Additionally the data is formatted into a CSV which makes it easy to export and then import into another application.
Cons_Review: If you have larger events, the pricing can get a little high, but you still have the option to absorb the ticket fees or ask your guests to pay for them.

Pros_Review: Easy access to multiple events going on with easy to RSVP options.
Cons_Review: None. No issues to report from my experiences.

Pros_Review: It has the ability to store you information and will send you info on events similar to ones you have attended or purchased tickets for in the past. Some may not like this feature as it can clog up your inbox, but it has alerted me to some under the radar events that I would have never realized were taking place nearby.
Cons_Review: The processing fees that are associated with buying tickets online. I realize that this isn't really a criticism of the software, it's just a gripe in general.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has helped to make it simpler for people to register for an event as well as for myself to check people in at the event.
Pros_Review: It's a great way to get all of your event information in one place.
Cons_Review: Unless you have a computer or access to the internet (which not everyone does) It's difficult to get all your registration information complete.

Pros_Review: I am on the board of directors for a non profit, and we use this product to track our pre attendance for some of our larger events. It has never failed us and the integration with facebook is GREAT!
Cons_Review: Nothing! I can honestly say that we have had ZERO issues with this product!

Overall_Review: Overall I would highly recommend using Eventbrite for creating events whether it be general admission or reserved seating
Pros_Review: I liked how easy it was to create events. I also had no issues at any step of the way. Things worked flawlessly and went off without a hitch!
Cons_Review: The one time that I did have an issue was when I was unable to reach customer support.

Pros_Review: I use it to find great events happening in the city. From tech to sport to meetups.
Cons_Review: I would like it to have option to look for event on a specific date.

Pros_Review: I like the design layout. It breaks down the cost, the fee, and the tax well so I know what I'm paying for.
Cons_Review: I wish that when a ticket was sold out, it would make that more clear.

Pros_Review: Easily create events and search for events.  Good visibility. Like the ability to charge for events.
Cons_Review: Fees are a little high for Professional version when accepting tickets.

Pros_Review: I think the software does what it needs to do very efficiently. The app works great also
Cons_Review: I would like to be able to download content on the app so I do not need data to get my tickets at an event

Pros_Review: I have been able to purchase numerous  tickets through event bright and save it on my phone
Cons_Review: The extra tax that you have to pay instead of paying cash in person

Overall_Review: It makes it easy to plan things and I love that it sends me an email so I can keep track of my events.
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to get tickets. Some website confuse me with all their steps but this one went smoothly. I was able to go to the lantern fest and it was amazing!
Cons_Review: Nothing! I like how easy to use it is. It's a good program.

Pros_Review: Easy way to organize and promote workshops and events. Does the work for you for selling tickets and putting together attendance lists.
Cons_Review: Nothing, the site is great for events.

Overall_Review: I would recommend Eventbrite in regards to creating, tracking, payment processing. A great tool for your events, small or large events, we always use eventbrite.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite offers a simple set-up for creating an event, importing list and sending invites. We love the easy to use templates provided, the ability to send follow-up and post event emails. Reporting has proven useful as well.
Cons_Review: The difficulty in exporting the attendee list. Post-even it's very important for our organization to easily access all attendees and invites.

Overall_Review: Creating events.
Pros_Review: I do like how it is connected with Facebook, and how easy is to create event.
Cons_Review: Everything is almost perfect on this software.

Overall_Review: We use event bright for employee events because it is so much simpler to keep up with an app opposed to paper tickets and even emailed tickets.
Pros_Review: This application is essentially a wallet for event tickets. That I can store multiple types of tickets in the software and not need paper tickets is extremely convenient.
Cons_Review: I have no dislikes of the software at this time.

Overall_Review: Overall, great product and convenient
Pros_Review: This software is definitely user friendly and professional. I love that they offer a free platform for non-profits as I am in HR Recruitment and have put together invitation only interview days using it.
Cons_Review: While it is professional looking, customization is limited so I'm unable to be as creative as I'd like.

Overall_Review: Overall Eventbrite has been awesome for sending and receiving invitations to events. I really like that it is paperless and also sends that confirmation email to help users remember when their event is taking place.
Pros_Review: I like that it is a very easy to use tool in order to invite people to an event online and paperless. I think it is also really helpful when other people use it to invite me to an event, or when buying tickets for an event. It gives all the information you need like who is invited and who is coming or not coming. It also sends everyone an email as a confirmation for the event.
Cons_Review: As someone who is invited to an event, it does not let me see who else is invited to the same event.

Pros_Review: Nice central location for local events for tracking attendees and for selling tickets. Also makes it easy to send out invites for recurring events too. Confirmations give ways to automatically add event to many calendars as well
Cons_Review: Have not had an issue but if mailers get sent often, might be easy for users to miss a notification

Pros_Review: I like that it was one of its kind for so long and the ease of use. I've used this for all events and I've never been disappointed even learned new apps they have, like organizer.
Cons_Review: I think the software, in which it currently is, should rebrand. There are newer apps coming out providing more features and options.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use. Allows guests to easily RSVP with a tap of a button (and ofcourse without creating an account). Easy to view guest count and details as well!
Cons_Review: Some guests did not like the reminders, however as a host, it was helpful because it prevented me from having to chase down the guests that had not yet RSVPd/responded

Overall_Review: I have used event brite myself for events and have looked at, purchased tickets and RSVPd for multiple events too
Pros_Review: Easy to Buy Tickets, share information about events
Cons_Review: limited space to include information about event

Pros_Review: This product makes it easy for you to sell tickets for your events. They also won't charge you fees if you are hosting free events in the community.
Cons_Review: When you publich the event, the first picture you see is the bright eventbrite logo. I set my own picture for an event but it always defaults to their logo and you have to scroll to see my event picture.

Pros_Review: I think the ease of which you can scan and check people in at events using their app.
Cons_Review: Setting up the forms and contingencies for the various ticket types could be more user friendly.

Overall_Review: I've used this to purchase tickets to several business events and found it very easy to use. I downloaded the free app to my phone and the tickets automatically loaded to the app and were able to be scanned with a QR code right from my phone.
Pros_Review: Allows me to purchase tickets to events, which are then sent to my email and to the app on my phone. It can also add the event details to my Google and Outlook calendars. Very convenient.
Cons_Review: I can't think of any cons. I suppose it would be nice to have more information about the actual event. But by the time I am purchasing tickets on Eventbrite, I already know about the event. Perhaps push notifications about updates to events would be useful. Parking info?

Overall_Review: With Eventbrite, I get my attendees registered, they get an email receipt instantly to their email, and I get insight reports. I love everything about this program.
Pros_Review: This program is perfect for organizing your event. With options for free or paid tickets, you can also offer a discount code, have attendees information, issue refund if needed. I also love the tracking tools to see who has registered and the total amount of registrants and it also tracks your sales.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I do not like about this software.

Pros_Review: I like the ease of use for the software, they spend a real good amount of time designing the interface to be nice and easy.
Cons_Review: I think there are some invite options that are lacking and calendar features which I could use to tie into more services.

Pros_Review: Being able to sign up for events and put the ticket in my app has been very helpful.  It can also be helpful to browse for current events in the area, though most have not been relevant to me personally.
Cons_Review: I do receive a lot of emails from eventbrite, most of which are not helpful or relevant to me.  It is a little annoying to receive so many emails, and I am afraid that if I unsubscribe I will not be able to receive the emails I need for tickets for actual events I have signed up for.

Pros_Review:
super easy to use
the interface is great 
allows for customization of target locations for better reach
has great features that are of value
Cons_Review: Didn't find it easy to manage attendees from the platform easy, couldn't find some guest based on how they input their names on the sign up, opted to print out a list instead

Pros_Review: Simple, user-friendly, no training necessary, availability and familiarity with the site, customers or contacts are able to easily use to RSVP to events, and it's typically free!
Cons_Review: There are not any cons to report when I utilized this product for college fairs, and to let prospective students/employers know about upcoming events.

Pros_Review: very user friendly, can easily select events and ticketing options. good breakdown of menu options and payment procedure is good.....a good match up for the long standing ticket king.....ticketmaster!
Cons_Review: less flash adverts which obstruct the ticketing process (especially when on a timer)! a summary page would be helpful

Overall_Review: Overall a really great program.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it so easy to have your event up and offering tickets in just a few short minutes. The program also has many options to integrate events into your emails, social media and website.
Cons_Review: Not a whole lot to say here as I think the program is doesn't have any major weak points. I will say that it is has been very difficult (almost impossible) to get live support (i.e. someone on the phone). Most of my service questions have been answered by chat boxes and/or help pages.

Overall_Review: The benefits of using Eventbrite from a staffing company point of view is that we can always find the best and largest job fairs happening in our area so we can decide if we would like to purchase a booth to become a vendor.  Eventbrite makes finding those job fairs easy.
Pros_Review: What we like most about Eventbrite is that they always have the most relevant job fairs posted.  Being in the staffing industry we go to Eventbrite to see which large job fairs are happening in our area so that we can purchase a booth for marketing purposes.
Cons_Review: What I like least about Eventbrite is that it sometimes takes a long time to register for the events.  I think that might be because they are a third party for the actual vendor.

Overall_Review: Mass and targeted promotion of events and meetings.
Pros_Review: #1--It's free to everyone--promoters and attendees.  #2--It allows scheduling of events, emails, and reminders.   #3--Ticket sales!  My normal use is for member meetings, but we have held a couple of ticketed events as well.   Ticket sales and proceeds are easy to set up, and proceeds are direct deposited after the event.
Cons_Review: The software has a learning curve.  There are many features that are available but are discovered with use.

Pros_Review: I got along Eventbrite more or less by surprise. I had signed up for a job and the interview was performed using the software. It is a great tool, easy to use and with all important features you would expect, like chat, webinars, etc.
Cons_Review: It only works by installing a software on the computer or an app on the phone. The PC software is not available for Linux. The smartphone app works fine, though it requires a really good network or WiFi connection to work.

Pros_Review: Easy user Interface as well as attractive event description can be given in application as well on website which makes it more appealing.
Cons_Review: Sometimes when you book a ticket for a show or function it doesn't email right away with your ticket. It takes time to deliver your ticket in your inbox.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it really easy and affordable for small organizations to promote events and get the word out.  They also process all of your ticket purchases so you can focus on the event itself.
Cons_Review: Their customer support is not the greatest.  They are really difficult to get in touch with since they don't offer live support.

Overall_Review: Selling tickets easier
Pros_Review: Being able to duplicate and publish events within minutes, having multiple show times for one event, creating seating charts with reserved seating and general seating.
Cons_Review: Fees can get pricey when selling higher price tickets. Refunds are easy but take a while to process.

Overall_Review: Being able to keep all the guest and  information in one location.
Pros_Review: Ease of use and ability to share event on social media, websites, etc.  Great for our affinity group, Young Leaders Circle.

Overall_Review: Keep up the good work and don't clutter the primary objective! Thanks!
Pros_Review: The interface is extremely helpful and guides you nicely through the checkout process. There isn't much friction that gets in the way of checking out, the design has removed all roadblocks and allows me to do what I need to do, namely RSVP or pay for an event registration.
Cons_Review: Could be a little less stressful, the large red counter makes you feel like you won't make it in time, but that may not necessarily be a con, more than a stressor.

Pros_Review: Ease of use and payment process.  I really like how I can look at old events, which helps me benchmark
Cons_Review: Speed of payment, not visually stunning, I have never used the social media tools because they do not seem useful

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite for all my events and to plan my social calendar. It's especially useful if you are attending the SXSW conference in Austin, TX. Reliable, fast, easy-to-use.
Pros_Review: Reliable, fast, easy-to-use!
Cons_Review: N/A!

Overall_Review: Overall, I've had a very positive experience with Eventbrite. It's simple, clean, and easy to use. The website itself is easy to navigate and is not confusing on the planning or attending side. It is very useful when planning events.
Pros_Review: It is extremely easy to use. The learning curve is very minimal, which allows for a frustration free experience right from the start.
Cons_Review: I don't really have anything negative to say. I've always had success using this software so far. I hope it remains this way.

Overall_Review: Overall, I like using Eventbrite. It helps you organize your event.
Pros_Review: I like the simplicity of scheduling an event and send out invites. Those who you invite can reserve a seat at you event with so much ease via the link in the email.
Cons_Review: Honestly. I don't think there was anything to actually dislike when it comes to this software.  I think it is excellent to use in business and if you need to send out invitations for birthday parties, weddings, etc.

Overall_Review: Easy to use platform to create and execute content for E-Mail campaigns.
Pros_Review: Free automation of E-Mail campaigns and event invites for, and capacity to set up campaigns several months in advance
Cons_Review: Rigid limitations to content format for emails, can make it hard to keep content being distributed fresh

Overall_Review: It was very easy for me to organize conferences and events using Eventbrite and then share the attendance records with management
Pros_Review: It's easy to set the total guest list and the maximum number of ticket purchase allowed per guest. It gives great insights and analytics if you are the organizer and tickets are directly emailed to the customers.
Cons_Review: There is no major con with Eventbrite. Maybe they can add more features and keep up with the changing times

Overall_Review: Terrible, outrageously bad customer service.
Pros_Review: The Worst customer service ever. easy to use and set up got to give them that, but the most unfriendly customer service and support on the planet. A company that has no phone or email communication with it's customers. Soooo unacceptable.
Cons_Review: Customer Service. The world's unfriendilest business The Worst customer service ever. easy to use and set up got to give them that, but the most unfriendly customer service and support on the planet. A company that has no phone or email communication with it's customers. Soooo unacceptable.
reasons_choosing: Because I was bound to make a mistake

Overall_Review: My overall experience with this software is that it was easy to use and I have been very happy with it.
Pros_Review: What I liked most about Eventbrite is the easy set up and ease of use for people to get tickets to the event.
Cons_Review: I don't feel there are any things missing or improvements needed for this program from my experience.

Pros_Review: Makes life really easy when it comes to purchasing tickets for your local events
Cons_Review: Can't really say I have dislike about this software

Overall_Review: Overall I have really enjoyed being able to use this product and the content it allows me to view.
Pros_Review: I have used eventbrite more recently especially when more things are going virtual. I have been able to attend more seminars and webinars through eventbrite which has been really easy to use and allows me to keep up to date on new information. As an attendee of the webinars it's easy access into the webinar and they have options to set up the webinar for later viewing which is great because I don't always have time during the scheduled posting.
Cons_Review: The only issue I've experienced with this so far is more probably a cellular issue I do most things from my cellphone and there are of course streaming issues but that's more my network issue less the product issue.

Overall_Review: I have bought tickets from eventbrite previously. Its easy to use and convenient for the potential buyer
Pros_Review: Eventbrite offers tickets at a reasonable price, and the website is easy to use. It is customizable to the area you are in, and shows you all events in that area making it more user friendly and convenient.
Cons_Review: Being a Canadian, sometimes I have purchased tickets and the tickets were in US dollars and not Canadian meaning that i had to pay more for the tickets.

Overall_Review: Overall I have used this software to attend a lot of different events and it has been very helpful in my career and just finding fun things to do.
Pros_Review: This app easily allows me to find events in my area for a variety of important categories like networking or culture events.
Cons_Review: I do not like that it costs money for certain types of events in regards to publishing events. Also, the ticket and payment system is questionable in regards to keeping information secure.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has taken one of the biggest headaches out of event planning: getting the information out there and providing a platform for people to get tickets. That said, the fees can be steep and should be factored into the event planning costs.
Pros_Review: I occasionally help a colleague plan events, and we always post them online using Eventbrite. The software is easy to use, allowing you to quickly set up nice looking event pages and add important information for attendees. There are also tools for promotion, and sales reports provide insightful information that has showed us what events perform best for us.
Cons_Review: The fees can add up quickly and have forced us to raise prices occasionally. There are no fees if the tickets are free, however. The fees vary by country, and Eventbrite is transparent about them, listing them all of its website.

Overall_Review: My overall experience has been wonderful! It is a great software.
Pros_Review: I have used this program for many things over the years and each time it gets easier and easier. The site seems to list the best prices for any show/conference/etc. I also like how it doesn't just list concerts, it is a host for anything relating to purchasing tickets.
Cons_Review: Honestly, I have not run into anything negative yet. It seems like a great software that anyone can use.

Pros_Review: It's free software, we could upload our event and advertise it with ease and we collect our database also with ease. Since it's Eventbrite, people usually browse for events on the website to check for events happening for the month or year. I would recommend this to others to promote their event.
Cons_Review: I just don't like that the flyer to be posted has only one size. sometimes I prefer a square sized flyer but it's fine

Overall_Review: My experience has been great, it has a good value and easy to set up.
Pros_Review: This software is great for capturing RSVPs for companies hosting an event. It is user friendly and has few bugs.
Cons_Review: The biggest complaint from my experience has been that created events seem difficult to find in the search function.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been great at establishing a trusted way to sell tickets, give directions, and details for any event!
Pros_Review: I love the exposure Eventbrite allows your event to get!
Cons_Review: I really dislike the fees they charge for tickets. Even though you have the option to pass them on to your guests, its still a con.

Pros_Review: fast easy way to get tickets for events in your area
Cons_Review: sometime you have to fill out way too much info

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been great - i'm not an administrator, but have used several times.
Cons_Review: Nothing.  No issues at all - pleased with it.

Pros_Review: Love that you can sell tickets to your event seamlessly thru this software.
Cons_Review: Can be a little tricky to navigate at times.

Pros_Review: This is a great service, it allows you to sign up for a meeting, webinars, social events, networking events or groups thru your desktop/Laptop/Tablet/Smart Phone
Cons_Review: None that I can say or complain about, great service for busy individuals.

Overall_Review: Overall experience with Eventbrite has been great.  They even offer ticket protection for a small fee.  It's worth the investment just in case you can't attend an event.
Pros_Review: I like Eventbrite because I am able to find fun events and seminars to attend within my area.  Eventbrite includes pictures and provides all the details you need for each event.
Cons_Review: It shows you how much time you have left to purchase tickets. If you have impulse control issues, that may be a trigger.

Overall_Review: The overall experience was good.
Pros_Review: We used this software for an offsite event where we needed to get reservation info.  At the time, we like'd how we were able to get reminders sent out to participants and capture important data.
Cons_Review: We had a few problems regarding flexibility, I.e. payment terms.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is really easy to use, I like the functionality
Cons_Review: I can't really think of any cons, I like the software.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite gives you the tools to organize events, make promotional codes,manage attendance and also gives additional exposure to the event you are creating.
Cons_Review: The mobile explorer version of the app does not have the use promotional code option, confusing non tech savvy users.

Overall_Review: This is a great platform for finding events and booking tickets! Easy, convenient, and safe!
Pros_Review:
This is a great way to find out about events going on in my area. 
This is an easy way to book tickets to events safely and without fear of fraud.
Cons_Review: There aren't  any cons I can think of for this software!

Pros_Review: Great website for searching for events. It also allow you to create , browse and promote local events. I love to browse to see what is going on in my city. Great place to catch up on the happenings in town. Great search area. Simple and fun. Having a babyshower, wedding or workshop event, this is the place to create or promote your event.
Cons_Review: You simply cannot go wrong with Eventbrite, its has the best set up.

Pros_Review: Super easy to navigate - simply find what you want, purchase, done. Emails you a copy of what you're going to and there's no hassle.
Cons_Review: A couple events we've tried to book haven't been on eventbrite, so it would be cool if more events were added, but otherwise it's super easy and to the point.

Overall_Review: My experience with Eventbrite's mobile app has been awesome, I've never encountered any issues with ticket purchasing.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite's mobile app is incredible. In the time it takes me on Google to find just ONE event I'm interested in going to, Eventbrite shows at least 5-10 events that are relevant to me. It's also very easy to register and buy tickets through the app.
Cons_Review: I have zero complaints about Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: We use this for our events for a professional women's organization.
Pros_Review: Great options for payment types and order form questions. Good Zapier integrations. And it allows you to publish to Facebook. Nice that it allows multiple users under one master account.
Cons_Review: No way to connect a member database to create member only tickets. Email options are limited...you can't email those who registered but didn't attend. Reporting UX design is cumbersome at best to use. You can't create event templates. The organizer name doesn't come through their Zapier integration.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has help us fill the void in our current POS that does not allow us to sell tickets in advance.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: Really no complaints. Although they take a higher fee for more customizable ticking options, I understand they need to make money somehow.

Overall_Review: An invaluable tool for setting up events and tracking attendance. I love it
Pros_Review:
Eventbrite allows me to set up an event in less than 5 minutes. As a recruiter in a start-up, I organize a lot of industry meetups and this has been an invaluable tool. 
I love how professional it looks, its integration with other platforms such as Facebook and above all, I can use it from my phone!
Cons_Review: I have no complaints about eventbrite, it has served me well.

Pros_Review: I used eventbrite for an out of school club where we were to create a small company and come up with a product idea. We also had to host an event where we would ask our family, friends, and the "investors" to come and see our product and if our idea was good enough to pass. We used eventbrite to invite our guests and tell them the place and time of our event. The program worked flawlessly and allowed for our event to run smoothly. It was easy to use and easy to implement.
Cons_Review: There was nothing we did not like about using this software while we were using it.

Pros_Review: I can use this on my phone on the go. You can also search multiple venues.
Cons_Review: Seems you have to create an acct to purchase

Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite a couple times now in buying tickets.  It has worked well every time and I have no issues with this program.  Plus I snagged Rachel Hollis tickets through Eventbrite so I kinda love them just for that
Cons_Review: I can't say I have any cons at this point in time.

Overall_Review: I still use this site regularly.
Pros_Review: I was turned on to Evenbrite by a colleague almost a year ago. The platform itself is easy to navigate is very straightforward. The website is clean, the graphics are exceptional. Anyone could pop on and utilize the site immediately.
Cons_Review: There is not much in the area we reside to offer. I'm not completely convinced this is there "con",  it may just be a matter of logistics.

Overall_Review: Love eventbrite. Not only as an event organizer but also as patron.
Pros_Review: Setting up is super easy. Youre able to view amount of ticket purchases you have. The control of setting up special discount codes for clients. Can use the site internationally
Cons_Review: Theres nothing so far I dislike about this site and app.

Pros_Review: Setting up events and purchasing tickets to an event are so simple
Cons_Review: Really nothing. Great UI, and just simple and to the point

Overall_Review: It is free for Free events and for paid they have a reasonable fee, Overall it is a great platform
Pros_Review: Create tickets for your events easy with minimal effort, They have everything like tracking, promoting and analyzing the event. They have very good mobile app which makes verifying the tickets easy at the event. Hosting an event is easy just like a breeze, even booking tickets from event brite is very easy. Processing fee are reasonable compared to other platforms. All the features makes eventbrite on stand out.
Cons_Review: I wouldn't argue more that this is the best service I have nothing else to say.

Overall_Review: I use this software at work to submit events to local calendars.
Pros_Review: I like that I am able to use it to both find events to attend, and also as a marketing tool to submit events for others to attend for my PR job.
Cons_Review: The information is not always up-to-date.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is simple to use as the host as well as the attendee.
Cons_Review: I can't think of anything that I dislike about it.

Pros_Review: It is straight-forward and user-friendly.
Cons_Review: I don't always need an e-mail reminder of an upcoming event.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was helpful in having a sure way to register people for our event, but overall having greater customization options or one's that were easier to find would have made my experience better.
Pros_Review: I did like how many options you were able to use to customize ticket sales: we had different tiers that allowed for different price brackets.
Cons_Review: There could've been more ease in some ways: either there were features I wanted that didn't exist or I couldn't find. An end date for ticket sales (not just up until the event date), a small deposit option, and more information fields that could be customized to fit the needs of my group would've been very helpful.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a wonderful way to manage events and track attendance. From a user perspective signing up for events is so easy and requires little to no software experience.
Cons_Review: Our admin complains about the support. Sometimes their response time is not as quick as one would hope for (but who does?)

Overall_Review: I used Eventbrite until my parent company disallowed it for compliance reasons. I'd go back to it in a heartbeat if my company permitted me to.
Pros_Review: It's so easy! I can set up an event and push out in just a few minutes! Love that I can format text within the platform.
Cons_Review: Not much, especially since I only use the free/unpaid functionality.

Pros_Review: I've used this software for buying tickets and registering for running events, its perfectly simple and I love that you can see other events in your area.
Cons_Review: I don't have any complaints about Eventbrite, always functions exactly how I need it to. There are booking fees but that's true of all ticket sites

Pros_Review: I like that you can use Eventbrite for free if you are not doing a major, in-depth registration build for an event. It's great for startups and small companies that don't throw many events.
Cons_Review: It's very basic, if you need a robust system this is probably not the best solution for you or your company.

Overall_Review: I use this software a lot and compared against multiple event ticketing platforms, it is one of the best!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use platform for patrons and organizers, with a plethora of customizable ticketing options for event administration. It's aesthetic is modern, and order history is very trackable.
Cons_Review: As common with all ticketing software, there are glitches that sometimes can slow down processing or take some understanding to resolve. Event customer service varies per event.

Overall_Review: I was first introduced to Eventbrite in college and the ease of use with regards to it's connection with my phone and other apple products was one of the seamless reasons I trust and use eventbrite today.
Pros_Review: Functionality with my apple products
Cons_Review: Wish there was a better way to manage and sectionalize the events I register to on eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Relatively straightforward and easy to use. I like the recommendations on events that it provides-- I often hear about interesting activities that I wouldn't otherwise become aware of.
Cons_Review: A bit of a pain filling out the info required to get tickets for events, even with an account. I'm curious why they put a timer on completing the "transaction." I'm sure there's a good reason for it, but who wants to be on the clock? I guess it forces you to get the job done (relatively) quickly.

Overall_Review: It's pretty easy to use, but I think they need to make it more widescale as far as events go. But easy to use, prices are great, and does a good job of promoting the event.
Pros_Review: Easy use
Cons_Review: Not always tailored to specific events

Overall_Review: It doesn't have everything but from a consumer standpoint, their event directory is surpassed by none. As an event creator, Eventbrite's 1 page, 3 step process is as easy as it gets. For simple events, I'd always use Eventbrite. However, for paid services, some competitors have better website builds/layouts available and data analytics. I do like that I can integrate with like SurveyMonkey and MailChimp but their Salesforce integration needs some work. For a free service, you can't go wrong.
Pros_Review: Free for events you aren't taking money for online
Cons_Review: Some missing features, some extensions need updated

Overall_Review: I was able to set up an event and invite people at no charge.
Pros_Review: I liked the professional aspect of it and ability to send invites.  It was very easy to use with scheduling .
Cons_Review: I didn't have anything to compare it to so I am not sure I know what it is missing.  The only thing I wish it would have is the ability to add a calendar link into an email to schedule a meeting vs a whole event.

Overall_Review: Overall my experience with this app has been OK. The concept is very good but, the app could use many features to enhance user experience.
Pros_Review: I use this app to keep track of the events happening in my area. What I like the most about this app is that it provides very good and reliable information about social events and activities. I've used this app to even go to some events.
Cons_Review: I don't particularly like the search and filter capability in the mobile app because it does not provide many filter options. On many occasions I could not filter the events the way I wanted to.

Overall_Review: Using Eventbrite makes promoting an event easier because people can easily reserve their spot.
Pros_Review: Being able to reserve spots to industry events and creating events for our clients is amazing. Eventbrite has been our to go for event RSVPing.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite would be nicer if the had a badge or fill in form that I could embedded to my website with my event so people could sign up to the event without being directed to Eventbrite.com.

Overall_Review: Overall a good tool for events and getting people involved.  Would recommend.
Pros_Review: Use this product to advertise events, keep track of sign up, email additional info and reminders to those who signed up, and to get people involved.
Cons_Review: When we combine with Zoom meetings on the day of the event those who signed up have difficulty accessing link and have to sign back into Eventbrite and click through a bunch of times to log in.

Overall_Review: Overall it is a great software to send out invitations to events, and manage the attendance.
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to set up and use. It has a variety of options to add to your invites to make it more fun, and it is fairly easy to import contacts for the evites.
Cons_Review: Event emails can go to the recipients spam folder, which can be frustrating. I find myself having to add a disclaimer.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite is outstanding.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is one of the best event tickets buying software in the world. It's easy and free to use.
Cons_Review: There's nothing to say negative about this software. It's reliable and secured as I have found from my experience.

Overall_Review: It is a good tool, particularly for free events, or when the scale of the event makes it worth investing the time and money in creating an Eventbrite event.
Pros_Review: I like the flexibility with ticketing particularly, and the ability to sync with other apps, e.g. Mailchimp.
Cons_Review: It's a little bit pricey. Also, as organiser, when getting confirmation emails, I ended up get a calendar item for each attendee - a little bit annoying until I worked out how to stop this...

Overall_Review: I love Eventbrite and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for events in their area!
Pros_Review: EventBrite is my go-to app for finding events and shows in my area. It has a really nice, sleek design, it's easy to use, and makes it so convenient to scan my ticket when I go to shows.
Cons_Review: Not many cons to point out. Perhaps it could feature more events, but they really do cover most events I look for with few exceptions.

Overall_Review: Keeps a running record of money paid and attendance
Pros_Review: I like the fact that the software is easy to keep up with who has signed up for each area., beats having the paper method sign up sheet.
Cons_Review: At this time there is nothing that concerns me with sign. Least thing I like is notification system. Sometimes I do not receive notifications when are area is fully covered. I dont care that portion of money collected is not fully in my account

Overall_Review: I can't think of one time when I wasn't satisfied with Eventbrite or had a bad experience. Its simple and easy to use.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, intuitive, user friendly. Events and tickets are right there, easy to access when you're at an event. Easy platform for presenting information for events. Surprised this didn't exist before
Cons_Review: Can't really think of anything that I don't like about it. Wish it was used more widely by companies that put on events.

Overall_Review: Overall was a positive experience and I would use Eventbrite in the future when creating events.
Pros_Review: I like the user interface was easy to use and navigate - creating new events and adding tickets to each. Also like how it is free to use and offers tracking ability.
Cons_Review: When setting the time for an event, sometimes the application would use different timezones and this was not made aware until participants signed up.

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite regularly to search for professional and personal events that may be of interest; overall experience has been great.
Pros_Review: The ability to become informed of events in the community I otherwise may not have known about; the ability to purchase tickets or make reservations directly through Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: At times the suggested events are not within the limits or area specified in your settings or search suggestions.

Overall_Review:
All the prompts seem to be in place from the Eventbrite side of the software.  I do wonder why the event coordinator occasionally leaves important information off the invite.  

The software itself is easy to use and the payment side is easy to work with too.  I would recommend it to anyone planning an event.
Pros_Review: For the most part, the software is easy to understand.  A few times I have found that a host has not stated the information clearly.  Eventbrite makes payment easy from the end-users end.  Plus I like the non- paper ticket option.  It is easy to find tickets and produce them in the digital format.
Cons_Review: I think this is more of an issue from the event coordinator side than Eventbrite but the description of the event can be unclear.  At other times I have found it hard to find the correct person to talk with about the event.

Overall_Review: Overall excellent service. Easy to use. Good customer service we will continue to use eventbrite
Pros_Review: So easy! Eventbrite makes it very simple to set up an event invite guests and take payment. Our guests like the app and so do I
Cons_Review: We have received occasional complaints from customers that they do not like the desktop version- that is is complicated and can not be refreshed, although I have personally not found this to be the case

Overall_Review: Overall, I love this platform and will continue to use it as a user and consumer
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to find and register for events in my area! I've also used it to sell tickets to a business event I hosted and it was super easy from start to finish!
Cons_Review: It's a little confusing that you have to list how many 'tickets' are available. I also wish there was a way to completely customize the events I create in it.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is my go to site when I am setting up some kind of event where I. We'd to sell tickets for. It's very easy to use and pretty much all you need.
Pros_Review: I like most about this software that it lets users set up events with easy and allows them to post it to sites to get people to buy tickets.
Cons_Review: I like least that the site does charge a percentage on the tickets that you sell. It's only I believe 2.5% but feel like it could be lower.

Overall_Review: In the company we regularly call events, of clients or employees of the company, to discuss certain issues, sampling of new products, sales strategies, advice, recruitment of new customers, among others, with this program we have managed to propose better events quality and in the shortest possible time.
Pros_Review: It is a program with very simple but necessary tools that provide enough help to create your important business-level events quickly and easily.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I should mention in this section since, on the contrary, this program has only brought benefits for me and of course for the company.

Pros_Review: great, convenient and user friendly process
Cons_Review: nothing, it has been really great using this software

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was perfect for creating a pop up event at our bar. The website guided you through every step and also made it easy to share and promote your event to social media platforms. I'll definitely use it again in the future!
Pros_Review: The website was so user friendly and made everything easy - from signing up, creating my event, and setting up our payment information.
Cons_Review: The only thing that I struggled slightly with was adding in photos for our event page. The sizing requirements for the photo were very specific and took me a bit of time to figure out.
reasons_choosing: Eventbrite seemed like an obvious choice for what we needed. It had every feature necessary to make our event a success and the fees associated with it are minimal (just a small charge for credit card processing).

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has enabled my company to utilize the number of sign-ups to guage interest in specific initiatives.
Pros_Review: I love the ease of customization. Eventbrite's notification emails concerning sign-ups also help gauge other necessities for an event. I also love the ability to utilize this software as apoint of assessment.
Cons_Review: There is nothing that I least like about the software. Eventbrite has been easy and convenient to use.

Pros_Review: From a user standpoint, all of the information on an event is organized in a fun and readable way with graphics and much more content types than straight text.
Cons_Review: It seemed difficult to go back to the event if you didn't have the original link.
reasons_choosing: Corporate decision

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very user friendly. It allows me to keep up with my guest list and give out updates of my events to all my guest at one time.
Cons_Review: I was hoping that it would send out text messages instead of the guests having to download the app.

Overall_Review: Overall my experience is great as a buyer and seller on Eventbrite. Setting up an event whether it be for personal or work use is easy and self explanatory
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use platform that allows for an easy experience when purchasing tickets to pretty much any event.
Cons_Review: I do not have any personal problems using Eventbrite. It has always been reliable for me in the past. Overall my experience is great as a buyer and seller on Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Great - no issues!
Pros_Review: I love this software, it makes registering for events very easy. I like that it has the option to add the event to your calendar after booking. I believe I can even add it to my Apple Wallet, which is super helpful when trying to find the registration information. No issues with this software!
Cons_Review: I haven't had any issues, I think it's an effective and efficient software.

Overall_Review: Easy means for the baseline development of organizational event planning and delivery to targeted audience. Membership is free for those that wish to participate and notifications are easily delivered to the correct and group of recipients.
Pros_Review: Simplicity and ease of event development. Simple and intuitive technology with extensive capability for building out the best of event information and marketing.
Cons_Review: Sometimes to simple for the development notification aspect.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite's analytics are great--you can see where your participants come from + watch the numbers in real time. It also holds the data so you can continue utilizing it even after a single event.
Cons_Review: i do not like it's integration with Facebook. It does not work properly on both platforms (graphics don't look good, info doesn't always translate into the FB event)  I would post FB events  (if using) separately.

Overall_Review: Great experience for getting bookings for events
Pros_Review: Easy to use, sends me notifications of purchase, sends me info about the event that's useful, sends me reminders about event
Cons_Review: No complaints . It seems to have improved a lot  into the last year or so

Pros_Review: Great to use if you are a host or attending an event. Very easy to use and change details of an event. Also easy to use to create more events once you have an account. Tracks guests and details easily.
Cons_Review: I haven't had contact with customer service

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use and find event tickets with.
Cons_Review: Not a fan of Evenbrite's high ticketing fees.

Pros_Review: Great Product, if you are planning an event and need a way to invite quest or confirm attendance you need no look an further.  Once you sign up for an event, you no longer need to carry paper passes with you anymore.  Everything is added to your account on your iOS or Android phone, just click on the icon and the next event that you signed up for shows up.  Quick and easy way to attend events and no more paper passes (save a tree)
Cons_Review: None that I can think of it basically does its job, it allows you to have all information at hand.

Pros_Review: I've used this through purchasing tickets quite a few times, seems easy to use and allows anyone to set up an event and sell tickets through the site
Cons_Review: Not much - maybe change the visual aspect of it and allow more customisation for events?

Pros_Review: I have signed up for events and trainings using this software. I was able to quickly and easily sign up, pay and move on to other important tasks.
Cons_Review: I was not able to find issues with this product in the past. It works the way it's supposed to.

Pros_Review: I like how you can see all the events in your area and how it's easy to book tickets from eventbrite with the best prices.
Cons_Review: They have to review their refund policy and follow up more with the organizers.. It happened to me once for an Oscar after party in LA, that I reserved a VIP ticket but after that , when I went there, I found it super crowded and the security told us that they did sold a lot more tickets than the hotel capacity!! so it was a nightmare for me because I came from orange county driving to spend the night there but after that I had to go back home really mad!

Overall_Review: I started using Eventbrite for my comedy shows after a bad experience with another ticket vendor. I like the flexibility and ease of use, their CMS is easy once you get the hang of it.
Pros_Review: Options for promotion, fee flexibility (ie can be paid by either buyer or producer),  option to process all payments immediately with paypal,  generates traffic for event beyond your own reach
Cons_Review: They send way too many emails once you've created an event.

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite for all my event scheduling and invitations. It is simple and intuitive.
Pros_Review: This makes scheduling my events easy! It also gives guests an easy way to accept or decline invites!
Cons_Review: There are no clear negatives to using this program!

Overall_Review: I have never had a negative experience with Eventbrite ever! Even when it came time to getting paid for events that I have hosted. Everything has worked out just fine.
Pros_Review: I love the ease of not only buying tickets to an event but also CREATING events of my own for the classes that I teach. The reporting and analytics are awesome. Everything you need as a vendor is right there....
Cons_Review: There is nothing I like least about the software

Pros_Review: Good level of events available even in small locations
Cons_Review: The automatic personalization of events is not accurate, would be nice to have a better algorithm available. However the filter system is quite good.

Overall_Review: I really like Eventbrite and would recommend it to others.
Pros_Review: I like that this site is easy to use and you are able to plan an event with everyone paying for themselves.
Cons_Review: It took me a little bit to figure out how to retrieve my tickets once I purchased it.

Pros_Review: I loved how it allowed me to have our event posted for clients to register and pay online instead of having to collect the money in person for our events. Made the process of RSVP a breeze!
Cons_Review: Sometimes there would be a glitch i guess and some people would register twice. Not 100% sure how that happened but there would be one person that it would happen to each event.

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to set up an event! Another aspect I love is how easily you can share your events on social media directly after set up. When planning an event on Facebook you can include a direct link to Eventbrite on the event page directing users to buy tickets. I also love that it has the option to create both paid and free events.
Cons_Review: After your event is over, it takes up to 10 business days to receive payment from the tickets sold. If you have to pay other vendors right away this can be tough as you have to wait to get paid.

Pros_Review: Good range of events to discover what to do in a new city
Cons_Review: Sometimes the quality of the content of the events is really low. They should implement a filter to avoid low quality events/images to be published

Pros_Review: easy to use and share. I like it automatically updates my google calendar.
Cons_Review: in searching, sometimes too many events not of my interest show up that it's difficult to locate certain events

Overall_Review: I have enjoyed using the software and its features. It is a useful software and should include more features like full fledged timetables of events, etc.
Pros_Review: Easy to use and does what you want to do. I have bought many tickets with ease.
Cons_Review: Should include multiple logins so collect all tickets in one place. I have a university account and a personal one so it should be able to tell me about all.

Pros_Review: Great way to sell tickets for events. It's nice to be able to find local events by topic online and it certainly opens up ideas for things to attend.
Cons_Review: When the event is sold out, some of the details (like original cost) are no longer available.

Pros_Review: So easy to use, outstanding invite platform
Cons_Review: Cannot think of any downsides to this software

Pros_Review: Very simple to use. Great for promoting events, set up registration for attendees as well as sell tickets.Can be integrated in websites.
Cons_Review: Can't really say anything negative about Eventbrite. It's mobile friendly and very easy to use all around and

Pros_Review: I am able to provide tickets to an event that you can access right from your mobile device.  No more losing tickets.  Also can provide info like a map, directions, etc.  Very convenient! Highly recommend!
Cons_Review: Really don't have anything that I didn't like.

Pros_Review: Ease of use. Simple and intuitive platform. I can very quickly get my events up and running, The ability to repeat similar events without much effort.
Cons_Review: They have recently changed their plans yet again. There use to be a maximum per ticket processing fee and now it's a percentage with no max. For my business I sell high ticket items to workshops with a very low number of participants. This has almost doubled my fees.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite exceeds all of my expectations. I no longer need an entire team working on selling and collecting tickets for events because I utilize Eventbrite. Knowing that my attendees will have an easy time purchasing their tickets, and getting a confirmation email with detailed info on where to go and what to expect from my event is such a peace of mind.
Cons_Review: Although I understand why there is a fee, I only wish that somewhere purchasing tickets could be free! But, since my members are spending less time gathering and selling tickets, the fee is definitely a better, smaller investment.

Pros_Review: Everything you need to host a successful event in one software package.
Cons_Review: I have no real problems with this software.

Overall_Review: Nice
Pros_Review: Easy to use. Email updates about purchased events are really nice. Receipts are clear and easy to use.
Cons_Review: As a consumer who uses to purchase tickets - maybe an app? Not sure if there is one - but if someone buys a lot of tickets could be an easy way to access and keep information.

Pros_Review: Super convenient and easy when you need to schedule an event. Best part is that it is free and you can literally use it for any kind of event (Birthday, bbq, holiday part, etc). I like the ability to set a limit on how many people can come per invitation as well.
Cons_Review: It would be nice to have the ability to make the invitation outline and design more customizable, but the reality is, is that it does what it was made to do very well.

Overall_Review: Good
Pros_Review: User friendly and colors are easy on the eyes. makes rsvping and getting info easy
Cons_Review: I did not have complaints about this software.

Pros_Review: Links for events are easily mapped.  And booking was never so convenient   And as a bonus, I  Booked an event that was cancelled, I was easily able to retain my deposit while others struggled.
Cons_Review: Hate to say it, but I am unable to think of a con!  But that's never a bad thing!!

Overall_Review: when receiving an invite through the software, i look up other ways to rsvp to avoid getting timed out or logged out of the software. i cannot say that i've had a great experience with it.
Pros_Review: i enjoy eventbrite as a way to present information about events around town, especially the blurbs that lead such presentations. through the software i've marketed and attended a number of events that i would not have known about otherwise.
Cons_Review: while getting information about events is easy in the software, registering for them is another matter. a lot of the time i am taken to third party websites to finish the registration, but can't do so because that action logs me out of eventbrite, which makes a two-minute process into a ten-minute one.

Pros_Review: Makes event planning easy and has many ways to personalize it.
Cons_Review: Nothing to not like, very intuitive and easy to use.

Overall_Review: Overall, great experience, and very user friendly.
Pros_Review: We hosted a ticketed event at my job and Eventbrite made it so easy for our customers to buy tickets and made it so easy for us to keep track of the tickets that we had sold and when we had reached the capacity of our event. It is so user-friendly and simple that anyone, regardless of tech-savvyness, can use it without feeling overwhelmed.
Cons_Review: This isn't really a con, I just wish there were more customization options for how to make the ticket sales page look. I wish I could personalize it a little bit more for my specific ticketed event.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an easy, seamless way to get people to attend events. It's a very popular software that most people are familiar with, comfortable using and confident purchasing tickets thru the site.
Pros_Review: It's an excellent way to raise awareness about events and keep track of who's coming.  The pay automation is seamless, which is also very helpful.
Cons_Review: The interface is a bit generis. Events could be better represented if a more the event organizer's own graphics could cover the entire page.

Pros_Review: In comparison to Signup genius, Eventbrite is much more sophisticated and user friendly. I especially like the design of the website and invitation forms.
Cons_Review: Not much that I did not like. However, it would be much more helpful if at least basic level of customer support is provided.

Overall_Review: Our organization is, in some ways, still moving into the 21st Century.  We are working to use more social media to reach our clients and Eventbrite has helped.  In addition, the time savings in registering clients for events is HUGE. The ability to collect contact information so that we can follow up with clients is also a big win for us so that we can maintain contact and work with clients  that, though registered, may not have been able to attend our event.  We also use this information to confirm attendance with clients prior to the event.
Pros_Review: Easy to set up and use.  Easy to create reports. Customization was simple.  No charge to use if the event is free to attendees.
Cons_Review: So far, I have not found a "down side".

Overall_Review: I love eventbrite and will continue to use it.
Pros_Review: I love that alot of the events found on eventbrite are unique and aren't typically of the norm. It has alot of cool find events that strike my interest.
Cons_Review: I dont like how sometimes organizers are able to post an event, without the ability of including thorough details about an event; sometimes it makes it difficult to contact someone or know specifics about an event due to lack of information.

Overall_Review: Even though the fees are high, it is a trusted site by the general public and I recommend using this to create events.
Pros_Review: This is a wonderful platform to create events; it has a lot of functionality and is easy to use.
Cons_Review: The fees for using this are bit high.  But other than that, it's a great platform.

Overall_Review: Getting a good estimate of those attending our functions. Allowing us to properly prepare to meet all our customers and guest dining needs.
Pros_Review: We cater a lot of charity and church function on my food trucks. This is a really affordable and productive way to get word of your event out to people. It also really helps us to get a good estimate of a head count of attendees.
Cons_Review: In the many times my small business has used Eventbrite to promote a function, we never had any problems!

Pros_Review: The app makes this service even more helpful. Especially the calendar sharing.
Cons_Review: Some vendors put the fee on to the purchaser.

Pros_Review: It is very easy and intuitive to use. It also offers a lot of different features to use in case you want to personalize the invitation
Cons_Review: The process to create is a little bit slow, but I feel that it is improving little by little and that it is going to become optimal in the near future

Pros_Review: I've mostly only used Eventbrite as an attendee, not as someone who's listing/coordinating an event.  That being said, it's easy to navigate, purchase & access tickets.
Cons_Review: I'm not sure that I use it extensively enough to find any areas of improvement. It works for how I use it!

Pros_Review: I love EventBrite because it allows you to invite everyone to an event without having to spend money on actual physical invites. It's easy for people to RSVP and make comments. People are able to see who all is coming, all of the info for the event and everything. I have used it to invite people and have been invited via EventBrite and it's always very easy and convenient.
Cons_Review: I think they need more template and design options.

Pros_Review: Easy to use, and guests can check in to see how the event is progressing, read comments, etc.
Cons_Review: Nothing. It's pretty good for what it is.

Overall_Review: I went to a few events that I saw from Eventbrite. There was no hiccups from ticketing to the actual event.
Pros_Review: It was easy to find events related to my industry (SEO and other digital marketing events). Ticketing was also very straightforward.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it was hard to find events in specific locations.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a very popular and standard event marketing and ticket sales software. I've used it to promote pop up shops and shows and will continue to use it. I love the different features and filters available for each event, and it's easy for event goers to access and purchase tickets on. Highly recommended!
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons, I've really never had any problems while using EventBrite and it is easy on the budget.
