Overall_Review: My overall experience has be very positive.
Pros_Review: It is so easy to eventbrite for paying for upcoming events.
Cons_Review: I have had no problems with Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: I like that all the events are one site.
Cons_Review: I would like more interaction for customers

Pros_Review: Sign up and track upcoming events easily
Cons_Review: Auto search feature doesn't help pinpoint specific events

Pros_Review: I love how simple event registration is with Eventbrite. Consise and to the point.
Cons_Review: I would like a little more interaction between apps

Overall_Review: I've always been happy with this software and will continue to use it to stay in the know for last minute and future events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a dynamic software that can fine tune to a specific category of events, or show you everything and more than you imagined happening in any given area.  Links to purchase tickets for events are also included.
Cons_Review: You may miss deals.  Eventbrite does not track all deals being offered, so best to do a quick search before purchasing.

Pros_Review: It was easy to use and i felt that the data shared was secure using the software
Cons_Review: it could be a little difficult to navigate at times.

Pros_Review: I've used this to post events - and find them - with general success.
Cons_Review: Would love to have comprehensive access to events analytics.

Overall_Review: Professionalism in creating an event that lets everyone reply, in which it helps me be able to prepare properly
Pros_Review: Love being able to create events with style and ease. Lets me contact everyone in a more professional manner.
Cons_Review: I can honestly say that I have not ran into any issues with this software.  It is very user friendly!

Pros_Review: The app is a great value add to any organization or individual.  As Director of Operations, I managed an extensive event schedule, from Recruiting Fairs to Conventions to Hack-a-thons.  Amazingly, Eventbrite was always an option when registering for the event.  I was able to remotely manage multiple events to a variety of personnel in an incredibly effective manner . . .And it was free!
Cons_Review: Sometimes, my ability to access event information was limited by the event's IT department.  I realize that this isn't Eventbrite's fault, but it does hamper the app's performance at times.

Pros_Review: I like the ability to streamline seating and ticket sales and have real time information as to where we stand with upcoming events.
Cons_Review: The fees feel excessive at times, particularly when ticket prices have a low base.  Also the payments can take longer than expected to arrive.

Pros_Review: Able to see upcoming events by city, state, country. Let's you single out the event type you are looking for purchase it, and placing it in an e-ticket holder so you know where it is. You can also put it in your apple wallet.
Cons_Review: No dislikes about this soft wear thus  far.

Overall_Review: I have not come across an easier to use event and ticketing management software. It's a bit more expensive than I'd like but worth it in the end.
Pros_Review:
Very, very easy to set up events. Eventbrite has honed the market for quickly setting up an event and monetizing. 
The reporting features are vital to our business.
Cons_Review: The fees are kind of steep relative to some of their alternatives -- and they always seem to change. We've experienced some confusion around what tier we are on.

Pros_Review: Super easy to use, extremely friendly UI. Probably the best is the ability to quickly create codes. We used this feature to create codes for customers asking for discounts for their coworkers...it let's us do something special for them and turn it around quickly.
Cons_Review: The only con is that they take a cut, but how else would they survive and make money? You can, however, very easily build in the price to be passed on to purchasers if needed.

Pros_Review: Very simple to use, efficient, few bugs, works well with merchant accounts. Eventbrite was a top pick for our event registration needs.
Cons_Review: I wish Eventbrite had a calendar component to plug into our website. Without a calendar function, it forces us to have to use another 3rd party app.

Overall_Review: Super easy platform to set up events for beginners and people with low budgets,  yet highly effective.
Pros_Review: This platform is super easy to use  for all events.  Set up is self-explanatory and can be used for all ranges of events or to set event reminders for upcoming dates. The integration is great and can be shared easily to Facebook, etc.
Cons_Review: I wish you could customize the platform a little more and make the website portion more designed  to fit your event branding.

Overall_Review: Like using eventbrite for knowledge of what's going on, and for RSVP. It ROCKS!!!
Pros_Review: RSVP Feature
Cons_Review: Not the product, but I use to not have mobile data, was hard to keep up on wifi.

Overall_Review:
I'm a huge music fan, so finding a software that I can purchase tickets and view upcoming events is such a cool, unique product. Almost every time I purchase tickets for one concert, I usually end up buying tickets for another show as well. 

I also love being able to connect with other people who enjoy the same music as me. The potential to go to a concert alone and meet new people is incredible and unlike any other application I've experienced.
Pros_Review:
Networking opportunities
Upcoming events features
Interest associations
Cons_Review: Ticket selection is glitchy sometimes

Pros_Review: Super easy way to find and acquire tickets for local events. I use it for music events all the time as well as comedy and food events. Easy to purchase and have the ticket with quick access to Apple wallet.
Cons_Review: Doesn't include all the events I go to - expand more! There are a lot of concert venues in the area that do not use Eventbrite yet. They should partner with more venues because I love the ease of use.

Overall_Review: My experience was positive, I was able to get reports I needed, was helpful in making up nametags and getting the event ready.
Pros_Review: I used this at my last job. We had quite a few events throughout the year and this was an easy way to track RSVP's and payments.
Cons_Review: That it was another software product outside of our system that we had to process and move those items into our customer management database.

Overall_Review: I use this for my company's events and it provides a simple inexpensive way to manage them. The best part is how easy you can manage returns
Pros_Review: I liked how easily you can create events with no background knowledge. It  makes it easy to reach customers or potential customers and inform them. It also integrates with other tools too!
Cons_Review: It can be a little overwhelming trying to integrate certain tools

Overall_Review: Quick and easy event registration tool that meets my needs for online events.
Pros_Review: I liked how easy it is to set up the page and how it integrates smoothly with Zoom. Due to current circumstances and having to do more online events, this is a great tool for coordinating registrations.
Cons_Review: While the landing page is customizable, I would to see more options available in the free event option.

Overall_Review: Amazing! I have the option to either print my tickets at home instead of the app not like other sites. It always sends me notifications when my event is getting closer to the event because I tend to forget.
Pros_Review: Able to see events that are in my area and always gives me good recommendations similar to my interest.
Cons_Review: Well happened to me once...my tickets weren't showing up in the application but when I checked my computer they were their.

Overall_Review: The benefit of Eventrite is that it can be used as a funraiser for the event where you can link your paypal or other methods of payment for the event.
Pros_Review: In using this software to promote an event to the public that displays across the internet is good. The pictures you can upload with graphics is great.
Cons_Review: The tutorial has a lot of information to help you. If you are not computer illiterate it can be challenging.

Overall_Review: It's a terrific site for anybody who needs to quickly set up an event and get it online. Analytics are helpful to see where your traffic is coming  from, too. Very happy user.
Pros_Review: For a neophyte like me, this is a VERY easy to use program. I like that I can easily copy/edit my old events to create current ones. Refunds and payout have been simple and straight-forward and it has good communication functions.
Cons_Review: The fee seems very high, although I've tried other programs with a slightly lower ticket fee and they just aren't worth the effort so I came back to Eventbrite.
reasons_choosing: See above

Pros_Review: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE Eventbrite!!! Every time I post an event on Eventbrite my events are shared with a broader audience than I would never have access to organically. I have increased revenue by sharing my events on Eventbrite. I also like the support Eventbrite provides to the users to help make events even more visible. Also, if you have a Facebook account, it also gives the option to create an event on Facebook which also is an amazing marketing tool.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite has been a gamechanger for my business. I have no Cons.

Pros_Review: It allows me to plann, modify and follow all the event we have. Neve miss an event.
Cons_Review: It allows me to do all my planning with it. For this moment, I like it.

Pros_Review: Allows me to see what is happening in the local area to see if I would be interested to attend.
Cons_Review: It would be great to have some events to have videos to preview of what to expect at the event. Some photos posted in link to the post are the same as when attending the event. And I feel disappointed. Easy to filter out events but results are sometimes off.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite has been more than exceptional and I've recomended  it to friends and colleagues.
Pros_Review: What I like best about Evntbrite is that after you've registered an account with them, it takes 1-2 clicks to purchase tickets or RSVP to events all around your city. It's so easy and fast that it's a no brainer.
Cons_Review: At this point in time, I don't have anything negative to say about Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: I have created events for work related things happening in the city.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is the best option for creating pages for events. The publicly viewable pages make it easy to share and promote the events- and allow for ticketing and attendance tracking. Excellent service.
Cons_Review: I think Eventbrite should have some sort of video playlist option for events, so you can make Video a part of your event page.

Overall_Review: I'm more active in my community due to the events on eventbrite. I've even started thinking of using it for my own events.
Pros_Review: I like that it not only keeps track of my events and suggests new ones, but I also like the new feature of following favorite people. I like that it saves my tickets and makes it easy for me to search for new events.
Cons_Review: It would be great if you could link more than one email under the same profile. Sometimes, you have business and sometimes personal, but it would be great if you could have all your tickets in the same place.

Pros_Review: I really enjoy that Eventbrite is really easy to access and use. I can buy a ticket to an event and then immediately upload it to my Apple wallet. Being able to access tickets through my phone makes it so much more convenient than looking for my tickets in an email or keeping a paper copy.
Cons_Review: The search function is not always easy to use. If I am attempting to search for events there is no way to filter by genre if I am looking for music events--this is possible with other event websites and apps that I have used.

Pros_Review: Can filter events by categories and all information is available under one platform
Cons_Review: The events don't appear in any chronological order so can get difficult to find the most recent upcoming event

Overall_Review: Overall a very solid app and seems like it would be cost effective to those hosting even for free events.
Pros_Review: Ease of use with mobile ticketing is great feature. Although personally I'm old school, this does come in handy! Fees don't seem exorbitant on here, which is always appreciated.
Cons_Review: I have had a little bit of difficulty finding events in the app - maybe due to the way their search feature is programmed.

Pros_Review: I really like how straightforward Eventbrite is. I also prefer using Eventbrite because a lot of people already have accounts through them, so it's easier to get people to attend your event or find your event when browsing the site. There's a feature that allows you to print a nametag for everyone attending which has come in handy at Career Fairs.
Cons_Review: There really isn't a whole lot of customizing available. There's just the one, or maybe two, templates available so complete branding is not offered. This also goes for the emails as well.

Pros_Review: The refund policy offered to customers is by far the best part of using Eventbrite!
Cons_Review: I do not like that I need a seperate app to use Eventbrite in business, and one for leisure.

Overall_Review: Overall i will continue to use it because i know what I'm getting
Pros_Review: It's reliable and predictable. Every month i have an event my customers know what to expect. It barely takes me 10 minutes to input my event info. And when it's tome to cash out my funds that is easy as pie
Cons_Review: Of course the biggest complaint is the service fee but I've learned to adjust my ticket prices to make my full profit

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an easy and efficient way to invite and track guests for any function.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is completely user friendly on both ends from the sender to the end user.
Cons_Review: There is absolutely nothing I do not like about using this platform.

Overall_Review: Can't beat it for the price & functionality. Also works well in countries outside the US / Europe unlike a lot of systems.
Pros_Review: If you mostly use it for free events (like us) - it's completely free. All the main functionality is available in their free tier - very impressive.
Cons_Review: Honestly - it's very good. Maybe it'd be nice to have some different designs for the event landing pages but the stock one works pretty well.

Pros_Review: Great app for storing event tickets to have at the tip of your fingers.  Love the ease of use and searching tools for events near you!
Cons_Review: I have used this app a handful of times and have not had any issues or problems.

Pros_Review: This software allows you to quickly create invitations to events. There is a minimum learning curve and suitable templates are available. I found this useful in a pinch.
Cons_Review: The con I have regarding this software actually deals with their marketing. The marketing is a bit intrusive and become annoying. Outside of that it is a pretty good resource.

Pros_Review: Using it as a mobile app is a lifesaver.  I can't stand having to keep up with paper tickets, and this allows me to keep them quickly accessible on my phone.
Cons_Review: As with most mobile apps, i just get a bit paranoid that my ticket info will be lost after i open it once.  I would like a confirmation somewhere stating that the info will not be lost until scanned at admission.

Pros_Review: We hosted our first summit with over 100 clients last year and when I was looking for a software to use for ticketing, I evaluated a few and chose eventbrite. They made the process of creating and selling tickets extremely simple and I loved the many features they have for event management and analysis.
Cons_Review: The mobile app isn't as great as I wish it was.

Pros_Review: I've worked for nonprofits, marketing companies, and co-work spaces who all use Eventbrite. It's a must use if you are going to accurately track your data and visitors for your events.
Cons_Review: I'm not sure what else the platform does besides RSVPs. I'm guessing they have other functionalities to help event planners or a similar role, but I've never used the platform for anything else.

Overall_Review: All in all it's good when you need it and doesn't seem to have too many troubles. Only drawback is you'll need multiple of the same type of app as there are other players in the space
Pros_Review: It does not take a long time to load the app and there are no issues between the web/mobile experience.
Cons_Review: The only con would be that I don't use it that often. There are other services offering similar products so it isn't used with all events.

Pros_Review: Pretty straight forward when using Eventbrite, all you do is search for an event you are interested in and buy the tickets on the website.  Tickets are downloaded instantly, you can print them out or have the e-tickets on your phone to be scanned.
Cons_Review: Maybe broaden the different type of events, include smaller events that may be more local.  Also, i don't like the processing fee.

Pros_Review: I'm a huge fan of Eventbrite as iit's helped me find numerous events that tI'm interested in. I like thtat the site is so easy to use and the multiple filter options are helpful to narrow down the exact event I'm looking for, whether it's a professional conference, a networking event or a happy hour.
Cons_Review: I would like to see better event recommendations based on user history.

Overall_Review: It has everything you need to pull off an event and manage the event participants. Definitely the tried and true event technology!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is probably the best player in the events space because it's user-friendly and it has all the capabilities you need to pull off a great event and notify people. It tracks registrants and disseminates the information about the event efficiently.
Cons_Review: It's a little clunky and old-fashioned-- the UI could use an update and it can sometimes be complicated to register. Minor things like having to scroll for a long time to select a drop-down option.

Overall_Review: I would recommend Eventbrite, it's easy to set up and, it help gives you a little credibility if you're a newbie.
Pros_Review:
Simple instructions and  self explanatory 
Easy access to promote on social media
Cons_Review: There is a fee if you use Eventbrite to process your payments,  but it's a minimal fee.

Pros_Review: The BEST software for accepting reservations for any sort of event or program. It's easy to use and very user friendly, the form is very easy to customize so you can ask any sort of question while accepting RSVPs. It's so helpful to collect info on your clients that way.
Cons_Review: No cons - it's a great product and really easy to use for the administrator and the users.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use.  Clean user interface.
Cons_Review: It helped to keep track of potential head count coming for an event.

Pros_Review: Using this app have been great, I travel a lot for Carnivals and would normally buy a wide number of event tickets either online or physical and have lost a few in the past. This app helps me keep them all in one place and on a digital forum.
Cons_Review: Sometimes I find it hard to find the tickets that I have bought when at the events due to not having wifi and my saved option is something unaccessible.

Pros_Review: I can't say enough good things about this software.  Ease of use #1!  I will always use this software for event purposes.  No one ever has a question b/c it's that easy!
Cons_Review: No negative feedback on EventBrite!  Will be using this again in the near future!

Pros_Review: The speed of the notices  when an event registration is submitted
Cons_Review: Nothing!Love this program. Very easy to use.

Pros_Review: Easy to create event invitations, track RSVPs, multiple service options and price is based on the cost of the event. If the event is free, then you can create the invitation for free. There's a percentage taken by Eventbrite as well as a fee per ticket for paid events.
Cons_Review: Could use more modern updates for free events. The percentage and fee combination seems a bit high. The company should charge one or the other.

Pros_Review: We are a small real estate teams that offer client appreciation events to our clients that are free! This is a great program to keep track of who's coming and be able to keep the attendees up to date on the event (you can send out emails to the attendees)
Cons_Review: If you plan on charging for the event, eventbrite charges you to use their service. Luckily we only have free events with our company.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great easy way to send invites
Cons_Review: Eventbrite sometimes ends up in spam mail

Pros_Review: I love how you can add so many plug-ins to the product that make an event organizer's life so much easier. It's a very easy to understand and manipulate product as well.
Cons_Review: I feel like the ticketing options could be slightly better than what they are.

Overall_Review: As overall I like this service, it makes my event management (people, tickets...) very comfortable.
Pros_Review: I used many event websites, but Evenrtbride is by far the most useful. In several years I use only it, this is really easy, free or paid events - very convenient UI.
Cons_Review: The least is... UI in mobile... Sometimes it is just horrible, not loaded assets or smth else - but you can not use website normally. Very rarely, but always in important moment.

Overall_Review: For us it's a one stop shop for event registration and planning.  Feature rich and flexible.  Frees us up so we can use limited time for event planning and execution.  A very nice product.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, efficient, accurate, allows us to concentrate on the event without worrying about providing information to attendees.  Flexible & intuitive for attendees to register.
Cons_Review: Took us a bit to get used to it but that may have been more our fault than the software.

Pros_Review:
Easy to use and set up.

Trusted site for ticket purchase that people know and willingly use.

Easy way to get online ticketing set up.
Cons_Review: I feel that the fee's per ticket are higher than I would like but also understand Eventbrite is a business.

Pros_Review: I enjoyed how easy and safe it is to purchase event tickets from Eventbrite. Also, information about the event is easy to find and navigate in the app.
Cons_Review: I can honestly say that I have not experienced any negative experiences using this software.

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite beats any competition by its simplicity of use. Within minutes anyone can set up an event page with a range of useful features that can help you manage an attendee list, promote it and keep attendees updated with important information or changes.

Particularly useful is how this syncs with Apple Wallet so you can check people's invites quickly upon entry with little effort from the customer required.
Cons_Review: Sometimes there is duplication of tickets and its not clear if customers need to down load a ticket or just use an email as confirmation.

Overall_Review: Excellent resource for promoting your important events and causes. Thank you!
Pros_Review: I have been using Eventbrite for many years for both adoption and orphan care events, as well as for orchestra events. It is a very positive resource for getting the word out promotionally and successfully. I love this program!
Cons_Review: n.a - I love Eventbrite. I don't see any real cons with this important tool for promoting events most successfully.

Pros_Review: In addition to advertising on MeetUp, we utilize Eventbrite for recruiting non employees to our user studies, promotional events and select happy hours.  The tool is affordable, and fees can be passed directly to ticket purchasers.  Indexing optimal--making our events easily discoverable across both Google and Facebook.  Analytics tools are intuitive and useful for measuring our growth and success.
Cons_Review: Increased visual customization would be appreciated.  Currently, pages have the same general look and feel, limiting the ability to further stand out.  As tickets prices get more expensive, the fees are higher--making this less attractive for expensive conferences.  Customer service is still in very elementary stages.

Pros_Review: Easy tool to plan event, especially one for many people requiring tickets and a strict ticket procurement time
Cons_Review: Have heard feedback from guests that it has timed out during busy times via their mobile browser.

Pros_Review: I love this software and use it almost weekly to sign up for events. My favorite function is the tag function that allows me to filter out events I'd like to see.
Cons_Review: I wish the search function were better.

Pros_Review: I like that it offers an options to use the QR code option for tickets versus the traditional printouts.
Cons_Review: I don't like that they charge a fee to use the services. Sometimes they charge the consumer and other times they charge the event host.

Overall_Review: Overall I was quite impressed with the ease of the program. We will be using it again this year at even smaller events. Very affordable and delivers as promised.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite made planning my annual sales conference a dream. I discovered it last year while planning our awards ceremony and banquet. I had looked into other products, but Eventbrite was by far the most cost effective for our needs. Eventbrite made meal planning, accommodations, and even printing nametags as easy as possible. We recevied praise from our end-users and they too found it easy to use. We will be using it again this year for more event planning.
Cons_Review: I did find a few navigations combersome at first, but the support team was great at helping me learn the program.

Overall_Review: By using Eventbrite I save a lot of time and I am able to track responses.  Anytime I have an event I can check the day off and  I can have an accurate headcount.
Pros_Review: I like that it is simple and clean.   I have used other apps that  are not so very user friendly and I love this one. When you are creating an event you can basically do so in less than 5 minutes.
Cons_Review: To be honest with you I do not have any complaints. Like I said... it is simple and clean.

Overall_Review: It is easy for us to arrange events that otherwise would be time consuming for our project coordinators to manage.
Pros_Review: I love that it allows us to create alumni events and then sell tickets easily
Cons_Review: Fees are a little bit steep in my opinion. Especially if you chose the base option!

Overall_Review: I like it and I will keep using it.
Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite to promote my alpaca farm open houses. I can see how many people booked "tickets" even though no actual ticket is required for attendance. The ticket adds value to my free event.
Cons_Review: I'm not sure if this reaches my rural area as well as some other advertising avenues, such as Facebook, where I can target demographics very specifically.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great tool to get any events being held out to the public. It offers a wide variety of details where you can post as much (or as minimal) about the event as you'd like, post images, etc. Extremely easy to use and sharing to social sites is incredibly easy.
Cons_Review: Not too many that I could think of. What I use it for, it's perfect. It functions from a business and consumer perspective.

Overall_Review: I love using Eventbright and recommend it for any event scheduling.
Pros_Review: Eventbright makes it easy to create and share events with your audience. It also makes it easy to RSVP for events and use your mobile device to show your event tickets.
Cons_Review: Although Eventbright makes it easy to obtain tickets and share events it would be great to have the ability to store tickets in Apple Pay. There are not many cons as I love using this tool.

Pros_Review: Easily promote your event and sell tickets. People in your area can also see your social media feeds when you connect them to Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Their cut is excessive and you have to wait until after the event to receive your money. Not helpful for some events.

Overall_Review: Although I create event on FB, Eventbrite is a trusted site to collect payments.
Pros_Review: I love the fact that I can just about any event I'm looking for as well as plan my own events and keep count of who is attending. I also love the fact that I can payout my money to PayPal instead of waiting until the event ends.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I least like about EventBrite. Eventbrite is the only software I use to create online events.

Pros_Review: It is easy to use and stores and hold information. We used this for race registration for athletic events such as our spring dash which is a 5 K race.
Cons_Review: It give the user and option to create a profile. If they don't create a profile then data is not stored.

Overall_Review: great for events
Pros_Review: I like that updates come to your phone and email. you also get reminders about your event and can see who is attending
Cons_Review: i do not have any cons.  I have never had a poor or bad experience using this software. not sure how anyone could

Pros_Review: I really like Eventbrite because it is simple and easy to use.  Help me with posting  and sending invites.
Cons_Review: At times it can be difficult to add list of contacts or update contacts since it doesn't link up with other sites

Pros_Review:
Easy setup of events- and attendees registration.
The tool allows you to send the invitations, check on bounces, and review who has clicked & RSVP'd.
You're able to manage waitlists, multiple ticket types, reimbursements, and custom order forms, all through the application.
Cons_Review:
Eventbrite should connect better with third-party integrations (i.e. Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.) rather than its own website.
Sometimes it can be difficult to get in contact with support which causes delays in having issues resolved.
It would be great if the analytics were more robust and expansive!

Overall_Review: Easy company to use for tickets (buying from or selling on).
Pros_Review: From a user point of view, it's very easy to buy, schedule, and redeem a ticket for an event. From a company standpoint, setting it up is also easy and they track your tickets and can handle all transactions. (But you do have to pay a fee)
Cons_Review: Although this works great for paid events, it can get pricey when you are doing a smaller free event, as the fees can really add up.

Overall_Review: Great product and continues to become more user friendly.
Pros_Review: The integration with Facebook.
Cons_Review: Can become confusing with regards to promotions.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite helps connect events with the people who want to go to them. It's really well integrated into social, email and ticket companies. I use it regularly for my events.
Pros_Review: I really like how integrated it is into the other programs i need
Cons_Review: I would like the interface to be a little bit more intuitive. One thing i have never been able to figure out is how to do different amount of tickets for different days. This is an essential feature and I feel like it should be super easy to do.

Overall_Review: When on the move and exploring new music, Event Brite has made it easy to check into events, shows and more. It's great that unlike many of their peers, they don't overload you with spam mail after you've signed up. I find that I prefer events that use Event Brite over other programs for ticket check in.
Pros_Review: No Spam, works flawlessly.

Overall_Review: I like Eventbrite but I fear they will be outdone in the marketplace.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use and is popular with many of the trade shows that I go to. Simple feature selection.
Cons_Review: Interface is easy but not that much of a value add to the events that people can register for. They need to update things.

Overall_Review: Overall my experience with eventbright  is positive. It works well for managing registrations and reaching different audiences.
Pros_Review: This software was easy to use when scheduling camps and classes. It was able to handle multiple registrations at a time.
Cons_Review: The service fees were the least favorite part of this software. It would have been better if there were more options available.

Overall_Review: We mostly use it for registering attendees for big, on-campus events. I've used it for tickets to live performances and conferences.
Pros_Review: I very much appreciated the Eventbrite app when I went to a conference last year. It broke down the events within the conference and their locationsall in one place. It syncs to your calendar, too. Very convenient. It also alerts you on upcoming events at your favorite venues.
Cons_Review: It can be a little buggy. It's currently locking me into its notification center and not letting me back out.

Overall_Review: Easy to registrate and order tickets. Share also the links with others.
Pros_Review: It's easy to buy the tickets with eventbrite. You can buy not only for yourself and also you get an email about the event information, reminder notifications.
Cons_Review: The UI of the software is not that good. Could be improved, sometimes I couldn't find the info about my events. The logo is also confusing.

Overall_Review: Overall, it has been a great experience using Eventbrite for the events we host in the company. Easy for our guests and clients to register. Easy to collect payments for ticket sales. We are pretty happy with the software.
Pros_Review: The ability to create events and share them is the best part. It is really easy and simple to get an event up and promote your event. Ticket transactions are an easy for customers.
Cons_Review: We didn't have any issues using Eventbrite. The process was simple and easy to create an event. Easy to share events and have people register.

Overall_Review: Experience was good and, when I did not cross up details, it worked flawlessly.
Pros_Review: Easy to use and create events.  No charge for events that are free admission.  Good user interface allowing people to sign up for events
Cons_Review: Wish a detailed attendee list was easier to generate.  Also wish manual attendee entry was a little easier.

Overall_Review: I have used this software for more than a dozen events personally, and receive these from lots of friends.  Very nice.
Pros_Review: Professional, smooth looking presentation to their event notices.  Will make even the smallest event seem like it is put on by pros.
Cons_Review: No issues with the software, very simple / affordable and intuitive.  I've not run into anything I can blame on the software.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite made it easy to purchase tickets, and attend an event. It gives all the event info and is very user friendly.
Cons_Review: This is hard to incorporate to a business level , its great for personal use.

Overall_Review: Overall my experience has been so/so. It serves its purpose but not without a handful of issues.
Pros_Review: I like how easy to use it can be. Very easy to read through and click through the form info when purchasing tickets.
Cons_Review: I tend to run into quite a few technical difficulties when trying to purchase from Eventbrite. It can also be quite difficult to find/use the tickets after purchasing.

Overall_Review: The main benefit I get with Eventbrite is expressed in a single word: organization. It's a must-have tool in mind when you need to have perfect logistic for the events that you organize.
Pros_Review: The most impactful feature of this tool is the ability to coordinate big events with a single app, making it easy to find everything in a single place (invitations, assistance, other events, schedule and more)
Cons_Review: The only con I have about this tool is the old-fashioned design it has. I think there's room for improvement in order to captivate users.

Pros_Review: I really love how Eventbrite keeps me updated on not only my favorite musicians and comedians coming to my city, but also on local art events and food festivals. Eventbrite is an easy app to buy tickets through and it even lets you know about volunteer opportunities in your area.
Cons_Review: I wish Eventbrite integrated with Google calendar better.

Overall_Review: It's been really good generally. I would definitely recommend Eventbrite to anyone hosting an event.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes ticketing for events really really simple. It has simplified the process of getting e-tickets for any event.
Cons_Review: sometimes synchronization with calendars isn't as smooth as it should be. I've almost forgotten an event before because it didn't sync with my calendar.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is a good product. It does what it is intended to do. It can be a bit clunky for users.
Pros_Review: I use this product both professionally and personally. I enjoy the ease of setting up an event and getting metrics of who has registered.
Cons_Review: My only con is as a personal user. It can be confusing when adding items to the cart. I would like a more user friendly application.

Overall_Review: It has helped our organization with our efficiency in event registration and management. What a great tool!
Pros_Review: It transformed the way we do events, mainly the free ones. We used Planning Center Registrations before and it was too complicated. It takes almost no time to scan each attendee into your event, which helps attendees and event workers.
Cons_Review: I wish the waitlist feature was better. It's hard when the sales are closed to release tickets to the first people on your waitlist without the risk of new attendees registering.

Overall_Review: Like I said before it's very easy to use easy to create an event and send Evite so guest can RSVP and even add comments
Pros_Review: I have used it on Several occasions to get tickets and never had an issue or any glitches. I've also gotten Evites for parties and was extremely easy to RSVP
Cons_Review: So far I have not had any issues with this software. It runs smoothly. No complaints to be had thus far

Overall_Review: Overall, I have enjoyed discovering events around my city for networking, professional development, and entertainment!
Pros_Review: This has become a site that I visit regularly to see what types of events are happening in my city.
Cons_Review: I just hope that more and more businesses start to add events to the site so that it becomes even more of a hub.

Pros_Review: The best thing about this tool is sending and receiving email cards.  It is a great way to track who has accepted/ declined an invitation and update your community.
Cons_Review: I don't have any strongly opinionated cos for this product. Sometimes their marketing emails are hard to differentiate from an invite that someone you know might have sent.

Overall_Review: The current standard in event organization is still really great.
Pros_Review: Creating, running, tweaking, and inviting people to an event is very easy and intuitive with this software. Does everything you would need it to without overloading with details. Also great that so many people are familiar with it at this point, keeps customer questions down. Also very easy to check people in for the event.
Cons_Review: The only real downside is I think the fees for tickets are a bit on the high side for what is being provided.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is great!  I use it to look up and get tickets to events in my area that I may not have found out about without Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: I really like that its make buy tickets so easy.  A lot of local event near me use Eventbrite to sell tickets and its nice that once I buy them they are stored right on the app.  You have the option to print them but its so much easier having the ticket right on your phone.
Cons_Review: I don't love that there are fees involved when purchasing tickets.  Its a small fee but I still wish it weren't there.

Pros_Review: The simplicity/ease of use is my favorite thing about Eventbrite. Getting people to attend events is normally a challenge but is made much easier with Eventbrite. Not only that but it is so easy for people to get a sense of what the event is and register/buy tickets.
Cons_Review: I have thought deeply about this and have nothing bad to say about Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: I like this website and the Eventbrite app. I would recommend it to other businesses.
Pros_Review: I have used this software to purchase, RSVP, and show my ticket for events. My school uses this software to RSVP to free events. I used it to buy tickets to an event in Chicago. I also used it to buy tickets to a concert in Chicago. The ticket is sent to my email and is easy to pull up. It makes purchasing and attending events fasters and has become very popular for venues to use.
Cons_Review: I cannot see who is attending the event or more information on the event. For example, Facebook events you can see who is attending. Another ticketing website you can see how many tickets are left.

Pros_Review: Its nice to have a platform that you can utilize to push your events
Cons_Review:
The constant emails of  did you do this... did you do that... 
sometimes it would be nice to be just left alone

Overall_Review: Eventbrite keeps all your event organizing information in one place. Processing payment, keeping tally of spots reserved, event description, any information the customer needs, etc.
Pros_Review:
I love that you can do anything you need to on your phone.
I also love that customers seem to have ease of use with it. I rarely have to walk anyone through buying or reserving a ticket.
Cons_Review:
I haven't had any complaints in two years.
It's only gotten easier to use. Some people don't find using the mobile ticket very intuitive, but that's easy to walk people through.

Pros_Review:
Easy to use
Integrates with Mailchimp and Constant Contact
Easy to manage RSVPs
Follows up with RSVPs to ensure that they attend
Sends a thank you follow-up email to RSVPs
Easy to check in attendees (as long as you have wifi)
Cons_Review:
Page design is templated and will not allow much customization
Some of the fields are difficult to navigate

Pros_Review: This is extremely helpful software to keep track of who is attending events in a centralized way. We use it for a few volunteer community groups and is quite straightforward and easy to use.
Cons_Review: Nothing really--this is great software and easy to use with any device (and any browser! this is a huge plus for using with community-based events)

Pros_Review: The small college i work for regularly uses eventbrite for on and off campus events, allowing the easy production of tickets and attendance tracking. This has allowed a much more professional and organized approach to community events.
Cons_Review: I would like to see greater customization available in emails sent to event attendees - they tend to be pretty bland.

Pros_Review: I liked that I could easily search and register for interesting events around my location. It even throws up event suggestions based on my previous searches. The interface is so ease to navigate. Also, you can easily sell tickets on eventbrite and also easily keep tabs on attendees for your event.
Cons_Review: None yet. So far I have had no negative experience

Pros_Review: Really simple to use - just create the event, add the details, offer tickets and publish.
Cons_Review: People have to create an account to buy tickets which may put some people off. Not a big deal to me though.

Pros_Review: I like that this software allows me to sign up for events with multiple organizations without creating a bunch of accounts.
Cons_Review: I have had no issues with this software to this point.

Pros_Review: This software makes buying tickets extremely stress free. You can easily see where your seats will be and the prices are clear from the very beginning.
Cons_Review: The only thing I do not like is not having a physical copy of the ticket in case technology was to ever fail. I am sure these can be printed out, I am just used to always having a physical ticket in my hand

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a an absolutely great software to host events on and I love using it.
Cons_Review: I don't have any negative things to say about Eventbrite and I would recommend to anyone looking to promote an event.

Pros_Review: While I would not use this software to arrange a gathering with family or friends, Eventbrite is an awesome solution for company events, large venues, etc. Eventbrite handles all ticketing efficiently, quickly, and simply. It is very clear and tickets are sent almost immediately. Eventbrite is able to handle large guest lists, as well as provides hosting for the event description, which are very powerful features in my opinion.
Cons_Review: No cons, software does exactly what it is supposed to do.

Overall_Review: We used it for two years for political advocacy. It worked very well as an event organizer - no complaints really. However it was not a full solution, you still have to share/link etc the Eventbrite entry to make sure it gets circulated. However, once people are pointed to it, it's ok.
Pros_Review:
Very clean interface
Lets you design your event (pic + by-line) easily
Handles ticketing (actual $$ or implied)
Makes local connections based on your locale.
Google maps
Cons_Review:
Not a turn key solution. You probably will not rely on Eventbrite's networking only.
So integrations still needed.

Overall_Review: I would prefer if there was a quick option to get your tickets rather than the long and sometimes confusing process
Pros_Review: You can see and access tickets to events in your area
Cons_Review: There are alot of steps to get your tickets

Pros_Review: This was a really nice way of handling tickets as a consumer. I hate using paper tickets anymore!
Cons_Review: The iPhone version has some glitchiness to it, I doubt it's using real Apple technology. Sometimes I hate even using it to look up events because of it. Also because of this when I switched over to a new phone I didn't even install it until I had to.

Overall_Review: We've used them for quite a few work events and really like the software.
Pros_Review: I like that you're able to cap off the amount of tickets you'd like to offer.
Cons_Review: I really don't have any complaints with Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: I'm only an end user for Eventbrite - but I have used it many times to subscribe to various events, paid and free and it's always been amazing.  Even when getting registrations for Defcon talks, Eventbrite did not choke when thousands of users were trying to get limited tickets to specific talks.
Cons_Review: It can feel a little clumsy sometimes, but in general it's quite good.

Pros_Review: Use eventbrite to find interesting events going on in the city. I like that I can search by either date or category. Easy to use and tickets emailed to you.
Cons_Review: Maybe I have not been able to set it up correctly but there are often times when I miss an event because there I got tickets early and then forgot about the event. Wish there was a way to set up reminders.

Overall_Review: We had no way to sell tickets in a secure manner on our website. This has provided a great outlet for our events in which tickets are necessary.
Pros_Review: Love that you have options for seating and pricing for your event, and you can totally customize each time!
Cons_Review: Having it take them to a different link - instead of being able to insert software into our website. But it's easy enough to have the link available.

Pros_Review: I used Event Brite for a large event. It's very user friendly and I love the immediate response when someone replies with an RSVP. It was very easy to plan and coordinate the event.
Cons_Review: I wouldn't change anything about Event Brite.

Overall_Review: I like Evite and I can't think of another big competitor out there
Pros_Review: Pretty much every company I've worked for used Evites and it's been easy to access the invite at any time and see who has RSVP'd and how many +1s are coming. Very user friendly it seems
Cons_Review: I honestly can't think of any cons regarding the platform. Maybe it'd be nice if they could add a video feature or add multiple photos to an invite?

Pros_Review:
I have used Eventbrite for my simple ticketed events. From here I can quickly organize and manage my event. For the tech savvy individuals, it easily intergrates with Mailchimp and Surveymonkey. For those who need it to be even simpler, you can still email any invitations or updates from the platform. 

For online payments: Eventbrite gives you a secure option and takes a small percentage of your ticket sales in return.
Cons_Review: I wish they had an "SOS" button. Events already hectic and stressful. It's becomes even worse when you have issues with your registrations system at the door. Thankfully I always have a printed back up list on hand when the system glitches.

Overall_Review: I use it alot for my professional association, for business events and even for personal use. It's also mobile friendly which is very helpful.
Pros_Review: I like the plug and play functionality of the software. There are no fields that are questionable on what to enter or not. It is easy to understand and fill in.
Cons_Review: There are alot of ads surrounding the tool and even pop ups that appear which can be irritating.

Pros_Review: So easy to use and create events! And I love that it integrates with social media platforms, so you aren't having to post events on several different platforms. You can also do paid events as well, which is nice that Eventbrite takes care of all of that. Also love that you can send out event reminders too!
Cons_Review: I haven't found anything I don't like about the software!

Pros_Review: It's amazing, it doesn't charge any money for free events and lets clients have their tickets for your event effortlessly. When I used it for a free event that my organization hosted it allowed us to organize the attendees using barcodes which was very praised by our organizating and logistics team.
Cons_Review: To be honest while using it I didn't encounter anything that I disliked about it

Pros_Review: I like using this software for big events and parties. I like that I customize it to my style and the style of the party or event.
Cons_Review: I did not like how some options seem limited while others seem overwhelming.

Pros_Review: I love that I don't have to go to a "box office" or anything to pay for event tickets. It's very convenient
Cons_Review: Sometimes the fees are annoying but I understand you have to have them since you're offering convenience

Pros_Review: The software is easy to use and I enjoy having access to tickets right on my phone.
Cons_Review: In order to sell tickets to another person it was a bit tricky to figure out at first. However, the issue was resolved fairly quickly.

Overall_Review: We have been able to organize fundraising and company events quickly an efficiently.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is like a market researcher, social media marketer and party planner all in one.
Cons_Review: I don't believe event reminders are sent after payment.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use and user-friendly, you can make an event posting with Eventbrite within mere minutes. The event pages look surprisingly professional and add a certain amount of legitimacy to events, compared to say conducting it by Facebook. EventBrite also makes RSVP-ing incredibly efficient, and is an example of modern innovation making our day-to-day lives a bit easier than in the past.
Cons_Review: EventBrite can feel limited when you're not a premium user, but that's to be expected with any tiered software. If you're looking to create a paid event, their fees can seem somewhat high as well. However, if you're coordinating public, free events, then EventBrite is perfect for you.

Overall_Review: Use Eventbrite for all of your upcoming events and save yourself the peace of mind knowing that you are in good hands.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it very easy and convinent to make an event for your next performance, book reading, etc. Making an event is very straight forward and you can set your own ticket prices. Buying through eventbrite is also safe, secure, and very easy for your customers.
Cons_Review: Obviously they take a cut of the ticket sales, but that's to be expected with a website like this! It's a minor thing to be honest. Any other website would do the same thing.

Overall_Review: I will be using this software for all of my special events moving forward
Pros_Review: I really like how I am able to do so many things with this software from keeping track of reservations to sending out marketing emails on the event. I also like how all lists can be converted into excel spreadsheets.
Cons_Review: So far I have not had any issues with this software.

Pros_Review: The ticket buying experience is very straight forward and easy. Also customer service is very easy to reach.
Cons_Review: The service fee is a little steep. This seems like an industry standard to charge a fee for each ticket but a way in which Eventbrite could really differentiate itself from other ticket vendors would be to charge one service fee per transaction, rather then per ticket. Just an idea.

Pros_Review: We've used this software to organize, setup events, and company parties. Very easy to use and effective.
Cons_Review: Just make sure you set the reminders correctly so it doesn't mail blast your people to much. It will happen if you don't.

Pros_Review: Great product, it is easy to use and if you have any issues they are quick to help you resolve to your satisfaction
Cons_Review: With this product, there are times it takes a while to get through to customer support for issues you have

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to promote local events. You can include all the when?, where?, who?, why? information in an easy to read summary. You can create different tiers of tickets for consumers to buy and it will email them the confirmation. You can then contact customers with further detail.
Cons_Review: The pricing structure varies and can get expensive if you didn't budget for that.

Pros_Review: The simplicity and ease of creating an event is incredible.  So professional looking without the complications.
Cons_Review: I thought my learning curve may complicate things, a lot of programs do.  I did not have that problem.

Overall_Review: I bought tickets for Event Brite's Cinco de Mayo bar crawl in Asbury Park back in May. It clearly stated on the tickets that there would be a person there to check you into the bar crawl until 7pm that day at the Asbury Ale House. I arrived at the Asbury Ale House at 6:30pm and there was no one there to check us in. We got no wrist bands and no sombreros or whatever we were supposed to receive. I asked the bar tenders and hostesses at the Ale House about it and they informed me that the person running the bar crawl left at 5pm! I couldn't believe it. So, I did my own bar crawl and lost money to a stupid company that didn't give me anything I paid for. Then to go further I filed a claim with my bank to get the money back because I emailed Event Brite and they didn't respond. Go figure. So, the bank gave me a temporary refund and I just got a letter in the mail today that says they are taking the money back because Event Brite basically said they won't give the refund. I will not recommend this company to anyone. I will never be using it again. Thanks for nothing, Event Brite.
Pros_Review: I can't say that there is anything I liked most about this.
Cons_Review: Not having an associate available til the time listed on the tickets.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has everything you need to organize events, sell tickets and manage the guest list.  It is user-friendly - it has an intuitive layout and an accompanying mobile app.  It takes care of the payment so you don't need to worry about that!
Cons_Review: I like everything about it, except the fees.  The fees can be passed onto the guests, but it can be a deterrent for the attendees.

Pros_Review: Easy to use interface (for free events especially), low fees, great tracking, and good data recordin system.
Cons_Review: When doing an event that requires tickets to pay for it gets a bit hairy. Customer service is hard to reach sometimes.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great software and makes organizing gatherings, parties, events much easier. It's great for keeping track of headcount and reserved seating, too.
Cons_Review: I love the software and think it is actually a leading app relative to its competitors. Would definitely recommend this product to someone looking for a ticketing app.

Pros_Review: Easy calendaring system.  message multiple groups (large groups) concurrently and make updates at any time.
Cons_Review: There's not anything I don't like about it - I've enjoyed using it and don't have any complaints to report.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use. With the different apps you can scan the QR codes of your guests very fast. Moreover, it is to my mind well designed. For me it is a must have when you organize an event.
Cons_Review: Indeed I cannot find what I like least about this software because it is straight to the point : organize your event and welcome fast your guests.

Pros_Review: Very simple to use for the end user when registering for an event.  Have used it for quiet a few IT conferences.
Cons_Review: Sometimes if the organizer sets it up different it can get confusing for the end user to actually follow.

Overall_Review: Good for purchasing tickets to concerts and events.
Pros_Review: Overall the program is easy to use, allows you to see upcoming concerts and events and sign up right through the site.
Cons_Review: There's a lot to actually getting your ticket. You sign up and pay, but normally a ticket is emailed right then. There's a lot of aftermath to getting your ticket via mobile. It's almost easier to just print your ticket.

Pros_Review: tickets for the event is right on your phone. don't have to use paper tickets. pulls up with a bad internet connection
Cons_Review: does not alert you if your event has been changed or canceled. mobile app is not the easiest to purchase tickets

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a clear go-to for my organization in the online registration realm. From large national conferences to small community trainings, Eventbrite gets the job done!
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is amazing for the most part, but if I had to list a con I would say it could have a few more features enabling greater control over the layout of pages.

Pros_Review: (1) Ease of browsing through upcoming local events (2) A one stop shop to buy tickets to the events you want to go to (3) Different filters available make it easy to search based on the preferences like kids event or cultural event
Cons_Review: I have not seen a way to sign up for a notification with respect to the event that I am interested to go to so that if any change happens i can be notified

Pros_Review: A great majority of events I attend use Eventbrite, and as a user I really like this. Simple to use and understand, and it helps that so many events use this so people are familar with the product.
Cons_Review: Sometimes there's a force to download the app, which when you're in line and just trying to show someone your ticket - you don't have time to do. So that's a very frustrating aspect.

Pros_Review: We initially were going to build our own event registration feature for two websites for upcoming events. The best decision we made was to use Eventbrite instead. It saved us a ton of development time and the reporting is very nice.
Cons_Review: I have not had a negative experience with Eventbrite to date. If something comes up I'll update this review but I don't see any reason that would happen.

Pros_Review: the ability to organise and track attendees on eventbrite makes organising events really simple and stress free.  designing the look and feel of an event invite was really simple and elegant in its execution.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite has recently transitioned to being a paid platform. this has seriously impacted the ability to justify using the platform when organising not for profit events. it is a real shame because it is such a great platform and we used to use it for every event. unfortunately we have had to transition to a different platform.

Pros_Review: This tool is awesome! I have used this many times to obtain tickets for a variety of events! Easy to navigate!
Cons_Review: As far as I can see, no cons at this time. The only thing I would add, is to add more events in my local area.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and set-up for managing small events and gatherings. Have used the free version a few times in recent years....
Cons_Review: Nothing bad to report as yet - some of the layout designs were very basic and could be improved in the future.

Overall_Review: This site is great for setting up a way for customers to come to an event and for coworkers to get the word out.

Pros_Review: It's a great product and it improves how we conduct business but a lot of the pitfalls of the software can outweigh the benefits at times.
Cons_Review: It's not super user friendly.  I had to go through a few days of training to feel proficient in the software.

Overall_Review: This product is so easy to use and makes our events better looking and easy for people to find and register. I use nothing else.
Pros_Review: Easy templates to create an event and then useful links to embed in in my email invitations or use their system.  Useful to see other events that I might be interested in as well.
Cons_Review: I love everything about this software.

Overall_Review: I only came herw for my free amazon gift card i never heard of you guys before so i dont have anything to say about you guys
Pros_Review: I dont know what is it that you do
Cons_Review: I dont. Have any

Overall_Review: I've used Eventbrite happily in the past. Now the site has radically downsized so there is very little control over appearance. For example, we used to register both attendees and sponsors. Now that's no longer possible. There is absolutely no support or contacts to assist. I've moved on
Pros_Review: Concise
Cons_Review: Very limited flexibility... no customer support whatsoever.

Overall_Review: It is a great app for organising all your events both online and onsite. We have been using it for over a year organising more than 20 internal and external events per month and it has proven to be a very productive and cost-effective app.
Pros_Review:
Ease of use
Price
Fast deployment
Cons_Review: Problems with the search in website integration

Overall_Review: Our current event will be our last with Eventbrite. Unfortunately, we can't move to another platform sooner. If we could we would.
Pros_Review: Until recently Eventbrite was satisfactory. Some limitations, but not bad. But see below.
Cons_Review: Since Covid-19 hit, Eventbrite has started holding 100% of the money it collects for you until 5 days after the event it over. Yes, you have that right, Eventbrite holds your money as if it were theirs. Worse, they justify it by saying it is for your own good.

Overall_Review: Overall I don't mind using Eventbrite when needed, but if I have a choice I usually prefer other event sites
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to get tickets for upcoming shows and concerts and search for events happening in my area that I might like to go to
Cons_Review: I dislike that you do not often get your tickets immediately and have to wait until right before the concert to receive them. I've also had an experience where a show was canceled and I never received a refund.

Overall_Review: Overall for events that I go to, it is easy to find and get the tickets.
Pros_Review: I like it that it is pretty easy to use. It is easy to respond to event invites. I haven't posted events myself though.
Cons_Review: I like it the least that you get emailed about other events that you haven't signed up for. I hope you can get off the mailing list.

Overall_Review: I liked the experience as I will try anything to grow my business and eventbrite is a well known website
Pros_Review: I like the reach of the product, it attracts a large audience and promotes my service in a way I cannot with other platforms
Cons_Review: The cost is a lot for a single business owner, unfortunately it did not reach my client base as broadly as I had hoped

Overall_Review: Overall I am satisfied and I would use it again. I suggest it
Pros_Review: It is very intuitive and easy to use. The registration process is seamless and confirmation emails work perfectly
Cons_Review: I tried t register to a very desired event and the service kind of crushed, due to the very high number of requests in a very narrow span of time.

Pros_Review: I like that we were able to use Eventbrite to sell tickets for our school events
Cons_Review: This biggest obstacle is convincing people to buy tickets with this software instead of in person.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been a great tool for our small events and we have had no issues with the software. It has been a secure and easy to use ticketing option.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a solid web-based ticketing and event promotion solution for small to medium sized events. Customer support is helpful and the software has many ticketing features such as the ability to see the status of a ticket or ticket order.
Cons_Review: We haven't had many major issues with the software. We sometimes hear from our guests that they are allowed to book duplicate orders with no warning from the software, but I don't necessarily look at this as a flaw as much as it would be an enhancement to combat user error.

Overall_Review: This solves the needs to still meetings and events that exists right now, but allowing folks to do that even though so many of those are discouraged or prohibited.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to get digital events set up. Right now, pretty much everything needs to digital, with in-person meetings heavily proscribed, so this is a major aid to that end.
Cons_Review: I think the biggest hurdle is getting used to the system so that you can create a digital event effectively. There is just a bit of a learning curve to use any new system.

Overall_Review: Overall i have had no problems using eventbrite and would keep using it for my event planning needs
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a highly functional, easy to use program that allows easy purchasing and distribution of digital tickets.
Cons_Review: There is a service fee that is cut by eventbrite, that may disassuade people to use the software to sell tickets

Overall_Review: Overall I think it's much better than having people respond in an email and having to track everything yourself.
Pros_Review: I like that this is something that everyone can easily respond to. It also collects the information on the RSVPs and organized them for you.  I get a higher response rate when sending this out versus just an email.
Cons_Review: Overall I like this. If I had to pick something it would be more control over who can see what as far as people attending/not attending. But that is being nitpicky.

Overall_Review: So far so good.   I'm able to set up the event so my organization can continue to function during COVID-19.
Pros_Review: During Covid-19, our organization need a tool for online registration.   Eventbright is simple to implement.   Just answer some basic question and you can create an online registration page for your organization within 5 minutes (provided that you have your event information ready).   The tool has sufficient options for free/paid events, photos, summary, detailed info, etc.
Cons_Review: There is a learning curve associated with the application.   You will need to set up the event via trial and error.   It will take some time, but it is intuitive.

Overall_Review: I enjoy using it and find it user friendly but the % of ticket sales cost is a lot
Pros_Review: I like that you don't have to pay for the platform and that you just pay a portion of the sales so there isn't many up front costs
Cons_Review: The customer service is very slow and not great, also the tax rules are not clear on how it is billed and 1099

Overall_Review: Overall I recommend Eventbright for your events whether they are paid for free.  It's great advertising.
Pros_Review: Eventbright is an excellent platform for setting up your events.  Whether they are paid or free it gives another level of advertising.
Cons_Review: Your event on Eventbright can be difficult to find your event if the proper keywords are not included.

Overall_Review: I love eventbrite and will continue using it as long as I can.
Pros_Review: I enjoy using eventbrite because it's easy to use, and I get an accurate account of how many folks are coming to our events.
Cons_Review: I don't like the fees, but I understand why they're there, plus free events are no cost. It's a fine product

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to attend various events in your community
Cons_Review: There is difficulty when trying to create events and determine how to share the event with others.

Overall_Review: I love Eventbrite. This is the only ticketing software I hopefully ever have to use.
Pros_Review: I love eventbrite. Eventbrite is a great software that allows you to easily publish tickets and notices for events that you are hosting. It is a simple and intuitive software that allows almost anyone to publish events. It has a great search feature and allows you to easily implement payment for tickets that you want to charge for.
Cons_Review: The only complaint I have with this software is it is too easy to list an event. Somebody could easily fake an event and have published tickets for it. I do think it is good to have accessibility but it could be used the wrong way.

Overall_Review: Flawless! Eventbrite is a good website to use for any purchase of tickets for any type of event!
Pros_Review: As a typical Millenial, drinks 5 to 10 dollar coffee on the daily, eating avocado toast, raving and partying on the weekend, I have used Eventbrite for mostly ALL my purchases from any music festival. This can range from any of the small raves to the biggest raves that everyone knows about EDC, Coachella, Beyond Wonderland etc. Eventbrite has been extremely user friendly and I have used them for all transactions!
Cons_Review: I have no had any issue with Eventbrite. I never had to do a return or whatnot on any of the tickets I have purchased from them.

Overall_Review: Overall the experience is okay. The fees make the product unworthy it especially with so many other options for promoting your event and accepting payments.
Pros_Review: It's easy to set up events and capture email addresses from attendees.
Cons_Review: The fees for using are entirely to high! I also don't like that the fees are sent to you via invoice after your event.

Overall_Review: My experience is awesome, the first time I used Eventbrite was for Gov's ball where I saw the return of Outkast.
Pros_Review: What I like most about Eventbrite is that if I am using the app, It means there is a good time about to come.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints about Eventbrite, easy to way to purchase and track tickets for dope events I am attending.

Overall_Review: My experience with this App has been easy and amazing, I have found some great events going on in my area.
Pros_Review: This is a great app to use, being that I am an author, and I'm always looking for book events where I can meet and greet readers.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything bad for me to say about this app because I love it. And would continue to use it.

Overall_Review: I use event brite for any type of event we are organizing
Pros_Review: I love the ease of use and personalisation features of eventbrite, it is very useful for organisation of events
Cons_Review: Untill now I havent met any negative features of event brite sometimes it would be nice to be able to implement a form

Overall_Review: Overall experience has been good. I love how easy it is to use
Pros_Review: What i liked most was how easy it is to use to create events and invite people to your events. also helpful in selling tickets
Cons_Review: I do not have anything negative to say about eventbrite. It has only been useful and very helpful with events

Pros_Review: Great for finding local events in new places and meeting new people with similar interest. Free to use and many events are also free as well.  Can find real estate seminars, night club events, book signings, party events, unique yoga classes and so many more experiences.
Cons_Review: I honestly can't think of any cons right now

Overall_Review: Eventbrite allows us to coordinate events with ease and never worry about overselling or underestimating turnout.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is incredibly robust in its offerings for coordinating events and managing available seats/tickets.
Cons_Review: Being a sort of blanket/catch-all for event scheduling, it often lacks options for some of the more specific needs f a given event.

Overall_Review: Overall, with a minor glitches my experience with Eventbrite has been very rewarding.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has such a great following in the community that even just adding my event to the page it doesn't require much advertising.
Cons_Review: When I have had issues with Eventbrite it wasnt very easy to solve . Customer service isn't great for time.

Overall_Review: I cant say I use this for business, but I used it for fun!!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to find what is going on in my area! I am always able to find an event last minute through here :)
Cons_Review: I wish it was more specific with searches in my area. It always sends me to locations that don't interest me even with my suggestions or previous clicks.

Overall_Review: Great site to find the relevent business event. Confirmation email will be emailed almost instantly. Hassle free as the e-ticket has the barcode for event admission.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: Once I get free tickets to a comedy show, it was great, and so easy. Simply sign up and e-tickets were in my email!
Pros_Review: I can get the latest schedules of any plays, musical, concerts or shows in my area and even find free events
Cons_Review: I haven't run across anything yet that I don't like about this product. I can't think of a thing I would change

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy way to sell tickets for any event and tickets can event be administered as free. I often find myself on the site just browsing local events so there is also an element of exposure that may be unexpected.
Cons_Review: The feel of the site has lagged behind the times before but it is pretty clean now.

Overall_Review: Organizing free events for a small group of people. It is more professional than using other Social Media platforms.
Pros_Review: One of the greatest platforms to organize an event! It is free for free tickets and a small fee for the paid ones.
Cons_Review: the fees are a bit expensive, but it is still manageable. Otherwise, I do not have any issues with it at all

Overall_Review: It was not that good. I had a couple of questions in the beginning and tried multiple times to contact customer service with and any response back from the company.  This plus the overprice fees and limited options made it a poor experience.
Pros_Review: It works and can be integrated with Facebook.
Cons_Review: This cost is prohibitive. The payment options are very limited. You do have multiple payment options but if you do not use there chosen option then many of the features do not work. They only have one payout method. Most of the other similar ticket management programs offer a lower price and more payment options and more payout options. The only advantage Eventbrite has is that the can interface with Facebook. However, of all the tickets we sold none came through Facebook.

Overall_Review: Great experience! Use it monthly.
Pros_Review: This software collects all events in a certain area that you can filter through to find what you are looking for. You can buy tickets through it. I would find our team outings through this software!
Cons_Review: Nothing. Easy to sort through and easy to buy through the website. No issues using it.

Overall_Review: I've used it for a number of different events, including via Facebook, and it has been a great tool/assist
Pros_Review: It is accessible, free, excellent for multiple organizations and types of events. Easy to use and update and share.
Cons_Review: Some of the features weren't intuitive or immediately understandable but it really doesn't take but a minute to get up to speed

Overall_Review: Overall, I feel like Eventbrite is helpful finding things to do
Pros_Review: I like how I can search up a specific time frame or dates that I want to do something and Eventbrite finds a variety of events going on based on those dates.  I also like the Calendar Sync so I can save the events that I purchased on my personal calendar on my phone.
Cons_Review: There's really nothing wrong with Eventbrite, except that the mobile app is limited in the things you can do with your booking compared to the desktop site.

Overall_Review: A great software for organizing medium to large size events and managing sales and guestlists.
Pros_Review: There are so many options when it comes to customizing your event, and integration with your own website makes it really great for connecting with a client-based. This software also has great custom form options and allows you to export rosters which I like in many different formats.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the software had delays in updating the public event page based off input from the backend. For instance, sometimes updating ticket prices could take up to 5 minutes or artwork could take an hour to update. I suspect this is the result of the stored cache.

Overall_Review: Eventbriteis easy to use. Whenever I am going to an event my confirmation is in the app.
Pros_Review: The thing I like most about this software is that it is easy to use. Whenever I am going to an event my confirmation is in the app.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the event you have a reservation for does not show up right away or can be difficult to find.

Overall_Review: Way better way to sign up for events and see how many people are planning on attending.
Pros_Review: Signing up for an event is like getting a "ticket" to the event. So, I can print or show it on my phone if necessary. The thing I like most is it sends event reminders by email. I would forget I signed up if not for these. You can also see how many spots are left and have a waitlist.
Cons_Review: The only things I don't like are you have to choose to add an email meeting. It would be cool if this were automatic.

Overall_Review: I find this website extremely easy to use. They make a good product.
Pros_Review: With EventBrite out there, I can't imagine using anything else for an event. It is so easy. It's ubiquitous. Customizable--pictures, etc. Great tool.
Cons_Review: I can't think of any negative. The interface is nice. It is well designed. Plus, you can do free or ticketed events.
