Pros_Review: We have used Eventbrite for many to years sell tickets to many of our events in including fundraising dinners.  I like the software as it is user-friendly and the reporting makes it easy to track ticket sales.
Cons_Review: The cost of selling tickets is high.  There is platform usage fee as well credit card fees.

Overall_Review: Have used thsi for multiple events -- free events and fe events. Flexible to adjut and change many details mid-way through an event. Accessing reports assists in registration at the event.
Pros_Review: EventBrite is relatively easy to use, and reduces the labor of guest registration & payment
Cons_Review: Payment fees. But I understand they gotta make money somehow.
reasons_choosing: see above

Pros_Review: Nice app to quickly promote an event. It makes easy to load content and pictures
Cons_Review: It is quite good, I don't have anything negative to say on Eventbrite

Pros_Review: My favorite feature of eventbrite is the promotion that comes along with posting your event! Their reach is far greater than mine is, as a small non profit, so their built in marketing and promotion is a true feature!
Cons_Review: My least favorite thing about Eventbrite is the fees, but that's just because I am a small non profit : (

Pros_Review: Easy to create events and invite friends, takes votes from friends to make decisions easier,
Cons_Review: Can take a few minutes to update although this only happened to me once

Pros_Review: How simple it is to set up an event and share it throughout all social media outlets as well as through your own links. Awesome platform to get the information out to the right people and also get an "RSVP" response. It is also a great tool from the other end when going to an event because you get to see what other people have committed to going.
Cons_Review: I wish you could change the page of your event to color coordinate or have a design of your choice to personalize the event.

Overall_Review: This is a great solution to offering tickets for local events. It's great for businesses, charities, or just to get a headcount for any type of event.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it extremely easy to create an event and offer sign-ups, and also makes it easy as the user to sign-up for an event and receive a ticket.
Cons_Review: Can't think of any complaints currently.

Overall_Review: I am trying to create better advertised events that are easily searchable
Pros_Review: This product is easy to use to update and upload events and create an atheistic design. However on the user end it is difficult to filer events to specifications such as location
Cons_Review: filtering and thematic organization were not helpful

Pros_Review: Eventbrite does the job and allows users to purchase tickets to events in a very simple and easy to use format.
Cons_Review: This software gets the job done, but doesn't feel like it is super rich with features. Nothing to necessarily critique but at it's core it is what it is- a website to sell tickets to smaller events.

Pros_Review: I love the fact that I van just have all of my tickets on my phone! I really hated having to keep track of my tickets and sometimes loosing them. It makes life so much easier. I am usually the one in the group that buys the tickets in bulk and my friends just pay me so having Eventbrite has been super helpful.
Cons_Review: I don really have anything negative to say about Eventbrite, it has honestly made life a little easier by putting al my tickets into one safe and easily accessible place

Overall_Review: It was easy and great!
Pros_Review:
easy to use
find out about new events
very vibrant
Cons_Review: nothing was bad for my experience. I have no cons

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was helpful in setting up tickets to a fundraiser
Pros_Review: It was user friendly and menu driven, simple for an older adult to use.
Cons_Review: There were some customizations I would ha v liked to do

Pros_Review: I used it always for free events,  you get your tickets instantly and is synced with Google Calendar. You never forget  anything.
Cons_Review: Not really customizable. Event's pages look a little boring.

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite when inviting people to an event that I really want to be special (Christmas party, wedding shower, bridal luncheon, etc). It's a cut above the normal Facebook event invitation.
Pros_Review: People use email now more than Facebook, so it's been the best way for me to evite friends to events.
Cons_Review: I dislike the email marketing campaigns that I and my friends receive whenever we use Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Good
Pros_Review: It's very easy to create an event and track attendees. It's also very easy to send updates to attendees.
Cons_Review: Integration. I'd like to see more integration with Event mgmt software like adsalesgenius.

Pros_Review: Ah! I can't say enough good things about this. These days, people don't check their mail, stamps are expensive, and people are always on their phones. For work, I always use Eventbrite to invite coworkers to events. Whether it's a baby shower, staff meeting, or birthday party. So easy!
Cons_Review: Nothing! No complaints with Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Overall, my experience with Eventbrite has been good and I would highly reccomend for others to give it a try. It's especially beneficial if you or your organization host a lot of events, such as parties, throughout the year. There are a few features that I do not like but regardless, it is still very beneficial to use.
Pros_Review: I would highly reccomend for any organization that hosts a lot of events to begin using Eventbrite to promote and use it for providing the admissions passes. It is such a great tool to use as it allows us to not have to create physical invitations and rather, we can mass send to everyone that we wish to invite to our event. This not only helps save resources, but also financially.
Cons_Review: What I like least about Eventbrite is that since the events are viewable by the public, many people may accidently sign up to your event  and as a result, you may end up preparing for guests that never show up. This is a major con when using Eventbrite and so it is important to follow up guests after giving them admission passes to confirm that they are coming.

Pros_Review: I able to nagativate this software so swiftly.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything I Did not like about this software.

Pros_Review:
I have had great interaction with Eventbrite. I use it to sign up for events and it helps keep my calendar organized.
The company sends out clear, organized, and efficient messages for events.
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons with eventbrite. I typically use Eventbrite to view invitations rather than send them out and I've never had a problem.

Pros_Review: Good when you are looking for something to do this weekend. Very helpful in finding small events around me and supporting a cause. It's very easy to sign-up and create events. Very helpful also as an organizer of events in my college
Cons_Review: Maybe adding tiers to tickets that the goers want to avail.

Pros_Review: I use this to view events going on and have purchased tickets through the website.
Cons_Review: It has not worked for me but I think this has been because there were too many people on website when tickets were released.

Overall_Review: As someone who registers and goes to many events, I'd say that eventbrite is by far the best way to buy tickets online or get registered for events!
Pros_Review: I think that compared to adderall online event ticketing services, I felt that with Eventbrite I actually know what I paid for and how the different fees stacked up.
Cons_Review: I haven't had any bad experiences with it really, I've had more issues with bad event planners having trouble sending the Eventbrite link more than actually having to navigate hunt Eventbrite to buy the tickets themselves!

Pros_Review: In terms of other event hosting programs, I have found this to be the best one around.  It is very flexible in the type of event being held, are it is able to work with social media platforms.  Typically, when I am posting  link on Facebook, I will have users link directly to my Eventbrite page to either sign up or buy tickets.
Cons_Review: I have had some issues with having it link with Facebook and seeing the correct number of attendees that plan on going.  But this has only happened a few times before.

Pros_Review: This software system makes planning and promoting events extremely easy and enjoyable. The software is very creative and allows you to create a very effective registration page. The software is free to use as long as you don't require ticket payments.
Cons_Review: When you purchase the paid portion of the software it is very rigid. The customer service is also very slow and lacking. The software also has some issues with how you receive the revenue from your event. From experience they keep your revenue until the event is over, which may be problematic to individuals trying to use that income to further promote their event. The platform is also over used and i have concerns about certain safety and privacy features.

Pros_Review: Finding events in the area has never been easier and purchasing tickets as well! I really like that it allows you to download the ticket into my wallet on my iPhone. Makes it really easy to just show up to the event and have the ticket ready to go on my phone.
Cons_Review: It's sometimes hard to find the event I'm looking for unless I have the exact web address.

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite for all sorts of events in multiple cities and will continue to use it whenever possible!
Pros_Review: Very simple to order tickets and find all scheduled events
Cons_Review: Can be a challenge if the vendor does not know how to list their experience properly, especially if there are multiple options.  Occasionally can be difficult to identify how to insert promotions as well.

Overall_Review: We have used this for everything from a back yard bash to a Beekeepers county club meeting.
Pros_Review: Love how you can set up a party, meeting even family get together and have all the information in there even as far as though who say they will attend, can say what they are bringing!!
Cons_Review: There are no cons I have run into. this software is super user friendly for personal and business.

Pros_Review: I like how I am able to save the events to my wallet on my Apple iPhone. This makes it so much easier to scan my ticket when I arrive at an event. I also like how you can browse similar events in your area in order to help users stay connected to what's going on in their community.
Cons_Review: I have had no issues with this software in the past.

Pros_Review: Whenever I have a function that uses Eventbrite to issue entry permit or tickets, I know the process will be smooth.
Cons_Review: It would be nice if more companies/vendors chose to use Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes organizing an event and collecting payment very easy. I love that my guests can automatically add the event to their calendar after joining.
Cons_Review: I haven't had any major issues using Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: This platform is great for discovering events in your area and looking for fun things to do on specific dates. It's my go to place when trying to book a show or other event and the interface is super easy to use and runs really smooth.
Cons_Review: The only problem I have with Eventbrite and all similar platforms is the gauging of pricing for resale tickets. Not to mention the convenience fees and other fees added once you're in the checkout. Your tickets can jump from one price to another price in a heartbeat so you have to be aware of that when purchasing.

Pros_Review: What I like most about this product is that it's easy and convenient to use. You have access to your ticket at the tip of your fingers just by downloading the app on your phone.
Cons_Review: The cons about it is that sometimes not ALL events you want to look for are on there or also sometimes it's a bit more expensive to use this app rather than other services.

Pros_Review: Though I've never promoted an event through Eventbrite, I have attended and kept track of many events. The website makes it very easy to discover, manage events and quickly recover tickets. The newsletter is also minimalistic which makes the user more likely to not spam it and discover upcoming events.
Cons_Review: Nothing really I wish there was more integration with more ticketing websites. But I don't see Ticketmaster relinquishing a hold of there share of the market. I like the snappy ease of use of Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Simple and clean cut to use. Setting up a new corporate account to organize events is very easy and email campaigns can be easily organized. Attendance tracking is also very simple and a mobile app is definitely the smart way. Export of data is also simple.
Cons_Review: Offers no further follow up from the event. Will be good to be able to have a survey after the event to rate users based on their satisfaction levels. Also, data analytics is fundamental, not able to track user profile and categories users.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite every time we have an event (under about 250 people). IT allows us to track RSVPs and easily blast out our event information
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is really cheap (free) and easy to use. Plus the functions and features are just what you will need to coordinate your event.
Cons_Review: My organization doesnt use any paid features or collect money thru Eventbrite so I can't really speak to those points.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so widely used now that it's a no-brainer when it comes to event management in all aspects. Many smaller non-profits are using it and the larger ones are tying it into their CRM as well to manage sign-ups, seating, etc.
Cons_Review: I have nothing negative to say about EventBrite except maybe they can look into updating some of the very basic interface ?

Overall_Review: The ability to organize invitations, manage waitlists and reimbursements all through the application.
Pros_Review: Easy to use interface that allows you to send out event invitations and review who has clicked & RSVP'd any event. Also great for tracking multiple events.
Cons_Review: Security is a bit of an issue for free events. The ability to customize the interface more would also be beneficial.

Overall_Review: easy to use, efficient and reliable!
Pros_Review: this software is easy to use, professional and reliable,  also i love the most the map features which facilitate our mission as event planners!

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite to RSVP to SXSW events. I find it easy to use, and it is consistent.

Eventbrite gives you a good overview about upcoming events.
The UX is intuitive. I especially like the iphone wallet function where you can send the event invitation to the iphone wallet.
Pros_Review:
Easy to use
Iphone wallet function
Cons_Review: Nothing

Overall_Review: Good app, until you search by day.   This could be improved to see everything for a day.
I love using Eventbrite but I wish it had better integration with my non-profit's Salesforce. It's not seamless so they don't want to use it.
Pros_Review: User friendly, easy to set up
Cons_Review: Doesn't integrate well with our database, doesn't embed into our website

Pros_Review: I mean i feel like they have the market cornered.  Who else would you use for this kind of stuff? Solid, consistent.
Cons_Review: The graphics aren't always as dope or beautiful as i would hope.  Also sometimes i just don't care.

Overall_Review: My experience with Eventbrite has been entirely as a event attendee and for the most part it's an excellent application that makes it easy for me to view the events I've RSVP'd for.
Pros_Review: It's clean and quick. I have a list of past events, and event's coming up.
Cons_Review: The only confusing thing about the app is editing my profile settings. I think it's possible to edit them on the website but not on the application.

Overall_Review: Easy to use on the business side and consumer side.  Great technology platform.
Amazing price compared to competitors and the best customer service. Plus its so easy to use i could teach my 5yr easily.
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to use
Cons_Review: I like it all

Overall_Review:
At  The Bold Italic, we produce a wide variety of events that often have diverse ticketing needs. Evenbrite is flexible enough to meet our needs for free events, paid events, as well as events that have tiered pricing. 

We have found it invaluable to be able to watch ticket sales in real time so that we can track and evaluate our marketing efforts and determine what actually moves the needle.

Their check-in application, Entry is so intuitive and easy to use, I only factor in 5 minutes of day-of training for new volunteers checking in guests. 

I've encountered very few problems using Eventbrite, however, when I have needed to ask a question their customer service is lightning fast and extremely helpful.
Overall, my experience with Eventbrite has been positive.
Pros_Review: What I like best about this software is that I have never had an issue finding a ticket for an event.
Cons_Review: What I like least about this software is that I cannot make an update to my ticket on the application without logging onto a computer.

Overall_Review: Fair. Sometimes events are lost when searching for them on site.
Pros_Review: Good way to get word across to large masses.  Good way of keeping track of events and distributing tickets/sign-ups.
Cons_Review: Not much to offer besides publishing and coordinating events. Could expand its uses but it is the oldest and most accessible worldwide.

Overall_Review: Average. Again, it's well enough put together that it's not a major headache to use, and there are some nice automations, but besides the "good enough-ness" of it, I chose to use it because they're pretty much the industry standard for doing online ticket sales for self-promoted events.
Pros_Review: Pretty easy to set up an event, good depth of features that more than covered my basic needs, some nice inbuilt featuers like automated email reminders before the event.
Cons_Review: No mobile application to manage an event in detail, the user interface and experience is a bit rough around the edges (for example, went in circles for a while to get the event created in the first place - not a well designed workflow).

Pros_Review: Easy way to RSVP to an event along with finding information for an event.
Cons_Review: There were no cons. User friendly, easy to manipulate . Great product.

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite frequently in the past to attend multiple industry events and it has been great.
Pros_Review: I like the ease of use and the ability to store tickets for industry and personal events on my phone.
Cons_Review: I wish you were not required to have the whole application on your phone and could possibly have a website login instead.

Overall_Review: Simple and efficient. Worked well for what it was needed for occasionally
Pros_Review: This was easy to set up especially for free tickets to an event. We used it for some hiring and networking events.
Cons_Review: I didn't really have any issues. We only used it s few times. It was simple to use for internal and external people

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is excellent and extremely organized with their data!
Pros_Review: Specific marketing to targeted audiences which is highly beneficial when hosting speaking events, webinars and engagements.
Cons_Review: Sometimes, potential customers leave out important information on their tickets.

Overall_Review: Have used Eventbrite on a number of occasions to purchase event tickets and haven't had any issues to date.
Pros_Review: My favourite aspect of Eventbrite is knowing that it is a secure way to pay for event tickets online.
Cons_Review: The layout of the page is sometimes muddled with too many different elements that can make it look confusing and messy.

Pros_Review: I've personally felt eventbrite is a great platform for purchasing tickets for events. Sending tickets to your phone is very easy as well similar to any other big name ticket selling apps.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints specifically about this software. It's easy for users which is who you're targeting.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is good to use when looking for information about some local events.  It would be great if it were updated more often
Pros_Review: You can check out what's going on in your region in one place and it gives you the chance to purchase tickets through their site
Cons_Review: It's not updated as often as it should be with events, and it's difficult to narrow down the area; I'm from central nj but it will come up with activities in NYC and Philadelphia. Lots of repeats in events too

Pros_Review: I've used Eventbrite at my company for both smaller monthly events and our annual conference. It's easy to use, I  can event tickets up and promoted in about 5 minutes. I  love that it allows me to manage multiple ticket types with ease.
Cons_Review: On the attendee side, adding a promo code could be a lot easier. There also needs to be better analytics so I  can track where pruchasers come from without having to create affiliate links for every channel.

Pros_Review: Every time I need to purchase tickets to an event I want to attend I use Eventribe. It's quick and seamless process of getting your tickets delivered to you digitally.
Cons_Review: Sometimes not all the events are listed in the app and you would need to search for the event on engine search yourself.

Overall_Review: very well organised way of creating and sharing events.
Pros_Review: Creating events is on finger tips and sharing with wider group and getting the responses online is very good.
Cons_Review: sometimes creating events and sharing on Face book and website is not working. need to publish twice. Room for improvement on sharing event.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is one of the most popular ways to coordinate events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy way to set up events and invitations.  I love how easy it is to track RSVPs through this software.
Cons_Review: I have not experienced any issues with Eventbrite and do not have anything to note that I like least about it.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great interface for managing event attendees rather than tracking via spreadsheet or emails.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy from a user's perspective to reserve and purchase tickets to events. It is also a simple platform for setting up and managing events like our company holiday party.
Cons_Review: If Eventbrite had some more customization features such as backgrounds, banners, pictures, text formatting, etc., it would allow for more specialized customization.

Overall_Review: We have another online software that works great for our camp but does not include options for conferences, adult programs, dinners, and other functions.  This software is is basic and does the trick very nicely.
Pros_Review: We are using it as an online registration for some conferences and adult programs, dinners, and functions. It is easy for a user to create an account and sign up for a an event.  It is easy to create the event also.  Easy for us to check who has signed up and what programs they have registered for.
Cons_Review: The fees attached are high.   It is a percentage of the program charge and we are passing it along to the participant.

Overall_Review: I find networking events on Eventbrite to attend for myself.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to find events, and sign up for them. Tickets are transferred easily via email, and easy to present on your mobile device.
Cons_Review: I don't dislike anything about the software. I think it's easy to use for finding events and signing up.

Overall_Review: I've found that simply creating Facebook events has about the same results without any of the overhead costs. While it's easy to set up, it doesn't leave a lot of room for customization.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has captured the market. Because of this, it works, which I like. It's fairly easy to use and set up events.
Cons_Review: This software doesn't work well for small businesses. It takes too much of a commission considering what it's doing.

Overall_Review: Love the product and will keep using it in the future
Pros_Review: I have been using this product for some time now and love the fact we can schedule an event and sell tickets all in one service without the need for other expensive products
Cons_Review: The only issue I have is not with the product itself but sometimes the registration confirmations get sent to my spam folder

Overall_Review: Overall, using Eventbrite as part of a total web / marketing system is proven to be a good solution.
Pros_Review: We use this solution as part of an overall plan in website development.  It solves the issue of having to develop and maintain an events system.  Create the events on Eventbrite and share them on your website.
Cons_Review: Not much to dislike.  The product handles takes the struggle out of event marketing.  Sometimes free events can be clunky since tickets are issued.

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite for non-profit events, for paid workshops and more. It is worth the processing fee!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a wonderful platform for you to sell tickets to events without having to pay tens of thousands of dollars to develop your own online ticket platform. You can easily integrate this with Facebook and sell tickets directly through your Facebook event. It also helps your event with discovery and gets your tickets sold!
Cons_Review: It can be tough to setup when you are first learning the software. Once you get through some of the initial learning and headaches it is a wonderful piece of software to sell your tickets.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a good software to organise events in a timely manner
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to promote your event. It is effective in reaching a vast amount of people that may be interested in your event that you would have access to .
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to navigate whether you are looking to set up an event or to attend an event. The events are explained clearly  and concise. When you are hosting an event, meeting or conference, Eventbrite, allows you to be specific with ticketing prices, and details. It is functional for all the things you need to do to have a successful event.
Cons_Review: The payment you receive for the tickets for your event is paid after the event. It would be great to have payment as each ticket is processed.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite helps us to organize our events of any sizes efficiently. Also, recently it has added some functionalities to track the metrics which is really cool. Also it integrates smoothly with our CRM.
Cons_Review: There is nothing to like least about this software.

Overall_Review: I've had a great experience with the app and with customer service,
Pros_Review: The app is easy to use and set up for events. It also has a mobile app which makes it easy to attend events without carrying paper.
Cons_Review: No cons that I can tell with the software and customer service is great. I have only contacted them once.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an amazing event marketing site, particularly for local events. I use for book signings, Barnes and Noble gatherings, and other functions. It's really helpful and produces a great turn out every time! Thank you!
Cons_Review: None. It's a great product; thank you so much!

Pros_Review: I had used Eventbrite in the past in a personal capacity for parties so I was aware that it might also be a good service to use professionally. And I was right. We were able to organize and send out a massive amount of beautiful, digital invitations to potential clients for our meet-n-greet events, and track views, confirmations of attendance, and rejections through the platform. We have used this twice in the last three months and I think we'll be using it a lot more in the future.
Cons_Review: There are no cons with this service that I can think of as it perfectly met all of my needs.

Pros_Review: Ease of usage and overall functionality.
Cons_Review: didn't see alot of options for customization

Overall_Review: I wish it was a more friendly rate
Pros_Review: Easy to promote events and set up payment for collection
Cons_Review: Very high cost of use. Owners take a high percentage for service

Pros_Review:
Easy to use
Able to integrate with social media platforms - Facebook, LinkedIn
Cons_Review: Not able to integrate with Instagram (I think)

Pros_Review:
We use Eventbride to create the event of one our client. 
It's easy, a lot of option. 
It' help manage the ticket and give you details about how is going to be at you event. 
The software is perfect .
Cons_Review: You have to make sure that you setting are right when you launch an event.

Pros_Review: Love how easy this is to us! The ability to request payment or make free events is very nice. One of my favorite features is how the event will create a pass/ticket for iOS Wallet app that can be scanned to track attendance. Getting alerts from specific vendors is also great for keeping track of when new events are happening.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything specific that I dislike! So far, Eventbrite has done everything that I want it to do.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has become very popular for me to accept invitations to seminars and meetings electronically. I appreciate the fact I get a confirmation email soon after registering for the event with my ticket.
Cons_Review: Repopulating my information when registering for an event could be made easier.

Pros_Review: i've bought tickets through eventbrite several times. it's an ok service.
Cons_Review: almost every time i've tried to buy tickets through it i've had some type of issue. either a promo code i'm using didn't work or cart had issues or check out had issues. i don't know- maybe eventbrite hates me.

Overall_Review: Finding potential events in current location or places that I am traveling to.
Pros_Review: Useful to look for events happening in cities near you.  Groups by category and can search for things that might interest you.  Easy to use.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the search isn't very refined and will give unrelated events or not in the location specified.  Information about the events isn't always clear, might be helpful to have more prompts for an event creator to fill out to give the users more information.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has helped me keep track of upcoming Events, especially Girl Scouts.
Pros_Review: Easily keep track of events with this app. Notifications are sent to me and It makes it fast and convenient to sign up for events. I mostly use this for Girl Scouts.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything negative to say about Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Overall eventbrite is really easy to use and get set up so that people can register for an event. On the back end it is also easy to manage registrants and attendees as well.
Cons_Review: I think the design of event pages could be improved. The branding is very eventbrite heavy, which isn't always ideal.

Overall_Review: For events of all scales, all types, internal, external, for profit, charity, entertainment, educational .... all things to all people.
Pros_Review: Intuitive design. Simple process. Quick, reliable and massively adaptable
Cons_Review: I don't own it?  Maybe the only thing is its popularitymeans the numbers of events is enormous, and your might get a bit lost.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is very useful for organizing events which require some kind of ticket to get into them.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great for getting RSVP's to events  and for distributing tickets. Eventbrite has an option to collect money for the tickets or the user can just print out the ticket. The software also allows you to include all of the event information along with contact information for who is hosting the event.
Cons_Review: As a user who is just RSVPing to an event, Eventbrite want you to create an account or sign-in with Facebook which is kind of annoying when you're just trying to print out your ticket.

Pros_Review: I like that the website makes it easy to create invitations for events and allows you to pick a date and time. Also makes it really easy for you to track who accepts and who rejects.
Cons_Review: Do not have much cons about this website. I use it almost all the time to create invites.

Pros_Review: Probably the best tool to keep an event organized and sell tickets
Cons_Review: It would be great to add conditional questions during the registration process

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so well known and widespread, it's a real no brainer to setup events as most customers already have an account with them.
Cons_Review: Discovering relevant events in the app or using it as a feed to inspire is almost useless, a lot of spam and unmoderated content unfortunately.

Overall_Review: Really good platform for groups that host events to manage availability and registrations.
Pros_Review: For groups that don't host events frequently, it allows for registration and availability management in an easy, user friendly application.
Cons_Review: Scaling may require deeper integrations. If selling tickets, fees can start to feel steep.

Pros_Review:
Great event management system which provides a large number of great features.

it make the event management easy with online ticketing. 

search for events on a selected field is easy with Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Customizing the registration page could be difficult and may require some programming skills.

Overall_Review: I love using Eventbrite. It keeps me organized and does all of the heavy lifting for me!
Pros_Review: Such an easy and efficient way to create events and market them online. I can send out easy notifications and manage my event and alert all attendees very easily.
Cons_Review: Nothing, it's fantastic, easy to use, efficient.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is great! Love using it for small events and registration for free seminars.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is affordable for companies and agencies that want to host events. It's free platform is also so easy to use and easily shareable.
Cons_Review: The fee for tickets can be cost-ineffective for small businesses or NPO's.

Overall_Review: Perfect for creating and tracking attendees.
Pros_Review: Easy to use and very accurate.  Easy for recipients to respond, change and update.  No complicated technical issues to set up.
Cons_Review: There really was not any negative issues.  I suppose the application could be a bit more intuitive or interactive.

Pros_Review: You can easily search for events near you with different categories that depends on your preferences.
Cons_Review: Sometimes i don't received any notifications if there is an event near my preferred location. It would be great if I will receive notifications and probably discounts or something.

Pros_Review: I like how easy it is it purchase tickets and invite other people.
Cons_Review: I do not like how many emails I get after I attend an event.

Overall_Review: Good.  I like it.  It took sa few tweaks to get the ticket sales right and taxes and fees.  But in the end, we did good.  I cant use it for NYE as its too hard to seat people at same tables.
Pros_Review: I love the one off events for this.  Its easy to setup and sell tickets.
Cons_Review: Expensive.  And hard if you want people to share a table and sit together.

Pros_Review: The best part of this software is how they streamlined the event coordinating process. From signups to check-in and everything else. The customer support team were especially responsive as well.
Cons_Review: The level of design and uniqueness for your events is limited. I wish there were more ways to customize.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is accessible, helps with planning, and is very conventient!
Pros_Review: The software is great and one of its kind, being able to look up events, create events and coordinate by getting tickets and codes through this one software is very convenient.
Cons_Review: I actually dont have anything that I dislike about the software.

Pros_Review: Great for events, works easily on phones and keeps track of tickets
Cons_Review: Not great for events where paper tickets are easier.

Pros_Review: Whether paid or free it allows us to manage adhoc events in one place.
Cons_Review: We still need to run separate system for day to day bookings covering multiple time slots.

Pros_Review:
- It is very intuitive and easy to use. It took me 10 minutes to figure out how to create the event and different functionalities such as keeping it private or public etc
- It also allows to keep the event open to only a certain audience and even there could be different ticket categories
- Automated emails, tracking, checking-in system by scanning QR code is pretty easy and helps me as an organizer to keep track of attendance
- I love how I could schedule emails and send to different audience, the sorting and searching functionalities are amazing
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: It is nice to be able to communicate with teachers and find things out bout the class. It is a nice way of staying involved with what programs and activities they are having.
Pros_Review: I love that I am able to review things about my sons class and that I can navigate easily through the software.
Cons_Review: I can't really pin point one thing I didn't like, for me I enjoy using it.

Pros_Review: Easy to set up and handle events, and also easy to use as a consumer.
Cons_Review: The only con I can think of was the link to the event page was very long and jumbled looking.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: - I only use Facebook for events, if Eventbrite integrated a social and calendar feature I would use it all the time!

Pros_Review: It is easy to rsvp to events and a ticket is emailed directly to you.
Cons_Review: If I closed out of the window or deleted the email there was not a way to view my ticket again.

Pros_Review: The software was easy to use. The directions were clear and concise.  I had no trouble navigating the website.
Cons_Review: I have no negative feed back.  I liked the software.

Pros_Review: I absolutely love that they do not charge for free events, it is a great way to keep track of attendees via ticketing without the hassle of having to charge
Cons_Review: When you are throwing a paid event precentage payout sometimes can be a bit of a pain, but that is the nature of all sites, eventbrite makes it easy to work with

Overall_Review: Needed a way to sell event tickets and also manage entry to the same event. Eventbrite provides all of this
Pros_Review: Easy to use software to set up ticket sales for any type of event. Love that I can create multiple pricing tiers, accept all credit cards, and use Eventbrite to check people into my event too
Cons_Review: Only minimal options for custom page design and branding without knowledge of HTML/CSS or paying for additional customization options. Still can create a decent looking ticket page that reflects your branding.

Pros_Review: I really liked that Eventbrite allowed us to have a convenient way to collect tickets for our class reunion, and get an accurate number of how many would be attending the event. It was easy to post the event and share the link and work through a convenient and professional paymeny system.
Cons_Review: I found sometimes it was difficult to navigate for event attendees for them to know how to pay for their ticket, but we were able to easily direct them once we found out the issue.

Pros_Review: There are way more pros than cons with this software. It's very easy to create an event and track rsvps, which is the entire purpose of the software. I also really like the options it gives you to add pictures and descriptions. It's also very easy to share your event to attract more guests.
Cons_Review: The only thing that could make this better is if you were able to completely design the webpage that guests were brought to, to make your event seem more enticing.

Pros_Review: It is so simple to use from both the creating an event perspective and user perspective. I have staff ranging from teens to 80+ and they can easily register for events using this site!
Cons_Review: The paid functions seem much more advanced than free. I don't think I would ever purchase because of the amount of free functions they offer.

Overall_Review: We have simplified our ordering for our event. People are still having issues with it, as that is why they call me, but it is because they are elderly. I feel like this is much easier to navigate than Ticketmaster, as I have used this before and had difficulties. Most people under 50 could figure this out with ease.
Pros_Review: I have had to log in several times to help people order tickets to our event. I feel like it is very easy to navigate and successfully check out.
Cons_Review: I understand privacy, but I would like the address and contact info to be shown in the email after ordering. This would not be needed if you ordered yourself, as you know your contact info, but for me helping someone order, I may need this again.

Pros_Review: I love using Eventbrite to buy tickets for events. I really enjoy that after going to a few concerts or events, Eventbrite will email me with possible shows I would enjoy going to based on tickets I have bought before.
Cons_Review: I think Eventbrite would be a little better if they sold tickets to a wider variety of companies.

Pros_Review: I use eventbrite to sale tickets when I throw an event. It makes the administration side and ticket sales way easier to manage.
Cons_Review: My only issue I have is when the system goes out it sometimes screw up pricing that you have set. Overall a great product with minor issues. Will definitely keep using.

Pros_Review: It is an easy way for our company to invite people to training and events
Cons_Review: It can be a struggle to make sure all event invitations are received in the proper email inbox.

Pros_Review: It's free! This is such a valuable software to plan events, manage invites, track interest, and anything else you need around invitations for events, meetings, conferences. The tool is easy to learn - such a small learning curve. And the design of the site is straightforward, clear, concise. You can even use tools to track what people are bringing to a potluck. I can even find local events in my city listed on the eventbrite site.
Cons_Review: Sometimes, you can't edit certain styles of writing in sections like the location. Our organization has a very strict editorial writing style and this doesn't allow us to be consistent.

Pros_Review: I like that your info is stored so its easy to sign up for events
Cons_Review: i dont love the lettering size and look on mobile

Pros_Review: Great tool to help get information on your event to the public. It is simple to use and effective.
Cons_Review: None, my team uses it a lot for our stations events.

Pros_Review: It's so easy to purchase event tickets with this software! Makes an amateur event look professional and keeps the collection of money electronic and eliminates the need to handle cash.
Cons_Review: I've only use the product based a user and not an administrator. It doesn't appear super slick or attractive on the webpage.

Overall_Review: I question the necessity of it with the functionality built in to platforms like facebook, but for what it is, it's a solid program.
Pros_Review: It is easy to use, for the most part. It is quick to use and access. The UI of the page is definitely user focused, simple enough.
Cons_Review: There are some moments of bugginess with seat selection when the event set-up isn't totally straight forward. It can be kind of awkward to go through the purchase process, but it isn't terrible.

Overall_Review: Great service
Pros_Review: I have used the software to book for religious events and it has been very easy to book.
Cons_Review: I have had only a good experience when using eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is good to get the word out to those you know and to those who you have contact information of. It helps when you want a mass event out there but it isn't good for when you need to target those you don't.  It helps organize the event and add details.
Pros_Review: I like how with this software you can share the event and anybody can use it. It makes creating an event very easy. The email that is sent to other people is helpful and they can respond relatively quickly. I like how it is also free to use and respond to the invitation.
Cons_Review: I don't like how you have to have a profile to RSVP to an event that you are invited to. It also continues to send you emails even when there aren't any events.

Pros_Review: It is easy to use and easy to setup. You are just couple click away as customer to complete confirmation.
Cons_Review: Not well known software where not a lot of people are familiar with.

Overall_Review: Great product, easy to use and great interface. Event planners and attendees alike find Eventbrite to be a helpful and useful tool.
Pros_Review: It's easy to use, can take payments and set up guest lists through the website, and has more advanced features that are helpful for event planners.
Cons_Review: Processing fees can add up and seem costly depending on the price of the event.

Pros_Review: Do you have an event that you want people attending to RSVP or pay for? Then Eventbrite is for you. It takes care of everything for you. people can purchase tickets and passes to your event and everything is automated.
Cons_Review: It takes a while to set up but once you get the hang of it, then you are good to go.

Overall_Review: We organize a good amount of events. We need to use this to organize data.
Pros_Review: The app is great to check people into the event. It is a easy and simple to use for user and it compiles all the data for users.
Cons_Review: The payment system on the Software could be improved. A lot of people struggle to pay because things are linked to PayPal.

Pros_Review: It's the only one I know of that manages events announcements and ticketing like this. VERY easy to use.
Cons_Review: I can't think if anything that I'd change about it.

Pros_Review: I have registered for many classes/events with Eventbrite and have always found it very easy to understand and use. It is clear and responsive. I prefer companies that use this because I have a clear picture of the event and details as well as any required ticketing.
Cons_Review: I am a user and have never had any issues with Eventbrite

Overall_Review: Several startup groups use it to promote events and as a user it has been very easy to manage them, and completing the entire process of acquiring a place and making payments has been excellent.
Pros_Review: The platform is quite easy to use, enter and select all the options of the event, manage payments and other tasks are quite easy and the usability is very good.
Cons_Review: Sometimes users confuse its use and create more personal events that take away the identity of the product, it should be a little more closed to a target market.

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite for events involving 20 registrations as well as 200+ and both have been great experiences.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: No complaints.  Lower levels of access still offer all I need to set up and event and collect registrations.

Pros_Review: It's an easy way to organize groups (for us, it's local influencers) to register for upcoming events. I also like how you can customize the form to include paragraph text as we often need participants to tell us more about themselves.
Cons_Review: When it comes to managing/editing behind the scenes, I feel like it's a bit too complicated in interface. Also, when I export my lists of participants there's no option to export their email address too which would be helpful.

Pros_Review: I've never used Eventbrite to host events, but have purchased tickets through Eventbrite many times.  It's always such an easy experience and one that you can expect from a 21st century software company.  The integration with mobile apps and Apple Passbook (wallet now) is great.  It just seems to work seamlessly across all devices.
Cons_Review: At this point I can't come up with any cons, it always just works.  I haven't had to cancel tickets or ask for a refund yet, and perhaps that is where things can become an issue, but as I said, I'm not there yet.  I also haven't seen the software from the other side (as an event planner) so not sure what that side is like.

Pros_Review: web or app you can user it to schedule own events or organize it easily.  Good UI and very intuitive app mobile android.  Another Pro: you don't  need print ticket: Just use mobile application and enjoy :)
Cons_Review: No Cons at this moment. Hope team developers and maintenance teams keep always high the wuality of product.

Overall_Review: Addition of other social media will be well appreciated.
Pros_Review: It is so easy to use as you just need few information to give out and you can get your ticket immediately via your provided email address.
Cons_Review: The sharing part of the Eventbrite is limited to only  facebook share, which people might also want to share in other social media.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great tool for large events for inviting, tracking and managing attendees.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great for managing invitations. It's great for checking people in at large events and has great tools for measuring different data.
Cons_Review: It can be an inconvenience with the extra tax that is added on for events. It causes confusion for the attendees.

Pros_Review: I've often used EventBrite to get tickets for certain free events I'd attend. The checkout process is always easy and quick. Fields are pre-filled if you make an account.
Cons_Review: Would be nice if they can add a feature to send reminders before the event. That way, I don't have to dig through my email to find the last pass.

Overall_Review: I would continue to use this again and again!
Pros_Review: It's so easy to use.  I purchased tickets 3 times from them and it was super easy and they continued to update me on other events that were available.
Cons_Review: nothing, this is great! It was easy to use, it sent me reminders about my event, and kept me posted on other events I might like.

Pros_Review: We've used this for a couple of events; it's a simple interface and worked well. Seemed helpful in also promoting the events as there was a general listing for events in the area.
Cons_Review: There are soooo many events happening - this worked for our events, but it feels like you can get lost in there among all the other stuff.

Pros_Review: I think Eventbrite is very user friendly. It has an intuitive interface and straightforward directions. It is also easily integrated into many different platforms, such as Facebook.

Overall_Review: Advertising our events is of supreme importance to the success of the event- and the ease with which our patrons can purchase tickets and find out information about the event is crucial. This site fulfills our needs about our events.
Pros_Review: The signup and is simple to use, the site is easy to navigate. Every little thing is explained in god detail so there is no confusion when you post events.

Overall_Review: I've used eventbrite multiple times for general reservations and rsvping to events. Its a decent platform but I feel some added mobile functionality could help it
Pros_Review: Its cheap, really straight forward
Cons_Review: Its a little buggy on mobile sometimes.

Overall_Review: It's a great app to store all of your event tickets in one central location. Helps me keep track of everything that's going on. 100x better than ticket master
Pros_Review: All my tickets in one place
Cons_Review: None

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite for planning small company gatherings rather than larger scale events, and using it as a free tool for free events is seamless and useful. Would love for it to be more integrated with other business software and calendar systems.
Overall, the platform is easy to use and the support is good.  Much better for ticketed events versus conferences for functionality and price.
Pros_Review: Ease of use
Cons_Review: Price for paid ticket events

Overall_Review: If you know what you like and you choose your interests accordingly, the recommendations are always spot on. It's hard not to find something that would interest you and there are always lots of free events. I had to download the app before I moved to Glasgow because I bought a conference ticket through Eventbrite, but then I started to tinker with it out of curiosity and it quickly became a very useful tool. I was new in the city and it quickly exposed me to a lot of stuff I wouldn't have known about otherwise, I even managed to sneak into an Industry Day type event only older students were supposed to know about (and it was great, by the way)

Pros_Review: It has a great ability to track ticket sales and events in the city or nationwide.
Cons_Review: It is not used by Ticketmaster which could save some money.

Overall_Review:
I'm the event organizer of an event posted on eventbrite, and I recently lost access to my event editing page, as it no longer appeared under the "my events" tab. I called customer service, and the automated system literally took me in circles, repeating questions I had already answered, and never connected me with someone who could help. I am no longer an Eventbrite customer for this reason. I host a couple hundred events a year, and will now go through another company because of how horrible my experience with eventbrite has been.

TIP: Fix your call center automated system! Connect your customers and organizers with real people instead of completely wasting our time! If I had a question that could be answered by a tutorial, I wouldn't have called your "help" center
Overall I think this software is great for event reservations and ticket transaction.
Pros_Review: What I like the most about this software is that it is very easy to navigate. Also searching based on interests makes it more organized.
Cons_Review: I would say my only complain is that I feel some events or activities might be left out most of the times. And I would like to see more description and details for some events.

Overall_Review: Generally, I really love this app, it helped me a lot to socialize in Venice in my first month. The possibility to have beforehand information about the possible concern in other cities is cute :),
Pros_Review: It was a very first friend of mine in Venice. It gives convenient info in the right way, getting emails as the notification about new activities is great, and the compact interface helps to find what is needed.
Cons_Review: I could not buy the ticket through the app, I  was directed to the websites where I was confused and could not buy. The impossibility to configure the dashboard according to my taste is another dark side.

Overall_Review: We use the online events. Wide variety. No issues at all.
Pros_Review: They did a good job of transitioning their product after COVID. The online events are very cool and useful.
Cons_Review: No major cons. It's a good product and easy to use. The website is very user friendly. Recommend to everyone.

Overall_Review: Positive! It has been helpful to use and it has come in handy to have this software.
Pros_Review: It is an easy way for people to get tickets when you are creating an event or work gathering. This has bene helpful with COVID when there may only be a limited number of seats available for different events and professional developments. We have asked employees to use this to get tickets for events so we can make sure we have enough space and seating.
Cons_Review: There are no cons- sometimes it can be difficult I have heard to reserve seats on certain cell phones, but it is easy to use on a computer.

Overall_Review: I have used it several times to buy tickets and have never had a problem with any transactions.
Pros_Review: being able to  purchase for tickets for various venues instead of some of the older ticket buying programs
Cons_Review: didn't find anything that was hard or not being able to understand how it works

Pros_Review: Ease and accessibility. Handles donations as well as tickets!
Cons_Review: Nothing , never had a problem using the software

Overall_Review: Very successful using it to keep up with upcoming events.
Pros_Review: I like this software for years to keep up with business events and seminars as well as upcoming job fairs.
Cons_Review: At first i didn't like having to sign up for this software but it has more than proven its value and worth.

Pros_Review: I loved that I could look up a lot of fun (and usually free) events in my area! Movies, premiers, openings of restaurants, etc.
Cons_Review: No cons here, they have great service where you can add events to Apple Wallet, or calendar so you never miss out on an event!

Overall_Review: We use this for professional development trainings for teachers. We invite a large number of teachers throughout our county and Eventbrite helps us promote, provide important information, and keep track of who attends. With it being available on everyone's phones, no one has to keep track of paper copies!
Pros_Review: Easy to create events, we love the ticket feature for keeping track of which teachers attend our events
Cons_Review: We wish that people could register or check in after an event has started

Overall_Review: I used it for dozens of different events and purposes
Pros_Review: Clean and easy to use interface, badge generator, credit card acceptance, mailing marketing, good customer support.
Cons_Review: For some kind of license type, taxes aren't too cheap in big or small events, depending on your needs.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite is a great program to use to find out about expos and tradeshows going on in your area or somewhere I plan to travel to.
Pros_Review: I have yet to use Eventbrite for my business, but I do use it as a consumer and it's a really great way for me to find different events in my area. The platform is simple and easy to use and I enjoy how you can find things months in advance. It's a great resource if you are going out of town and need to find something in your area.
Cons_Review: I have yet to find anything negative about the program from a consumer's point of view. It's easy to use.

Pros_Review:
User friendly.
Has a many options to choose from.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints.  This is a very good product.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been very helpful in organizing an event and promoting it. It takes a lot of the stress out of event planning.
Pros_Review: How easy it is to navigate through Eventbrite. It is very simple to create an event and tell others about it through this platform. Eventbrite will also help you manage your events and assist with ticketing.
Cons_Review: Unless your event is free, Eventbrite does charge a service fee in exchange for its online ticketing services.

Overall_Review: Helps connect individuals announcing and planning events
Pros_Review: This is a great application to share information about an upcoming event, obtain RSVPs, share to calendars, etc.
Cons_Review: The application works pretty well as it is designed and I have not noted any other options which might be helpful.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite at least once a month. we have used some of their competitors and we continually return to Eventbrite for its ease of use and large userbase.
Pros_Review: The ease of use to sell tickets to your event through Eventbrite is unmatched.
Cons_Review: The fees are somewhat high for Non-Profits or small political candiates

Pros_Review: It was super easy to use and very user friendly!
Cons_Review: There isn't anything I didn't like about this software!

Overall_Review: Will not be using again. If customer service was top notch than that would change the experience completely.
Pros_Review: I like being able to see events near me. If everything goes well, the event happens, nothing comes up and you can attend, than it works out.
Cons_Review: Terrible customer service, no refunds, no reassurance that things went correctly with an email, text or anything of the sort.

Overall_Review: I used Eventbrite to distribute free student tickets to an event. I prefer other softwares for ticketing events, however, Eventbrite does embed well within my website.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to customize what the event looks like and to advertised the tickets online
Cons_Review: Eventbrite users will see adds pop up and the windows for loading and downloading their tickets are confusing. For example, it can be easy to miss the " print ticket" button.

Pros_Review: Our organization primarily uses this software to register for events at our partner organization.  What we love about using it is the ease of functionality when registering, the reminders we get, and the ticket barcodes that we can save for future registrations and checking into the actual event.
Cons_Review: I haven't experienced a con that I can think of at this moment.  Not one that is beneficial to a review yet. :)

Overall_Review: This has allowed us for and other businesses purchase tickets with ease. Customer service is great! overall very pleased with how this has made events and ticketing easier.
Pros_Review:
Ease of use
Great for events and parties
Cons_Review: I hope there are more tutorials on the site to navigate your way through the software.

Pros_Review: I love Eventbrite for multiple reasons. I use it for work networking to create events and am able to have guest lists and tickets for people to use. I also like it for personal life to find events nearby!
Cons_Review: I would say my only con is that more people don't use this!

Pros_Review: Very easy to use search engine.  Easy to navigate through the app.
Cons_Review: Hard to purchase large groups of tickets

Pros_Review: As a use, Eventbrite is easy to use with a clear and neat interface. Information is easy to find compared to other websites. I like that you can reserve tickets for the event through the site as well.
Cons_Review: I don't have any negative feedback at this time.

Pros_Review: I am a huge fan of Event Brite in my professional and personal life. With a simple search, you can find every event in your surrounding area. This site came in handy creating an event calendar for my job. I was able to locate various networking events. Additionally, I was able to reach a wider audience when hosting an event for my organization.
Cons_Review: I feel that some of the events are over priced but that is not the fault of the software.  There are not a lot of options when it comes to refunds. Once you purchase tickets, it is a hassle getting the money back.

Pros_Review: Reporting is great.  very detailed.  fairly easy to learn and set up.
Cons_Review: Limited ability to customize.  Registering multiple people at the same time is a bit of an issue.  system preference each person to register.

Pros_Review: So easy to post and find events. I love also that once you log in, it autofills all of your contact info so it's really quick to sign up for events.
Cons_Review: Would be nice if you could see other events similar to the one you are looking at, the way Amazon shows you similar products.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has allowed my personal and organizational events to become more organized and efficient! It's easier to plan and track all areas of events!
Cons_Review: The only feature that I feel could use improvement is to have more customization on the user's end.

Pros_Review: Appreciate the platform's functionality to invite friends and others to events, and also discover local events in your area.
Cons_Review: Flexibility with registration - it'd be nice if there was flexibility to change the names of registered attendees after submitting attendance.

Pros_Review: Easy to use, intuitive, lots of great integrations
Cons_Review: I didn't have any problems with Eventbrite!

Pros_Review: Easy to book tickets for smaller independent events. Easy to search for tickets in your city. Checkout process is easy to use. Event reminders when approaching date are helpful too.
Cons_Review: As a user it has been very helpful to use and can't speak to setting up events on it.

Overall_Review: Our team found it quite easy to set up and share through social media to get bookings. There was a bit of fiddling to get the "free tickets" we needed to give to sponsors and special guests, (fortunately I didn't have to handle that). Ultimately we decided the following year to find another ticketing solution that would allow us to utilise some of the pre-sales to help fund preparation for the event.
Pros_Review: It was a simple but effective set up which allowed us to share and book throughout social media
Cons_Review: Getting paid after the event is difficult for a non-profit. If we could get at least some of the money from pre-sales before the event it would help with cashflow for getting many elements of the event.

Overall_Review: I really like Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: Ease of use, You are able to reach so many people.
Cons_Review: I have no cons about the site or software.

Overall_Review: Easy to set up your event.
Pros_Review: Easy to use to set up your event. Intuitive design.
Cons_Review: Nothing to report here. Worked as it had hoped.

Overall_Review: Great way of putting events into your calendar.
Pros_Review: The calendar function. Once you've said yes to an event you can add it to your calendar. Great.
Cons_Review: I can't seem to figure out how Eventbrite can remember my settings. I have to put in my credentials every time I say yes to attending something.

Overall_Review: Planning work events.
Pros_Review: This is great to send out an invite for the company BBQ or Christmas party. You can get a headcount much easier than sending an Outlook calendar invite or doing a headcount. Reminders and updates are simple.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything to comment on cons.

Pros_Review: I enjoy how eventbrite can be used for so many different types of events. I have used it for concerts and conferences multiple times and have never had any issues. The ability for you to have a digital ticket on your phone saves you the hassle of making sure you have the tickets. Also I like how this is a sustainable way for the usage of tickets.
Cons_Review: No real cons on this software it is easy and great for events.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has great extra features and the cost for that is reflected in their fee.  Our customers were unable to navigate the site as well as others.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has a lot of features that other ticketing programs (like an easier option for multi-tiered event levels), but produces a less user-friendly final product. We received many questions about the events listed on Eventbrite from users hoping to purchase tickets.
Cons_Review: The fee is higher than other programs (like TicketsToday) and the customer page is too complicated for the average consumer.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite handles all of the different ticketing prices and types that you could want, and is very easy to maneuver. It also is easy to advertise and has a great user interface. It's also easy to use Eventbrite to market as it provides you with many different options for where to put your event's advertisements.
Cons_Review: It is frustrating sometimes to use Eventbrite because it charges a lot of fees for what it wants to do. Sometimes it seems as if it might actually be more effective just to build the ticketing system yourself or to find other ways to market your event.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is great for organizing large event registration. My experience has also been very smooth as an attendee.
Cons_Review: There is not a lot of customization possible, and the standard options don't work well for all event types.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite has been very good so far as everyone can use it and have an event set up in no time even for people who does not do the event planning as an everyday job
Pros_Review:
Organize events is not part our day jobs, we just do it occasionally and every time, it was a nightmare and a task no one from the team wanted to do as it was usually time consuming. Since we discovered Eventbrite, it has become very easy and we get our events organized in less than half of the time.
The Interface is very straightforward so you can set up an event in just a few minutes and also manage all the ticketing/registration data in one place.
Cons_Review:
For free events it works perfect for us but when it comes to paid events, fees can be very high
Less important, but other point that can be improved are the customization options (font/colour)as at the moment they are very reduced which make the presentation of the events to look very similar one after the other

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very intuitive. It's very easy to create registration options for events that often are more user friendly for the participants than standby registration platforms.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the fees involved with using the platform feel imbalanced.

Pros_Review: The website it fun and appealing to the user. It defaults to your current city and prompts you to search for current events. When posting events, it caters towards younger generations.
Cons_Review: If you are hosting an event with those who definitely have a smartphone and younger generations then this site will work swimmingly for your gathering. However, it may be challenging to obtain tickets/check ins without an electronic device.

Overall_Review: Serves us well.
Pros_Review: Very intuitive to post events and track registrants in the platform. Pleasing visual display as well.
Cons_Review: Hard to manage exports of data. Once you know where to go its easy, but feels like it shouldn't be so challenging to export basic information.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been super helpful in marketing events as well as being "in the know" about events going on in my city. Im glad there is an app for my phone as well.
Cons_Review: so far there isn't anything I don't like. Maybe the refund policy can be a little more clear, but other than that I am very satisfied.

Overall_Review: Excellent
Pros_Review: the thing I liked most was how easy it was to use the website. very simple !
Cons_Review: I have no negative comments about this website.

Overall_Review: Super simple and easy to use and track everything purchased
Pros_Review: As someone who always purchases event tickets online, I never have any issues going through eventbrite. Super easy and I can see everything under my account
Cons_Review: As a user, I don't think there is anything I dislike about this software

Overall_Review: Overall, if you are trying to organize and event and are looking for a place to start, EventBrite should top your list.
Pros_Review: EventBrite is a great way to organize events, attract audience and get valuable data and analytics on your customers. It is extremely easy to use and the value for money aspect is simply phenomenal.
Cons_Review: The data analytics part and the email service associated with the guest list can be improved to add more features, context and insights.

Pros_Review: This app is awesome for finding something to do when you have some free time. It is very easy to use and the layout is clean and simple. Tickets can also be scanned on the app which makes everything very easy.
Cons_Review: I wish there were more filters when searching for an event (price, distance, etc.)

Pros_Review: I use this for events for our arts and craft festivals!
Cons_Review: I never had any issues with the system, works smoothly!

Pros_Review: I love that this program sends you a downloadable link to your Icalendar.  So you dont have to do much and all of the information is put into your calendar. Dates/times/locations are all placed in your schedule.  It is really convenient.
Cons_Review: Honestly, I dont have anything that I dislike.

Pros_Review: I like how the software is easily set up and easy to navigate, I am able to get to where I need to go without having to worry if I printed the tickets off yet because Eventbrite has them ready for me and can be easily added to my Apple Wallet
Cons_Review: Not all events are uploaded on to Eventbrite

Pros_Review: I love how it shows me all the places nearby me and it ranging from parties and shows to other opportunities to go have fun. It is very easy to use as well.
Cons_Review: I have not come across anything yet that I have issues with. I will update if I do.

Pros_Review: I love that it is free to use the software for free events. There is a fee associated with paid events, but hey, it only makes sense! I use it for all my ticketed events.
Cons_Review: If I am hosting a complicated event, it can be challenging to get all the features I need, but works well for basic events.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite is very positive.  I like that there is an app option as well.
Pros_Review: The software is easy to navigate and fast with it's responding emails; I like that it has the option to add the event to your outlook calendar.
Cons_Review: I can't think of anything off hand that I did not like.

Overall_Review: I like it. We use it for my company bar crawl as well as a lot of the events I have participated in.
Pros_Review: I like how all events can be found in one place. I like searching for a type of event I am looking for and being able to browse through what is happening around me.
Cons_Review: The extra fees when purchasing tickets.

Pros_Review: We used Eventbrite to sell tickets to our annual fundraising gala and it was extremely easy to use and our donors had no problems getting tickets
Cons_Review: We had no real issues with Eventbrite. I had a few questions early on and customer service and FAQ's helped answer them.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so easy to use when sending out an invitation to people. I have used in the past for meet ups, internal events, external events, and school events. Worked great each time and most people I sent it to knew what Eventbrite is so they are familiar with the set (making it easier for the user). I also like that you can register for more than one person and everyone will get a copy of the event, regardless if they have an account or not.
Cons_Review: The only thing I wish I could do more of is customise based on the event. For example, make it more Christmas themed if it's for a Christmas event.

Pros_Review: Free version is useful for managing event planning. I really like how it sent reminders for upcoming events and helped make the marketing of the events simple.
Cons_Review: There's nothing that I can think of that I didn't like, especially with the free version.

Overall_Review: I have and will continue to use eventbrite for small and free events that I need to keep track of and promote without a major budget backing them.
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to set up an event with tracking and ability to sell tickets. I can connect the event to facebook events and sell tickets or have people sign up if it's free.
Cons_Review: I don't like that they Charge a fee to sell tickets on their  site and I also don't like that I don't have complete control over the Event when I use them.

Overall_Review: We frequently hold events at our dog park/bar. Eventbrite helps us organize, excecute, and pay for our events and makes them a huge success!
Pros_Review:
Saves time and money
 Helps make our events a success
 Makes sure EVERYONE gets paid
Cons_Review: No cons! Eventbrite is a great service. Highly reccomended.

Pros_Review: We had to use a ticketing system for an event and were looking for a tool providing the service in a simple way. Eventbrite resulted in the ideal management software for our needs
Cons_Review: It could have more integrations with other social platforms to provide more information on customers for retargeting

Overall_Review: I have used eventbrite for events with clients, customers, partners and prospects. It is great for any situation. The data and insights eventbrite can give you on your events is important. Free to use since none of my events had paid tickets. Overall it has been a great product.
Pros_Review: Easy to create an event. Easy to track registrations and where they come from. Designing the registration page is also easy. Great Pardot connector too. Free to use for our purposes.
Cons_Review: Not everything is easy though. I had an issue with there being too many tabs and options and not knowing where to find what we were looking for. It didn't hurt the event overall, but it did hurt our data.

Pros_Review: What I like most is the ability to find and use my tickets. Clearly labeled!
Cons_Review: What I dislike the most is sometimes the software bombards my email with event details. It may be helpful for some users but theres not an option to receive less notifications without completely unsubscribing from the entire email list.

Pros_Review: It a great  and easy app. Keeps you informed of all the events around you.
Cons_Review: The search may need some improvements. When searching for a specific event, sometimes it won't show up on the search results. Instead, I would have to go the longer route as in searching the venue and look for the event there.

Overall_Review: This is the steroid version of the former Entertainment Section in your old newspaper. The variety of postings and the thoroughness of the information is very appealing and helpful. I recommend this to anyone with a short list, looking to expand their base.
Pros_Review: I enjoy the fullness of the information provided as well as the visual appeal. The presentation is stunning and inviting.
Cons_Review: There is really no downside to the eventbrite app. Going locally or nationally are also big plusses - all in all this is a superb program.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: - did not get much use out of the analytics module. used our own internal system as we found eventbrite's analytics to be minimal

Pros_Review: Easy to make an event and easy to spread the event. Useful for the school events specially for the students need to improve their career.
Cons_Review: I don't like some of the events that is too much to pay the events will I don't even know what's the topic to be presented and the speaker/s profile.

Pros_Review: The backend interface has become more user-friendly through the years.  It lends a more professional image to your event invitation as well.
Cons_Review: Processing of payments can be an issue if you have multi-national participants. Acceptance of foreign credit cards has been a hassle to deal with at times.

Pros_Review: This in genius software allows event planners to leverage on technology for total management of invites and attendee data and analytics. Very easy to use.
Cons_Review: Security concerns as to security of the data generated. Basic design.  Slow rate of adoption buy event planners. Has not reached its full potential

Pros_Review: You can post pictures and links for people to view and you receive notification emails when an event ticket is purchased to keep informed on the number of attendees.
