Cons_Review: When going to the Eventbrite's  website it's so many posted advertised events, I get lost trying to find what I'm specifically looking for.

Pros_Review: We use that solution for our meeting organisation. We took a look the a lot of platform and EventBrite was the best for our needs. They are not too costly and our customer can easily get ticket and get all the information that they want. You also can use their ticket validation system at your meeting entrance. I contacted the customer service to get answer to our question and they were very responsive and help us understand the benefits of their system. They also have a mobile app.
Cons_Review: I do not have a cons for event brite. They offer all that we needed for our meeting and customer service is awsome.

Pros_Review: It looks professional and easy to share, very easy to use. I like that free events are free to post on Eventbrite
Cons_Review: They have high fees for paid events, and there are some functions that are difficult to find. And it`s not easy to search for events

Pros_Review: Very smooth and straightforward event management software. Has many bells and whistles to help you promote and manage your event on and offline.
Cons_Review: Works on a "percentage of sales" fee model that can be pricey especially when selling a large volume of tickets or when selling high priced ticketed events.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use and seems to be a great way to ticket events, have registered for many events and seminars that use this system and it works well.
I like the fast loading and ease of use of this simple app. It's also nice to be able to search the events around me.
Cons_Review: It'd be great if the app had a more bare-bones list view of events. The scroll view seems to have many different kinds of info that doesn't hang together in a way that's easy to understand.

Pros_Review: I use this software to purchase tickets to local events and shows.  It's pretty easy to maneuver around the site to get what I am looking for.

Overall_Review: Great applications for events.
Pros_Review:
Easy to use, great user interface for the ones who will register and the admins.
Easy and fast response in the QR code scanning.
Cons_Review:
You need two applications to manager your event.
In Mexico there is not a good customer support, we need to contact someone else in United States.

Pros_Review: Seems good for finding and promoting events in a particular area, and for the most part it has worked well for me as an event attendee.
Cons_Review: Today when I tried to register for the Software Advice SXSA Party, I downloaded the mobile app and was not able to choose a quantity of tickets. Which meant I wasn't able to register for the event. The moble website worked, but the app didn't. At all.

Overall_Review: Product is not intuitive enough in user interace.  Needs deeper features for event data.  Pleased with registration portion of service.
Pros_Review: Registration tracking output
Cons_Review: Not intuitive enough

Overall_Review: Generally, Eventbrite is easy to use and very useful to organize events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is perfect tool to organize and share events to participants. The dashboard is packed with lots of useful features. The best part is that it allow you create events for free as long as the event is not  paid for.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is a great software, it works perfectly fine for me. I have had no issue using the software.

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite has been useful and allows you to share an event and get people to register.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to share with others and you are able to spread the word about an event you are hosting. You are also able to set up payment for the event.
Cons_Review: I don't like the length of time it takes for you to receive a refund if an event is canceled. I think they need to make this process easier.

Overall_Review: The overall experience has been great.  I would recommend this software.
Pros_Review: The ease of use was what I liked most about this software.  They make it incredibly easy to set up and provide you with the tools needed to be successful.
Cons_Review: I feel there could be more features to the software.  I feel this is the only downfall, other than that it's been great.

Overall_Review: Overall a good experience.  Reminders for upcoming events is very useful.
Pros_Review: This software provides a quick and seamless way to sign up for conferences, webinars, etc.
Cons_Review: Refunding a missed course took a little time.  But that is the only complaint.

Overall_Review: The Eventbrite has helped us to reach more audience to attend our events.
Pros_Review: the software allows us to post events we are hosting and also it's easier to use to check other events being organised by organisations who are in our field.
Cons_Review: the only concern is that most people in Zimbabwe do not use the software to publish their events, if more organizations used it, it would increase attendance significantly

Overall_Review: I have used eventbrite for work events and recruitment purposes for a college
Pros_Review: I like that this source is kept free for the basic templates and can be used for easy event invites. This is good if you are responsible for group invites going out over email or large groups.
Cons_Review: The templates are simple and a bit limited. If you are looking for something very visually appealing, this might not be the best site for you.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an exceptional software that allows customers to use it with ease to plan events, take payment, and schedule.
Pros_Review: This software is amazing for planning events.  We use it to plan educational training, parent conferences, family events and much more.  Its super easy to use.
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons on this product.  It meets all of the needs of my company.  The parents and staff love what it offers.

Overall_Review: We decided to go with another service that allows us to create our website in addition to providing event registration.
Pros_Review: The cost of the service is minimal compared to other services.   It is fairly easy to create eblast invitations.
Cons_Review: You are limited to what you can create.  Payment systems have to be separately integrated.  We decided to go with another service.

Pros_Review: I like how everything can be saved to my "wallet" on my iPhone, which makes finding events a breeze, instead of searching my entire inbox. The user experience is also very friendly.
Cons_Review: I enjoy the application on the browser better than the mobile app, even when I use the browser on my phone. Also, I think customer service responses could be faster. Overall not much to complain about

Pros_Review: I love this software! I'm a musician so I love going to concerts, this software is so great because I can use it to buy tickets online and it's so easy to use.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I disliked about this software! I think is it excellent and nothing they need to changed.

Overall_Review: Great for free event invites and purchasing tickets
Pros_Review:
Eventbrite makes it very simple to set up event invites for free events. For free events, Eventbrite makes it easy to invite and communicate with attendees, and the design they provide for you is great for a free service.
I've also used Eventbrite to purchase tickets to events. The interface is clean and simple and I have always gotten into the events without any problems.
Cons_Review: I have not used it for paid events, but I've heard that the fees can be expensive. For free events, this platform is great.

Overall_Review: Events can be searched easily by the user through their online platform. Offers multiple payment methods to make ticket purchases. Gives the event creator a way to keep track of attendance and ticket sales through web page analytics and email notifications.
Pros_Review: Ideal software when organizing events and wanting to keep track of attendance. Offers event planners to post their events online to reach a wider audience. I used it to create networking events in the bergen country area.
Cons_Review: The loading time of ticket analytics can be slow. But overall it is an ideal service for event planners and organizers.

Overall_Review: I believe when an organization needs an outside ticket manager, Eventbrite would be a great place to start.
Pros_Review: I used Eventbrite to purchase tickets for my family. It was very easy to use and didn't give me a "countdown until your tickets are released" time limit, which I liked. It linked to PayPal, so it was easy for me to pay. Simple, no huge fees for the buyer. It seems as if it is designed for smaller groups and it would be easy for them to use.
Cons_Review: This was my first experience with Everbrite. I did not experience any problems, there was nothing notable to "like least" about it.

Overall_Review: It provides an easy way to collect the tickets for your registered events in a single silo.
Pros_Review: Working with Eventbrite is pretty straightforward. You can register for your desired events, and Eventbrite will take care of your tickets.
Cons_Review: I do not remember any particular weaknesses. The only thing is the events the app suggests may not align much with your preferences, but you always can unsubscribe.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an absolute necessity for our events now that we have been using it for a while.
Pros_Review: Free registration for an unlimited number of participants is the most amazing feature of Eventbrite's software. Thank you for helping us stay organized.
Cons_Review: The purposes for which we use Eventbrite have led to our having a perfectly positive experience with this software. We have not had a single complaint.

Overall_Review: Overall, use eventbrite for almost our events because it's so user friendly anyone can use it.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes setting up company events or meetups super easy, you can easily keep track of attendees, share the list with a concierge or volunteers and make your life easier.
Cons_Review: Sometimes, depending on service, searching for an attendee can take a long time. The scan feature doesn't work 1/3 of the time.

Overall_Review: I've been using it for all the past events I've been to and it's simple to use if you attend a lot of events
Pros_Review: Simple information given about the event and quick purchase
Cons_Review: Sometimes the details given weren't accurate or gave enough time information

Overall_Review: Simple to use event meet up platform for all kinds of users.
Pros_Review: I like how versatile eventbrite is! There are a ton of events related to design and technology. Even for social events outside of work! it's my go to site to find events in Chicago.
Cons_Review: They could use better filters on their main site. The categories seem a bit random , and I think the event type filter should be more prominent.

Pros_Review: I love being able to post an event and sell tickets for them without hassle. I also love being a end-user and purchasing tickets to events also without hassle. Great software.
Cons_Review: There are really no cons to Eventbrite software. I enjoy using it.

Pros_Review: I like the accessibility to the platform to me and all my event members from anywhere.
Cons_Review: Some of the online features are not user friendly. However, I did use the free version which is bound to have limits.
reasons_choosing: It was free to use.

Pros_Review: I think this is a really easy place to get tickets from, and it doesn't make you sign up for certain things, which I think is really nice.
Cons_Review: I haven't had any issues with this so far. It's nice knowing my tickets wont get lost with this software.

Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite for years to organise my events. The fee structure is low and fair, and gives you free marketing through its powerful Google presence.
Cons_Review: No major complaints - it does everything I need it to at a very reasonable price.

Overall_Review: Since our events are free and open to the public, Eventbrite is a great option to track our attendees and get more attention for our event.
Pros_Review: The formatting and features were straight forward and easy to use. Easy to track the events and RSVP. Able to publicly post events to Eventbrite audience to attract more attendees.
Cons_Review: High transaction fees for paid events and some of the settings are difficult to change.

Overall_Review: I love that this product is easy to use in purchasing tickets for local events.
Pros_Review: I love that this program allows me to easily find and purchase tickets for events in my area.
Cons_Review: Sometimes I have a hard time finding my ticket inside the app.

Overall_Review: Love it great to plan an event!
Pros_Review: Great event management platform because it automates the confirmation and ticket process of your event, and integrates with CRMs.
Cons_Review: I would like the ability to customize the ticket, but not a must.

Pros_Review: I've attended several events which distribute tickets through Eventbrite. It's easy to RSVP, access tickets, see event info, and even change RSVP status if plans change.
Cons_Review: I have only had good experiences with this software!

Pros_Review: It's very easy to get started, and people are aware of the brand and willing to use it. Good reminder options as well.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite doesn't integrate with the CRM we use, so we had to do everything manually on the back end.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is brilliant. It's simple to use and includes a variety of events based on different interests. I came across several events with no issue and obtaining tickets is a breeze. They are conveniently available within the app, so there's no need to print paper tickets. I like that it sends notifications of upcoming events that I may be interested in attending.
Cons_Review: The search function has room for improvement and it would be helpful to get suggestions for events in major cities as well. Events that I've "liked" often hadn't been saved.

Pros_Review: Easy way to create, manage and track events, attendance, etc.
Cons_Review: Somewhat buggy - often have clients saying they aren't able to access the page, or register properly, etc. Support is usually very good in resolving these issues.

Overall_Review: It is a easy way to send out invitations to events and get responses.
Pros_Review: Very easy to use and you receive your confirmation immediately.  It is also appears in my g-mail schedule of events.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything to Not like.  It is a very product.

Pros_Review: I love the ease of purchasing tickets without the hassle of some of the larger ticket websites! Everything was easy and simple to use and check in at the events!
Cons_Review: I haven't had any issues when utilizing Eventbrite

Overall_Review: All in all, I have enjoyed using this and will continue to use and recommend this in the future.
Pros_Review: This a very easy software to learn and utilize for any events you may be planning and create and easy payment structure.
Cons_Review: I have had this software sometimes have errors and not load up once payment is put it, which does make me think that maybe it was not received until the confirmation email comes in.

Overall_Review: We host seminars, events and training at a dealership.  we use this to get a rough head count to prepare for these types of events.
Pros_Review: free options for when you need a head count but do not need it to be customer facing
Cons_Review: has sooo many options that sometimes it is confusing

Overall_Review: Amazing, simple, easy-to-use, time-saver.
Pros_Review: Super easy to use. So helpful to have a central hub to buy tickets for church events. Saves so much time and e-mails for admin staff.
Cons_Review: No cons at this point, this tool helps sell tickets smoothly.

Pros_Review: I loved the Faebook integration that allowed me to easily advertise to my friends and then link the, to pay directly on the Eventbrite site.
Cons_Review: People complained about the added fee (myself included) on top of the price of the admission.

Overall_Review: It worked well when I needed to RSVP to the event and find the info about it.
Pros_Review: The event I wanted to attend was available through Eventbrite and it had all the information on it that I needed.
Cons_Review: It was just a little clunky but they've been making it better with updates.

Overall_Review: The new feature of being able to integrate with Facebook has been huge for us in promoting events. Overall, I've found it much easier to plan and manage events with Eventbrite. It takes so many admin style tasks off the table.
Pros_Review: The analytics/dashboard overview.  This made it very easy to stay on top of your event and easily get a feel for the performance of your marketing/ticket sales. It also makes it easy to manage any aspect of your event.
Cons_Review: I am yet to come across anything that I dislike about this software. It works well and has all the functions one might expect from an events management software.

Pros_Review: I've used this mostly to purchase tickets, and have the app. It's easy to use and pick seats. It's realia L1E and easy to retrieve the ticket.
Cons_Review: There's usually a few but it's not too much and it's expected. I definitely wouldn't avoid purchasing tickets because of it.

Pros_Review: We can advertise events easily and for low cost.
Cons_Review: The man power required to set up the event info.

Pros_Review: This is a very nice platform for getting updates about the events happening and getting the tickets for that instead of searching for them here and there.
Cons_Review: May be more user friendly platform and few more features.

Overall_Review: Help me find tickets to a few concerts and festivals I like how it has local events and national events
Pros_Review: Great reviews and very easy to use. You also can find out about a different variety of events
Cons_Review: To be honest I like everything about it , it can be an Improvement on customer support

Overall_Review: I use to set up leadership luncheons events. It allows me to better see attendance so I can better plan catering and seating
Pros_Review: So easy to use, set up, track sales and collect payments for events
Cons_Review: i wish there were more event themes for the event pages but it gets the job done well anyways

Pros_Review: I enjoy the easily customizable invites and the "text to invite" feature.
Cons_Review: I have not had any issues with this product.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and manage tickets and events
Cons_Review: Not a lot of room for customization and other template designs

Pros_Review: Event tickets are easy to find/store on your phone and RSVP for events is easy because your information is saved once you create an account.
Cons_Review: I do not like the emails I receive about events that I am not interested in after signing up for an account.

Overall_Review: Like the fact that I can sign up to as many events that I would like to join in on.
Pros_Review: With just a few clicks you can be signed up to dozens of events in your local city/town.
Cons_Review: I like everything about this software, no complaints from me.

Pros_Review: It is easy to RSVP for events. The reminder email that eventbrite sends the day of the event is a great way to boost turnout.
Cons_Review: You need another platform (such as facebook, instagram) to raise awareness about the event which requires referring people to eventbrite to register, which adds another step. This is especially cumbersome when people find the event through a poster or flyer instead of on the internet.

Pros_Review: I like that this software allows me to invite many people to an event at one time, I can keep up with rsvp's, comments and pictures all in the same place!
Cons_Review: The description section on the invitation does not allow for a lot of information to be added.

Pros_Review: We used Eventbrite on a  conference website and it is a great event platform overall with things like discounted tickets and online payments.
Cons_Review: The embedable widgets are rather basic with few customization options.

Pros_Review: I like the user interface and the opportunity to organize events, followup with the participant also send them reminders
Cons_Review: the Current UX is the worst the UX before this was better , everybody is not artist also coming from IT performance and familiarity if the tool is priority

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to organize your event with Eventbrite and issue tickets, even for free events. It lets you track who's coming and check them in easily with the iOS app.
Cons_Review: Adding more functionality to the iOS app would be a good start but overall, great!

Overall_Review: The experience has been fairly good, no complaints but no extraordinary good features
Pros_Review: The range of events that the system has and vice versa almost any events ticket sale can be coordinated via Eventbrite
Cons_Review: The mobile UI is a bit unconventional and hence difficult the get around.

Pros_Review: Less fees than competitors!  I also like that the interface of the ticketing page is simple and easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: Still charging fees to use.  I don't really understand why presale tickets for events need to be so much more expensive than buying at the box office.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was very simple to use and effectively completed the tasks it is trying to facilitate.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: Positive
Pros_Review: Ease of use, user friendly, well laid out webpage
Cons_Review: I have absolutely no criticisms of the software

Overall_Review: Far more effective than just a social media event page.
Pros_Review: Makes running events easy.  Ticket your event to make it feel more epic or simply manage attendance, this does it all!
Cons_Review: Doesn't have a lot of options to promote your event, just a tool to keep track of who you convinced to come.

Pros_Review: This software is excellent for purchasing and selling event tickets. This works for free events as well. People can access this software from any electronic device and have access to their tickets.
Cons_Review: I have not encountered any problems with this software.

Pros_Review: The only thing I can think of is software is such a great tool for me to use and handle my business with few clicks
Cons_Review: The time of proceses is not a good thing of this software and the function of page is too much in the same one

Pros_Review: It's easy to set up a page for your event, and easy to advertise. It's great that you can edit the URL for your page, so that it's easier to remember than something with too many numbers, etc. I also really like that you can do different ticket types, and that the payout method is rather easy.
Cons_Review: It costs extra money to do many things such as using separate ticket types and you also aren't able to change your payout type once you have sold your first ticket (EventBrite Payment Processing vs. PayPal, etc). Also, the whole QR code check-in process is quite complicated.

Pros_Review: The event discovery platform is invaluable to promoting local events. The software is is intuitive enough for all members of our team.
Cons_Review: We have been encountering problems with the Facebook integration, but the eventbrite team is working to solve them.

Pros_Review: this platform helps create events demonstrating to the users security, charge before the event making offers and thus attract more users
Cons_Review: So far I do not know what I do not like about this platform, but I think it's very intuitive and useful when creating an event

Pros_Review: Easy to use and search for events you are most likely to attend. Sync between web and app works perfect.
Cons_Review: Despite the fact the the app works great, updates are a bit larger than I would like. You don't use the app that often to have update notifications every couple of days.

Pros_Review: The interface is really clean and it's easy to set up an event. Allows for customization and promotion of event. Easy to share.
Cons_Review: The price would be the only thing. It's percentage based, but honestly, worth every penny to take the work out organizing this portion of the event.

Pros_Review: Can send invites digitally and easily track RSVPs. It's also nice to be able to send messages to guests about event updates!
Cons_Review: Fees apply based on number of invitees. Limited options for event designs. Frequent messages sent from software to event owner and attendees.

Pros_Review: I signed up for a continuing education course using this website. On the day of the event it made finding my ticket very easy. The event hosts also used this service to send communication to attendees. Each of these correspondance emails included the downloadable mobile ticket, the address of the event with links to google maps, and the information from the host. This made it extremely easy to find everything I needed on the day of the event.
Cons_Review: I found zero cons with this software. I really liked the service and would use it again. It was a pleasure to use compared to other ticket services.

Pros_Review: Great and very well organized tool to have to organize and event. Needless to say that it definitely is one of the best tools out there.
Cons_Review: We have had absolutely no problems whatsoever with them, even the customer service is very welcoming and knowledgable.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to find local events. I like that it lets you search by event type and location and create a free profile to manage your tickets.
Cons_Review: I have not had any issues using Eventbrite so far so there's nothing I can think of as a con at the moment.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite helps you collect all customer information you need for events. Ticket purchasing is super easy. And customization for the event pages is sweet!
Cons_Review: There is nothing that I have come across on this software that I do not like.  Eventbrite is a great tool.

Pros_Review: I love that they only take a percentage when you are charging your attendees for tickets; free events are free for us to use eventbrite!
Cons_Review: I have NO problems with this software. It keeps me organized!                                       .

Pros_Review: Easy to track invites and RSVPs, great exportable lists, and very intuitive functionality. Really impressed!
Cons_Review: Maybe I'm just not using it in the correct way, but you should be able to view people who aren't attending.

Pros_Review: This has been an easy enough app to use, simple way to access events and pay for them in the app. Emails with updates for other events I might also enjoy.
Cons_Review: there has been formatting issues at times with some of the smaller meetings that are not professional

Pros_Review: I like that I can book event tickets and pay for them in one app and I don't need to print a ticket, can just show my smartphone
Cons_Review: Sometimes it shows that my old events are still "upcoming" - this is confusing. Recommendation system is not always relevant to me

Pros_Review: The app is easy to use and intuitive. It didn't have a steel learning curve. I spent maybe 10 minutes setting up my event, or less.
Cons_Review: I would like to see more options around selecting pictures to customize my event page. For example, editing the picture background.

Pros_Review: I like the interface, the simplicity, the visual design, and the functionality.   Eventbrite is a well designed application that makes event tickets a breeze to purchase.
Cons_Review: The application could help offer more incentives and discounts, and offer more tools to look for events by category.

Pros_Review: Great way to organize the invitee and attendees for any event. App works great, website is easy to maneuver, and is free!
The ability to create multiple types of tickets for various events, helps ensure we are planning for the appropriate number of people.
Cons_Review: The only option to collect payment is currently pay pal which charges a fee, adding other options such a donor box would be helpful!

Overall_Review: Easy to use. Reduces time managing registrations. Low cost. No spreadsheets!!
Pros_Review: It's ease of use and how you can personlise it to your companies look and feel. People are also very famililar with event brite and are happy to use it and sign up.
Cons_Review: If you are running break out rooms and mini events it's difficult to break down the eventbrite invitation. The page showing you has registered isn't very easy to understand. It's only ideal for small and easy events.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite does it all! It's super easy to use, and the flexibility and functionality allows us to utilize it for free and paid events. Even if you have one event happening multiple times, Eventbrite makes it easy for people to choose their date and get the information they need.

Overall_Review: As the founder of BostonTweetUp, an event planning and promotional service, and a networker that goes to 2-3 / night I have found Eventbrite to be one of the easiest and must feature rich event registration tools in the market.  Since my role is both an event organizer as well as an attendee I review and use products that can handle at least those persprectives very well. I was an early adopter of the product and have been recommending the product to almost all the event organizers I work with. I highly recommend the current product and I'm also looking forward to hearing about the new things they have in store.
Overall, I appreciate the ease of using Eventbrite. It is very convenient to sign up for an event and add it to my calendar.
Pros_Review: I love when program organizers use Eventbrite as a platform for signing up for events. It makes adding it to my calendar so easy!
Cons_Review: I do not have any complaints about Eventbrite - I can't imagine it being more simple to use and it does exactly what is needed.

Overall_Review: Overall I couldn't complain. I ended booking another even through them for the holidays. We also set up a free event through eventbrite prior to the virus and it was successful.  Eventbrite made it so easy to schedule and process tickets.
Pros_Review: Its extremely user friendly! I used Eventbrite for the 1st time last year. There was a local food truck event close by, I booked tickets and immediately received my tickets by email. It was super easy.
Cons_Review: I loved everything about it. They explain everything about the events,  refunds and in case its canceled.  No complaints.

Overall_Review: It is a good app that I think everyone should try.
Pros_Review: I am able to find the event I was looking for precisely, has a great and simplistic user interface, I am able to present ticket information through the app when attending the event.
Cons_Review: I did not find anything wrong while using Eventbrite, it is a good app to check or set up events, the user interface is on the spot.

Overall_Review: It has been a fantastic help and it is very easy to set up everything and manage the information.
Pros_Review:
This tool has been a great help in event management. It is very easy to set up the event and manage the participants.

It keeps participants informed about everything and the reminders work very well.
Cons_Review: Nothing really material. However, it would be good to be able to further customise the check out and data requested from participants. It would be important to include a check-the-box for the organiser's privacy policy as well.

Overall_Review: We have using Eventbrite for technical events, online and also presential. It´s nice because we can have access for important informations about the attendes. So, after the event we can make contact with them.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has helped our organization a lot to create great events. It has helped us with the online registrations and also to track the attende´s personal informations
Cons_Review: It´s a little expensive the taxes of each registration. But, it worthes the investment based on the features.
reasons_choosing: Eventbrite is easier to use than other options on the market

Pros_Review: I like to post online events to Eventbrite because many people find the event directly through the Eventbrite platform, so it's a way of getting more attendees.
Cons_Review: It would be great to have integration with Slack

Overall_Review: Overall I would say Eventbrite is a great resource to have for community theaters, comedians, and local bands.
Pros_Review: The biggest reason for using Eventbrite is how easy it is to setup our own ticketing. Being a performer, I need to have a cheap or free way to sell myself to the public and provide the best options for people to purchase. They step you through the process and make it easy to track sales.
Cons_Review: I occasionally wish the customer dashboard was less cluttered and easier to navigate, but overall my complaints are minimal.

Overall_Review: customize event description and order experience with digital passes for hosting events with internal attendees that need to be tracked and documented
Pros_Review: our internal events are always hosted as free to attendees so there is no cost from eventbrite for hosting free events
Cons_Review: do not use customer support because of the internal distribution aspect so no need to market or share to public

Overall_Review: More advertising would be great because people need this right now.
Pros_Review: My friend introduced me to event brite for a party where she showed the things she made for her business.  I love it and it's really important to stay connected with others during this time.
Cons_Review: The only disappointment I have is not knowing about it sooner lol. It has been great using it and will continue.

Overall_Review: We promote our events here and generally we get people that sign up that otherwise would not have signed up or attended our events.
Pros_Review: Their software is pretty easy to us if you interested in promoting an upcoming event, this is certainty a great place to do it.
Cons_Review: There really is not any thing that I don't like about their software so far I have not had any problems at all with it.

Overall_Review: It makes planning an event and attending events easy.
Pros_Review: You have all your tickets digitally stored. It's easy to pay and get updates. If you're having a get together it is easy to communicate with guests.
Cons_Review: I have had a few small issues but there was always an update before I could complain. Sometimes I print tickets because if my phone dies I won't have the app available.

Overall_Review: Easy to use, not as easy to get rid of. It would be a better product without the spam.
Pros_Review: What I like most about this software is that it allows one to participate in organized events easily.
Cons_Review: What I don't like is the constant spam emails that are sent to me after using this software one time.

Pros_Review: I like that it has a mobile app - that is helpful.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite has too busy of a design. There are too many options of things to display and the website takes too long to post things. I'd rather use a Facebook event with other payment options or have ticket sales at the door.

Pros_Review: Diversity of events: social, networking, learning, marketing etc.
Cons_Review: I wish they had a feature of applying additional filter of cost on the application:(

Overall_Review: I have used this with my son's school to set up volunteering and parties.  Also my son's swim team to help with volunteering and filling coaches coolers.
Pros_Review: It is very easy to use to have a party or volunteering set up.  It also sends reminders to help with a hectic lifestyle.
Cons_Review: It doesn't let you change times if you don't set up your own account.  Other than that, there is nothing negative.

Overall_Review: For the right sized events they are great. Great they don't charge for no cost events. A good option for many medium boutique events.
Pros_Review: It's very accessible. Fees are connected with the income of the event which makes it very manageable. The ability to absorb costs is handy too. Fees may seem a little high depending on your type of event but all things considered they provide good value. Listing your event creates some good exposure too.
Cons_Review: There are some lower cost entrants but when you consider the overall package and the need for reliability, it seems pretty fair

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is useful for some events but not as helpful when planning.
Pros_Review: I think its nice to have software that allows you to discover local events for you to enjoy with friends and family.
Cons_Review: There really is not a clean filtering feature and many events are not updated with accurate times or admission prices.

Overall_Review: Great program to either find upcoming events or post and market your own - it's a name that people recognize and trust too
Pros_Review:
The integration with my calendar is wonderful - I can find events easily and sign up and not worry if I will remember to add them to my calendar. 

For organizing an event this helps ensure that my guests are away of what's coming, and it links through with their ticket information.
Cons_Review: The chat feature with the organizer of the event isn't always smooth and I've found that notifications get missed sometimes

Pros_Review: I notice that most concert venues are using Eventbrite now and I must say it makes it much easier to purchase tickets online with this company.
Cons_Review: The only thing I've noticed is that sometimes the information on Eventbrite is different from the information listed on the venue site and that can be annoying since you don't know which one is correct.

Pros_Review: The Eventbrite platform was introduced to our small festival to assist in organizing.  We learned a lot about better organization as a result of the exposure.
Cons_Review: The cost was completely out of our budget.

Overall_Review: My overall experience with eventbrite is cool i find what i need
Pros_Review: The thing that i like most about this software is that you can really find tickets to any event available.
Cons_Review: I least like that the app for this software is not like going on the actual browser. Its doesn't have alot of features

Overall_Review: Overall, I would recommend others to use it. It's a popular software and many law firm knows about it so it's nice to talk to others about it for suggestions and create quick events.
Pros_Review: This software is easy to use. It's also easy on the eyes and easy to manage.
Cons_Review: When we want to add a certain feature or edits, it's not as simple as the software makes it out to be. That is when we would need to call customer service, which sometimes takes a while, but once we get them on hold, it's easy to fix. However, it would be nice to not have to call customer service.

Overall_Review: We use this when scheduling large events or trainings.
Pros_Review: This system makes it very easy to set up a meeting or event. In the learning and development world, this is very important!
Cons_Review: This is a really useful tool, and although I don't have much to say negatively about the actually software, I wish that it was a little less generic and had some more interesting designs!

Overall_Review: Overall, we used Eventbrite to help spread the word about events, but the lack of customization turned us off.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has a multitude of helpful features, tracking event attendees, selling tickets, spreading the word, and more!
Cons_Review: The event pages lack customizable options, and the program is overall a bit clunky.  Overcoming the learning curve can prove difficult, considering the lack of learning resources.

Overall_Review: Since my first event, we have been relying on Eventbrite to promote it.
Pros_Review: Ease of setting up an event and promoting it.
Cons_Review: Does not support all integrations. For example, had trouble integrating it with my design tool for website.

Pros_Review: Easy to setup for the most part. The ticket quantity was somewhat confusing in regards to having many different ticket packages.
Cons_Review: Not being able to add where we could send the guest a coupon with their ticket purchase.
reasons_choosing: Everyone buys a lot online it only made sense and made easier to sell tickets to a wide variety of people using Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Super easy and safe to purchase event tickets. Great software to keep your info safe
Cons_Review: Not much didnt like about it. It seems pretty safe to purchase tickets and you can print them out right away

Pros_Review: I like that it's easy to browse and narrow down and it's also easy to post events as well.
Cons_Review: I don't like that it lags at times and you have to go through multiple links to book an event sometimes.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite's ticketing system is super-easy to use for the users and pretty easy to set up by the administrators.
Cons_Review: The back-end has a slight learning curve but once mastered, makes event registration very easy.

Overall_Review: Overall being more efficient is the key and it helps us out.
Pros_Review: We like the ease of setting dates, appointments, meetings and events across the state.
Cons_Review: There's nothing Eventbrite can't handle.

Pros_Review: I love that my attendees can purchase tickets through Eventbrite with a fast and secure checkout.
Cons_Review: I like the functions Eventbrite offers and the ease of setting up ticket purchase for my events.

Pros_Review:
Easy to use
professional looking
consistent
ability for your event to be found by general public
Cons_Review:
Wish there were more options for exporting data from event
Wish it connected better with constant contact

Pros_Review: Easy to setup.  Great tools for your event.  Being listed on their webpage improved tickets sale without extra promotion.
Cons_Review: If you want to have custom html/css on you event page things could turn messy.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a platform that allows you to register or buy tickets to events. It is a great place to keep track of all of your tickets and events.
Cons_Review: Nothing negative based on my usage so far.

Pros_Review: The site is very easy to maneuver when you upload pictures and enter information.
Cons_Review: If you don't enter your payout details it will be hard to get your money on time. And I feel like the percentage fee could be cheaper.

Overall_Review: We used it in many TEDx events and courses in university
Pros_Review: Social networking integration, tickets selling, attendees management and the badge generator.
Cons_Review: The taxes may be heavy to hold depending on event budget.

Pros_Review: The fact that the software allows you to create events for free as long as attendance is free,  makes it the best in its category
Cons_Review: I have not found any thing wrong with the software,  it does the job.

Pros_Review: We used the free version of Eventbrite, as we did not charge for tickets to our event. We used it to promote hiring events and we got a decent turnout. We were able to get the word out about our open hiring event without having to spend money and the eventbrite system made it easy to share out with our social media.
Cons_Review: We had to make sure that we were all set for dates regarding the event. Setting it up in Eventbrite means that it would be difficult to change the date later as we had already gotten the word out.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to navigate, has an attractive interface, and is a very seamless product.
Cons_Review: When there are too many people trying to get a ticket for something at once the site gets glitchy and SLOW.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use.  Very affordable.  Makes advertising and collecting fees for events a breeze.
Cons_Review: Great for simple events with limited options - the more complex your event is, the more cumbersome the software can be

Pros_Review: User-friendly,  and doesn't require much time to get started.  Great for invitees to be able to see who else is going.
Cons_Review: Layouts are a little too busy, may benefit from some prioritization.

Pros_Review: The website was easy to use, and I was able to schedule event and send it to friends.
Cons_Review: NOthing, the software never received any complaints from friends and family when I created events through it.

Pros_Review: It's a great tool for tracking registrations for your event, big or small.
Cons_Review: Maybe it's a new option now, but I wish that it didn't always send attendees a ticket to print out, since not all events require that.

Pros_Review: It is the best used event software, and so is widely recognized across the world. It is easy to distribute to mailing lists.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite  charges a high percentage for ticket sales compared to other sites.

Pros_Review: I've used both the free and paid version of Eventbrite and I love them both. The platform offers so many great features to make your event go more smoothly, and look more professional. It helps a ton in management before, during and after the event.
Cons_Review: Paying per ticket fees isn't my favorite. I'd rather be charged a subscription fee and keep the additional fee.

Overall_Review: Im part of the activity committee who plan events in order to teach young college students about the importance of financial responsability in life so they can have a brighter and better future.
Pros_Review: I love the simplicity of the App by giving you the option to post an event that you're planning with the objective of more people to attend.
Cons_Review: I can honestly say that I do not dislike anything about this App.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy and saves time when planning an event online.
Pros_Review: Using Eventbrite is an easy and convenient way to organize and plan any event.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite provides the solution needed for planning an event online. No cons to speak of.

Pros_Review: As an active person, I love seeing all the events in the city and being able to look at them based on dates, locations, categories, etc.
Cons_Review: Nothing. I suggest this for people new to cities to get out an see the city and meet people.

Pros_Review: It's very convenient for setting up events. The app version helps with managing said event as well. You can easily check in the guests and enter in any people who didn't sign up. It also exports the information very neatly for you so you can collect information for future reference. You can also connect the app to other programs to send invites.
Cons_Review: The interface could have some more work. For example, in the app version when checking in you just swipe the person. But if there's a lot of people, you take a lot of time searching for the name even if it's typeable.

Overall_Review: Overall, I prefer to do my own event invitations directly on my website ... but this is a viable solution.
Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite off an on over the years.  It's simple enough to use, and effective.
Cons_Review: I found it complicated to keep track of attendees, and make changes.  Not impressed with paid event processing.

Pros_Review: What I like most about this program is that it integrates well with Facebook, Mailchimp, and Wordpress.
Cons_Review: What I least like about this program was the end of the referral program which makes it less beneficial to promote through this program.

Overall_Review: I had purchased tickets before with Eventbrite and found it easy to work with. I recently set up an event and sold tickets through the app. As someone who has sold tickets manually without the aid of a computer program, I was blown away by the easy setup process and thrilled with the simplicity of checking on ticket sales. Following the event, Eventbrite was very expeditious in sending ticket sale funds to my account. I would highly recommend this app!
Pros_Review: Easy to set up. Very user-friendly. Easy to check on ticket sales and professional dashboard for ticket buyers.
Cons_Review: I can't say I found anything that I did not like in this software.

Pros_Review: I love that they offer events from every big city. I never run out of things to do, especially for small lesser known events.
Cons_Review: There is nothing about Eventbrite that I do not like.

Overall_Review: It is helpful for both event planners and event attendees. It is also great you can use it on a smartphone.
Pros_Review: I like the convience of being able to sign up for an event or on the other end to keep track of attendees.
Cons_Review: I don't have any negative comments about Eventbrite

Overall_Review: I've used it registered for small meetings outside of my business.  For the people administering Eventbrite, it's a good solution but for someone like me who handles registrations daily, you may need something more robust.
Pros_Review: Easy to use if you are organizing a small event by yourself.  It can handle basic registration functions.
Cons_Review: Once I registered through Eventbrite, I continue to get marketing emails.  If I had known my email address would be used this way, I would have not registered for the event.

Overall_Review: It has helped us connect with guests for events and for them to interact with us, leading to greater engagement.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, cost effective, great interaction between attendees and host!
Cons_Review: nothing - very pleased with the capabilities of EventBrite!

Overall_Review: Overall I think EventBrite  does an awesome job - both as an event host and a user.
Pros_Review: I liked that it was a free service. I worked for a nonprofit, so our budget was very limited. Also tracking attendees and the ablility to print a RSVP list for the event was so helpful!
Cons_Review: Sometimes I found it clunky to work with, especially if I was trying to make several diffferent offers or packages per each event.

Overall_Review: Very good will use again in the future
Pros_Review: I have used eventbrite to acquire tickets for events before along with various other sites, eventbrite makes it easy
Cons_Review: Sometimes the page will file out before I have finished my transaction

Overall_Review: We moved on from Eventbrite this last year and do not regret it.
Pros_Review: I like that people are familiar with the name Eventbrite. It is a trusted brand that people can easily identify with.
Cons_Review: The transaction fees were steep. We were so thankful to discover another solution that offered cheaper rates and more functionality.

Pros_Review: It provided an easy and efficient platform to buy and sell tickets. For example, I Purchased tickets to an influencer event and it was so easy and quick- took maybe 3 minutes.
Cons_Review: It doesn't provide access to larger events like concerts

Overall_Review: Generally good, no real complaints.
Pros_Review: It is very versatile; you can use this software for fundraisers, lectures, webinars, or parties. I like how Eventbrite provides analytics as well so you can see when/why there was a sudden surge in attendance/sales. I like how Eventbrite can also track ticket sales and notify you when the payout/check was sent.
Cons_Review: Not much I dislike. If anything, I wish there were less fees applied to the tickets sold (a certain percentage taken for credit card processing, flat fee per ticket and 2.5% taken from ticket price).

Overall_Review: The set-up experience and seamless. Even non-techies can use this service.
Pros_Review: One of the fastest and easiest ways to create and promote an event in your local area.
Cons_Review: Would be nice if there was more customization options on the actual design of the page.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite helps me know what's going on in any city I visit to make sure I have a good time.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite only has a limited amount of filters which makes it difficult to pinpoint totally specific venues that offer the services I want to visit.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is increible for event planning. The software is very friendly and has all the features necessary to plan the events, set the dates and sell tickets. It also has amazing features for clients, such as, the app. The app will the the user what, where and when to go to the event.
Cons_Review: I think there is nothing to improve. I like pretty much everything about this software

Pros_Review: I like that Eventbright is easy to use and lots of companies use it so you can register for their events.
Cons_Review: Sometimes when you use Eventbright to register for events your receipt tells you the name of the event but not the actual company that is putting on the event.

Overall_Review: Gained exposure to my event. Successfully recited new members.
Pros_Review: I've used Eventbrite to recruit interested in my sports team. Generally low maintenance, this platform lets you customize your event from type of ticketing/rsvp to occurrences.
Cons_Review: My main problem when the platform in the past was when I tried to cancel an event. When attempting to cancel my free event, the platform would not allow me to do so because people had rsvp'd. While I understand the need to restrict quick cancellation of paid events, this should not be required for free rsvp events.

Pros_Review: I love that they keep you updated via email on tickets and the ease of use of the App to get bookings
Cons_Review: Sometimes the quality of the events and people are not always as advertised which can be disappointing

Pros_Review: We recently had a large company wide event with over 3000 people and it was PERFECT for it!! Made organization so easy!
Cons_Review: Don't have anything bad to say! It was easy to set up, easy to share, and easy to use in general! Great!

Pros_Review: Selling different types of tickets (including promo codes), customizing order form and exporting attendee lists.
Cons_Review: The payment processing options are a bit restrictive and some of the ways to export spreadsheets are a little convoluted.

Pros_Review: This platform is not only easy to plan events, but also very easy to following other events so that you're not missing anything.
Cons_Review: I cannot think of a con right now. I would say to watch out for scam events so that you don't get ripped off.

Overall_Review: Easy way to sign attendees up for an event and track them the numbers for preparation purposes as well!
Pros_Review: The ease of Use of the platform and seamless integration into my calendars.  A really great application that should be utilized more often by businesses.
Cons_Review: There is really not much to not like about the application, but I think that users can do a better job of event description and dating when using it.

Pros_Review:
1) No extra charges to customers
2) Easy to use - On mobile and desktop
3) easy to make decision on tickets because of great UI
Cons_Review:
1) Technical and customer support could be improved
2) Sometime techincal issues while doing payment leading to frustration

Pros_Review: They manage the backend nicely, you can run a check or cash internally but include them in the count with everyone else, also they promote your events and they make it easy to communicate with your attendees.
Cons_Review: They are too expensive and no longer offer a non-profit option, and I was very upset by this and am looking for another option, but no one else seems to have all the pieces together.

Pros_Review: Easy to design an attractive webpage, reports are simple to read. Can use for free activities not just paid tickets.
Cons_Review: Data does not import directly into our system - have to re-enter ticket purchases in central  development database

Pros_Review: What I like most about this ticket purchase website is how easy it is to use!! Also I got notified immediately after the ticket purchase
Cons_Review: It would be better to see more advertising for this company so that i could tell people more about it without them being confused

Overall_Review: Easy to use and attractive.  Easy to set up and to integrate with existing lists.
Pros_Review: Easiness in useage
Cons_Review: Need more event covers

Overall_Review: Get it!
Pros_Review: Very easy to use for bands of all genres. Stupid not to buy it. Buy it buy it buy it buy it buy it buy it
Cons_Review: No cons at all stupid not to buy. So easy to use and easily accessible. Couldn't be easier!

Pros_Review: It list some fun events in the area.  Its easy to go through the items and search for items to do. I
Cons_Review: I wish there was more events listed in the area. Also, to include the whole Central Texas area and then expand statewide

Pros_Review: Accessibility and functionality is wonderful! I used the app this morning to rsvp for parties and it came in hand.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the app is a little slow but it really is of no inconvenience to me so i didn't mind at all

Overall_Review: Would love to see options for merchandise pairing at time of ticket sale - but all works really well!
Pros_Review: Easy to get started using

Overall_Review: I do like event brite but it's kinda confusing
Pros_Review: It's very user friendly and very relevant to my age group because I attend a lot of events and concerts.
Cons_Review: If you want to get a refund for the event, its tough because do you contact event brite or the ticket holder?

Overall_Review: I love eventbrite and i love attending events that people use eventbrite to set up. I have setup a couple of events and it is easy to enter all the information and set up tickets. They handle all the sales of tickets and everything you need. From an organizer perspective, day of checking in and verifying tickets is also a breeze using their mobile apps. You can have your ticket checkers / entry folks download the apps and sign in to your event and scan customer tickets / phones, OR look up the customers in a list and make sure they're allowed in.

Eventbrite is a go to for me when planning events, everything from happy hours to conferences. And especially repeat events since it's so easy to copy an event and adjust the settings. 

There are a few quirks in the product (like some features that are great but feel hidden), but nothing you can't learn about through trial and error, or by going through their extensive FAQ. 

Oh and if you're ever unsure, I always save my event to private first (not published publicly) and experiment with it live to see how the customer would react to it. Super helpful!

Eventbrite is my go to source for all my event publishing and promotion needs. I run a small non-profit that throws weekly events.  Eventbrite makes it easy to publish events (that look beautiful!), manage events, and promote events. Since using Eventbrite as our platform for ticket sales, we've seen a huge increase with new users because of their own marketing tools (which are easy to track). Additionally, their customer service is 5 stars and the reports/search mechanisms available are top notch. I truly love being an Eventbrite user and highly recommend their services.
Overall using Eventbrite for our events has been a positive experience.  It works across multiple devices and the updates are improving.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite enables my organization to host and plan events seamlessly.   We can track RSVP's and check in guests using their app.
Cons_Review: I wish the Eventbrite Android app was easier to use and the integration with email clients was smoother.

Overall_Review: Instead of keeping tracking of hard copies, Eventbrite does part of the work!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use and great for organizing ticketing for events. It easily tracks what's left and even shows seating.
Cons_Review: I find the layout of the software a little distracting in its design which is very minor. Aside from that I really enjoy using this platform.

Overall_Review: The overall experience with Eventbrite is awesome and it makes event and ticket management so much easier.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes event planning easy. It offers many kinds of event styles to choose from and help users issue and manage tickets.
Cons_Review: The least favorite part about Eventbrite is it requires a separate application from the main one to manage events.

Overall_Review: I love that Eventbrite is convenient to use for hosting personal events, such as weddings, bridal showers, baby showers, etc. It is definitely a software for sharing invitations to events.
Pros_Review: What I liked the most about Eventbrite are the examples they provide of distinct events to create with this software. Eventbrite also has a builder that conveniently scaffolds the creation of an event.
Cons_Review: What I liked least about this software is that Eventbrite is only free for events that are free themselves. Users have to pay fees for events they create that elicit potential earnings.

Overall_Review: Makes it easy to sign up and track what events you're attending.
Pros_Review: I use EventBrite mostly to sign up for corporate events (monthly digital marketing groups). It's easy to sign up and keep track of my registrations.
Cons_Review: I have to sign up using my corporate email to get into events for free, but want it linked to my personal email as I sometimes sign up for events that are not work related (concerts, movie festivals etc.). It's not easy or intuitive to make sure the right eventbrite account is being used (rather I'd like them to just let me link emails to one account).

Overall_Review: We have had an overall positive experience with this software.
Pros_Review: This software is great to organize our events and send invitations to Contacts as well as the general public alike. We use it a lot and enjoy the simplicity.
Cons_Review: We would like to see more network and sharing options within the software to link event staff and providers.

Pros_Review: I liked that it was easy to find events near me that cost little to no money. The process for reserving a ticket is easy, however as an administrator it was a little harder.
Cons_Review: I didn't know when making an event that eventbrite would take a percentage of ticket sales, but overall it's easier than other ticketing websites.

Overall_Review: I have had only good experiences with this.  I also like the reminders.
Pros_Review: I enjoy being able to communicate with a "mass" message and when someone reply's it doesn't respond to everyone.  Helps keep the organization.
Cons_Review: Some people have a hard time understanding the process but again, that might be a user error. Fun to use because you can personalize it.

Pros_Review: It helps you find a variety of events to attend throughout the US.
Cons_Review: They only offer certain categories of events and there are some industry events that aren't specified in the search.

Pros_Review: So easy to use! I accomplish my ticketing needs in minutes and then am able to get my ticket as a Apple wallet pass!
Cons_Review: Adding tickets to your Apple Wallet should be less clicks.

Overall_Review: Not only does Eventbrite make hosting an event so much easier, but they also have the option for you to create and brand beautiful landing pages for event goers to purchase tickets from.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes hosting company events so easy! In the past we were relying on social media and primarily Facebook to get the word out about our event and to keep track of attendance.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints so far! It is such a nice, clean, and organized system that anyone and any company can find helpful at a great price!

Pros_Review: We have purchased tickets to various training seminars and events through Eventbrite with no problems and no unexpected surprises.
Cons_Review: Nothing.  All tickets have been successful.

Pros_Review: Sending out a professional invite for a corporate event it works really well. Eventbrite has great mobile platform.
Cons_Review: It is new, not many people have it. RSVP for an event is difficult.

Overall_Review: It was good experience. Like I said earlier, it's very easy to use and navigate.
Pros_Review: It was easy to add an event to my calendar once I had confirmed I was attending the event. It was also easy to search for other events.
Cons_Review: There isn't much else to the software from what I can tell other than just using to publish events and sent invites to people.

Overall_Review: it's easy to use, it's fun and colourful, it's helpful
Pros_Review: I love using this to find out events near by or post events that myself as an author is hosting or my family business.
Cons_Review: I don't have much I don't like about this software except there have been times when events were out of date of expired and it says it on the website but not an ad showing it

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is my favorite way to buy tickets to events! Highly recommend it.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great, dynamic way to buy tickets to events. It is also simple to use, and even allows the user to find events in their area.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the website can be a little loud, but once one gets used to it, its a lot of fun, and in some ways reminds me of Fandango's website.

Overall_Review: For me, Eventbrite has become my go-to for selling tickets to workshops and events. I also have all my clients set up to help them mainstream their events. It really helps connect us with our target markets.
Pros_Review: I started using this product for my first workshop and the ease of setting it up and launching ticket sales was so simple. The simplicity of set up and opening ticket sales makes this one of my favorite products.
Cons_Review: Creating separate coupon codes can be challenging, especially if it's your first time working with the software.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use when creating events as well as browsing events to attend locally. The checkout process is easy as well!
Cons_Review: I wish it was easier to cancel tickets from the app.

Pros_Review: We used to have to track RSVP's manual. Now we don't, which is great.
Cons_Review: You don't always have control over the quality of information that is provided by other users.

Overall_Review: I have accepted many invitations, but have yet to set up an invitation.
Pros_Review: You can email invitations quickly and target only those you want to attend
Cons_Review: less flexibiilty than I like to decorate and personalize

Pros_Review: This service couldn't be easier, tickets show up as iPhone wallet items, making going to events smooth and hassle-free.
Cons_Review: Not everything in my neighborhood uses eventbrite yet.

Pros_Review: We used this for our family orientation and it was very easy to use. We were able to track all tickets purchased!
Cons_Review: It was challenging send out new invites for the same event.

Pros_Review: Always a great tool fir both business and personal use. Makes sending invites and gathering RSVPs a breeze.  I like the added features too.
Cons_Review: So far  have. Not encountered any issues.

Overall_Review: Has worked successfully every time I have used it.
Pros_Review: Easy to use for gathering RSVP's to events and creating tickets for attendees.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints at this time. This has always worked well for me.

Overall_Review: Great product, user friendly. I would definitely recommend.
Pros_Review: I love having a platform for events It has made organizing things much easier.
Cons_Review: The lack of customization in the invites that are sent out.

Overall_Review: By using Eventbrite, it's another tool we use to market to the demographic we want to capture.
Pros_Review: It's easy to use and set up events to promote our Air Conditioning and Plumbing company. You don't have to pay to use Eventbrite if you don't charge for the event, which we don't. We use it to market our company especially now that it's Summertime and warm out.
Cons_Review: No real complaints honestly. I've been on both ends of Eventbrite--setting up events and attending them--via Eventbrite and the experience felt easy.

Pros_Review: The ease of ability to set up an event and all of your guests, really simple.
Cons_Review: It does provide a lot of ads and follow ups on the free version, to be expected.

Pros_Review: I like that I can pull the app up on my phone when I go to a concert and don't have to worry about printing out my tickets!
Cons_Review: None...great software I have no complaints!

Pros_Review: This software provides an effective way to create and respond to events.
Cons_Review: While the software is neat and clear in appearance, it also appears overly simplistic.

Overall_Review: Selling tickets for events that need different tiers and attributes.
Pros_Review: Easy to sell and manage tickets and registrant lists.
Cons_Review: Doesn't integrate well with the tools I use, but that's my fault. So I manually do reporting with it.

Pros_Review: It's really easy to find events and concerts near your location, the app makes it easy to search and select and buy tickets
Cons_Review: Too many reminders auto-configured into the app

Pros_Review: Easy to use, all in one place, saves paper- I send a link now!  Saves me money on supplies. I am in love.
Cons_Review: I really don't have a negative to say. It does what I want it to do.

Pros_Review: The most I like about this product is eveything. I can find all event from large to small on here
Cons_Review: There isnt anything I dislike about this product

Overall_Review: Overall my experience with Eventbrite has been great on the user end and consumer end. Good service to use!
Pros_Review:
I love how easy it is to create an event with eventbrite. It also has categories you can place your event so it will be easy for other people who have that interest to find.

I also love how easy it makes for my email collection and how informs everyone any updates and sends digital tickets and give reminders for the event.
Cons_Review: I just wish the overall layout of the site would ascetically look better.

Pros_Review: I purchased many event tickets through this website as it is easy to navigate through and offers many events
Cons_Review: The costumer service is very hard to get in touch with

Overall_Review: We use this service at my office to invite and handle the registration for company hosted events/conferences (100-500 people depending on the event). The registration form is able to be customized which allows us to list accommodations, transportation and even include dietary requirements for attendees. We are satisfied with the ease of use of the application/software.
Pros_Review:
Quick and easy sign up
Ticket promoting
Ticket purchasing
Email reminders
Check In
Cons_Review:
They don't have a chat option for customer service
Interface could be a bit more user friendly
Search functionality

Pros_Review: It was inexpensive and mostly intuitive.
Cons_Review: When I've had problems with my account it's been nearly impossible to get answers from a real person. When I finally do get a person, they don't listen to me or read my explanation of the issue I'm having.  They've been condescending, sending me to the help page I already explained I'd read through and it didn't pertain to my situation. This last time, my entire account has disappeared and I've been trying for four days to get answers about it, but no one is responding to my request. Guess small businesses don't matter to them.

Pros_Review: It is really helpful to get to know about the events and register them online easily and quickly.
Cons_Review: I don't see any con of this software. Its a great way to search and schedule events.

Pros_Review: We love using Eventbrite when sending out RSVPs to candidates and clients for our company events. The platform is easy to set up on the back end, aesthetically pleasing, and easy to use for candidates/clients RSVP'ing to events.
Cons_Review: I do not have any issues with Eventbrite. It is our go-to platform when scheduling events.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy for both the administrator setting up an event and a user who is going to the event.
Cons_Review: Nothing, the software is simple and right to the point.

Pros_Review: This tool is great. Our company doesn't hold that many events, so a big elaborate tool is not something we need. This is great for the 2-3 events per year we hold. Our clients get the link and it has the event details and rsvp all there for them to have and us to see. It's also a great resource to suggest our employees going networking events
Cons_Review: I haven't run into that many issues. The tool is great. The only issues is when we do run into issues there support is a bit slow

Pros_Review: eventbrite is the easiest/best way to find something to do on a popular weekend, the signup is quick and easy, and you can even sign up for multiple events without thinking too much about it
Cons_Review: i dont like how you get stuck on the mailing lists of events after the event concludes. I have to unsubscribe constantly

Pros_Review: I have not used Eventbrite very much at this point, but organizing events is slowly becoming a larger part of my job, and Eventbrite is becoming a crucial part of this process.  It's user friendly, easy to use and a clean interface. I love it!
Cons_Review: Some of the features are a little bit rigid, so depending on what you need to do, it might not work, or might be difficult to organize the event the way you would like.  I have had to organized only very basic events though, so I have not run into much trouble at all.

Pros_Review:
The menu options are easy to use. 
Tracking events that are scheduled, and events hosted are manageable.
Event organizing is simplified
Cons_Review: Difficult to access event history and tickets without having to log in.

Pros_Review:
Easy to set up events and accept payment. 
Easy to create ticketing system for admission to events 
Easy to create a page and add it to Facebook or link in email. Ability to purchase tickets straight off of the site.
Cons_Review: There are no cons at this time. The functionality is great and is easy to use. There is customizable text and images for your invite.

Pros_Review: Easy to use. Mobile is strong - full functionality. Recognized across the industry. Great tool for discovering events.
Cons_Review: Understandable the company needs to make money but... no one likes service fees!

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has an easy set-up, syncs to other programs nicely, and makes it easy to track RSVPs.
Cons_Review: Can't think of any real cons. Event recommendations can at times look cluttered and be unrelated.

Overall_Review: For any event that requires reservation  and /or tickets I would recommend using this program
Pros_Review: Very easy to set up an event and those wanting to attend can sign up connected directly through the app using their Facebook account and easily links to your Facebook events.
Cons_Review: As of right now I have not found anything that I dont like about it. The app on the phone is also easy use

Pros_Review: I love making event invitations and tracking RSVP's online, for free!!
Cons_Review: I don't know that this is a con for the software or the email accounts they are sent to, but it seems they typically go to spam.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has helped us host user groups effectively.
Cons_Review: I can't always find the right setting. It would be nice if settings were a little more user friendly.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite always has events that i'm interested in. I mainly buy tickets to beer and music festivals, but there's plenty of other event types.
Cons_Review: I haven't found anything Eventbrite does wrong.

Overall_Review: Utilizing this software is easy for the end user as well as the person planning the event. Thank you!!
Pros_Review: It is so easy to sign up for events and to plan events. The ease of use takes a lot of stress off the organization putting on the event.
Cons_Review: It is sometimes hard to contact the host through this software.  You cannot do it directly - sometimes it goes through the website only.

Pros_Review: I like Eventbrite because it is easy to set up for any event. It has a very user-friendly interface which makes it simple to use for anyone.
Cons_Review: I have nothing negative to say about Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: The design of the platform is very appealing and enjoyable, it very easy to find, to promote and to join an event, and the best thing is that the service is for free.
Cons_Review: There is a lack of a good customer service.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very user-friendly, it very east to create an account and manage all your events. I love using the mobile app, saves time , and i don't have to always print out my ticket for something.  My husband and I have used eventbrite tons of times to create events, and invite ppl for our business parties.
Cons_Review: Not really anything negative to say about eventbrite.  Maybe add more information when someone is interested in attending our events, there should be a space for them to put their phone number as well..

Pros_Review: Great email alerts to when concerts or events are coming.  Easy to use.  Quick way to purchase tickets.
Cons_Review: Fees can be higher but I have noticed a lot of the other ticketing agencys are raising their fees as well.

Overall_Review: I highly recommend this product!
Pros_Review: So handy for inviting people to events. Business and non business alike. We used it for a baby shower invitation.
Cons_Review: Not much, it's super easy to use and has great graphics.

Pros_Review: The apearance of the event page is good, everything important is emphasised.
Cons_Review: That my country is not registerd and I could not have my account linked for payed events.

Pros_Review: I've been using eventbrite for a while, it's easy to use and has lots of events that I can quickly find
Cons_Review: It could be a bit more user friendly, as it takes a few extra steps of i need to change the location.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is so easy to use to plant events and since it's the most popular event planning app, everyone knows and uses it. Also, Eventbrite's UI is amazing.
Cons_Review: It's a bit costly compared to the alternatives.

Overall_Review:
Really good. 
Will definitely use for the next ticketed event.
Pros_Review:
Easy to use - Got it working in no time at all. 
All the setting you need for ticket sales are there.
Cons_Review: Getting around is a little fiddly but everything is there.

Pros_Review: I cherish that I can make an occasion in under two minutes! We have Health benefits everywhere throughout the nation and utilizing eventbrite causes me advertise my occasion to the neighborhoods. I can likewise include a picture which is additionally useful. Causes us demonstrate our image to individuals scanning for wellbeing administrations.
Cons_Review: I dont like is that when I get data of somebody who is occupied with going to our occasion, we are given a first and last name and email address yet no telephone number.

Pros_Review: The facebook integration with the events page made it extremely convenient for people who rely on fb calendar.
Cons_Review: to be honest it can be a little difficult to set up because theres not many customization options

Overall_Review: We needed a way to host and schedule events in a simple an easy way. This software does just that. I would use it for any event. And, if your event is free the tool is free to use. Great for non-profits.
Pros_Review: This software is very easy to use to host your event. You can go from never using it to having an event up in minutes. It is that simple.
Cons_Review: Nothing at all. Again, great software with easy to use design.

Overall_Review:
