We are able to promote any event in a very timely manner and have been able 
to make it easy for our costumers to be a part of an event.
Pros_Review: You are able to promote your event in a very easy way.
Cons_Review: The percentage of cost can add up to a good amount.

Pros_Review: It is very easy to use and has better built-out features than Checkfront or other event booking programs.
Cons_Review: It is expensive.  I opted for less functions with Checkfront but saved a ton of money on just one large event.

Pros_Review: Probably the best thing about the product is how easy it is to set up a ticketing campaign for a major event
Cons_Review: In certain cities the quality of the events is pretty low - some content curation could be useful

Pros_Review: When you're promoting an event or selling tickets, this tool really makes it easy for me. Not to mention it's easy to add onto the list of recipients.
Cons_Review: I wish there was more visibility on all data.

Pros_Review: I love that this is one app that allows you to search for events and buy tickets all within the same application.
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons for this app as it's easy to resolve any issues that you may have with the vendor.

Pros_Review:
- Easy to use and get started
- Integrates with many other platforms (for me most important is HubSpot)
- Easy to export data and customize fields
- Great email reporting and post-event recaps
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: Finding races I wouldn't have heard of otherwise and being able to store my tickets in one consolidated place.
Pros_Review: The software interface for the user if very clear and easy to navigate. It's on-point when you search for events near you and you receive relevant options from your search with plenty of choices. I also love that it offers one place to keep your tickets, instead of downloading them to your computer and having to frantically search for them again just before the event!
Cons_Review: The booking fees to use the software can be quite steep.

Pros_Review: It's good for signing up for events and that's about it. There's not much else that I'd recommend about this product.
Cons_Review: I do not like the email reminders when signing up for an event. It could be much less invasive in my inbox.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use and track who has received, viewed and responded to your event invitations.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I can think of that would be a con, in terms of the capacity that I have used Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Amazing event application and website, super easy to use for those that aren't around a computer all day.
Cons_Review: Tough to navigate to your event sometimes and not friendly for those who don't own a smartphone for tickets.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use tool for setting up events. It's well known by attendees so it's simple for them to sign up. Love how it lets you check people in. I'm not sure of it's functionality of large groups as we have used it on 50-120 people.
Cons_Review: A few minor complaints: an attendee who didn't register but still shows up can't be easily checked in, the end date of ticket sales is set ten days after making the event so that has to be changed and you can't export the checked in attendee list to see who actually showed up easily.

Pros_Review: Nice layout and easy to obtain information and updates in 1 place. Secure portal for safe transactions.
Cons_Review: I really do not have anything negative to say about this software at this time. I have used a few times without any issues!

Overall_Review: All good. Keep up the good work guys.
Pros_Review:
1) Straight to the point, no cuss no fuss.
2) Stupid people friendly. In short ease of use is optimum.
3) Don't know if anyone giving a competition to this software would survive for long.
Cons_Review:
1) Minor glitches when reloading the page sometimes, but that can happen with anyone.
2) Hardly anything to be said on the negative part.

Pros_Review: It allows all event participants to register and check in with ease. No hastle and no papers involved.
Cons_Review: I don't like the fact that they hold they money until after the event without penalty. I usually need my funds as we go.

Pros_Review: I like that it is intuitive, anyone can set up an event and easily track event registrations. They can also upload their own email list.
Cons_Review: I wish that the platform interacted better with existing CRM databases. We have a donor database with IDs and event attendance history, and I would like to be able to export data from Eventbrite in a format that can easily be uploaded to the database.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite shines with its free and low cost event ticketing features. I've mostly used it for free or comped events that involve simply checking people in off a list. There's an app or printable lists you can check off and live update as you go.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite gets more complicated with larger scale projects. I would definitely only use it for small or free events.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use, makes ticketing and checkout easy.  The reminders and receipting features are great too.
Cons_Review: There is a very limited Salesforce integration, and it would be nice to have more features built out.

Pros_Review: Ease of use.  Convenience.  There is a lot of information on different activities around town which makes it valuable.
Cons_Review: Sometimes its hard to find events outside of that there are no cons.  We use it to organize our conference.

Overall_Review: User friendly. Overall a good UI. Wish there was a better way to review previous/ in-process RSVPs

I have used dozens of similar applications for event invitation management and this is one of my favorites. The interface is easy and the updates are unobtrusive. I like how easy it is to use from a standpoint of sending out event invitations, as well as receiving invitations and updates.

Pros_Review: Love using this to create events for our real estate firm. It's a breeze to set up and integrate with social media. It's really easy to use and has so many features. I love the spreadsheets too!
Cons_Review: I think you have to use it frequently to understand all the ins and outs of how the app works and how to use it to its fullest potential. It just takes a little time the first try.

Pros_Review: Ease of use, connects with all browsers, works on mobile and regular operating systems, remembers your email
Cons_Review: Doesn't simplify the steps, sometimes doesn't allow copy paste and other simple features like connecting to calendar

Overall_Review: Eventribe give you almost no other option but paypal. On the mobile site there is a big button of check out with paypal... but what about if you dont have paypal? only after you click the button of paypal you will then see another option to pay with debit or credit...  not good if you all about conversion
Our company has used it to invite our employees to our yearly Christmas Party and other events.
Pros_Review: This software that helps invite people to events and keeps track of who is coming is a very useful tool for planning events.
Cons_Review: Overall this software does what it is supposed to do. It is an event planner and tracker of events. So no issues

Overall_Review: Overall the free product is good and you get what you pay for
Pros_Review: It was fairly simple to set up, took a bit to learn the quirks but able to figure it out. Has good metrics to see whats going on.
Cons_Review: Limited functions for free program but still very useable, could not figure out how to do a few of the options

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is wonderful! It is easy to create, send out, and see responses. Saves so much time!! We have found that more people respond to an online invite vs a social media or mailing invite. 10/10 recommend this software!
Pros_Review: I love that it is easy to use for me as well as the customers we sent invites to. It is so easy to see responses and well as customize our event as well.
Cons_Review: It really checked all of our boxes, but if I had to choose something I would say adding more customized design features.

Overall_Review: Overall, I liked my experiences with Eventbrite and I recommend others to use it.
Pros_Review: I have only used Eventbrite a couple of times. It was really easy to use and get tickets for the event I was attending with a group of people. I received a link to follow, selected event details and how many tickets I needed and it processed right away and I was able to print my tickets right then.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything that I don't like about using Eventbrite. It's a helpful tool to use for attending events.

Overall_Review: I'm overall very happy with Eventbrite and will continue to use this platform to promote events.
Pros_Review: I recently worked for a marketing agency promoting events for clients. We used eventbrite to help promote client events because it was quick, easy, and looked professional. It's also nice that there are options to add tickets/pricing as well as maps, images, etc.
Cons_Review: I really like Eventbrite and don't personally feel there are any cons to using this free website for promoting events.
reasons_choosing: It was recommended by a friend.

Overall_Review: I used it to participate for online workshop series held in Australia. It is really easy.
Pros_Review: It is really easy to get register for the site and it allows you to search events and buy tickets. It's all free and handy. I like it very much. It sends tickets to your email as well.  It allows to take-part in events all around the world.
Cons_Review: I have used it to buy tickets for a workshop series and till then I haven't encountered any issues with eventbrite software.

Overall_Review: We used this to promote events digitally as part of my fraternities marketing strategy. THIS was 7-8 years ago!
Pros_Review: I was an officer of the undergraduate chapter of a professional business fraternity working alongside my colleagues to create a couple of events hosted through Eventbrite. I wasn't the actual administrator but I did have some hands on usage of the tool.
Cons_Review: To be honest I didn't have anything I did not dislike about the tool because I didn't have as much hands on experience. I wish I had more training and that's it.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and navigate. Helpful with organizing events + consumer friendly
Cons_Review: Have to closely monitor the amount/capacity of tickets being distributed

Overall_Review: Scheduling appointments for trade shows and meetings with individual meetings.
Pros_Review: This is easy to use and can help with scheduling meetings for large events.  It also helps to keep records of what you are doing and who you are scheduling your meetings.  I also like that they also send you information regarding other events that could be of interest.
Cons_Review: At this point, I have little to say about the negatives.  For what I use, it is fine and I have not had any issue with it to date.

Overall_Review: When i have used this software it has done what i expected.
Pros_Review: I enjoy the overall ease of use of this software and the ability it has to help make the overall process and timing of issues easier to handle
Cons_Review: Sometimes it can be a little hard to coordinate with day to day operations and meetings that you have planed.

Overall_Review: Convenient way to sell tickets and promote events for a relatively low cost.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite offers our company an easy tool for promoting events and selling tickets and gives our fans a secure platform to purchase tickets to our events.
Cons_Review: There is a bit of a lag with transfers of money from ticket sales to our account and sometimes tickets purchased don't show up on our guest list in time for the show. This is easily remedied by the fact that guests get an e-ticket issued.

Overall_Review: It is so easy to track tickets sold and log the names
Pros_Review: I've used this service to sell tickets and buy tickets, and it is very easy to organize and it is very fast.
Cons_Review: There is no option as a seller to comp a ticket. If I want to give someone a free ticket, I have to purchase it and then write off that amount.

Overall_Review: Best place to store all your tickets in one clean, easy to use application
Pros_Review: All my tickets I buy are stored in one place for easy access. I have never had a problem scanning my ticket at an event and getting in. Legit software instead of going through your email to find your ticket. Nice and clean layout. Can't get much better than this.
Cons_Review: Just the "Service Fee" that is associated with every ticket bought, adds and builds up but other than that is it reliable.

Overall_Review: Overall I have had some ups and downs using eventbrite. It is really easy to use, but there are a lot of things that could be optimized for improvement.
Pros_Review: I liked that this software made it really easy to set up my events with multiple options for different ticket pricing options. I was able to advertise using a custom link to purchase tickets.
Cons_Review: I did not like the fees introduced during ticket pricing that is shown to the customer as an additional price. I would rather pay a flat fee than have my customers pay more than what the ticket price was listed as.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is easy and free to use (unless you're buying tickets through them). All college campus events have been ticketed through Eventbrite in my experience. You can purchase as many as you want. Eventbrite is also great for organizations planning events so they can see how many people bought tickets and will be at the event.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it glitches out when you're at the checkout for tickets, but most of the time you just have to refresh your page

Overall_Review: It's been great! Easy to use and implement, and easy to connect to a Facebook Page's business. Our fans could see the event when it was added.
Pros_Review: Using Eventbrite helped us plan for our catering needs. It keeps us updated with those who purchased tickets and how many views our event was getting.
Cons_Review: It's fairly easy to use and simple, so there's not much to complain about. Being a secondary user, I did not get a guest list for those who had reserved tickets. That would have been nice.

Overall_Review: Most of the events we are attending as a company, are using Eventbrite. We can definitely recommend this experience.
Pros_Review: We really love the user experience on Eventbrite and the full provided infrastructure for attending to an event.
Cons_Review: The design of the event page is a bit overcrowded with additional information that can be hidden in some tabs.

Pros_Review: it's a great event management tool that's really helped us streamline numerous events.
Cons_Review: sometimes it's a little difficult interface to manage.

Overall_Review: Great - used it for lots of events but wouldn't use it for events with a charge attached, would use alternative.
Pros_Review: It's really simple to set up an event, share the link and keep track of attendees
Cons_Review: For events where there is a donation or ticket sale involved, Eventbrite take a cut, unlike some other similar websites
reasons_choosing: Didn't.

Pros_Review: Great for RSVPing and finding events. Easy to bring up passes on phone at event.
Cons_Review: Sometimes app is overwhelming making it hard to find events.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is used by several local professional development organizations for memberships, professional development sessions, networking events, etc. and it is very easy to purchase tickets and download them through the website.
Cons_Review: The transaction fee Eventbrite charges is not inconsiderable.

Pros_Review: It is very easy to use and the app is easy to use my tickets straight off my phone!
Cons_Review: Dislike when a promoter is allowed to demand a text or email sign up.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great software for event hosting and tracking. For all the events I've set up (free and paid), I always want to use Eventbrite. Featuring great analytics and integrations within the software!
Cons_Review: Once the event has ended, it's harder to duplicate some options into the new event.

Pros_Review: I like that it's easy to send out notices and receive replies for events.
Cons_Review: It seems that it might be confusing to those receiving the invite.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: So far we've been very happy using Eventbrite for our events. We do make sure to promote them ourselves though because they may not get seen by the audience on the platform. And for that reason I find the pricing rather high if you decide to run a paid for event.
Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?
reasons_choosing: Because it's extremely fast to get started.

Overall_Review: Overall Eventbrite makes event planning and payments easy to manage. The mobile ticket features are also very handy whenit comes to event check in.
Pros_Review: This tool makes it easy to marketing and sell outreach event tickets all in one space. It is very well organized and easy to use.
Cons_Review: Customization of the event pages are very limited.

Pros_Review: I love how updated this application is, all the events have details and contact information. I use this site/app to tell my patrons about upcoming events in their area that are usually FREE or under $100.
Cons_Review: I don't like how often they remind you of events once you use their site/app.

Pros_Review: I use this app often for a variety of events. Quick, easy, and reliable.
Cons_Review: No complaints thus far. Maybe share more events that I like.

Pros_Review: It's very easy to set up, invite, RSVP and organize events.
Cons_Review: Making people download a full app is sometimes a hassle, especially for just one event.

Pros_Review: Very easy to set up an event, the mobile app is great as well.
Cons_Review: You have to cut and paste names and emails, it would be great if there was a way to sync contacts.

Pros_Review: Easy to input event data and share event page to gain interest.
Cons_Review: There are no cons. Attendees can sign up for events directly through event page.

Overall_Review: Great software for planning events.
Pros_Review:
Easy to use
Fast response
Clean look and intuitive interface
Cons_Review: Time limit can be too short for user to enter all information.

Pros_Review: This software is so easy to use and is great for finding similar events!
Cons_Review: Sometimes the similar events  you are searching for aren't relevant.

Pros_Review: Easy to purchase tickets and save to my digital wallet.
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons other than the ease of finding a venue is challenging sometimes.

Pros_Review: easy to use, and organize events and RSVPS. All event info is easily accessible.
Cons_Review: nothing. great software. I don't have any complaints.

Pros_Review: I just started using and managing Eventbrite recently.  It's pretty easy to navigate and is becoming more of the industry standard for event management software.  We are using it for an event here in just a few weeks and I have been very happy with it.
Cons_Review: Honestly, not a ton to put here yet.  So far we have been really happy with how it's performed.  Initially we had a link that didn't work, but that was user error, not really Eventbrites fault.

Pros_Review: It's very easy to create an event, see the registrants, and pull a list for check-in. You can easily customize the event and advertise within the site itself.
Cons_Review: We use Hubspot and the fields do not cleanly transfer over into our CRM system, even though it's supposed to be compatible. We also suddenly lost the ability to see some of the required fields we ask on the Eventbrite form, so besides the initial notification emails, there is no way to go in and find our registrants details, which is very frustrating.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to setup and configure events for our company, both as attendees and host company for lunch and learn events and networking sessions.
Cons_Review: It would be great if the location details for events would permit multiple locations for tours and/or events that travel from one location to the other.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and you can print the tickets from your computer. I love that you do not have to wait for tickets to come in the mail because they could get lost or ruined. Eventbrite was a game changer for concerts and events everywhere.
Cons_Review: No cons that I am aware of. It is so easy to use.

Pros_Review: Whenever I see a link to an event that uses Eventbrite, I know it will be easy to use
Cons_Review: Sometimes I don't get reminders when I have upcoming events.

Pros_Review: I use eventbrite to set up events for my personal and professional endeavors and its easy to use
Cons_Review: nothing. It's a very great and easy to use website

Overall_Review: Great experience! Will use again if I need to.
Pros_Review: I used eventbrite for a fundraising event and it was really easy to use and worked really well! Collected money and sent emails to those coming as well. Seamless.
Cons_Review: I wish they had various design templates built in. Not too bad though in terms of looks.

Overall_Review: Works as expected.
Pros_Review: Its easy to create events, make then unique and then share them with audience.
Cons_Review: Overall its nice tool to use for events.

Overall_Review: EventBrite is a fantastic tool for any event.  It is reliable, accurate and cost-effective.  I've urged team members to leverage Eventbrite for their personal events as well as continuous learning meetups here at work.
Pros_Review: I like most about Eventbrite is it's ability to work for any event, from concerts to a child's birthday party, it can help anyone plan an event.  If the event is free, the the Eventbrite application is free!  There is a great guide provided that helps beginners to go through setting an event up.  It has great features and connects to 3rd party apps!
Cons_Review: The thing I like least is the limited options for the look and feel for your event page.  The support from Eventbrite is great but it updates quickly.  It can be difficult to find explanations online so you will need to go to Eventbrite customer service for answers (not a bad thing).

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use, reliable site that allows you to scope out the best deals.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows you to seamlessly find tickets to different events in your destination at a great rate.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is very competitive as there are always tons of users on the site so it is best to check back in and set notifications.

Pros_Review: I have only ever been on the receiving end of this but it is very user friendly.
Cons_Review: There is nothing that I have ran into that I dislike.

Overall_Review: GOOD.
Pros_Review:
Free
Ease of use
online
accessible from various devices
Cons_Review:
no offline capabilities
not good for third world countries or developing countries because they don't have internet

Pros_Review: Evertbrite is really easy to set up and use. I've used it s both an organiser and attendee of events and it is great for generating guest lists and communications between organisers and attendees.
Cons_Review: Perhaps the fee when using it professionally organising events however I can see the benefits.

Pros_Review: It's a very easy way to find and attend events
Cons_Review: I can't really think of anything but it might be nice if you could sell one-off event tickets on here

Overall_Review: It was great for my business and I really enjoyed the ease of promoting my business.
Pros_Review: Easy to use and advertise use for people to attend events. The fees were super reasonable and it was very convenient to get the word out for events hosted.
Cons_Review: A lot of people use Eventbrite. It was hard to find the event posted.

Pros_Review: I like the ease and convenience of this program for events and functions...even birthday parties.
Cons_Review: I don't like the processing fees that come out of it and informal form of ticket printing.

Overall_Review: Great tool at the price especially if you do a lot of events that you would like clients and potential clients to attend.
Pros_Review: Great for Organizing Parties and Events.  Corporate get together are made easy and tracking head counts and views are perfect.
Cons_Review: Software gets caught in Spam filters for high security clients.

Pros_Review: Easy way to create, organize and invite - an event planners greatest tool
Cons_Review: Sometimes hard for attendees to calendar the event or find more info once rsvp'ed.

Overall_Review: Overall EventBrite does make it so much easier to post a live schedule, and its just as easy to make changes if necessary.
Pros_Review: I liked that I was able to post multiple events and schedules onto this platform for easy posting.
Cons_Review: I don't like that the process is long and that you cant put together the slides on EventBrite and have to save it from another source.

Pros_Review: The software is easy to use and the features and UI is simple enough to understand without technical savvy.
Cons_Review: This is an unbelievably expensive service and not worth it for what you get.

Pros_Review: You can promote your event easily by using this software. It's easy to use! Plus, it sends reminders through email.
Cons_Review: If there could be more options for design.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has helped me keep events in line and keep up with attendees as they check in to RSVP and pay for the event that I am hosting at the time!
Pros_Review: I love how I am able to create an event and get RSVP's for events that I host Eventbrite has been REALLY effective with helping me organize parties!! I love how I am able to see who has RSVP'D and who hasn't. It also is a great thing that they allow payment to be made right then and there.
Cons_Review: This software is GREAT! I don't have any thing I do not like about it!

Pros_Review: Easy to promote and sell things for business or personal use through convenient registration links.
Cons_Review: Nothing! I have not found any other that could replace this one.

Pros_Review: This software is easy to use, simply type in your zipcode and see events registered on the software in your area. I've purchased tickets via it simply and it only took a matter of seconds.
Cons_Review: There was a surcharge to purchase tickets for an event I attended when buying via this software that seemed unnecessary. Also while using a particular event in my area did not show during the display of local events (it was not a private event either) however I found it via the search feature.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use. You can pass the service charge to attendees. Great way to send updates to all attendees.
Cons_Review: Can't think of a single "con". This is a great app!

Pros_Review: Easy to use tool that allows for decent customization.  We used this tool to plan and invite users to our 20 year high school reunion and everyone was able to easily manage and navigate through the app.
Cons_Review: Upon first sign-up I received several emails and adds to use the site again which ultimately led me to unsubscribe.

Overall_Review: I love the ease of use and the ability to add my events to my calendar.
Pros_Review: I love the ease of keeping track of my tickets
Cons_Review: I honestly love this app. A dark mode would be appreciated.

Pros_Review: This is a customizable event planning platform that has various tools to effectively plan your event. You can manage registrations and collect data from your event.
Cons_Review: It charges a small fee if you collect payments for ticket sales. Because it is a primarily free platform, it makes it not as powerful as some other event management tools.

Pros_Review: I like that events in Eventbrite easily migrate into my Apple Wallet so it is easy to pull up tickets when the time comes, even offline.
Cons_Review: I have never had issues using Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Great, would definitely recommend to anyone looking to create a quick, easy event invite.
Pros_Review: A great user-friendly way to create an event invite.
Cons_Review: Could include a bit more functionality and fun features.

Pros_Review: I have used this specifically for promoting corporate events in multiple cities. This software is incredibly easy to use and should be standard for any event large or small. Great for both promotion and RSVP management.
Cons_Review: The branding elements are minimal and you lose traffic to your website if you typically use a landing page for marketing and RSVP purposes

Overall_Review: Wouldn't use any other app.
Pros_Review: How easy this application is to use!  It seems to be the top competitor in regards to event planning, as it's very well integrated into so many other applications.  Booking is easy and you are notified well in advance with tickets and event details.
Cons_Review: Navigation could be a little bit more intuitive.

Overall_Review: Overall love the software great and fast way to get tickets for events
Pros_Review: Great way to get tickets quick for events
Cons_Review: had a few issues with buying tickets prior to event maybe a glitch in the system

Pros_Review: I love to be able to go to one place for all my event and concert tickets and information.  I use Eventbrite regularly
Cons_Review: Id like to see a more advanced notification of events with reminders

Overall_Review: Awesome product.
Pros_Review: Great option if you want to organize your personal or professional event.
Cons_Review: Not much; I think is the best service out there for event manage and planning

Pros_Review: I was able to RSVP and receive my tickets to an event with a simple click
Cons_Review: It would be cool to also use as a personal planner

Pros_Review: so great that the tickets and entry items are so convenient on my phone
Cons_Review: had some cellular issues with downloading tix. but realized you can download so it was resolved!

Pros_Review: This software makes sharing events & receiving feedback quick & easy.
Cons_Review: Nothing, this software has been helpful in scheduling employee events.

Pros_Review: It is easy for the seller and the buyer to use to buy tickets to events and issue refunds.
Cons_Review: It can be tedious to keep signing in if you make an account and forget a password.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has helped us tap into a new channel to expand our audience. For marketers, it can be a good lead-generation opportunity for online and offline events.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great channel for marketers to grow your audience.
Cons_Review: The commission fees are quite high and depending on your situation, it can be worth it or can try a different platform or approach to save on fees.

Overall_Review: Overall, this is the software to use when organizing an event!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes planning events and ticket sales extremely easy and unfriendly.
Cons_Review: None! I really have nothing bad to say about eventbright!

Overall_Review: Great. Would definitely recommend using it if you don't want the hassle of having to ticket individuals yourself for an event your hosting
Pros_Review: Super easy for setting up ticketing for events. Integrating for sharing on social media is a cinch. Easy to find other events in your area as well!
Cons_Review: Nothing I can think of as of yet, the software is well built out.

Pros_Review: We used this at work when we did our optus end of year party which was awesome to send out invites and RSVP
Cons_Review: nothing was there that I could see that I didn't like. It was easy to use

Pros_Review: Easy to setup, one of the first that I have used and has improved over time
Cons_Review: Scheduling design needs work. I like Sched better for that, but they are integrated with each other.

Pros_Review: Frankly, as far as ticketing platforms and event organization goes, Evetbrite is exactly what you want it to be.  Multiple tiers are allowed, updates are quick, and you have as much or as little information as you need about attendees available to you.
Cons_Review: Cost is not prohibitive, but some competitors are certainly making tempting offers to compete.  Eventbrite is open about their costs and you should have no negative experience on this end, but you may not be getting the best deal for your service if you haven't shopped around.

Pros_Review: Great software. Intuitive. Not only for pre events but also for post events.
Cons_Review: Haven't found anything off-putting at least so far.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is highly flexible. It can do almost anything you want it to, but most of the things you want it to do will be for an added price.
Cons_Review: I primarily use this for ticketing for non-profit fundraising. The percentage of fees is pretty steep, in my opinion. I wish there were a way to create a non-profit account for lower fees.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use and setup, whether you are a SMB or Enterprise. Also have nice mobile options as well.
Cons_Review: Not many cons. They continue to roll out features that make it better.

Overall_Review: Overall a good helper to organize your events!
Pros_Review: I love using Eventbrite because it is easy to use and makes your life easier when it comes to send multiple invitations and follow-up with each of them.
Cons_Review: It takes a couple of minutes to adapt to the software and to configure the body, text and users, but nothing too much to stress.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use and functional.  Great way to attend an event and have it placed on your calendar.
Cons_Review: I really cannot think of anything that I do not like about this product.  It works great.

Pros_Review: Many people check event brite locally. I first found out about it when I was searching for wedding events. You can find meetup style events there, family, wedding, concerts, local meet and greets and more! As a user on both ends, it's very user friendly. Posting events is pretty easy. They take a percentage of your ticket sales if you're charging. its free for free though.
Cons_Review: They take some percentage of your ticket sales. I feel like it should be one or the other. Not fee on-top of fee. But, that's just my opinion.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is an easy to use event hosting program. Having used it as an attendee for a lot of events, its easy in that regard and very straightforward when hosting events.
Cons_Review: None, really. I havent set up a ton of events using it, but the one thing that seemed a little unclear was how to export attendee's, although i'm sure i just missed something.

Overall_Review: ease of setting up events
Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to set up events, customize verbiage, and change or add payment settings.  It is very intuitive, and it's a brand and system that's become more well-known and wide-spread where customers trust the system and secure payment checkout platform to be able to purchase without any worries.
Cons_Review: I wish I could customize the landing page more with different fonts, colors, and adding photo layouts. The option to be able to have a spotify streaming widget embeded would be great too.

Overall_Review: I enjoy using this software for both small and large events. Super helpful to maintain communication with attendees. Allows easy follow up after the event.
Pros_Review: Handles customers payments quickly and easily.
Cons_Review: Needs more of a Q&A section for promoters.

Overall_Review:
Great. Application for creating free events

User friendly
Easy to use event creation and management software. Great for free events, and the fees they charge for paid events is worth it!
Pros_Review: Great UI for attendees to register.
Cons_Review: Does not integrate into other CRMs as tightly as we would like.

Overall_Review: I've used Eventbrite several times to attend both free and paid events and it's always quick and easy to use, find events and be reminded about my reservations. Between the website and their app, I'm always connected.
Pros_Review: It's easy to use and always on my phone

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great for a simple, free service.  If you're looking for detailed functionality, their work arounds get a little awkward for users.  Also, support is slow to respond and I have had to work pretty hard to get to a real person.
Easy to use and for every type of event you want to organize.

The experience with Eventbright was OK but did not respond to our growing needs as the event drew to a close. We required people to send their photos which we needed for the badges but this programme would not let them upload these and we needed to send separate emails to each participant, resulting in photos with different formats and lots more work.
Pros_Review: It's online and easy to use
Cons_Review: No possibility of uploading photos/documents

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has been so wonderful for my fitness startup! I am not a tech person at all, but I have found the site easy to navigate in order to create appealing and effective event and registration pages! It is very very user friendly and has helped create a community for my customers! My only bit of advice is that it takes a bit of time for tech support to respond to questions submitted online. Other than that my relationship and experience with Eventbrite has been quite wonderful!

As an event organizer, I've used Eventbrite at least once a month. I find it to be very intuitive and user friendly.  They've designed it well, thinking of just about everything. On the few occasions when I felt stuck or had an issue creating or managing an event, I got very prompt support from their friendly staff. I like the ability to "copy" a past event, the option to email attendees, invite past attendees, and so many more great features. The app is also great for checking attendees in! Two thumbs up!
I've had a relatively positive experience with Eventbrite. I use it often when putting together events.
Pros_Review: I think this software is very easy to navigate. When you're creating an event you have the ability to add great detail such as location, payment method, and invitees instructions.
Cons_Review: I don't like how you have to navigate through a few screens to make changes to an event. On the buyer side, Eventbrite take out a certain amount of money from any ticket sales.

Overall_Review: Overall, an easy software to use and plan events. If we did charge for events frequently, we would probably use this more often.
Pros_Review: We have used eventbrite to plan a few events at the company I work for. It does make the set up easy and functional! I do not have too much experience as we are doing a free trial and don't charge for events all that often.
Cons_Review: I wish there were an option on eventbrite if someone wanted to pay in cash that we could input a code or something to let them know that the event organizer is overriding this. Some features were not all too easy and I wish we could change some layout options.

Overall_Review: Loved using Eventbrite. I'm glad we don't have to use it anymore, but when we needed it, it did it's job!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is simple to use. Many churches were able to use it to offer tickets to church service during the COVD-19 pandemic. This allowed leadership to know how many people would attend each service. Tickets were free, but you had to have a ticket to have a seat.
Cons_Review: From my end of things, I didn't see any negatives. It was a great product that helped us when we needed it.

Overall_Review: Would generally recommend to those looking for new adventures in your established area or random adventures in a new area. Great for exploring new events and connecting to people in general.
Pros_Review: Whether you are looking to hold an event or looking for an event, Eventbrite is an application that well connects the seekers to the organizers. Eventbrite does a great job in advertising events based on your location, interest, and various other filters. I have personally used this when travelling to new cities, domestic to the US and even international, to find out what is happening and where i can take advantage to live up the day/night.
Cons_Review: Not too many negatives to say about Eventbrite. It is incredibly simple to create an account and start searching for events in your area and in the dates you are seeking.

Overall_Review: Overall it's been a great experience. I don't have an event planned because of the current conditions but, when I do I plan to come back.
Pros_Review: I found this software pretty easy to use when setting up the event and getting tickets to buyers. I had no issues at all with this process. I would highly recommend it. I also like how the tickets go to my customers phones easily.
Cons_Review: It was an easy process to utilize this platform for the event. I didn't have any complaints or issues arise.

Overall_Review: Overall, we will use Eventbrite again to help without annual events.
Pros_Review: We used the Eventbrite platform to sell tickets to our annual Gala.  It made selling tickets quick and easy! We were able to pass on the cost of processing to the buyer and the money was deposited in our account in a lump sum.
Cons_Review: There was a bit of a learning curve on setting up the event and sharing with our targeted audience, but once we figured it out, it was a breeze.

Overall_Review: Overall it is a easy way to RSVP but the mobile issues needs to be fixed.
Pros_Review: I like how the user interface is clean and easy to navigate. I like how my tickets to events are emailed to me and can easily sync with my google calendar.
Cons_Review: Sometimes when I am on the mobile site, I cannot finish the check out because the button does not light up even though I have filled out all the required boxes. Then I have to just do it on my computer which is annoying.

Overall_Review: easy to use. not hard to understand
Pros_Review: easy to find information needed. user-friendly
Cons_Review: how many emails I received on a daily basis

Overall_Review: Overall, Eventbrite has been great. Whether I am organizing an event on site, off site or for personal use, I have been very pleased with this program.
Pros_Review: very easy to use and makes organizing events incredibly easy. Helps centralize things more so than using calendar invites through email.
Cons_Review: I really don't have anything that I dislike about  the software. It's very easy to use and any time I have organized something or been on the other end, it's been a very smooth process.

Overall_Review: It helped us do an event and helped parents connect.
Pros_Review: The ability to have a link for an event and people can register through it and pay as well! Helped take pressure off.
Cons_Review: Fees for processing. That's is pay off today's world though. Anything you do online is that way now.

Overall_Review: Makes hosting small events easier than the alternatives.
Pros_Review: Great for booking events and selling tickets. Makes managing small events much easier than trying to do it manually.
Cons_Review: Not much to not like. It does what it is supposed to do and does it pretty easily. I just need more events.

Pros_Review: Over the years I've found Eventbrite fairly easy to sign up to, set up, and use.
Cons_Review: Charges and payment terms are currently unfavourable when compared to their competition.

Overall_Review: I really liked using eventbrite, it was pretty straight forward and easy to get comfortable using.
Pros_Review: A great aspect of this platform is that you can create an event and sell or give away tickets. It keep tracks of who is coming, or who has purchased tickets, so you can have your own guest list which is super convenient.
Cons_Review: I think there could definitely be more options available if you're having a very specific event and need to have customized ticket options and so on.

Pros_Review:
Ease of use
Good user experience 
Very versatile
Cons_Review: Can't think of anything. I have always been very pleased.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is easy to use as an admin and is something I frequently use via the Eventbrite app as a user. Most events I attend are now hosted on eventbrite and having tickets added to my digital wallet is easy.
Pros_Review: Creating events and pricing is easy with Eventbrite. They take a minimal fee based on what tier you pay for and creating events is possible in minutes.
Cons_Review: If I have to name a con,  it would be that Eventbrite takes a fee (it's a business, I understand) based on the percentage of the ticket plus a minimal service fee.

Pros_Review: I like that it is very easy to use and free!
Cons_Review: There is not much functionality but it is free so I should not complain.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a large player in the online ticket world and provides vendors with an easy platform to reach their audience.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a strong patform for those involved in event management that require ticket sales and tracking.
Cons_Review: Overall a strong product, however have heard that individuals who have bought tickets from eventbrite complain of receving numerous follow up "suggestion emails" for upcomming events that border on spam.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great looking website that helps connect us with our customers so they can not only find the events we have going on, but also purchase tickets to events we are hosting.
Cons_Review: I wish that more of our customer base was familiar with this platform.

Pros_Review: #NAME?
Cons_Review: #NAME?

Pros_Review: Looking for an interesting event can be easily done via Eventbrite, simply because it is widely used by event organizers to do event registration, ticketing, etc.
Cons_Review: Just using it to explore what's happening in the town while traveling, works great so far, nothing that I would dislike.

Pros_Review: It's easy to sign up for different events and the interface is logical
Cons_Review: You get a lot of emails using this system

Pros_Review: I loved how easy it was to configure and begin selling tickets to events
Cons_Review: Like many companies do, Eventbrite takes a portion of the sales for themselves in return for allowing us to use their software. While this isn't a "negative", it is something that is good to know

Pros_Review: An excellent tool for events invites and new product launch parties.
Cons_Review: I haven't encountered any issues since inception.

Pros_Review: Super easy to use. Very versatile. Applicable to many industries.
Cons_Review: I don't have a con. The software is well designed and useful.

Pros_Review: I have used eventbrite for organizing my own events and it was smooth experience
Cons_Review: their pricing was not so convincing for me

Pros_Review: Ease of use. Facebook events integration for purchasing and accessing tickets is my favorite feature and I also appreciate how they email you a pdf ticket the same day as he event as well.
Cons_Review: Service fees. Though not as bad as ticketmaster, the fees still often seem excessive.

Overall_Review: This organization is an internet rip-off. We set up an event for religious organization and sold tickets to the event. The organization of Eventbrite did not honor the contract that we had to agree to. They sent false invoices stating that they were going to send money that have been paid for the tickets and they never sent the money's. On multiple attempts to contact this organization of Eventbrite to resolve the issue they neglected to contact us back. Stay away from them as far as you can they are true rip-off artist
Pros_Review: There was nothing positive about the software
Cons_Review: this organization is a complete rip-off. They steal money that people pay for events and never turn it over to the organization that is hosting the event that the person bought the ticket for

Pros_Review: I thought it was very easy to use and no hidden information like fees.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I do not like about this software.

Pros_Review: A good way to get the word out about an upcoming event
Cons_Review: Best for simple events, didn't use any advanced features

Overall_Review: It is an awesome piece of software both for folks who have only a few events to schedule but also for enterprise solutions.
Pros_Review: It is incredibly easy to use from setting up your events, scheduling, and receiving/managing your registrations. I also really like it's open API - it will communicate with many other tools you use!
Cons_Review: I could not figure out how to disable the feature for paying for registrations without losing some important functionality.

Pros_Review: We'd always struggled with some of the logistics of planning and managing events, but Eventbrite helped us solve almost all of those issues by streamlining our process. Registering and tracking guests is super easy and the ability to customize it for our needs has made it incredibly versatile across clients.
Cons_Review: I've never had any issues with the software, though some people have said their customer service can be a little slow.

Pros_Review: I really like how I can monitor the number of invitees when setting up an event. Makes it easier instead of having to go through my email.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything negative to say about the product. I think it is very simple to use when I set up events for my clients.

Pros_Review: fantastic software for creating and inviting others to events
Cons_Review: extremely difficult to get ahold of customer support

Pros_Review: I love the convenience of eventbrite! Super easy to use!
Cons_Review: I have no cons at all! I use eventbrite alot!

Pros_Review: i really like when you are hosting an event you can see live who has booked and their details etc. This has been really important for promotional purposes of not targeting people who has already signed up for the event. Like that you can export the details of the people signed up for the event easily.
Cons_Review: I think overall its a great piece of software which can be used for getting events up easily, not much not to like.

Pros_Review: Evenbrite has simplified our event registration process significantly.
Cons_Review: No complaints! Would definitely recommend.

Pros_Review: Great way to get a hold of tons of people to invite them to an event
Cons_Review: I don't like that I can not use it on the wallet app without having to download the app.

Overall_Review: Brilliant. have made our move into paid for events very simple
Pros_Review: Easy to use platform for selling tickets to our events
Cons_Review: wish we could design different ticket emails

Pros_Review: It is very user friendly and I used this software to book multiple events in the past with ease.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything that I dislike about this software.

Pros_Review: We've used Eventbrite for creating and managing our various events. It's simple and easy to use.
Cons_Review: Their administrative fees are quite high.

Pros_Review: That it allows our company to get our events seen and have people RSVP easily.
Cons_Review: That creating a visually appealing event takes a bit of time.

Pros_Review: Even as a free tool, Eventbrite offers users many features that allow tracking of analytics of events.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the mobile app can be a little confusing.

Pros_Review: It summarizes the events near you and gives you options to attend
Cons_Review: I've only used it a handful of times but so far nothing I can say that's negative

Pros_Review: I loved using Eventbrite to plan my recent event. It was easy to use and kept track of who I'd invited and also sent reminders to them about the event. It made it so easy and effortless AND saved trees by being digital.
Cons_Review: I can't really think of any negatives from my experience.

Overall_Review: I am glad that this software is becoming more widely used so that all (or most) events can be accessed from one solid platform.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has become the go-to for my company's event listings. It is easy to use and conveniently displays information on the page in a way that is pleasing to the eye.  I think that EventBrite has streamlined event planning for the better.
Cons_Review: I think there could be a little more customization in terms of typeface/font size, but overall I am very satisfied.

Pros_Review: This platform is a great modality for small communities to purchase and sell tickets or host workshops. You can easily download it onto your smart phone and have easy access to your ticket and information around the event.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it can be tricky navigating a ticket once you've purchased it.

Overall_Review: It has very good Search Engine Optimization and will bring your event up in a google search relatively.
Pros_Review: Events are simple to setup and easy to manage. You can customize your event page with a description, as well as an event image and business image. It is nice having all of your tickets in one place and being able to print out a master list of attendees for the event.
Cons_Review: Some attendees had a difficult time finding the event on Eventbrite via their search bar. It had a hard time finding "David's" in the search.

Pros_Review:
Shows a list of events near you or a place of your choosing. You can also choose events to attend according to category.
Provides APIs which you can easily integrate with any platforms that you have to use it more seamless 
Has mobile Apps hence easily accessible
Cons_Review: Does not have a self hosted version for those who don't want to use Software as a service option denying corporates that have regular events from eliminating recurring costs.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great tool to sell products!
Cons_Review: I've found software programs that are just as good or better than Eventbrite.  There are other tools with lower fees available.

Pros_Review: My favorite part about eventbrite is how it spans across multiple industries. I have purchased seminar tickets as well as concert tickets for competitive pricing.
Cons_Review: Sometimes I can't find exactly what I'm looking for (not too often), and have to use a different platform to get the tickets i need.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has helped me to identify events and opportunities that are happening around the city. It consolidates the events at one place so you don't have to move from one website to another and waste your time.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is really easy to use and helps me basically find events around the city in which I might be interested.
Cons_Review: I haven't come across any feature which is frustrating to deal with in the app. From the time the event is selected to the time of receiving the confirmation, it is really smooth to use.

Pros_Review: I appreciate how easy it is to look up events as well as create everyday girls nights, or movie dates.
Cons_Review: I honestly haven't ran into any issues with this software. Every experience either connecting with friends or creating my own event has been easy, efficient and made keeping track of minor details SOOOO MUCH EASIER!

Overall_Review: Used Eventbrite for 'online" courses, tracking progress of participants.
Pros_Review: A breeze to use, quick and easy.  Very user friendly interface. Awesome for tracking guests/registrants to a variety of events/courses.
Cons_Review: No cons from my user standpoint. It was easy and did not require alot of time to "learn" how to use .

Overall_Review: Gets the job done quick and easy. That's what makes it ideal. If you're looking for something fancier, go ahead. But this does the trick, and in a lot of ways is exactly what you need.
Pros_Review: Easy to use. Sets up fast and creates a great way to create event invites.
Cons_Review: Branded for EventBrite so you don't really get to customize the appearance as much as you'd like.

Pros_Review: Terribly easy to use. I pretty much had the task of updating my boss' events on Eventbrite thrown into my lap from day one. With no prior experience on the app, I ended up training myself. Seriously, if I can figure it out, anyone can!
Cons_Review: I cannot think of any cons. Again, so very easy to use. I no longer work for this client, but if I had need of it in the future, Eventbrite would be my first choice of app for posting/searching area events.

Overall_Review: Having used Eventbrite to purchase tickets for events I'm attending, and for organising events too, I've found it to be a very helpful all rounder.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite brings everything together in to one place for your event planning - selling tickets is easy, and allows easy registration at the event itself. The costs aren't too high, either.
Cons_Review: I've not really got anything negative to say about the software. I suppose the recommendations for related events attendees might like could be improved.

Pros_Review: This is my preferred method of getting tickets to events, it is quick, easy, and secure.
Cons_Review: Sometimes scanners have a tough time picking up a qr code on my phone.

Overall_Review: We have our members use Eventbrite to schedule local events. The process of collecting data is simple, seamless and incredible efficient and a huge time saver.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a user-friendly system that allows you to plan different events in in just a few moments and is robust enough to let you track the metrics you need.
Cons_Review: The lack of integration with other systems

Pros_Review: I use this software for events and meetings so I can get a head count.
Cons_Review: So far I have not found anything that I like least about this software.

Pros_Review:
-It's easy for end users
-It's available in app and web form, so it's easy to find and access
-The interface/GUI is intuitive
Cons_Review: -I didn't find any major flaws but the algorithm for figuring out what events are similar to others (and may be interesting to the user) is very poor and makes odd recommendations.

Pros_Review: I have used this software to book several business events for our staff. It is very easy to use and quick to process events. It nicely organises event history and saves e-tickets for us to get in which are easily accessible on my phone.
Cons_Review: It doesn't have as many events available to book as some other sites.

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite is one of the best event apps available on the market. It is very intuitive both for people attending events and for those organizing them, giving possibilities to event marketers for more effective (and cost-effective) event advertising.
Also, I like the way it promotes events within the app and website.
Cons_Review: The mobile app should and could work better. Also, the accuracy of locations is not always as precise as it should be...

Pros_Review: Generally a good system I use for my business for events. I like that Eventbrite integrates into Facebook and there is a good marketing system
Cons_Review: The affiliate link didn't copy from the copy button on Android phones for clients so they didn't participate as affiliates which affected the overall attendance results for the event.  I contacted customer support who reiterated on their end is fine and will not be changing the link button.

Pros_Review: This product is key for not only external marketing and campaign awareness but for office-wide (internal) events as well. It has been a great way for us to stay connected in office and promote product outside of the office to reach as many end users as possible.
Cons_Review: I have nothing negative to say, really. I think twice now while uploading new events or editing event information, the software froze or crashed without auto-saving the information that was already started.

Overall_Review: I think that the site is great for anyone looking to promote their events, and a great place to start so that you learn how to create the posts. It's easy to use, really accessible, and straightforward.
Pros_Review: It's easy to post on Eventbrite, and is a good starting place if you don't have a large marketing budget for your events. It has a large audience, which means the opportunity for exposure.
Cons_Review: There have been times where the original time that was input for an event was created, and when going back a week later, the time changed somehow...this happened to me twice. The other downside is that because it's such a large audience, it's difficult to target specific, ideal, people.

Overall_Review: Used it often as organizer and as an attendee of multiple events. It is very easy to use for signing up and the platform does a great job of exposing me to nearby events my friends may be attending as well.
It works well for attendee registration,  I look forward to continued product innovation and integration with other solutions.
Pros_Review: Ease of use for attendee registration
Cons_Review: Customer support is very limited

Overall_Review: Its easy to schedule events using this.. I forget a lot so now it reminds me of dates and the fact that i have tickets for it.
Pros_Review: Visuals
Cons_Review: Not easy to use

Pros_Review: Reasonably comprehensive ticket buying solution for mid-sized events (<900). Well-known platform so has a reasonable number of integrations
Cons_Review: Features for conferences haven't improved significantly in several years. Pricing becomes a bit high when ticket prices climb into several hundred points.

Overall_Review: We have used Eventbrite for over 3 years. We are a small distributor that host monthly lunch and learns for our customers. The ease of use makes our events successful every time!
Pros_Review: Ease of use and functionalitiy
Cons_Review: None

Overall_Review: We use EventBrite for some of our smaller fundraisers and monthly events. It is very easy to use, track attendees and payments, as well as share information and post-event details. Overall we really like using it and our volunteers appreciate the easy information. We would like to see additional app functionality and integration with new payment options as they come available but overall this is a great tool for us.

Eventbrite is a fantastic software package designed with the management of events at its core. With lots of native functionality and integrations to associated technology platforms, Eventbrite is a must have for companies looking to improve their event management capabilities. The ability to either pass along or absorb fees makes Eventbrite very flexible from a budgeting perspective. Overall, a great piece of software!

Eventbrite is simple, customizable and accesible for all users and attendees. I organize small and big events and I can have a good control of registration and the event check in as well, all in once! Practical and modern, there is no better system that this one to organize events.

For the 2nd time I have received an 'oops' message from you reading payment.  I agreed to use event brite due to the flexibility of weekly payments.  You have been selling tickets for my event for 5 weeks now and I have not received a penny.  Instead I got some rubbish about my bank rejecting the payment to start with I checked with my bank and they have no record of any attempt at payment from yourself then you say its because the sort code was wrong which it wasn't however i re inputted the details again and today another message saying there is a problem.   My event is less than 3 weeks away and i have bills that should have been paid 2 weeks ago.  Your company is a disgrace holding on to small businesses money and telling lies.  I will not be using or recommending your company again.   I am speaking with my lawyer on Monday as I may have to cancel this event if payment is not made to me as I do not have the funds to cover the costs of my outstanding bills for my event and your guys will be picking up the tab and explaining to my clients why this has happened.

I plan events for several groups in town and Eventbrite is simply the best tool for all my needs from start to finish. It's easy for guests to sign up for the event, but my favorite part is the check in app. It's the worst when you get to an event and there's a huge line because the organizers have to manually check off arrivals. But with the app, it's so quick and easy, we can zip people right through.  Plus, we have a great rep in Boston. Highly recommend!

Pros_Review: Very easy to use and purchase tickets! And it sends you an email and a reminder right away when you purchase a ticket.
Cons_Review: I think it could have better suggestions for similar events. Otherwise, this software is very convenient and easy to use!

Overall_Review: I had a great time looking through the events available, there was so much happening in my town that I didn't even know about and EventBrite made me aware of that.
Pros_Review: It's very easy to use, you can find events you didn't even know existed and you can instantly buy tickets to them.
Cons_Review: Unfortunately if there are too many users trying to buy a ticket for an specific event the site might crash and you might lose that ticket you were waiting for .

Overall_Review: It was good for how much we used it but I think it has many more features that can be used if the software were more user friendly.
Pros_Review: We began using EventBrite for some events, however, as an educational institution we were not able to exploit its features, as much as I suppose another type of business.
Cons_Review: It is for very specific fields and it is not very user friendly. However, we did not use it long enough to maybe fully understand it.

Overall_Review: Overall experience was negative. Eventbrite not only put up prices - twice - but then developed a no refund policy. Crazy when there are always people who are not able to attend at the last minute for very good reasons.  If I had stayed with Eventbrite my numbers would have been severely reduced.  Putting profits before people is the opposite of the event management site I now recommend to all and sundry.
Pros_Review: It was easy to use. Like many other event sites so can't single this one out.
Cons_Review: There was nothing to complain about as the software was accessible, had the functions I needed.
reasons_choosing: I am a not-for-profit and their new price scale did not made them unacceptable

Pros_Review: It's free and you can see others' RSVPs.
Cons_Review: I felt like they sent too many reminders.

Pros_Review: I was able to set up job fairs for multiple locations using this software. It allowed applicants to reserve times that was convenient for them  and gave me a  head count of how many applicants to expect.
Cons_Review: I did not have any cons with this software

Pros_Review:
Following are the things i like about eventbrite:

1) The vast category of events available
2) Easy booking procedure
3) The mobile application is also fine
Cons_Review: I feel the entire design of the application and the website can be better.

Overall_Review: I USE IT TO ADVERTISE CLASSES AND EVENTS IM HAVING
Pros_Review: I LOVE EVENT BRITE, ITS A GREAT WAY TO BE SEEN, ADVERTISE YOUR EVENTS WITHOUT A FEE , VERY USER FRIENDLY
Cons_Review: WISH WE COULD ACCESS ALOT MORE LOCATIONS VIA THE APP, CAN GET A LITTLE SLOW AT TIMES BUT OVERALL GREAT

Overall_Review: It has been great! I recommend it for all the people that want something simple to use.
Pros_Review: This is a great software for people who don't know much about technology but want to have a simple platform to publish their events on a weekly basis.
Cons_Review: The software doesn't have as many options and you will need to have some integration with your current website depending on your CMS or Code. Also, there are fees when you sell tickets.

Overall_Review: A good generic tool that could benefit from a few enhancements tailored to my industry.
Pros_Review: It's fairly comprehensive, and allows me to plan and manage all the events in my calendar without major issues. I like the ease-of-use and navigation to set up my events.
Cons_Review: The rates a re very high, and they lack certain features that are specific to non-profits, such as split receipting and the ability to set up donation toggles.

Pros_Review: The ease of use, the way to keep track of all people reserving for the event. Helps for large organizations such as the university I work for to get all departments invited in a short amount of time
Cons_Review: Honestly haven't had an issue with Eventbrite

Pros_Review: I love this tool because it's so simple and easy, people can quickly sign up, generate tickets to save to Apple Wallet or any other device they use, and save events to their calendars.
Cons_Review: It is such a good tool that I have no complaints to make.

Overall_Review: It's great for networking events! Especially if there is payment involved.
Pros_Review: It's very user friendly and it makes it easy for the event planner to track number of RSVPs. They payment option is easy too.
Cons_Review: I've never had any problems with this software.

Pros_Review: I like that my events are all in on spot and it even shows me all the pertinent info. Easy to share with my coworkers or my wife
Cons_Review: I tried to go back and look at a past event and it didn't load. Not sure if they purge after a certain time or not.

Pros_Review: Set up is incredibly easy. It's nice to be able to have attendees directed to one place to record attendance.
Cons_Review: Sometimes users get confused about the price of the event if it's free. Making the free cost more apparent would be helpful.

Pros_Review: It's great for smaller venues and groups that need to get their word out quickly and easily. Support staff are wonderful to work with as well.
Cons_Review: We have our own marketing team so this wasn't as helpful as we thought as we connect to FaceBook ourselves.

Pros_Review: As a recipient it's very easy to get invites and rsvp
Cons_Review: Their newsletter is a constant in my inbox

Pros_Review: I use this to create events for our company's Real Estate Agents. It's very easy to create the events, send invites, and track event registration. I also like that I can easily communicate with and send reminders to those who registered for the events.
Cons_Review: For paid events, the fees are a little high. Some of the different features and event customizations are difficult to find.

Overall_Review: This is a great tool to find events based on locations, content and other criteria. Also it is a comprehensive portal to capture which events are taking place.
Pros_Review: We can purchase tickets through EventBrite. Many events cannot be found on search engines or are hard to find. EventBrite is good for narrowing down the events that suit our requirements and expectations.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it does not show the link to purchasing tickets.

Pros_Review: I use eventbrite to find local events on free weekends or special occasions.  Easy to use, shows you a location map and emails you your ticket!
Cons_Review: Could not find a flaw.  I have even heard that adding an event is easy, although I have not done that yet.

Pros_Review: It's very easy to create events and sell tickets
Cons_Review: Maybe a user facing UI could be a bit more friendly

Pros_Review: Have you ever wondered how to let people know that there's an event and want to avoid going to a mall to buy a ticket? My favorite feature is related to the last specific sentence, I can see where's a concert or any other event and if I like it, I just buy it utilizing the same platform! The tickets will be delivered to your email and it's as easy as that.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints about EventBrite, I love it.

Pros_Review: It allows for easy sharing of events and RSVP'ing.
Cons_Review: The interface with calendars is lacking.

Pros_Review: I use it as a user that need to buy ticket from. Some events also require free registration through it. Since people start using it. I will see it supposed to be easily used. But after I purchased a ticket, no vendor ever asked me to show the eventbrite confirmation or email or number ever.
Cons_Review: I noticed onetime that if I purchase a ticket through facebook, it's cheaper than eventbrite. I assume eventbrite charfe fees. more

Pros_Review: So easy to use! You can sell tickets on social media and the Eventbrite site at the same time. Also, very reasonable prices for the tickets.
Cons_Review: I can't really find a downside to this software! I love it for ticketed events that are priced or free.

Pros_Review: It result helpful for me that I live and work in Ecuador, a country where it is not easy to find online information about events and much more. It keeps me updated on events, fairs, festivals and so on.
Cons_Review: Nothing negative to tell at the moment, I must say that I feel good with the service as it is. I hope that in the future it will be used by a greater number of users in Latin America.

Pros_Review: This software keeps tracks of events that you selected you were interested in.  Awesome way to find local events and buy tickets to them. Many useful and wholesome events are posted on here.
Cons_Review: Been using this for years and have no probelms.

Overall_Review: It really helped me to find great events happening nearby and buy the tickets throught it by online.
Pros_Review: It's really nice software product, that helps to find events happening nearby as well as to register or buy tickets/pass for events. And I can search events by categories that I like.
Cons_Review: It's really a useful software product. I would like to have a feature that let us know how many passes/tickets are left for an event

Overall_Review: Overall, it's a great tool and allows you to have a central location for all the information guests need in order to know about and sign up for an event.
Pros_Review: A great free tool that allows you to have a landing page and registration acknowledgement from attendees for whatever event you are hosting.
Cons_Review: The biggest thing I think that could use improvement is a condensing of the page and important information. Users are in tune and being trained with short, sweet, and to the point messages. At times, the page has key information in too many places that makes it hard to get the quick version of the event.

Overall_Review: Overall very easy to use and look up events.
Pros_Review: Easily look up events, easily readable. Great way to not only buy tickets but also sell them if needed.
Cons_Review: Prices can be a bit high. Site can appear somewhat clunky looking and overwhelming to a less tech savvy person.

Overall_Review: I moved to Washington DC from a small town within the past year.Eventbrite has been my link to fun events for my son and I .
Pros_Review: I like that it gives me a link to events happening around me .This includes dates,times,tickets and registration.
Cons_Review: I don't have any complaints at this time .

Pros_Review: I like that I automatically get outlook calendar invites for events I register for. It keeps me reminded and up to date on my availability. It sure beats manually adding it to my calendar.
Cons_Review: Search terms. Whenever I search "digital" or  "business" trainings, all I get are the same 100 results of a project management class. It's not really relevant and the Cincinnati calendar is flooded with them.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is definitely the DIY Event Management Platform available because of the ease to setup and run without having to depend on external help. Love the Event Check-in option.
Cons_Review: Not much to dislike about Eventbrite apart from the pricing.

Overall_Review: While the interface was slightly cluttered, Eventbrite gave me the tools I needed to create high-quality event information.
Pros_Review: I most liked the ease of use of this software. From the first time I felt confident in my ability to use the software to meet my needs.
Cons_Review: While it was nice to see a plethora of events going on in my area, it was a little much to take in at first glance, so I wish the homepage was more straightforward.

Pros_Review: Love the ease of using it to get all my events organized.
Cons_Review: The least I liked about it is that I just cant get enough.

Overall_Review: Simple set up very easy to use.
Pros_Review: Has so many options of things to go do. You can find music to go see, food events, events for kids, educational events it has it all.
Cons_Review: Sometimes when I'm searching for an event that I know for sure is happenening the app won't show the event.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a must tol for event marketing, very user friendly, easy to use and can be integrated with Facebook.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite is free as long as you're not selling tickets online, otherwise you will charged at a minimum 2% on each ticket sold. But still not entirely a bad feature.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use, just a few minutes can build a ticketed event
Cons_Review: The percentage taken out from each transaction

Overall_Review: I use this software a lot because lots of events now sell their tickets with this product. Sometimes it's tough to use, especially when you have a promo code to enter. It is a good product for what it is though.
Pros_Review: I like that it enables me to have my tickets for events delivered electronically straight to my inbox.
Cons_Review: There is a lot of information I have to fill out in order to get my tickets, I feel it is excessive. Sometimes it's also hard to figure out how to get my tickets printed.

Pros_Review: -This is a tool I'll use when I'm trying to plan a) ahead or b) just trying to find something to do over the weekend. The date finder and tool bar are easy to navigate, and there are even events that are suggested right away.
Cons_Review: -Honestly, there aren't many cons to this software. I don't know if they have an app, but I haven't head anything. That would be the only improvement. For example, SeatGeek sends me emails when people I am interested in are coming to my area.

Overall_Review: Helps to keep everything organized within one event platform. Easy to navigate and tech support is very responsive.
Pros_Review: It is easy to navigate and find multiple events, especially if they are linked to one conference. An annual conference I both work at and attend uses it each year to manage all the many activities happening simultaneously and it really helps to streamline things.
Cons_Review: None- it's been a huge asset to our event management!

Pros_Review: I find it very simple to use.   I use it to register for workshops.
Cons_Review: sometimes it's hard to look for a specific event

Overall_Review: We use this for our local festival.  Eventbrite is easy for our vendors to use for registration, easy to issue refunds, etc.  Unfortunately my experience has been that it is not very easy to set up a campaign.
Pros_Review: We use this for a local festival to register vendors and for this purpose it is well suited.  We can create numerous different vendor types and set pricing easily.
Cons_Review: Our event is essentially the same every year, but copying the campaign is a pain (lots of copy & paste)

Overall_Review: I usually just use Facebook to search for local events, but Eventbrite is a good option as well.
Pros_Review: I like that if I am looking for a specific type of event I can easily search Eventbrite for events occurring near me. I recently used it to find Halloween costume contests near me and it gave great suggestions. It is very user friendly. They also email me with events they think I would like. I've received a promo code for a free Shutterfly book in one of their emails.
