Cons_Review: My one criticism is that their emails with event suggestions aren't usually events that I am interested.

Pros_Review: This is great for creating events and because everyone seems to use it, it's become ubiquitous so everyone who might go to your event is immediately familiar with it.
Cons_Review: I don't like how the integration with websites still isn't very good. For example I might have a company with two locations and want to have a page on my website listing all upcoming events at Location A, and another doing the same for Location B. You can't do that unfortunately, as far as I  could see.

Pros_Review: It is easy to use and it works well with Iphones
Cons_Review: The thing I like least about it is that not everyone uses this platform yet

Overall_Review: Fast, simple, and to the point.
Pros_Review: I have signed up for quite a few events using Eventbrite and it has always been a seamless process. Printing my tickets and receiving notifications was always simple.
Cons_Review: Nothing bad to say. This products does was it supposed to do and does it well.

Overall_Review: Don't miss this app, it's a life saver when it comes to organizing an event and don't want to deal with it yourself.
Pros_Review: very easy to use, free for free tickets (which makes it a no-brainer for personal events like a class-reunion or so), alert and notifications at will.  Very useful!
Cons_Review: Don't have any cons to my perspective.  Non-Free tickets have a processing fee but it's just a fair arrangement for the great service they provide.

Pros_Review: I like that this software is easy to work with as a user and as an admin.
Cons_Review: I cannot think of anthing that I do not like about it.

Pros_Review: Easy to use. great Ux/Ui all events needed info and tickets in one place.
Cons_Review: I didn't find anything that I dont like in this software.

Pros_Review: Very simple to search through your area and see what events are free. It is also very simple to create a public event and post it.
Cons_Review: Very simple to use and interact with your community. You can add tickets to your phone so you don't have to waste paper printing them out. No complaints.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use event management software; clean ui that is well designed.  Simple to promote events on the software.
Cons_Review: Integration with importing events into certain calendar software can be buggy at times.  Email formatting for sending invites is occasionally off.

Pros_Review: The registration page is very intuitive. I appreciate that I get an email confirmation with all information about the even (plus location via GoogleMaps).  I like that I can add the event to my calender. I found a lot of events because of Eventbrite that I wouldn't have known about otherwise.
Cons_Review: So far I really like to purchase tickets via Eventbrite. I have no cons. I have not used the customer support yet.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is very easy to use, from sign-up to creating and managing events. I use it a lot when I want to organize meetups. It makes my event looks so professional.
Cons_Review: I have been using Eventbrite for some while, I haven't found something that I dislike about the platform.

Overall_Review: Great networking tool, great marketing tool, and overall very straightforward and valuable product!
Pros_Review: You can search hashtags, find local events that you would not normally see posted, and even buy tickets right there in the app. It's a great program! The "contact the organizer" feature is great as well.
Cons_Review: I really cannot think of anything negative. I have not found any issues with the program yet, although I have not been using it for a terribly long time.

Pros_Review: The software is great for setting up and managing events. It is easy to gather needed information and run reports.
Cons_Review: It would be nice to have a big more flexibility when it comes to their tickets. I don't always want to have a 'ticket' emailed but there doesn't seem to be a way to turn it off.

Pros_Review: Able to register and manage many different types of events. The apps and website interface are very easy to use. Checking in event attendees is quick and easy.
Cons_Review: I would like to see more customization options. It also needs better integration with other apps and software to easily pass data.

Overall_Review: Easy & user-friendly!
Pros_Review: This website has been a lifesaver for our event registration.  It is so easy to create the form, invite the attendees and track the number of tickets sold. And the best part, there is no cost to use the site unless you charge a fee for your event.
Cons_Review: The only downfall is not being able to edit want information you want to collect from each attendee. All the fields are already completed and you have to choose from the list.

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is for people to register. I believe that this is the new era of registering for events and the beginning to a successful event.
Cons_Review: For a site that is made for sales of ANY kind to not have a customer support call in number and a slow response time is very inconvenient.

Overall_Review: I use it when others invite me to an event through the program but do not use it for searching for an event itself.
Pros_Review: Readable
Cons_Review: Doesn't always link to addresses

Overall_Review: Keep up the good work. We would love to work closer with eventbrite as an event partner in the future.
Pros_Review: The system was intuitive, easy to use for ourselves and our guests. The backend tracking was very helpful for our team as administrators.
Cons_Review: We were hosting an event where we could have used a few unique tool specific to our event, but were unavailable. The only other con for us is cost. As a nonprofit our budget is tight and unfortunately we aren't afford to use the system more than we have but it is great for free events.

Pros_Review: It's incredibly easy to sign up for all sorts of events, the registration time is just a minute. I like that I receive a confirmation email with a ticket that I can print or refer back to.
Cons_Review: The registration times out, always makes me nervous! But I understand that it's a necessary feature.

Overall_Review: I use EvenBright periodically. A number of events I've been to use it. It's easy and works well
Pros_Review: It's really easy - makes gathering much easier
Cons_Review: None that I can think of

Overall_Review:
Had no problems with Eventbrite until end of year tax reporting.
My NYE tickets were paid to my account on Jan 6th 2015 but Eventbrite claimed it on the 2014 1099 form. (My accountants loved that)!!!
 Also wondered why my bank statements and 1099 form didn't add up??
 Apparently they 1099 you on the fees they keep as there own service charge!!!!
Customer service couldn't even tell me that. My accountants had to figure it out on there own.
Did over 150k in ticket revenue with them last year. They will get $00 this year..
Check out Ticket Tailor. (This is not a plug) look for yourself. They have flat rate fees that are pretty reasonable in my book. And much easier to justify come tax time!!!
Software is great but if you don't want to pay taxes on there income then I would check out something different.
easy, enjoyable and simple to use. no negative feedback here
Pros_Review: I found event brite very easy to use, simple and does exactly what you need it to do. When setting up a event it was very straight forward and very useful tool for those that want to digitalized your event through social media.
Cons_Review: i didnt have any issues using this program, simple but very effective. Great for social media use or adding to your own website.

Overall_Review: was a good experience
Pros_Review: Easy to navigate around. Like the convenience and having all event details right at your finger tips
Cons_Review: None at the moment. I didn't like that i couldn't see full details on the mobile but was able on my computer

Overall_Review: I will continue to use Eventbrite for events because I am already used to the system.
Pros_Review: It was super easy to use and there were tools and help available to allow for better event pages to be created.
Cons_Review: I did not like the complexity of trying to figure out the discount codes. The language in describing how discount codes work was confusing which left me with only trial and error. A customer abused a code and I was not aware until it was too late.

Overall_Review: Great software, easy to use and an enjoyable experience for our customers.
Pros_Review: Setting up the registration for our company event was very easy on eventbrite! I love the capabilities of integrating on our website and the setup of the tickets was simple.
Cons_Review: There could be a few more options for different add-on purchases with the ticket types, but overall it had what I needed.

Overall_Review: It was easy and took alot of the pressure and stress off of me when it comes to organizing the event.
Pros_Review: This app allowed for me to raise money for my team without having to collect money or the stress of organizing the names and keeping track of tickets purchased.
Cons_Review: I personally had no issues with this app. It is very detailed oriented but that helps eliminate questions that may be asked. It can be time consuming.

Overall_Review: Nothing but awesome experiences. Eventbrite has made scheduling & signing people up so much easier.
Pros_Review: Such a great program to allow customers to register for events. It is super easy & the data received is extremely organized. I highly recommend this for all Large scale event planning.
Cons_Review: Nothing. It is an awesome program, and I would highly recommend it to anyone who plans any large scale events.

Overall_Review: Getting everyone together at the same time
Pros_Review: It has a great deal of information and connects right over to outlook for scheduling
Cons_Review: Can be confusing at times. Ive not gotten confirmation in a timely fashion and book a second event on top.

Pros_Review: We used this for a church function so it was nice to send out invites and have people rsvp so we had an idea of who was coming
Cons_Review: Took a while for people to check in and some people had to still register

Pros_Review: Super easy interface for when we want to coordinate company and customer events. No one has issues using.
Cons_Review: It's rare but have been kicked out of eventbrite while uploading an event. Other than that, it's worked great.

Pros_Review: Easy to setup a new event.  You can easily customize it to fit your particular event which is nice because we have different categories of attendees that we need to add for each event. The reporting feature is also a nice bonus!
Cons_Review: Wish there were some more layout options available for use. Would also like an easier way to contact customer service.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is one of the easiest event management tools you can use. They've got everything laid out in a super easy to navigate format and it all just makes sense.
Cons_Review: Nothing really it's easy to use and I can't fault it.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is just perfect,  and the best part is, it is completely free to organize and share   events, as long as registration is free for the event.
Cons_Review: I have e never had any problems with this software.

Overall_Review: I was in Las Vegas on a business trip! I am no stranger to Vegas and all of the attraction and things to see and do been there done that right! So I happen to stumble across Event Brite and to be honest I was shocked they had  stuff going on that they don't tell you about! Free festivals and wine tasting all around free carnival passes they made my two day stay not typical Vegas leisure ya know! I don't step foot I the strip because there was so much to do on Event Brite off the strip! They offer some of everything from conferences to concerts dope app very innovative! User friendly interface as well check out Event Brite for the non typical events and leisure just around the corner! Event Brite people is the way!
Pros_Review:
Find any event near you listed
Offers multiple categories 
Choose your price range
Create on Event
Cons_Review:
Too many events to choose from!
Booking could be simpler

Pros_Review: It's so easy to find and sign up for events as well as to cancel or make changes to your tickets. It's easy to use the app to navigate to your tickets.
Cons_Review: There is no easy to find customer service available.

Overall_Review: We were able to reach out to our invitees early enough without relying on the "snail mail".
Pros_Review: The software is very simple therefore making it easy to use.  This is the first time we have used Eventbrite for one of our events.  It was very easy to send out the invites to guests and as easy to receive the RSVPs.
Cons_Review: Initially I didn't check into the fees for the use but I think it may have been worth it, whatever we did pay.

Pros_Review: I have seen that many organizations including many political parties use this software to promote their events. We decided to give it a try and made an event. I love how everything is in one place from the event information to purchase tickets. Very simple and easy-to-use software.
Cons_Review: I really have no negative opinions about this software. Give it a try it is awesome!

Pros_Review: I like the fact that my tickets are held when I go to submit them, and that my card details are stored for the future.
Cons_Review: There have been times when I have gone to buy a ticket and the fees have seemed extortionate. It would make it easier to know why those fees were there, even if it's just explaining that it's for maintaining the site, it would make it easier to swallow.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and fits well with many different websites - easy to get to
Cons_Review: Customer service took a long time to respond to inquires and there are many additional features that eventbrite could add to its website

Pros_Review:
It's so simple to use and free to use for
Events that are free. Also you can save your past events which makes work easier.
Cons_Review: It would be nice if the whole platform was free even if your tickets have a price attached to them.

Pros_Review: The filters make it so easy to find the exact events I want. Then the ticket can be transferred into my Apple Wallet upon purchase.
Cons_Review: I haven't found any feature regarding this software that I dislike.

Pros_Review: I have never been on an app where so many events, from my area are advertised. Being able to not only buy tickets to exclusive events but also have the ability to post tickets for events that I host myself is insanely convenient to me.
Cons_Review: I wish the app had a loyalty program so you would get rewarded for sharing it with friends and family.

Pros_Review:
Eventbrite is the best place to go for info on events in your area, bar none.
It just has so much info and links to website of events to buy tickets etc. Perfect one stop place for events!
Cons_Review: I love this software and have zero complaints at all.

Pros_Review: I only use this to create Events and also attends Events. It is easy and free as long as your event is free. There are no hidden costs when setting up an event. However my buying experience has been different.
Cons_Review: When buying, I was confused and I asked for help but this is very limited and does not get to an answer. I do not use it anymore as my event was cancelled and I lost my money.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been super helpful for me. I am a very introverted person and struggle to figure out what I want to do on the weekends. I have been able to search for local events that are happening. I have event created my own events as well. It interfaces well with social media as well as email. Super helpful
Cons_Review: I wish more people would use it. This way there would be more suggested activities

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to pull up your tickets.
Cons_Review: They have been great and I have no issues with them .

Pros_Review: I have used Eventbrite a couple of times. It's easy to use and find event information. It has a lot of features for free event pages creations for companies to use.
Cons_Review: The upgrade cost is pretty pricey. A lot of add ons to your package/tickets.

Overall_Review: Overall I do not like the functionality or ease of use with this product. Anytime I get an invite from it I know I will lose 15 minutes of my life trying to fill it out.
Pros_Review: I don't think I've used a tool that solves this problem that is better. Having said that, I don't like this tool much either.
Cons_Review:
Overall Quality is basic and poor.
Ease of Use is horrible and don't even try and use the mobile application. Hard to use, not intuitive and time consuming.
Features & Functionality are ok.
Customer Support: Needed many times but would be more time consuming to call.
Value for Money- not worth it.

Pros_Review: I purchased tickets to an event using this software. Easy to navigate. I especially liked that I received an emailed receipt.
Cons_Review: Seemed a little much for a simple event site. I haven't attended the event though. I hope to see email reminders.

Pros_Review: It kept all my event tickets organized and easy to pull up when entering the event. No searching emails or logging into websites in the browser, or remembering where my tickets were.
Cons_Review: I have not come across a "con" yet using Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and set up. Lots of added functionalities that make it easy to print out name labels, sign in who attends a conference, etc. Good integration with third-party software.
Cons_Review: The price is quite high, unless you are running a free event

Overall_Review: The presentation of my end product is so spectacular I was amazed when I saw it I am still learning all this software has to offer. However I'm always at ease when I start it up
Pros_Review: As a new user I have found it to be extremely useful and easy to navigate I am still learning the software, however I am excited to get it done
Cons_Review: No cons at this present time I am a new user, I will stay dilegent to my reviews and post any shall I come upon any.

Pros_Review: I am an event promoter and producer, and use eventbrite often for both my paid ticket events and free ones
Cons_Review: even though the percentage that eventbrite takes per ticket sold is very cheap, it would be beneficial that it would have a promotion for startups

Overall_Review: It was a great experience. We use this for our continuing education meetings all over the US. It works great for what I need,.
Pros_Review: I still use the software and love that we are only charged when I charge people. It is also very easy to use.
Cons_Review: I wish I could do more of my own layout.

Pros_Review: Awesome way to communicate with non work related people about events.
Cons_Review: This is not so great for business events but I have to be honest that I have tried it for business events in a while.  The themes are less professional and more fun/personal in my opinion.

Pros_Review: It is easy to use and visually very appealing.
Cons_Review: I like the experience as a user but not as a seller.

Pros_Review: It has many years on the market, and for that reason, many companies use it. You can find a lot of events on it and is very easy to use
Cons_Review: It doesn't let you to add a massive data of guests, If you have a list of guests you have to add them one by one

Overall_Review: We had a yoga for cancer event we wanted to sell tickets for attending, we used Eventbrite and found the set up really easy to do.  Provided a QR code and allowed us to promote on multiple platforms.
Pros_Review: Easy to plan and promote your event and even sell tickets!  Literally takes a few minutes from set up to the event being live and the event is searchable in Google.
Cons_Review: I really don't have any negatives to give about Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: This has made our ticketed events much easier to keep track of. It is great that my whole team can see what's going on.
Cons_Review: I don't like the marketing side. I use a different software for that, because Eventbrite has been a bit complicated to deal with.

Pros_Review: The accessibility to use this software is so useful. You can check the necessary information about the event on just one-click!
Cons_Review: A little issue on some feature that requires more updates and improvement. Hope to get is soonest.

Pros_Review: It's easy to register for events on Eventbrite. Mobile tickets are easy to access and use
Cons_Review: Eventbrite could be much smarter, using AI and your preferences to recommend things you like to do on specific days. Proactively plan my weekend for me

Pros_Review: I've both hosted and attended events and seminars where tickets are vended through Eventbrite.  It's easy to use, cost effective, and simplifies that section of hosting.
Cons_Review: No real cons. Never had a problem getting tickets out there.

Overall_Review: I would recommend this app as it is a simple way to find events!
Pros_Review: I love how simple this app is. Incredibly user friendly. It's a great tool to find local events in your area.
Cons_Review: I do wish there was more variety to the app but I still really enjoy it.

Pros_Review: I use this to discover & sign up for events both in town & when im travelling. It helps me keep track of things i signed up to attend
Cons_Review: I wish it were a more attractive ux/ui. The website has a very dated look & feel like an old portal

Pros_Review: You can organize your events quickly and manage them all in one place.  I like the different pricing options and features available that I can choose from based on the type of event I'm organizing.  I also like the ability to log in from anywhere and track my sales.
Cons_Review: The Premium pricing package makes me choose a minimum threshold amount which doesn't always work for the event I'm organizing.

Pros_Review: It's basically easy to use but what I like the most about this solution is the overall reach I can get -  - and I can use it on most social media platforms for easily getting my events out there and being able to get an idea of how far my event is being shared.
Cons_Review: The online help center can be a little hard to use sometimes.  I wish that was just a bit more user friendly but it's still usable.

Pros_Review: Ease of use, secure purchasing and selling, many features that allow you to buy tickets directly from eventbrite as well
Cons_Review: Customer support could be better. I had an issue with a seller and it was hard to get a quick response from eventbrite

Pros_Review: EventBrite makes it really easy to create and share public events, as well as accept payments.  The user interface is also very user friendly.
Cons_Review: I wish there were more way to customize your event page.  Other than that I don't have any complaints!

Overall_Review: Simple to use & helpful for future promotions
Pros_Review: This  is such an effective tool for connecting with those interested in participating in any event you may be organizing
Cons_Review: This is not yet a very well known software. My hope is that this will be used more in the future as it is so helpful

Overall_Review: Good way to find events, but not the best. Could have an easier way to organize events
I love singing for events using this app. It makes easy to RSVP to events and share information with friends.
Pros_Review: Fast and easy
Cons_Review: None

Overall_Review: Easy to use for customer and organizer.  Easy navigation.
Pros_Review: Ease of use, mobile friendly
Cons_Review: Could be more visually appealing

Overall_Review: The aaplication make it easy to register and join events that i get a link to. The aaplication make it easy to register and join events that i get a link to.

Event Brite is really useful when planning/publishing events, but it could use more features/options to integrate other platforms instead of basically just being an RSVP website. However, overall a really useful site that I enjoyed using.
Pros_Review: Ease of use, didn't have too many issues with it.
Cons_Review: Could use more personality and modifications

Overall_Review: Nice and simple
Pros_Review: Easy to book and keep track of your tickets in the iWallet on my phone. I can access them anytime and I can never loose track of them
Cons_Review: I've sometimes found it hard to search and discover related events. It would be nice to be recommended events I would be interested in

Overall_Review:
Simple to use, has all the advanced functions I want, love the DIYness of it combined with the more advanced help via customer service if needed, customers are familiar with it and trust it, makes ticketing something that doesn't take a lot of time or thought which for a busy event producer I appreciate.

All of the employees I've interacted with are very friendly and helpful as well.
My overall experience with Eventbrite is amazing, I love the website and what I can do on the site.
Pros_Review: I like that it allows me to add and take things off that I don't want on there or have changed. I like that I can add a cut off time to sale tickets
Cons_Review: The only thing that I don't like is that I can't take my flyer and add it as a picture without it being a certain size.

Overall_Review: this application let  to target   the right audiences and  the setup and registration are really easy
Pros_Review: best trusted platform where  users  and  public could find  all services online,  multiple tickets can be created     , all  best service for free
Cons_Review: the fees for tickets  could  add up,  sometimes have a tediuos process to find events due the old and new ones are mixedf

Overall_Review: So far I have had great experience with Eventbrite and it awesome!
Pros_Review: It is great for organizing events, gatherings, getting responses from people, number of attendees etc. It definitely helps in organizing and managing the events.
Cons_Review: Well, so far it has been great. But if you have any questions about the event, it may be difficult to contact the concerned person unless the details are posted.

Overall_Review: It is a very good experience because it let me know of what is going on in town.
Pros_Review: It is a very good software that you provide you with access of what events are going on in your town and makes you aware of free events too.
Cons_Review: The Eventbrite does not have an update notification of for example a subject like health event that you can be update once something new is in town.

Overall_Review: I was planning for an event out of town and it kept my information right at my fingertips.
Pros_Review: I've used this software for a couple of different events. The event information was well organized and easy to follow.  I also find it helpful to see what is coming up.
Cons_Review: I found it was slow when I used the app on my phone.  A couple times I had to close and re-open the app.

Overall_Review: I have had many positive experiences buying tickets with EventBright for things that are local to me!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been my one stop shop for finding tickets for my local venues. everything is listed out whats near me and makes it easy to pay.
Cons_Review: I have nothing bad to say, nit it would be cool is there was a way to narrow it down to use for business purpose only.

Overall_Review: We have enjoyed using as well as attendees like not having to keep up with paper tickets.
Pros_Review: This was the only decision to be made when we decided to take our event completely digital.  The check-in process now runs very smoothly and we don't have to have tickets printed.
Cons_Review: We have not experienced any cons and have even had to get refunds which was a smooth process as well.

Overall_Review: great experience with it. it give great information about people who plan to attend your event.
Pros_Review: it gives good visibility on how many people are interested to your event. It let them to rsvp or reject the event.
Cons_Review: it require some setup to get you connected to the system. it also require you to install the apps to rsvp or reject the event i believe.

Overall_Review: Seems like a good way to advertise an event and a simple way for people to choose to attend an event.
Pros_Review: I used Eventbrite to RSVP for a workshop. It was user friendly and simple. All of the relevant event information was displayed in a readable fashion.
Cons_Review: For my use, I did not find anything I didn't like about the software. I have only RSVPed. I am not familiar with setting up an actual event itself.

Overall_Review: We highly recommend Eventbrite for the management of smaller list events.
Pros_Review: We love how easy it is to create events in Eventbrite and manage our invite lists to maximize or vital time.
Cons_Review: The only drawback we have to Eventbrite is that it doesn't sink with our CRM. We find that for larger events we utilize our CRM's event management tools instead.

Pros_Review: This was a good way to get free visibility for my event.
Cons_Review: I wanted to connect the Eventbrite event to my Facebook event, but I would have had to made them at the same time through Eventbrite. I had already boosted a Facebook post with my event, so I could link the event without disrupting that.
reasons_choosing: I had heard of them and used them for personal searches for local events.

Pros_Review: This is super easy to use and straightforward. Really nice that it sends a detailed confirmation straight to your email.
Cons_Review: It can appear bland at times but I like the software all in all.

Pros_Review: It was very intuitive and easy to use for people who are not technologically savvy.
Cons_Review: Honestly, I do not think I have anything negative to say about Eventbrite. It worked very well for our purposes!

Pros_Review: I like how they offer a variety of options when creating an event and able to send and track invites
Cons_Review: just not a fan of seeing the ads on the emails but I get why they have to do it

Pros_Review: This app allows you to see events happening around you, search and purchase tickets and allows you to have your tickets right in the app.
Cons_Review: I have no complaints about this software!

Pros_Review: I loved having all the information about my events in one place. It was easy to manage the site and application.
Cons_Review: I wish that I could more easily link my events to my Google Calendar.

Pros_Review: Very quick to set up and easy to track any event. Last minute amendments can be made quite easily. The feature to be able to add more tickets once your event has sold out is great! Allowing us to manage numbers.
Cons_Review: I find it very hard to find a con about eventbrite. Its so easy to use, that i dont actually think i have a any cons

Pros_Review: Actually its simple and perfect very much easy to use. Create events and able to advertise them via emails, for paid events tickets are sold through the platform and they charge a commission which I believe its reasonable. This ticketing system is absolutely fabulous.
Cons_Review: This software functions as intended and I have no problem with it.

Overall_Review: Pretty good experience overall - I've used it to get hundreds of people signed up for half a dozen events. I am going to continue to use it.
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to set up an event, get it live, and get people signed up.
Cons_Review: I don't like how outdated some of the pages look. The landing page where you sign up for events can get pretty ugly, which is sad for such a large company.

Overall_Review: Being in sales, I need to know where my clients are going. Eventbrite has helped me have a much farther reach. It has also connected me to non business groups that are fun to be a part of.
Pros_Review: It's like the hotels.com or kayak of event sites. It pulls all the different events by keywords and let's you easily register.
Cons_Review: Some events are in the past and will show up as options.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is the standard when it comes to events, both that we put on and ones that we accept to do personally.
Cons_Review: This software is easy to setup and doesn't have much downside!

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is useful because it tracks the replies or lack there of of the people invited to the events.
Pros_Review: I like how it is easy to RSVP to events sent in Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: There isn't anything I can think of at the moment.

Pros_Review:
Easy Set Up
For the Most part its Set it and Forget it
E-tickets work wonderfully
Cons_Review: Customer Perception when driving them to Eventbrite in regards to making sure the CM know that they are still with the same organization

Pros_Review: App is awesome and it's super easy to set up and mange events + sell tickets. Promotion tools make it easy to market your event on Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Processing fees can be steep and payouts can be delayed

Overall_Review: Very satisfied with this software
Pros_Review: I love that Eventbrite stores tickets for events/registration in an inbox for you so you can always come back and know that your ticket is safe and didn't get deleted.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything negative to say. Eventbrite makes my job very simple. I am always registering many people for events and it's extremely convenient for me.

Pros_Review: It is so easy to create events and share them out on social media with the app or a desktop. In just a few clicks and you are able to issue a refund, which for me is anytime saver when compared to my previous way of offering classes!
Cons_Review: I have to use a workaround for the managing events feature, but it may be user error and not an issue with Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: For a company that arranges trainings, this software is convenient to register attendees and collect payment. Even offers discount codes.
Cons_Review: I have not experienced any particular challenges using this software.

Pros_Review: I dont know what much to say, its just a perfect little app. If you are offering an event, setup is easy; if you are attending an event, registration is easy. Moreover the app is plain, simple and great.
Cons_Review: Not much to say here but if i had to say something its the event recommendations i receive in the app, which most of the time actually dont interest me.

Pros_Review: A lot of crucial functionality already included in the free software makes it my go to for pop-up events.
Cons_Review: Because it has a lot of extra functionality I don't need, the behind-the-scenes interface feels a bit cluttered.

Overall_Review: It a good way to purchase events tickets
Pros_Review: Its easy to purchase in app and online as well as organise your own events
Cons_Review: Unfortunately organising your own events sometimes doesnt attract as many costummers as referenced by the website

Pros_Review: It is easy to purchase tickets for events using this website. They also have an app you can download if purchasing tickets often.
Cons_Review: I have only used this website for purchasing tickets and have had no issues

Pros_Review: I guess what makes me go back to Eventbrite is that it is easy to use. I've never had a problem with customer service.
Cons_Review: You cannot accept Paypal payments which gets annoying when my patrons often want to pay via Paypal.

Pros_Review: This software makes ticket sales for large or small events a breeze! It's also great for free RSVPs when you're trying to limit the body count.
Cons_Review: It's pretty great! I don't have any complaints or suggestions.

Pros_Review: Easy to use, simple steps to view events and check out. Like that you can share on social media platforms etc.
Cons_Review: Dislike the linking when you purchase tickets to an event that has assigned seating. You are unable to view where you will be sitting. You have to look separately at the seating chart. Not as many details regarding the event available.

Pros_Review: I haven't really used EventBrite . I attended a Meet and Greet earlier this month and EventBrite was used by the woman who put the Meet and Greet together. The link was easy to share with all my clients and it was convenient for the organizer to know who'd be in attendance so we could be prepared for them.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything bad to say about it. I haven't used it directly just shared the link.

Pros_Review: Ease of use and very easy to find local events that match my interests. Also very easy to transfer tickets  if you sell or bought for someone else.
Cons_Review: No bad experiences, the app and the online website both work very well.

Overall_Review: Creating and inviting people to events.
Pros_Review: I like the ease of use when creating events and inviting people, along with RSVP function.
Cons_Review: I think the mobile app differs slightly from the desktop software, but it isn't major.

Overall_Review: I have planned to use this software for my next event as i am new to event management. But definitely would try this.
Pros_Review:
This has been one of the best event applications available. i first got to know about the software when i was invited for a event in the university. After some research i found out that this is a really good software for event holding and all the registration needs. 

Features of  creating, promoting, tracking, checking-in, analyzing events is very useful and also this is a very user friendly application. it will be very useful for event management.
Cons_Review: better if they could arrange the seating arrangement function in the upcoming updates. More updates with more features and templates would be needed.

Pros_Review: Easy to use with a great UI.  Doesn't take much time to set up your event and get it posted for your attendees
Cons_Review: Fees are a little high (2.5%) depending on what package you use it for but they do offer custom pricing.

Pros_Review: Ease of use is crucial! I like the layout, as well. Love how easy it is to create discount codes, etc.
Cons_Review: Honestly can't think of anything. I always wish software has the ability to have customizable interfaces so that's one.

Pros_Review: I think if you have an event you are hosting/sponsoring, you must include your event on EventBrite because of how many people it reaches and how many people use the site to search for events.
Cons_Review: the pricing for the use of the software is a little high, to me. Each ticket sold through the site is charged a fee that the end user may not appreciate.

Pros_Review: I enjoy eventbrite's customer service support team. Any time I've had an issue they were more than willing to help alleviate the problem.
Cons_Review: The software is very hard to learn at first. It depends on a person's individual user experience however I found it very hard to learn. Once I got the hang of things I can click right along.

Pros_Review: I like that it is easy to create new events, promote them online, sell tickets, and manage purchases night of.
Cons_Review: I dislike that the fees are just as high if not higher than competitor programs that function very similarly.

Pros_Review: Being able to put in emails and have them mass sent an event is great. Our company is on the larger side and Eventbrite allows us to send our invites for events with no problems at all. The templates are great and make for ease when constructing the form
Cons_Review: When accepting the event, you are then put in their system and they will email you when you may not want to receive their emails at all.

Pros_Review: It's easy to use and makes scheduling and filling events so much easier. It avoids double booking a seat and people are familiar with using it.
Cons_Review: The fee associated with using Eventbrite can be annoying when setting the costs of an event. Depending on how often you use this, it might be more beneficial to cover the costs yourself vs including it in the price of the event.

Overall_Review: It works very well. After having an account you register for new events with two clicks!
Eventbrite app is very user friendly, and easy to use
Pros_Review:
Nice UX
Good integration with apple eco system

Overall_Review: Easy to use, keeps you on time and knowledgeable of your events.  You won't be missing any events with this app

I use Eventbrite both as participant and as an organizer, and I really enjoy each experience! It's easy to use, practical, and has all the functionalities I need. Whenever I needed answers, the Customer Support was always ready to help, with great feedback. I definitely suggest it create and promote your events!

I attended a Trump rally and the only way to get in was by having a ticket through Eventbrite.  I had never used it before and it was quite easy.  I then attended a local ATV event called Camp RZR and once again, super easy.  I even got several updates/notifications regarding my event which was awesome.

Eventbrite seems to be the most common service I use these days for registrations. It's quick, remembers my information and doesn't ask for much. The details are easy to find for each event I attend. Would recommend to anyone. I haven't used it much to find events happening around town, primarily used for registrations for events found elsewhere.

I've used Eventbrite for everything from launch parties to tailgates, and it just really is the easiest tool for generating interest and managing attendees for any kind of event you can think of. Payment systems and ticketing were super easy, and I have found it easy to do everything from refunding overpayment to communicating with guests.

Pros_Review: It's extremely intuitive and easy to use.
Cons_Review: Sometimes they didn't send the confirmation for the tickets but the customer service solved the problem immediately.

Pros_Review: Simple but functional, used several times for event bookings, without problems.
Cons_Review: I have not noticed any anomalies, I can be satisfied with the service offered.

Overall_Review: Site reference no doubt at the time of buying tickets for events
Pros_Review: There's a huge variety and you always find what you need. I use it to search for events and to network in them, always within the same sector as my company
Cons_Review: Sometimes the prices are high but it does not depend on the platform but on the company that organizes the event

Overall_Review: I have no bad things to say. Very pleased with the ease of operation from both ends. Nice application.
Pros_Review: So easy to set up and create an event, and sell tickets. From an end user standpoint it's extremely easy to purchase and show proof of your purchase.
Cons_Review: I haven't found anything I dislike from this application. Works the first time every time. Great way to buy/sell event Tix.

Overall_Review: Used to organize events: it allows to have an updated list of participants and manage the registrations.
Pros_Review: This software offers a good on-line support to organize the events. Lots of customizations are available to distinguish the event from the others.
Cons_Review: The list of participants to the event can be improved with other features. Integration with other softwares can be improved.

Pros_Review: This software is great for planning events, managing guest lists, and making reservations.
Cons_Review: This software has met or exceeded my expectations so far.

Overall_Review: We are able to quickly set up and publish events to our target audience. We have seen a great return from using this software.
Pros_Review: It is very easy to set up events for our business. It is well set up and allows for quick publication.
Cons_Review: I can not think of anything that I dislike about this software. It does everything we need it to do.

Overall_Review: For emailing invitations it is a wonderful support tool and makes checkin at the venue a breeze!
Pros_Review: Simple process and registration information was surprisingly easy and precise. It worked wonders during the check-in and attendance.
Cons_Review: Somehow seems like a lot of scrolling for the recipient with all the details after clicking registration

Pros_Review: I like that it is a secure platform to order tickets to various events on.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the orders do not include  the fees upfront, which can be frustrating.

Overall_Review: No problem.  Very good.
Pros_Review: It's easy to book various events on Eventbrite, even when the events are free!  I have booked a ticket for a free grand opening food restaurant that came with a free meal!
Cons_Review: None.  The software is good.

Overall_Review: Overall very good, easy to use and I have attending events off the back of this.
Pros_Review: I like Eventbrite because it gives me the opportunity to find local networking events suitable for my business.
Cons_Review: On the homepage I can't ever see a search option to look for local events, i usually do this on google by putting 'local events Eventbrite'

Pros_Review: I like that I can reach out to multiple parties at once, and find cool new venues in my area.
Cons_Review: What's there bad to say about this? It does what it's meant to do.

Pros_Review: As an attendee, it's super simple - see event, pay, tickets in phone, done.
Cons_Review: As an administrator, could do with more ability to edit events after being posted.

Overall_Review: It worked well for my purpose. It was free for free events so I appreciate that very much.
Pros_Review: I used this tool to encourage signups to a free event with a paid component. It did get a few signups but none that correlated to the time spent.
Cons_Review: I wanted to be able to easily create one event with multiple locations but that was not possible so I had to spend time creating multiple events.

Overall_Review: Over all I think it is okay for smaller events that don't have a lot of overhead and upfront payments and that are located in the States.
Pros_Review: I like how easy it is to set up an event in Event Brite. It is also very friendly to use when posting events on Facebook.
Cons_Review: I don't like how the payments are paid out to use in lump sums. It would be so much better to have the payments as soon as they come in. I would also like to see more languages offered for international events.

Overall_Review: We use this for public events regularly when we are trying to invite new attendees
Pros_Review: I like that it makes emailing simplistic, it also organizes email lists so you can email over and over again.  Allows you to collect contact information
Cons_Review: there is a learning curve and it doesn't offer some of the features you would think would be standard

Overall_Review: As a manager we use this to buy tickets for our on-line webinars. If I need to go back and add someone I can just as long as I log in.
Pros_Review: When logging on it will ask you to sign in or continue as guest. Easy to work around and easy to use.
Cons_Review: I have not come across any cons as of yet. Everything is easy to work. I have no issues with this software.

Pros_Review: It is easy to use and manage our events. We can then link it via our website
Cons_Review: It took a bit of time to understand how to use it but after a while it gets easier

Pros_Review: LOVE that we got to use it for free since our event was free.
Cons_Review: Unfortunately, that meant that we couldn't collect all the data we needed, like phone numbers.

Overall_Review: I like Eventbrite and have actually used it to plan events while traveling and at home.
Pros_Review: I like the ease of use with the App. I like the connection that it has to social media and online websites. Where I see the event, I can capture it.
Cons_Review: The only complaint is that sometimes it doesn't show that there are no more tickets available.

Pros_Review:
It's easy to find popular events in your area.  And at the same time u can filter by category. 
Also, u can like events and share with friends or people u think would like them.
Cons_Review: This software has many problems when it is used with the celphone. For example, I had problems to select my seats.

Pros_Review: Frankly, I liked that there was no cost associated the best!
Cons_Review: The software is geared towards public events rather than private, internal events, so some of the features were irrelevant. They should have a different template for internal events, in my opinion. I also think they could have better design templates.
reasons_choosing: Because I was able to send them out for free.

Pros_Review: It's very easy for the attendees to get a ticket and it's more official than a facebook event for a free event
Cons_Review: Transaction fees for paid event are high

Pros_Review: I enjoyed being able to register for the event and purchase tickets online. The fact that you receive recepit and ticket online without standing inline is  a win in my book.
Cons_Review: I do not know if it been fixed but when i purchased my tickets the page constantly locked up and I had to refresh the page or go back and start over but eventually it worked.

Pros_Review: Easy to book any artist's concert tickets that you like, I like that I can book sport events as well.
Cons_Review: Only prices vary when advertising and the actual price.

Pros_Review: Very easy to set up and event and track invites and RSVPs
Cons_Review: I'd rather see more security around who can respond and restrictions on forwarding invites

Pros_Review: Eventebrite is an excellent platform for those looking to promote their events online. I love being able to have a customizable web page for my event. Many are familiar with Eventbrite now so that make it even easier to promote using this software.
Cons_Review: Accessing your payment prior to the event would be great!

Overall_Review: As a respondent to events generated from Eventbrite, things couldn't be easier.  Simply click link in email, register for the event and setup a reminder if needed. It is also convenient to share the event via the standard social media methods directly from the event page.
Pros_Review: Easy to view, respond, and share events.
Cons_Review: Nothing stood out as a con with this software, easy to use as an end-user.

Pros_Review: Easy mobile application to follow events, allowing me to see daily schedules for each event with ease.
Cons_Review: The interface is a little slow on mobile devices.

Pros_Review: Easy to use with various ways to promote, collect information and transaction for ticket payment methods. Whatever type of event, available for the general public or closed to invite only, you can customize using your own graphics and easy to make changes after creating. As a user, you are also able to follow an event if any changes are made due to weather, cancellations, etc.
Cons_Review: No complaints here! It's a great tool for promoting events.

Pros_Review: My school uses eventbrite to notify people of upcoming events they've signed up for and it's awesome. It lets people view who is going to certain events and change your status on whether or not you're going
Cons_Review: I don't get why it is necessary to have an eventbrite account as a user if you are not creating events.

Pros_Review: I like that I am able to make a page that is easily accessible to the public for the events that I manage in the facility that I help manage. I also love that I am able to create a Facebook event page directly from Eventbrite that links back to the event page.
Cons_Review: I personally haven't had any issues with Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a great platform to use when you want to get the word out about your event while also providing  the ability to purchase tickets.
Pros_Review: What I love most about Eventbrite is that events are easy to find and your event can be easily found within categories.
Cons_Review: In my experience, I haven't had any problems using Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Easy way to buy tickets for an event or check to see what is going on around me.
Cons_Review: Not always as up to date as I would hope and times out rather fast

Pros_Review: I love that it makes creating tickets for your event extremely easy. Creating an event is very easy.
Cons_Review: It is too easy for people to create multiple log ins and lose track of their tickets.

Pros_Review: It's super easy to setup, load in all the info and super easy for guests to use.
Cons_Review: It would be nice if we could customize the look a bit more, but this is why it runs so well. So it's small thing.

Pros_Review: That I can view multiple events in my area that are happening at lots of different venues.
Cons_Review: It does not organize events by date. It just seems to list events in random date order.

Pros_Review: Ability to search by location AND date, ability to pay for events within app, suggested events for me.
Cons_Review: Lack of advertisement, a lot of events and business don't know to use it.

Pros_Review: Great for finding what's going on in your area and then letting you purchase tickets with ease.
Cons_Review: It could use a once over with its interface.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a simple way to get the word out for your event and achieve sales.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it simple to import your information to be able to sell and promote for your event.
Cons_Review: The search function could use work to make it easier to use. Looking for an event can often junk up your search results with events that are not similar in nature.

Pros_Review: It's easy to use and allows for quick entry of necessary guest information and quick purchasing through the system
Cons_Review: mobile interface for event replies can be simplified for external users

Pros_Review: I love the ease of utilizing Eventbrite. It's user friendly and understandable.
Cons_Review: I honestly don't have any genuine issues with the software. It rarely crashes or times out.

Pros_Review: It's super easy to add new events and the HTML widget functions are really easy to embed into websites
Cons_Review: The HTML widgets need to use Javascript and can sometimes clash with the website's JS

Overall_Review: Great flexibility in ticketing and easy to set up.  They take a cut but it's reasonable and you just build it into the ticket price.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite's ease of use is unparalleled.  Simple to set up, easy on the eyes, and efficient to use.  The reminder emails are key in helping us remind and ensure people are still coming to our events.
Cons_Review: I think they've pretty much nailed it for our use - no complaints

Overall_Review: Good way to see what classes are available and was easy to use, however I would tweak it so you could see the classes you had registered for while still scrolling through the options.
Pros_Review: This made signing up for seminars very simple because you could scroll through to see all that was available.
Cons_Review: Could not see what I was registered for without going to cart and then could not add other classes in the same batch.

Pros_Review: It is super easy to set up and allows you to sell tickets and keep track of number of attendees
Cons_Review: Sometimes looks a little plain. Would be better if the pages were more customize-able

Overall_Review: My overall experience with this app has been awesome! This is such a game changer for date night or when family comes to visit. I have been looking for something like this for a while and am so happy that I found it.
Pros_Review: I love the layout and design of the app. It is so easy to use and it I can see everything at one glance.
Cons_Review: So far I have not found a single thing that I dislike about the app.

Pros_Review: I liked how easy it was to create an event and was able to reach all the people that I wanted to know about the event.
Cons_Review: There was not much wrong with the software. Inviting people to events can be time consuming and using a new software meant that I had to type in some email addresses for people that I could not reach through social media, which it completely understandable.

Overall_Review: Ease of use
Pros_Review: Like everyone has said, it's so easy to get an event set up.. I got mine up and running in minutes. It's really nice that they provide the analytics as well so you can keep track of your sales for your paid events. It saves a lot of time.. just set it and share the link!
Cons_Review: Really nothing that I didn't like. It was simple, easy and intuitive to use. Saved a lot of time for me.

Overall_Review: Easy to find local events.
Pros_Review: I like that there's plenty of local events to choose from on EventBrite and it doesn't charge "convenience fees" for buying tickets like TicketMaster does.
Cons_Review: I think sometimes local event organizers do forget it exists, but that's about it. If you're organizing an event, don't forget to put it on EventBrite even if it's a free event!

Overall_Review: Easy to search events, buy tickets, and reserve a place or register for events.
Pros_Review: It's easy to use! I've used EventBrite mostly to register for events and buy tickets. It's great getting a reminder email about an event and all I have to do is click a button to reserve or buy a ticket. It's also a great resource to search for events whether its a fitness event or a concert and, of course, people can buy tickets straight from the site. I have yet to use it for distributing my own event tickets, but definitely will when i get the opportunity.
Cons_Review: The site can be a bit busy and their recommended events for my area do not look like anything I'd be interested in going to . . .at all.

Pros_Review: The mobile app, multiple interactions with other apps, make the event searchable and found easily to the relevant audience.
Cons_Review: Complicated interface and dashboard, very high commission on online payment, it charges commission for the at door sign-ins for events with paid tickets even if the payment was done at the door and not through the app, which is inconvenient and doesn't make sense

Pros_Review: I like that everything about this software is personalized.  It's cool that I get to select exactly what type of activities I enjoy and input my location so I am shown only those that relate to me.  It saves me time searching endlessly.
Cons_Review: It was difficult to navigate the software at first, to figure out where my tickets were and how to browse, but I learned relatively quickly, just like any other app.

Pros_Review: Easy to access to tickets, fast and simple. I used it regularly and it is practical and it works well!
Cons_Review: Improve the access to map and to infor;actions relative to the event. Sometimes there are some lacks

Overall_Review: very nice invite/evite software.  Use it all the time.
Pros_Review: Ease of use on multiple browsers
Cons_Review: Is it compatible with all browsers?  What about java/flash potential non use via folks who have locked down browsers from their work computers

Pros_Review: Everyone uses it so you know what to expect when the home screen pops up. And you know you will get an email promptly
Cons_Review: Why so many questions before I get what I want to accomplish. Also no way to add it to your calendar. I registered for a bunch of things for SXSW and when I tried importing , I got some weird PDF I cannot open

Overall_Review: Overall I have a good experience when I use Eventbright, however there are small little issues that always cause a bump in the experience. For example, every time I select multiple guests for an event, it asks me for their information on the next page. If I decide at that point that I don't have one persons info, there is no way to easily remove them from the RSVP and I must start everything over, even sign in.

Pros_Review: Ease of use, simple, and free!
Cons_Review: Nothing really. Not much.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is the go to tool for tickets and information on the latest events in your area. I would recommend this app bc it's easy to use, it's extremely accessible, and it allows for great ticket management
Pros_Review: Simple, easy, fun
Cons_Review: Not all tickets go through eventbrite

Overall_Review: Super experience with Evebtbrite. I organized a training workshop through this and it was everything my team and I was looking for. We did not know where to start and it was recommended by a friend on Facebook. And I must say, I'd definitely refer it to someone too!

As soon as you get to the main page, everything is mapped out perfectly. It's so easy to find exactly what you're looking for, I don't have to click around to find things. The website lists every single feature and price of the software, I didn't have to ask any questions!! Very impressive

Eventbrite is fabulous!

Wonderful to work with various employees on the GLIDE Legacy Gala. Sarah Loaiza, Amber Roesner, Johnny Pelfini, and the whole team, were all fabulous. Thank you for all of your help- waiving fees, database importation, registration equipment... You all rock. I hope we work together again soon.
I've had a good experience with this tool overall and will continue to use it from time to time when needed.
Pros_Review: This tool is great for small events that require an invitation or ticket of some sort. It's easy to pull up on your phone as well as change/cancel your event reservation date and time.
Cons_Review: There's not a ton of useful features for me so I'd like to see more integrations or other features. A redesign to the user interface would also be nice.

Overall_Review: I have loved the ease of using Eventbrite to purchase tickets to events.
Pros_Review: It made purchasing tickets for events really easy and secure. I never had any issues using Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I don't like about Eventbrite. I have only used it as a customer though so I don't know what it would be like selling tickets on there.

Overall_Review: It's easy to use to create and attend an event through it.
Pros_Review: It's easy to RSVP to events.  It will also send you out a reminder of the event and in some cases the zoom link.
Cons_Review: If the event cost money they will charge a little fee on price to get their share, but it also makes the price go up.

Overall_Review: Great! I was able to purchase my tickets with ease and enjoyed my event
Pros_Review: I only used this software a few times to purchase event tickets. I did a foam run and went through this software. It was very easy and i felt like it was a secure website i could trust.
Cons_Review: I do not have anything i did not like about this software as it was fairly easy to use.

Overall_Review: Overall, my experience was fine. I liked the event tickets and it is a good way to appear professional.
Pros_Review: This was a nice tool to create events online and promote. My favourite thing about Eventbrite is you can create tickets for your events.
Cons_Review: It left me wanting more. I can easily create events to post and promote on other platforms such as Facebook.

Overall_Review: i love registering for events with eventbrite. it is always a good experience.
Pros_Review: as a user, this product has probably the best experience. so smooth and seamless. i love receiving my tix via email
Cons_Review: i am not sure how robust the backend reporting features are with eventbrite, but i have a feeling they are not on par with cvent? i would love to know more.

Overall_Review: Overall no issues. Very streamlined and straightforward.
Pros_Review: Event rite is super easy to use. Very modern platform very user friendly and straight forward. Seamless design
Cons_Review: Currently there's nothing that I can say I don't like about the product and platform. Everything works as it's intended.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite will continue to be the ideal solution for event planning.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes registering and keeping track of registration for conferences I attend to be simple and quick.
Cons_Review: I have never had an issues with the software. Everythingnhas operated well and no major issues have been observed.

Overall_Review: We use it to find events for our business team-building.
Pros_Review: My team and I love that you can search with a lot of filters and choices on what to find. It's always easy to use and understand.
Cons_Review: Maybe it's our location, but in the area we are in, there aren't that many events. We find some once in a while.

Overall_Review: Overall the experience was very pleasant and straight forward.
Pros_Review: As easy as you'd expect for an event software. Used it recently when picking up a set of tickets. The transaction was easy and I was able to quickly pull up the tickets.
Cons_Review: There isn't really a lot to the software to not like. The transaction fee's at Eventbrite could be less.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and a well known brand. All event details are clear to attendees.
Cons_Review: No downside really. It has all the features  I need.

Overall_Review: Pretty easy to understand platform, that does less than stellar things with your data
Pros_Review:
Easy enough to use and get set up/working
Managing future event is easy
Analytics are good and easy to understand
Cons_Review:
Their data practices are less than stellar, keeping my event/cust. data, which is wildly unacceptable 
Getting in touch with their customer support is incredibly difficult and unintuitive
Integrations are lacking quite a bit behind other platforms

Pros_Review: This software makes buying tickets to events easy and hassle free. I like that this is an alternative to buying tickets and always offers deals
Cons_Review: There isn't anything I do not like about this software. I do not know anyone that has ever had trouble with using this product. All tickets were easily accessible and valid.

Overall_Review: It's been great and very helpful in boosting the exposure of our events. In fact, during this year's Back-To-School Event, we had 2 other competing events within close proximity to our church, and we've maxed out participation for our event. All backpacks (hundreds of them) have been accounted for.
Pros_Review: Easy to build, advertise, promote, share and integrate event invitation. The tracking is also very helpful and the ability to capture signups, emails and communicate with the attendees. The integration with Facebook is also valuable
Cons_Review: I've just started using Eventbrite for the past 4 events for a church that I volunteer to, and its been very effective so far. There's nothing that I find problematic yet.

Pros_Review: Makes finding an event, and hosting one, so much easier! It's all in one place.
Cons_Review: I haven't found anything that I don't like.

Pros_Review: As a user, it's easy to register for an event, receive my ticket and the event info. As an event host, it's very helpful to manage registration, attendees, provide refunds if necessary.
Cons_Review: No real complaints to speak of - if anything, I would prefer some additional reporting for events.

Overall_Review: It was awesome using this app. I totally loved it.
Pros_Review: I liked finding events around me as it saved me from loneliness on days when i had nothing on my calendar. Weekends especially.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the notices from the software for events come late and I either do not attend the event or go late.

Overall_Review: I found and went to programming meetups with Eventbrite.
Pros_Review: The simplicity to use Eventbrite mobile or desktop always easy to find the next event, sign up, and meet people seamlessly.
Cons_Review: I wish there's more public relation to promoting this to the community so there can be more content.

Overall_Review: The overall experience is very positive and we will continue to use this product.
Pros_Review: We use this product for personal invitations and it is simple and easy to use.  We are also able to track how many are coming to our events.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the follow up marketing emails are numerous, but we are able to change our subscription preferences.

Overall_Review: Good for a first timer. Will definitely use again if needed.
Pros_Review: As a new user to this platform, it was easy to use setting up event. Instructional videos on how to have successful event were very helpful.
Cons_Review: Making changes to event is a bit tricky to figure out. Would be nice if could do a simple edit of wording or pricing on event.

Overall_Review: Administration is happy to have another platform to engage parents.
Pros_Review: It doesn't require users to make an account, which appeals to users. Parents like seeing this for school functions.
Cons_Review: It is not as functional for volunteer signups as sign-up genius. It takes longer to create new events.

Pros_Review: I have used this software multiple times and I really like how easy it is to set things up.
Cons_Review: I feel like it could be more user friendly.

Pros_Review: Easy for everyone to use. Seemed like I got help throughout the entire process.
Cons_Review: Was slower loading then what I was used to.

Pros_Review: After registering for an event the follow-up communication is very detailed. The event registration number was easy to find. All of the event information was accessible via the "welcome e-mail". I didn't even need to log back into the Eventbrite platform itself because it was all condensed and organized in the e-mail.
Cons_Review: If the event is free, the use of Eventbrite services is free. However, if the event is NOT free, there is a service charge that varies. I signed up for an account for a free event and I have not seen any other events that I've wanted to attend on the Eventbrite platform (my guess is due to the cost).

Pros_Review: You are able to easily reserve or cancel events you're invited to
Cons_Review: I find it difficult to navigate some of the extras

Pros_Review: very convenient tool for checking the event information and booking tickets
Cons_Review: user interface needs to be improved a little

Overall_Review: Managing and planning events.
Pros_Review: I love how I can keep track of upcoming events with Eventbrite. I can also plan events that have many people coming, keep track of people who RSVP'd and more using this software.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I dislike about Eventbrite. It has been great so far.

Overall_Review: Great user experience!
Pros_Review: I have not used eventbrite to create my own events but I have used it as a user and every time I have used it I love it! It is very user friendly and I love that tickets come straight to my inbox. Def recommend using it to create a great user experience.
Cons_Review: Don't have anything bad to say about this software.

Pros_Review: I love how easy it is to navigate through the app.
Cons_Review: I'm quite satisfied with the software and have no complaints.

Pros_Review: The Eventbride app is very convenient in order to store event tickets
Cons_Review: The Eventbride app did not have anything I disliked about it

Pros_Review: The website has every event you can think of in any local area.
Cons_Review: The only problem is there might be too many events to look at.

Pros_Review:
Easy to navigate 
Easy to register and payment process
Cons_Review: Not easy to find events on other locations because it uses your phone's gps.

Pros_Review: This software is very helpful for events near you.  It shows the date, time and a little bit about the event.
Cons_Review: I wish it would give contact info for questions and it would be nice if we could pay for tickets right on the website instead of being redirected all over the place

Pros_Review: I like the ease of use and reliability of this program
Cons_Review: I don't dislike anything, it has always functioned as needed.

Pros_Review: I feel as though getting information for each event is rather simple and the layout is clean. It's easy to search for events that pique your interest.
Cons_Review: I think the homepage can be a bit too cluttered and sometimes feel as though the images of the events distract me away from the information I want to find out.

Pros_Review: You can find events in your area with ease
Cons_Review: Sometimes it's hard to tell how much the event is or it doesn't show all events

Pros_Review: I love that it's so easy to use and that tracking analytics is built right into the interface.
Cons_Review: I disliked the amount of cusomizations available

Pros_Review: It does make hosting events easier because all the information is right there.
Cons_Review: It sometimes seemed a bit overwhelming for a simple invitation.

Overall_Review: We will continue to use Eventbrite where possible when attending events/seminars outside of our company.
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is user friendly - Several work colleges and myself have used this for a few events/seminars that we have attended. It has all the information needed for the event.
Cons_Review: None that I have seen yet, we are fairly new to it.

Pros_Review: How you can create events and have people sign up for them to give you an idea of who's coming
Cons_Review: Figuring out how to use it, but once we did it was goid

Pros_Review: I love this software. I like how customizable it is and I like the designs they have for us.
Cons_Review: I personally have not found anything to complain about.

Pros_Review: It's a very intuitive platform that help you organize your event in less than 20 minutes.
Cons_Review: Sometimes fees may seem high but on a large number of sales they weigh less.

Pros_Review: It was very easy for me to look up events near me. I was able to search and find several adult cooking classes near me, fairly quickly.
Cons_Review: It doesn't seem like new events are added often, at least in my area. It's good to go on and browse once in awhile (every month or so), but for me it seemed pointless to use it more often.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is Easy to use, easy refunds, mobile friendly, user friendly, easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: It was Difficult at first to find a contact number when requesting a refund.

Pros_Review: Great tool for organizing events and having everything in one place.
Cons_Review: At this point, there really isn't anything that sticks out as negative right now.

Overall_Review: The benefits with Eventbrite is being able to communicate to multiple people and having them sign up for things on their own time and leisure. This is also a great way to have reminders of when/what to do for an event!
Pros_Review: I like that I am able to send out to multiple emails and have people sign up for events easily.
Cons_Review: There are no con's with this software that I have found with my many uses.

Pros_Review: I can create event and sell the tickets online, also event brite has a wide range of customers visiting there app for searching event and you can also get benefits of it. Pricing is based on how much tickets you sell. Support is awesome just drop a mail and you will receive an Email withing 24-48 hrs
Cons_Review: Good app to create only 1 drawback is there you need to visit desktop to check the status of your tickets sold. event brite should provide an Mobile app for the same.

Pros_Review: Ease of use, ability to search, ability to collaborate locally and regionally, pleasing layout.
Cons_Review: Disliked the general overpopulation of distracting events that had no bearing on what I wanted to look for.

Overall_Review: I've had a great experience with eventbrite that was an easy transition for someone like me that don't use online website for events
Pros_Review: I like that I was able to post and create content for the event and post specifics about my even and have it showcase to a lot of people and customers
Cons_Review: That it took about a day to get fully posted on the website

Pros_Review: This software's simple UI and efficient processing has made organizing my events and get-together's so easy.  It's mobile friendly and offers many utilities to promote my events.
Cons_Review: There is a fee with every paid ticket sold.  However, this is understandable as the creators need to be able to improve their product.

Pros_Review: Allows ticket sales and tracking for special events your business may be hosting; easy to use; tracks ticket sales and provides up to date information for users; uploading events and ticket information is easy and is a great software to have for any business regularly hosting events
Cons_Review: Many users trying to access at the same time may slow the software, but will quickly pass allowing users to quickly and easily access their purchase and ticket information

Pros_Review: Like how easy it is to use, set-up for new events is so quick.  The RSVP reports are helpful in the days leading up to an event.
Cons_Review: So far it has done what we have wanted.

Pros_Review: We used it to sell tickets for a nonprofit fundraiser and it accomplished that goal easily. We were able to get the guests info and ensure a seamless process night of.
Cons_Review: It did not collect everything that we would have liked to capture about our guests. It was also not ideal for our limited number of guests who wanted to purchase tickets offline.

Pros_Review: I love how this allows such customization when it comes to event information. It also looks great to share on facebook too. Eventbrite is a really great and powerful tool for schools and companies/organizations.
Cons_Review: I have no cons about this software as it has done it's job above and beyond! It has tons of great features!

Pros_Review: We used it for a company wide event and it was amazing! It created a easy platform to be able to let people know where they needed to go and when they needed to be there!
Cons_Review: It honestly was great. A little confusing at first but as any app is, we just had to play around with it for a few and figured it out! Great app!

Pros_Review: I like how it suggests events that you may be interested in depending on what kind of tickets you buy. I also like that you can add your ticket to your Wallet App on the iPhone. I think the formatting is intuitive and easy to use.
Cons_Review: I do not have many cons to report. I think if this website was marketed more and people knew more about it it could take off.

Pros_Review: It's really easy to set up and also integrates easily with other tools which works out great. The platform also allows you to easily set up free and paid events!
Cons_Review: I wish the  cost structure would be different as it gets a bit pricey when you have to give a % of your ticket sales plus a fee per individual ticket.

Pros_Review:
Easy to use, and event history is as your finger tips
Wonderful phone support at all hours
Easy to set up event
Cons_Review:
Discount codes are difficult to customize for our situation
Can't seem to get notification sent out when I upload the distribution list
Auto full would be nice when I have to register people, I have to reenter every time the same people and it can be time-consuming
Ability to email attendees an attachment. We send out speaker slides to all attendees the day before the event. I can't do that currently. Just the ability to email all attendees would be awesome

Overall_Review: This helps me remember things that I have scheduled, tickets that I have coming up, and it lets me know about things that I might be interested in. Being someone who keeps a lot of irons in the first, this is really helpful and convenient.
Its pretty chill, easy to use and user friendly. Some nice features and can include more new stuff like sharing pictures of event afterwards and stuff like that.
Pros_Review: Easy to sign up and use.
Cons_Review: Misses details at times.

Overall_Review: It has a nice UX and allows users to easily sign up for events. I recommend this product
