Pros_Review: Stated above
Cons_Review: I wish it kept me signed in so I didn't have to enter my information over and over again.

Overall_Review: I have used Eventbrite to promote several accounting events.  It is easy to use and always works well.  They keep track of all the ticket details and payments for the event.  They allow an easy way to check people in at the event as well.
I have used Eventbrite for several event registrations, and I feel like it is a great balance of ease of use and customization. Will recommend it in the future.
Pros_Review: Ease of use balanced with customization.
Cons_Review: Nothing at this time.

Overall_Review: I've used this to host birthday parties in the past, and I think the authentification with an email address is fairly easy! Of all the simple event management platforms, my friends use this most (though mostly this is being displaced by Facebook).
Benefits are beautiful invites your choice I how elaborate you want it to be.  An easy way to have this program keep track of invites and responses and it also sends  reminders.
Pros_Review: Grafics and invites are beautiful and designed well. Presentation is very impressive. I have used from both receiving an invite and sending out invites to meetings  or events and it has reply to event with options in the response.
Cons_Review: On occasion I have had a glitch or two in responding to an invite. I felt I responded correctly but it did not acknowledge my reply. This happened on  2 occasions.

Overall_Review: Good. I wish it was more widespread. Wish more places used it.
Pros_Review: User interface was great really easy to navigate the website. They show your tickets electronically.
Cons_Review: Not enough places use it. It should be more widespread. They need more advertisement because they're good and more people should use them

Pros_Review: I LOVE THE EASY WAY TO PURCHASE TICKETS FOR UPCOMING EVENTS
Cons_Review: NOTHING BAD TO SAY ABOUT THIS BRAND I LOVE IT

Overall_Review: It is amazing. I have been using this app for a while now.
Pros_Review: I love  this app for event planning. It is easy to use and keeps me notified  of any upcoming events.
Cons_Review: I don't have any cons with this  app. It is great and  I will continue to use it to plan  future events.

Pros_Review: Gemakkelijk in gebruik. Gemakkelijk veel bezoekers te bereiken.
Cons_Review: Site blijft voortdurend vastlopen bij betalingen. Veel bezoekers verloren op deze manier.(evenement) Schande.

Pros_Review: It's easy to use when building a event for your company.
Cons_Review: I can't think of anything I wouldn't like

Overall_Review: My overall experience with Eventbrite has been very pleasant to me! I enjoy looking for the EVENTBRITE name like yes! We're here to make scheduling much simpler than what it should be!
Pros_Review: What I like most about Eventbrite is that it's very easy to manage the schedulings and events when available. The ease of it, on my desktop computer, is that I can easily see the upcoming lists in real time which is a plus!
Cons_Review: The least thing I don't agree with is why hasn't Eventbrite come much sooner rather than later? The page freezes sometimes maybe because of the weather, it do get pretty hot to where equipments are being fried if not stored properly.

Overall_Review: Overall this program is very simple to use and allows an attendee to be reminded of the registration.
Pros_Review: I often interact with this program on behalf of my boss - it makes registering for events super easy and even sends reminders and information about the upcoming event. The receipt has so much detail it makes finding information very easy.
Cons_Review: One thing I like least about this event is that it's up to the creator to include contact information, I wish you'd always have an email for a person if you have questions about an event.

Overall_Review: Our clients have been very happy with this service.
Pros_Review: This is great for promoting local events. Many of our clients have utilized this tool with great success.
Cons_Review: No real complaints. Could maybe use some more flexibility with the tool, but it has almost always fit our needs.

Overall_Review: I have used it to view and respond to events that I have been invited to. I find it to be quick and easy to view the event details and reply in a timely manner.
Pros_Review: It is easy to use. I can view events easily and respond easily and effectively.
Cons_Review: Occasionally there is too much info. I have found this to be confusing and overwhelming.

Overall_Review: All of my banking info is correct but their payments keep getting returned and so am owed months of revenue.
Pros_Review: Another option in the market & appears to be tied in with Evensi that I have enjoyed.
Cons_Review: Terrible customer service for any event organizer. We deserve our own line of help.

Pros_Review: Very friendly, easy to use and have very good value.
Cons_Review: Everything has space to grow and be better.

Pros_Review: It made finding tickets and events in my city very easy.
Cons_Review: Service fees made tickets even more expensive

Pros_Review: I like that you can set up a link for your event to share on social media, and I also like that tickets can be sold through the software. That way, all of the details are in one place if needed.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the Eventbrite software can be confusing to navigate, especially if you do not use it often

Pros_Review: Has an insane amount of features.  Can handle anything you would need when planning an event.
Cons_Review: Extremely expensive.  They do not have a very good a la carte option which can make it prohibitive for smaller firms.

Pros_Review: We were recently introduced to Eventbrite through our Visitors Bureau, I do not manage anything internal, however, on the other side, everything looks great! It has been really easy for us!
Cons_Review: It is a little blocky, however, I believe if we ask for the alterations, they will likely be possible.

Overall_Review: Eventbrite was a great resource. It was simple to set up and get tickets to audience. Simple check out process as well. I would recommend.
Pros_Review: Easily integrated to many devices on end user side. Easily able to access via tablet, smartphone when attending events.
Cons_Review: No response team for questions to be quickly answered and solved.

Pros_Review: Ease of use, simplicity and cost effective
Cons_Review: Reporting can be much improved but sufficient.

Pros_Review: It is easy to buy tickets on this website and to sign up for events. It is convenient to have different types of events in one place.
Cons_Review: It was difficult to find my tickets and sign-ups after I had already paid and signed up for them. This should be simpler.

Overall_Review: Sends reminders before the event. Makes it easy to have the ticket on the app
Pros_Review: Buying tickets in one click is the best part. Filtering and categorizing events is really useful.
Cons_Review: Event location Map should also have had a direct link to the google maps to check the directions

Overall_Review: It's great if you are looking for events or are organizing one of your own !
Pros_Review:
1. It's a good software to be used during booking of events. It's easy, proper guidance is given while guiding you.
2. If you want to organize events of your own, you can get a very good guide for the same as well.
3. Good functionalities provided, with a good number of helping videos and FAQs. Go ahead with this one, if you are to organize events.
Cons_Review:
1. To change some setting, it's easy to do, but still you have check each page to ensure the changes have been made.
2. Make a live chatbot available for a better user experience.

Overall_Review: It's a good way to keep track of what you're going to and respond to different invites
Pros_Review: My college uses this for event invites and it makes it super easy to rsvp
Cons_Review: It won't let you rsvp maybe, you eventually have to pick yes or no. It's not really an issue just a personal preference

Overall_Review: Overall, an easy to use platform and the customer service cannot be beat.
Pros_Review: The ease of setting up an account mostly, but the customer service is next level  The best we have encountered.
Cons_Review: I wish I could see who was attending without sharing on social media.

Pros_Review: We had to create an event for our local branch and it was very easy to set up and use. They offer all the features you need to organize an event, get RSVPs and communicate with your audience.
Cons_Review: It was slightly complicated to use initially, but if you know someone who has used it before, it can be straight forward.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is the quickest and most comfortable way to book your place for an event. I've used it for conferences and seminars but also for cultural happenings, festivals and concerts.
Cons_Review: I think more event managers should start using this software. In some countries it is not popular yet.

Pros_Review: This software tells you about all the events that are happening in your town.
Cons_Review: I can't say anything negative about this software.

Pros_Review: I used this for the purchases of event tickets great product
Cons_Review: I have no problem with this product keep up the great work

Pros_Review: I loved that this software allowed our company to, not only invite many community members to our event, but also to keep track of those who had registered and responded. This made planning for our event so much easier!
Cons_Review: At times, some of the clickable headings seemed somewhat ambiguous.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to track events and get the word out.
Cons_Review: I don't have any dislikes when it comes to Eventbrite.

Pros_Review: Quick and very easy to use. Not a lot of non-sense on page, which makes for less confusion. I was able to get on find what I was looking for and check out without any issues.
Cons_Review: I myself have no complaints once so ever about this site. Although I did have a very small issue trying to find event I was looking for.

Pros_Review: This is very easy to use. I love that you are also able to ingrate with other apps as well. I like the back office portion of this too because you are able to send out invitations via email.
Cons_Review: The few times that I needed to contact customer service have been rather difficult.

Pros_Review: The offer is clear. It does what it says it does. Efficient
Cons_Review: There are many competitors and I think that Eventbrite doesn't adapt that quickly

Pros_Review: As a nursing student, Eventbrite is an amazing software to use when hosting, attending, or planning a big event. I've used Eventbrite while attending numerous parties, and conferences. It's easy to use, and quick.
Cons_Review: It does get a little tricky navigating through the software at some points.

Pros_Review: Easy to use and has great organization for events.
Cons_Review: Not able to customize anything. Has generic layout across the site.

Pros_Review: What I like most about Eventbrite is that it helps promote our events with minimal effort involved.
Cons_Review: What I like least about Eventbrite is that it is not very well known and therefore has a small audience.

Pros_Review: I use it for one of my clients. They have a lot of small lectures that are open to the public. Helps them gain some new followers and customers. Also a very great company to work with and has great customer service.
Cons_Review: I have nothing negative to say about this since they make it so easy.

Pros_Review: I'm able to book tickets to all events so quickly. Easy way to get the tickets i need!
Cons_Review: Nothing, it's simple to use and understand.

Pros_Review: Its simple and easy to use for local events. The user just inputs their info to register.
Cons_Review: It could add more functionality and customization.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use! Love the features showing events in my area, option to like different types of events and a great place to hold on to my tickets (making it so easy at the door).
Cons_Review: As far as I've used it, I've had no problems. Everything is clearly laid out and very user friendly.

Pros_Review: This software makes it easy to create, view and attend events. Very user friendly.
Cons_Review: There is very little that I would say needs improvement.

Pros_Review: i love the app UX design,easy to navigate and have access to tickets and event in the area. i love he recommendation that the app comes up with
Cons_Review: transferring tickets, i ad a ticket i wanted to give o a friend and it was hard to figure out how to do that i ended up not doing it, big con for me

Pros_Review: I just recently started using Eventbrite and it is very easy to use. I am able to purchase tickets for events as well as create and sell tickets for my own event.
Cons_Review: The organizer app is a little difficult to use at first I think maybe like a guide can be useful for first time users

Overall_Review: This site an be used by anyone! We use it at my company for tracking events for employees to see how many people are actually coming to our events when they sign up. This helps us plan for the future!
I use Eventbrite for ticketing with free and paid events. They take care of payment processing and even do some promotion within the Eventbrite user community - all for a commission on each sale.
Super easy to setup events and manage attendees and invite through Eventbrite. Would recommend it for any size business.
Pros_Review: Ease of use.
Cons_Review: Could have more customization options.

Overall_Review: I've used EventBrite to find good networking events in my area and have been impressed by the ease of use. You can filter by type of event you're interested in and pay directly through the app, which is convenient.
Ive used eventbrite to sign up/buy tickets to local events. its a nice platform and easy to use
My overall experience is great I love the platform I love the way its set up
Pros_Review: I believe that it was very easy to understand very well laid out nice platform I would definitely come back and use it over and over and I would definitely recommend it to others
Cons_Review: There wasn't really anything that I didn't like about it I don't really know what to write right here because I really didn't have any issues

Overall_Review: Good overall experience using eventbrite.Would use again
Pros_Review: First time using eventbrite and I would definitely use it again.  Made it easy to buy tickets,  and sell them when needed
Cons_Review: Initially had an issue setting price for a ticket i was trying to sell, but I was able to resolve this issue

Pros_Review: Amazing ticket application and user-friendly. Setting up events and selling tickets to that event is a straightforward and simple process. Even if you aren't selling tickets to an event, but rather looking for local events and need tickets, Eventbrite is where to go! Also, as a host, I love how you can leave a personal message on the ticket confirmation page.
Cons_Review: Sometimes it can be difficult to search for a specific event, at times I'll search for a certain event and nothing comes up in the results even though I'm positive the event is in Eventbrite.

Overall_Review: Really great . A very pleasing and honest experience
Pros_Review: It's honestly an amazing software. it allows you to host an event and manage tickets as the users purchase them
Cons_Review: the pricing is a bit much for my taste and the user interface and design is a bit outdated in my honest opinion

Overall_Review: Bad, I personally would never attend any event on there anymore.
Pros_Review: Integratability and ease of use. Could be a good tool if you host an event for the first time. Not too much beyond that.
Cons_Review: Event experience is awful. They seems to have to screening in place for event providers. Consumer lost their money and time. Tried multiple times and no improvement.

Pros_Review: I never had to look up any of the steps, or what was next, to book my event. It was self explanatory.
Cons_Review: There were just so many steps. Like, I could understand what was next, but it just seemed like there were lots of pages to click through. Otherwise, very easy to use.

Overall_Review: It is a very useful source, when you are planning an event
Pros_Review: This software was good when i need it for an event that i was trying to go to.  I didn't really use it that much
Cons_Review: There was nothing that i found to dislike about it. It helped me when i needed for that particular time

Pros_Review: I personally use evenbrite to seek out competitors and what their marketing dept does sometimes when it comes to event launching.It helps us also gain recognition and networking benefits.
Easily able to pull up tickets and create pdfs/guest lists. Whether as an event runner or a participant, events remain well-organized with little hassle.
Cons_Review: Depending on the event, the surcharges on individual tickets can be pricey and a hassle to deal with.

Pros_Review: I like that it is functional on all social platforms. Many organizations and event planners use this software. I consistently see it online for big social outings and city wide events. It is easy to use and functional.
Cons_Review: Very little to complain about the software.

Pros_Review: I love how easy this was to have others collaborate on events and send updates on party planning/events! Such a great way to manage events with others, personal or business!
Cons_Review: The least thing I like about the ticketing price of the software is the 2.5% processing fee.

Overall_Review: Horrible.  Worst experience. Worst customer Service. If you are an event organizer do not use it because you are losing out on potential clients!
Pros_Review: Nothing- it is horrible and no one should use it.
Cons_Review: As a customer looking to book several events, this service has never worked for me.  I have cleared history, used different servers, different email address, different credit cards, and still I cannot sign up for events that I want to support. I contacted customer support and received a generic form response that said to do what I already did. Issue is still not resolved.

Overall_Review: I attended a few food and beer festivals on facebook that used eventbrite.  No issues.
Pros_Review: It was easy to scan facebook events and get tickets ahead of time for interests.
Cons_Review: Not always clear that an eventbrite ticket is required for certain events.

Overall_Review: For small businesses looking to promote events, sell tickets or increase recognition this is a great cost effective way to do so!
Pros_Review: I first discovered eventbrite from an invitation to an event.  The ease of use, professionalism and quality was great.
Cons_Review: Customers that aren't familiar with technology may have problems getting tickets.

Pros_Review: Super nice software to help promote local events.
Cons_Review: No issues with this at this time to write about.

Pros_Review: What i liked most about eventbrite is the ability to search for specific events in their selected 10 states that provides you with dates, times, location and opportunity to grab a spot.
Cons_Review: What i liked least is the fact that it only has 10 states in which they provide information about events.

Pros_Review: I think it's super easy to use and get your event out there. It's definitely the best place place for local events with tickets. Tickets can easily be added to your apple wallet too which is great.
Cons_Review: Sometimes there are fake tickets on there

Pros_Review: The Ability to Manage an Event all in one space is a what I like most about Eventbrite. It has been a lifesaver for my personal use and the business side of things as well.
Cons_Review: Eventbrite has cover pretty much everything and has exceeded my expectations.

Pros_Review: It's simple and scalable, I can organize an event for 50 people or 300 people and that would take the ticket load off my shoulders. Can be set up in minutes.
Cons_Review: I'd be happy to see some more colorful themes if possible. But I have no real reservations after using this platform.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite allows your event to not only keep track of how many people are attending/buying tickets to attend but also, with its search feature, allows you to publicize your event to the community.
Cons_Review: There is a fee when you choose to collect fees for your event through the website.

Pros_Review: Simple, straight forward and effective for events
Cons_Review: Limited appearance of the basic forms and tickets

Pros_Review: This really helps us to do manage the events. The function is easy to use. Great experience to using this
Cons_Review: A lot of the settings are in places that don't make much sense and you have to go to completely different sections. It's totally weird

Pros_Review: This app is #1 for me if I plan our family weekend or holidays. Very easy to find events by your interests especially if you are new to the city. So many free choices. Eventbrite app is user-friendly and very convenient.
Cons_Review: I would say "nothing". Every time I use it, I find what I need.

Pros_Review: It is a good tool to create events, and make the sale of tickets through the same page, it is quite easy to use and learn
Cons_Review: The commission for the entrance sale is a little high, but it is quite similar to the rest of the sites that fulfill the same functionality

Pros_Review: Super easy to create an event. I love using this to create Clinic events for work and its free. Super simple to use, can finish an event in less then 10 minutes. AMAZING!
Cons_Review: Wish some of the premium stuff would be available to the free creations but it is what it is.

Pros_Review: The forms are easy to use phenomenal user experience.
Cons_Review: Branding is difficult,CMS options are too limited.

Pros_Review: Very easy and quick to do an evite for an event or party.    You can choose themes, pick from your contact list.
Cons_Review: I wish they had more themes to pick from for event to personalize it a little more.   I could not find a decent picture of a beach.

Pros_Review: We love using Eventbrite for our events. We are a small non-profit ran on volunteers this takes some of the worries away when selling tickets.
Cons_Review: Not a lot of options to make it "pretty" but it works for selling tickets if you are looking for an elaborate ticket page this is not it.

Pros_Review: I use this website to create events to share with fellow student about our upcoming events in club. It works great and is very user friendly.
Cons_Review: I do not have any negative comments about this software and will continue to recommend it to my friends.

Pros_Review: Using this software internally and externally have been somewhat of a breeze. Self explanatory, although not always reliable. Does what you are asking of it.
Cons_Review: The regulatory aspect of this website needs upgrading. I find it frustrating that ANYONE, ANYWHERE can upload fake events and reap the benefits of scamming someone on this website.

Overall_Review:
It is really easy to use, get tickets or making rsvps to events.
Really like it saves to apple's wallet to make it easier to find tickets.
the software was easy to use to purchase tickets for a local event, with no problems at the door unlike other major ticketing outlets.
Pros_Review: ease of use
Cons_Review: no problems

Overall_Review: Eventbrite has allowed me to manage my event tickets/listing effortlessly, fast and with great design. Never looked at another ticketing platform since I tried it!
As a student, I run into Eventbrite everywhere. It's a good tool for ticketing, and has a clean interface that is very easy on the eyes, and user friendly.
Thanks it's really good I like how u can meet new ppl and share your ideas it's also free to sign up
Pros_Review: How easy it is to use
Cons_Review: How easy it is to use

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is the core of my business.  I use it for all events.  The interface is highly customizable, extremely easy to use, and I love the ability to customize the order form so I get more information on the attendees.

Actuallykept filling out the same information over and over it felt like...i fi ally closed out the app hoping that they got my registration and waited for a confirmation email letting me know that i indeed was registered...which i did receive..
Pros_Review: I thought it would be great with all the covid stuff happening..no contact way to sign up for an event...
Cons_Review: Once i got into teying to sign up for an event that i wanted to attend the whole process became very confusing...i felt like i was doing the registration process over and over again

Overall_Review: Overall it is very useful. We use it at my company for community events.
Pros_Review: It is a very useful tool for easily RSVPing to events and adding them to your calendar. Also, I like the descriptions and easy way to add a new event.
Cons_Review: Sometimes the homepage feels crowded and hard to navigate. It is sometimes hard to organically find an event if you don't know the name of it.

Pros_Review: This software is great and easy to use for either a paid or unpaid event. Easy to post an event and receive confirmations.
Cons_Review: The only con is searching events sometimes it will show me events weeks out instead of same day like selected.

Pros_Review: I have attended numerous events with Eventbrite tickets, and it is always easy to get tickets and provide info to event organizers when they are using Eventbrite. I've also helped out with an event that created tickets using Eventbrite, and we found it so simple to create the event, as well as to see who was planning to come and to collect ticket fees.
Cons_Review: It's unfortunate that, even for events that directly benefit nonprofits or charities, or are organized as humanitarian fundraisers, Eventbrite still takes a substantial cut of each ticket.

Overall_Review: I have both hosted and attended events on Eventbrite, and it has been working great for me.
Pros_Review: Website is self-explanatory and easy to use. Perfect for simple events that don't require too many options. It is also  compatible with Google Calendar for easy transfer.
Cons_Review: Not many cons about this platform. It can be a bit more expensive than some platforms, but it is definitely worth it.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has a great outreach - very useful to reach out to my network about my events
Cons_Review: Not easily compatible with MS Outlook or other MS OFfice tools

Pros_Review: Very intuitive and easy to setup free events. Organizes wait list well and able to export badges easily. I love the email alert setup.
Cons_Review: Not always intuitive but capabilities more than make up for this.

Pros_Review: The lovely lay out it provides for many of our notifications to our staff, familes and the comunity.
Cons_Review: The cost , ifyou chose to go past the trial period, I think could be a bit more friendlier to us.

Pros_Review: i like it all, it helps me in everything when i'm going to organize my event (ticket, list of guest, email remind to all guest ecc..)
Cons_Review: Long-time to get payed, 15 days after even ending

Pros_Review:
Allows you to post both free and paid events
Has options for payments through the site
Keeps the RSVP list all in one place
Cons_Review: From my position, I didn't have any issues with the software.

Pros_Review: It is very easy to use. As a small group of people, we needed something uncomplicated to keep track of events and attendees. As a university group, we need to keep a tight tab on numbers so we can plan and budget appropriately. It also makes it super easy to sell tickets since most university students want the convenience of purchasing through a phone or laptop.
Cons_Review: The email templates are very plain. Not a huge issues as most people read about the event on a Facebook page or post before they purchase tickets or RSVP to events anyways.

Pros_Review: Love that many tickets that i purchase go through Eventbrite and how their targeted email campaigns allow users to explore local and upcoming events
Cons_Review: No complaints at the moment regarding this platform

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a of the best invitation category,  the best part is it allows users to plan and invite pattipants to an even for free, so long as the event is free to attend.
Cons_Review: I have never had any problem using Eventbrite, works just fine.

Pros_Review: Events look very professional when the sign-up sheet is streamline and easy to use which is why I really appreciate Eventbrite!
Cons_Review: I can't think of any improvements because it's so easy to use!

Pros_Review: It has an end to end slution for you event organization, including ticketing and social media sharing
Cons_Review: You do need to adjust your event specifications to what the platform is requesting

Pros_Review: With Eventbrite, you can focus on the quality of your event and forget about ticketing and billing.
Cons_Review: They do take a fee off paid tickets, but I think it's justified by the time it saves

Pros_Review: Eventbrite has been amazing for us. It has allowed us to streamline our ticketing process for events in a much, much better fashion that what we were doing before.
Cons_Review: Nothing! I wish we had been using it earlier.

Pros_Review: It does its job. I was part of a team using Eventbrite to set up an event once and all in all it was a fair experience!
Cons_Review: It was a little confusing to figure out some of the settings/ wasn't as intuitive to use as I would have wanted.

Pros_Review: Relatively simple to use - used elsewhere so large familiarity with product
Cons_Review: Always seems to have more blotware and 3rd party ads associated with it

Pros_Review: This is the best option out there for my needs at the time
Cons_Review: I think there should be some different options for basic free use

Pros_Review: I was pretty impressed with my experience using Eventbrite.  I was most pleased with the information on the help pages that gave me ideas on what I should include in my ticket description.  The registration tool is really great and does a good job of keeping track of who responded, what their response was, head  counts, etc.
Cons_Review: The features were really nice but the cost reflects this.  And while they have the Essentials package which doesn't have all of the frills as the higher-price options, the % fee can still be steep.  I would prefer less features for a lower cost.

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it super easy to create events, sell tickets, and track attendees. This is an essential tool for anyone who organizes ticketed events.
Cons_Review: Nothing comes to mind.  Eventbrite works perfectly for all my event related needs.

Overall_Review: Very good, I had two successful events so far.
Pros_Review: In one hub you can manage the event, including many useful functionalities, like sending emails, adding to your website, sending reminders etc.
Cons_Review: Could be integrated with more applications.

Overall_Review: Buying and selling tickets was and is very easy with this site and they send you email confirmations which is always a plus in my book.
Pros_Review: How easy it is to purchase using this site
Cons_Review: I really have nothing negative to say about this site.

Pros_Review: this app is amazing for keeping up to date events going on in the area. I love it to bits, couldn't do without it.
Cons_Review: It maybe doesnt include all events, sometimes the once of my interest as well.

Overall_Review: Highly recommended.

Cons_Review: #NAME?

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is an overall good quality way of scheduling and managing events.  I was surprised to see that the software also has a ticket component which is very helpful for online users.
Pros_Review: Easily accessed online by a variety of viewers.
Cons_Review: Sometimes difficult to navigate when developing a new event.

Pros_Review: The software is easy to integrate with you website and also the back end to fill it with enough information for your event to stand out.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything negative about this company. It met all my needs for the specific marketing that I need for my type of business.

Pros_Review: As a user of this software I was very impressed by the simplicity and elegance of claiming tickets. The app was an easy download and install.
Cons_Review: I do not have anything negative to say about my experience with EventBrite. It was nice not being scalped!

Overall_Review: It's the best digital solution to event ticketing.
Pros_Review: The organiser app is so easy to use and is the perfect solution for modern event management.
Cons_Review: It has limited customization as far as digital integration goes. It would be great to see more feature-rich flexibility with 3rd party platforms.

Pros_Review: The ease of use has been great, and the ability to get the event out to so many and consumers seem to trust Eventbrite.
Cons_Review: Still getting used to using the software so right now there is not and constructive feedback.

Overall_Review: Keep it up!
Pros_Review: I love Eventbrite because it is simple to advertise your event and give your customers easy access to tickets.
Cons_Review: I don't have anything that I don't like currently. I have only used the product to create classes for dog training.

Pros_Review: Not locked into an ecosystem that is harvesting every little bit of data you produce. Straightforward to use, set up tickets and send out updates.
Cons_Review: Follow up emails and marketing to event participants / attendees sometimes causes strife.

Overall_Review: It is great for organizing and advertising events, especially free ones.
Pros_Review: Simple interface, user-friendly design without sacrificing function
Cons_Review: Not much filtering, so good legitimate events can often get mixed up with suspicious ones

Pros_Review: Eventbrite is a great way to manage all of my upcoming events and holding all of my passes/tickets/information on my phone!
Cons_Review: Searching for events doesn't always bring up the most relevant or relatable events that I would like to attend.

Pros_Review: I love this program. It is extremely easy and convenient not only to post tickets and information to an event but also to purchase them. Very good concept.
Cons_Review: Nothing that comes to mind at this time.

Pros_Review: The fact that the free version also gives great opportunity to put one's programmes out to the public
Cons_Review: Just like every software, the free version limitation is there, I wish it wasn't but it is. But for me there really isn't any cons so far. I  am but a new user

Pros_Review: Love how easy it was to create events and the ease of invitations! Easy way to track who is coming and who has declined!
Cons_Review: I would love if you could have a phone app for this so you can always check on it on the go and not have to use browser.

Pros_Review: I like the fact you can use it every time you want and create your event. In addition, you can send it in different ways.
Cons_Review: There is nothing I don't like about this software. It is a good tool to create your event, to share it and to have people there.

Pros_Review: I think the thing I liked the most about the eventbrite software was the ease of use with their platform and app.
Cons_Review: If i had to pick a con I think the only thing I almost wish there were more advanced check in features, i've seen some that allow selfie check ins and other methods.

Pros_Review: Great way to get marketing for an event. Pretty easy to set up an account. I like the fact you can add more than 1 person on an account.
Cons_Review: We were not expecting to have to pay eventbrite for creating an account. This was a surprise however we still will use the system

Pros_Review: I like most that at anytime I can look up events around me, whether I am at home or out of town. It keeps me in the know of current things to do.
Cons_Review: The only thing I don't like about Eventbrite it that it won't show you all the events in your area, just some.

Overall_Review: Easy way to advertise and get people out to your event!
Pros_Review: Eventbrite is the best way to both promote and get people out to your event! I have used this to promote job candidates to come to a job fair. We got a good amount of people to show up in a short period of advertising. I also use it to find local events that I am personally interested in. It has a nice/easy to use layout where you can add customized text and photos.  You can also collect money for your event.
Cons_Review: There isn't much to dislike - it is a great way to promote an event and learn about what is happening in your area.

Pros_Review:
Easy to use App. The sync with caInlander is very good. 
Also easy way to see what networking events are in our area.
Cons_Review: In terms of designing our events and making it feel like our branding, there isn't alot of features that allows for this.

Pros_Review: Wonderful for nonprofits. Streamlined ticket and check-in processes and provided great back-end data.

Pros_Review:
very easy to use
lots of functionality
free to use!
allows me to created small to medium sized events for staff and clients

there could be more functions but would expect to pay a premium for this. 
would like it to be a bit more editable

Overall_Review: nothing to dislike, really. it's very simple. nicely designed. it's my favorite tool to manage our events
Pros_Review: it's very easy to manage the event management in our hotel, from 'mini meetings' to more important venues I like it it's very easy and powerful

Overall_Review: Used a promoter regulary. Very inutitative and easy to use.
Pros_Review: Ease of use
Cons_Review: Offline use

Overall_Review: I use Eventbrite all the time for when I am needing to rsvp for activities. Especially during SXSW.
Pros_Review: I like the ease and convience of the app. I like that I could do everything on my phone.
Cons_Review: I don't really have anything bad to say about the product. I feel that it might glitch on me sometimes. But overall its great.

Pros_Review: Very easy to use, and efficient. I have had no issue with this application/software before. I like how you can pull up a ticket on your phone

Overall_Review: No thanks!

Overall_Review: Event bright has been a great tool for event invitations

Pros_Review: Showing all events in my area with good selection of events and time slots. I like the fact it gives me quick feedback on events.

Overall_Review: Great to easily build and market any event with.  Has all the features needed to sell, manage and communicate with your attending crowd.
Very nice and wonderful seat booking and ticket allotting software for organizing event in a smooth and easy manner.
I use this product for all my events. Sometimes it can be confusing trying to find certain functions
Eventbrite is a great tool! I use it all the time to send invites and track guest counts. Very intuitive and highly recommended!
We hold quite a few events in the space and we use Eventbrite quite a lot. I like the ease of the software.
Makes it easy to keep track of events and tickets. Also allows me to not have to print tickets which is good for the environment.
It worked perfectly and the quality was amazing. I would buy it again if i could. The best product i have seen
The software was very easy to use. If you had any questions or concerns the customer service was easy to get a hold and answer you right away.
This software is very educational.  It helped me expand my business in ways I could never have imagined.
Pros_Review: It broadens the management side of my business giving me complete flexibility.
Cons_Review: I really don't have anything that I dislike about the software.

Overall_Review: Easy to use.  Find popular local events, get event recommendations just for you, and see which events your friends are going to!
I use eventbrite, to plan out weekend activities.
Its been an easy way to maintain all my event tickets and passes anywhere and anytime as its both web and app based.
It was great and loved it. Never had anything like it before. A lot of people should like it as I did.
Worked great, minor issues with speed.  Lagging was an issue once or twice but straightened out after a little bit
The software was pretty helpful.  It helped me to find exactly what I was looking for without too much jumping from place to place.

Having the ability to schedule time and speak with an expert made first time use of the system easy and efficient.   The custom needs of my event's ticket sales were all easily met with Eventbrite's flexible application.
Pros_Review: Easy to use, self explanatory.  Being able to direct questions to a person rather than having to wade through help files is a definite plus.  Receiving email copies of every purchase is also a plus.
Cons_Review: Not being able to preview the messages sent with ticket sales.  This was overcome by purchasing a free ticket.

Overall_Review: This is a great product for scheduling events with friends. It is easy to use and easy to navigate for personal and business.
We are very happy with the way Eventbrite supports our non profit promotion of events. It's really easy for our followers to use and it helps us continually update our database.

Pros_Review: This product puts local events at your finger tips - a great place to grab tickets for events.

Pros_Review: very easy to use, everything is clear and fast

Overall_Review: I use it to search for business events that are related to real estate. It's the only app that I'm aware of other than Facebook. However it's easier to sort through than gacebook

Cons_Review: I really don't have any issues with the app
reasons_choosing: Easier to sort and can follow organizers

Overall_Review: I am very pleased.
Pros_Review: I love how great it is to use for events.
Cons_Review: I can not complain about this software.

Pros_Review: I used this for the first time in June when I booked a conference. Overall it was ok, very easy to book and also to locate the event I wanted to attend.

Overall_Review: Overall. A good and effective application to use for taking classes.

Pros_Review: Ease of use,  simple to sign up,  simple to use

Pros_Review: Super easy to use and made even sharing easy!

Overall_Review: It is a very useful tool for the organization of events

Overall_Review: Eventbrite is a convenient software my company uses to coordinate pop up classes.

Overall_Review: Easy to use. Wish it synced with all calendar types.

Overall_Review: it was great and easy. You just pull up the app and the ticket is saved on your phone for them to scan.
Pros_Review: very easy
Cons_Review: nothing

Overall_Review: Highly recommended to use. Really great. I like it.
Pros_Review: Amazing software to register for online events/webinars. Gives all the important notifications about upcoming webinars. Send notifications/remainders of registered events and timings accurately.
Cons_Review: Well generally it's really a great software. Nothing bad. Just the pricing for premium are little high by my standards.

Overall_Review: We use Eventbrite to provide information of any events going on and keeping track of reservations and guests.
Pros_Review: I like that it is very simple and easy to use. For the people who are responding to events, the UX could not be any easier to understand.
Cons_Review: I dislike how the data is displayed and the limits of the response data the creators of the event get. Little control of visualization.

Overall_Review: Feature-rich tool for setting up and managing physical events
Pros_Review: I've only used Eventbrite a handful of times but found it great each time. It makes it easy to set up an event and manage it, all the way from first launch to dealing with attendee's and their tickets on the day.
Cons_Review: No issues, tools are self-explanatory and worked without problems, didn't need to contact customer support

Pros_Review: Eventbrite makes it easy to get tickets to local events and also to book signings in the area. It also makes it easy to promote various events in the city and for charity events, so that we don't have to print actual tickets, that may or may not be purchased.
Cons_Review: There weren't any cons to the product. The directions were straight forward and easy to set up.

Pros_Review: I like how you can link your event and make it easy to share. I like how the platform sends reminders, you can buy tickets, and it has directions ready for you.
Cons_Review: Creating an event can be kind of tricky because its hard to replicate another event like other links that seem easy. Would be nice to have a template type of events. Using this platform was okay.

Pros_Review: The software is very consistent. Easy to navigate.
Cons_Review: I honestly don't have anything negative to say.

Overall_Review: Highly positive experience!
Pros_Review: With Eventbrite, my event succeeded in targeting a larger audience, with the same interest. I also greatly appreciate the fact that Eventbrite gave my event and cause a better visibility. Fair pricing also.
Cons_Review: As of date, I did not find any drawbacks with the software. One improvement could be to provide a number of tickets purchase free of the percentage that they take as revenue.

Pros_Review: Easy to use versatile and engages with numerous people
Cons_Review: Old fashiones, lacking chic design and freebies

Overall_Review: This product is great because it helps get our tickets for events with our non profit organization GO4IT. Its under the company Asset Builders of America.
Forget buying and shipping tickets... keeping up with a piece of paper until the conference arrives... Eventbrite takes it all and makes it simple!
Pros_Review: Ticket tracking and keeping your tickets in the app
Cons_Review: Its a great app - No need to change a thing!

Overall_Review: web site was great but the app kept crashing.  Uninstalled and reinstalled and still crashes.  Gave up.

Pros_Review: I love how I can easily integrate this tool with Facebook to let my clients purchase tickets to my events directly from Facebook.
Cons_Review: I wish the purchase page for the tickets would be a bit more customizable (more than just the banner). I wish we could brand it more, especially for corporate events.

Pros_Review: A free way to promote your local event by region or city.
Cons_Review: I don't like the ticket option if it's a free event, people get confused.

Overall_Review: As a consumer, this is a really easy interface to use and scalable to set up for events of all sizes.
Used this several times for parties and fundraising event. Super easy to use.
Pros_Review: Online and easy.
Cons_Review: None really.

Overall_Review: Positive experience and will continue using for future events.
Pros_Review: We have used this software to schedule multiple events, some paid and some free. In both cases, it was very user friendly and intuitive to set it all up.
Cons_Review: No real negatives to report. Anything I had questions on , I was able to figure out on my own. All good.

Overall_Review: Overall it has helped us plan events for the company but I do feel that there is room for improvement

Overall_Review: Overall, I will highly recommend Eventbrite to others!

Overall_Review: The overall experience is been positive and I would continue to utilize the program.

Pros_Review: It is easy to see what events are coming up and find more information.

Pros_Review: It was so easy to set up an event and track our ticket sales and know exactly who was coming
Cons_Review: I honestly didn't have any issues! The customer service was great and ready if I had any problems, which I didn't!

Pros_Review: It was really wonderful. It was ready to navigate and is a great to use.

Pros_Review: It's relatively easy to set up ticketing for events or schedule events.

customer service via email has not been helpful in refunding our money. they are just pocketing peoples money. how does a company like this exist.

Overall_Review: I have been able to RSVP for multiple events on this site
i love it and i would pay the subscription for the full use for my business

Cons_Review: There are so many other resources for things such as this, that it seems superfluous. I also have local, reliable resources, that I seem to choose to support over this company. I find that I don't choose Eventbrite first, second, or third much of the time.

Pros_Review: I like how it gives events happening nearby or by location of your choice. It gives description and ability to purchase tickets through the website. Good if looking for something to do.

Pros_Review:

This software allows me to easily organize and schedule events.  So far I love it!
